item.text: rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs/ khro bo pun d+ha rI ka'i tan+t+ra bzhugs so// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs/ khro bo pun d+ha rI ka'i tan+t+ra/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// he ru ka yi sgrub lugs 'di// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan pas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// 'jig rten sa bdag lha klu la// sa rin byin te sa bslang ngo// sa gzhi de yi phyi mtshams su// sa las byas pa'i mtho bzhi brtsig/ mthu chen rgyal po sde bzhi ru// spyan drangs byin gyis brlabs la gzhag/ de nas dam sri gnan par bya// sgo nas 'dom gang phyi rol du// mkha' 'dra'i hom khung khru gang ba// gru gsum pa la zlum por bri// dur khrod mnan pa'i thod pa la// nang du dam sri bris nas ni// dur khrod rkang gi phur bu la/ khro bo Ar+ya a tsa lar// bskyed nas sgrub pa po rnams kyis// dur khrod

phur bu bzhi glangs la// phyogs nas 'dril zhing gdab pa'i tshul// bstan cing gnan pa'i las bya'o// dkyil 'khor bkra shis par bya'i phyir// bkra shis pa yis smon lam gdab// bsgrub pa che chung gang bsgrub pa// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han+da la// gsol byang bris la shar du gzhag/ bskyed pa'i sa bon 'byung ba lnga// dkyil 'khor bskyed cing bsgom par bya// de ltar dbang chen bskyed nas ni// gsal bar gyur pa de steng du// rin po che yi gzhal yas khang// ta la'i skyed shing cong cong dril// de nang dur khrod gzhal yas khang// rgya khyon dpag tu med pa'i nang// che mchog he ru ka dbu dgu// phyag nyi shu rtsa gcig/ spyan nyi shu rtsa bdun 'bar ba/ zhabs brgyad du gtams pa'o// hUM hUM/ de nas zhal zas la sogs la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bskyed// de steng tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de ltar gsal bar bsgoms nas ni// dkyil 'khor de yi snga de nub/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang/ spang skong klag pa dang// tsha tshwa gdab pa la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ci cher bskyed/ de nas maN+Dal ba'i ko ba tsam byas la/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga bshams la// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa dang// 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa dang/ mgon po yon tan gyi mgron rnams la mchod pa dang/ khams gsum snying rje'i mgron rnams la spyin pa dang/ re ba bskang ba dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ smon bcol bgyi'o// de yang gtor ma cha gsum rnams rim gyis mchod cing gtang bar bya/ gtor ma tha mal dmigs nas lan chags kyi bgegs su gyur pa rnams la bsngo/ de na sar sog g.yas pa la/ khrag gi yi ge bris nas ni/ gzhal yas sgo la gdags par bya/ de nas phur pa dar gyi cod pan can bcu mnga' gsol la/ phyogs mtshams su bzhag go/ de nas rdo rje gzhon nu dang bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i las bya'o// tshon rtsi rnam pa lnga po yang/ tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod cing/ snying po lngas byin gyis brlab bo// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor khru gang ba/ bdud rtsi lnga yi go ma yi/ dri chen dri chus skyang nul bya/ de na gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa

gcig la/ las kyi rdo rje mor dbang bskur la/ thig skud 'khel du gzhug go/ de nas thig skud spyi bor bzhag la/ gnas lngar dpa' bo 'bru lnga dgod do// 'bru lnga spros bsdus pas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lngar dbang bskur la/ ye shes lngar byin gyis brlab bo// mo har ti dza zhes brjod pas/ yum kun tu bzang mor byin gyis brlab bo// de nas yab yum gyi mkha' rdo rje pad+mor byin gyis brlab bo// byang chub kyi sems 'od zhur gyur pas dkyil 'khor gyi thog tu dkar mer kyis gyur pa bsam mo// de nas dz+nyA na hUM zhes brjod pas gnam thig gdab/ badzra su tra ma ti kra ma hUM zhes brjod pas sa thig gdab// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus su zla gam zlum por bya// mtha' ma rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// sgo bzhi pa dang ldan par bya// de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor la// dbus su b+han+da mtshan ldan la// yab yum snying po bris la gzhag/ dbus kyi b+han+da'i mdun drang du// b+han+da shing lo'i 'dab ma la// ma brgyad snying po bris la gzhag b+han+da tshal bu bzhi la/ bsgrub pa'i gsang mtshan dang gsol byang bris la gzhag/ gzhan yang zhing chen gyi ras gos/ sha chen gyi lang ling/ rgyan gyis brgyan par gzhag/ tshil chen gyi me mar la/ dur khrod kyi zhing ras kyis sdong bu byas la btang ngo// de nas lha bshos zla gam la rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas pa dang/ dam rdzas tshang ba'i gtor ma la tshil chen gyi zhal khebs can dang// sgrub pa po rnams kyi mdun du b+han+da'i bzed phor dang/ dmar gyi ar+g+ha dang bcas drang ngo// de nas sgrub pa po rnams kyi rak+ta'i thig le dang/ zhag gi zo ris/ thal chen gyi tshom bu gdab bo// rtags dang mtshan mas btab nas rgyan spras te bzhugs so// de nas zhi khro'i las gzhung bzhin byas la/ lha re re la bsnyen pa brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo// 'dzab rdzogs pa dang thugs dam bskul phrin las bcol lo// stong tshigs kyi mchod pa cho gas dbul/ yang na stong tshigs kyi mchod pa dang zhal zas mchod pa dbul/ yang bsnyen pa yang nyin mtshan gcig la drug stong bgrang/ dgongs dang tho rangs gtor ma gtang/ gtor ma slad ma yang de'i rjes su gtang/ de lan re la yang mtshams bcad pa dang/ zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor bskyaid do// stan mi sprug/ gral mi bsnor/ langs pa'i tshe stan byin gyis brlab bo// de nas bsgrub pa phyin pa dang gtor ma tsho gsum du bcad de/ tsho gcig sbyin bsreg bya/ tsho gcig mkha' 'gro la bskyang/ tsho gcig mi zad pa'i gter du sba/ de nas sgo dbye/ pra brtag sgrub pa rim pa nas dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing dbang bskur/ dngos grub bkra shis gsol la tshogs bya/ de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu/ slob dpon la yon 'bul/ nongs

pa bzod par gsol/ de nas gtor ma cha gcig la tshangs pa brgya byin la bsngo/ mtshams klong ngo// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ zla gam gcig pa'i sgrub lugs te gcig pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las phyag rgya chen po dgu bsgrub pa'i phyir// zla gam dgu pa'i sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// 'jig rten sa bdag lha klu la// sa rin bcal te sa bslang ngo// phyi nang sa yi mtshams rnams su// phyogs bzhi dag tu mtho bzhi gzug/ rgyal chen bzhi ru mnga' gsol lo// de nas shes rab mtshan dang ldan pa gcig thig skud 'khel du bcug/ dpa' bo 'bru lngas byin gyis brlab/ tsa ra d+ha ra hi zhes thig gdab/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i dbus su// zla gam dmar po kha byang du bstan pa bri/ rtsibs brgyad la zla gam re re kha nang du bstan pa bri// de'i phyi rim du rdo rje ra bas 'khor ba bri// sgo bzhi dang ldan par bri/ de'i phyi rim bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba bri/ dkyil 'khor dbus su b+han+da mtshan dang ldan pa la/ dpal chen yab yum bris la gzhag/ tshal bu brgyad la gau'u ri ma brgyad bris la bzhag/ tshil chen gyis me mar dgu/ dbus dang phyogs mtshams su gzhag/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnams kyang tshul bzhin du dgod/ mchog phur dar gyi cod phan btags la gzhag/ he chen dgu'i dkyil 'khor du// dur khrod chen po dgu ni klong dgur gsal// mtshal gyi thig phran dgu dag ni// thig le chen po gsum gyi ngang// de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor ni// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang du rdzogs// rdzas dang mchod pa'i yo byad kyang// mtshan ma'i dngos po kun bral te// kun tu bzang po'i rol pa'o// zhes dpal he ru kas nyid la nyid thugs kyi klong brtol nas ngom mo// de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor du/ mchod pa bkram pa yang/ lha bshos zla gam la rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas pa dang/ dam rdzas tshang ba'i gtor ma dang/ sgrub pa po re re'i mdun du b+han+da'i bzed phor dang/ dmar gyi ar+g+ha drang ngo// sgrub pa po rnams la yang rak+ta'i thig le dang/ zhag gi zo ris/ thal chen gyi mtshan ma btab la/ rgyan spras te bzhugs so// zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bya/ lha re re la bsnyen pa drug stong drug stong dbul/ 'dzab rdzogs pa dang thugs dam bskul// phrin las bcol/ stong tshigs kyis mchod pa 'bul/ tshe la sogs pa dngos grub gsol/ dkyil 'khor bsdu/ dgong dang tho rangs gtor ma gtang/ gtor ma slad ma yang drang/ gtor ma tsho gsum du bcad la/ tshog gcig sbyin bsreg bya/ tsho gcig la mkha' 'gro ma bskyang/ tsho gcig mi

zad gter du sba/ rgyal chen la bsrung ba'i gtang rag gtang bar bya/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ zla gam dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub lugs te gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje he ru kas sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi sgrub lugs gsungs nas/ zla gam bco brgyad pa'i sgrub lugs phrin las kyi go rim 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sa bdag rnams la sa rin gzhal// bslang dang spyad pa tshul bzhin bya// phyogs bzhi dag tu mtho bzhi btsug/ bsrung dang mtshams kyi las rnams bya// gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa la// byin gyis brlab cing thig skud 'khel du bcug/ tsa ra d+ha ra hi zhes thig gdab/ dbus zla gam dkar dmar kha sprod byas la bri/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la zla gam kha sprod du bri// sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ mtha' rdo rje'i ra bas bskor ba/ de'i phyi rim bskal pa'i me ris bskor ba bri// dbus su b+han+da mtshan dang ldan pa gcig la/ dpal chen po yab yum bri'o// shar du tshal bu la badzra he ru ka dang/ yum badzra kro tI bris la gzhag/ lhor rat+na he ru ka bris la gzhag/ nub tu pad+ma he ru ka bris la gzhag/ byang du karma he ru ka yab yum bris la gzhag/ byang shar du b+han+da mtshan dang ldan pa la gsol byang bri la gzhag/ sgo bzhir dza bzhi bris la gzhag/ de nas shar lho'i 'khor lo la/ tshal bu la rak+sha he ru ka yab yum bris la gzhag/ lho nub tu sa nu he ru ka yab yum bris la gzhag/ nub byang du gu h+ya he ru ka bris la gzhag/ byang shar du yak+sha he ru ka yab yum bris la gzhag/ de nas mchog phur dar gyi cod pan can bcu/ khro bo bcur mnga' gsol nas mtshams gcad do// snang srid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin la// ye nas dag pa'i mchog phur 'dis// gdeng dang ldan pa'i sngags 'chang gis// byin chen dbab par mnga' gsol lo// yo byad dbang mdzad gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal// oM AHhUM/ skye la dbang mdzad bran tshul mi g.yo mgon// oM AHhUM/ tshe la dbang byed 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed// oM AHhUM/ chos la dbang mdzad ha ya g+h+r-i ba dpal// oM AHhUM/ las la dbang mdzad bdud rtsi kuN+Da li// oM AHhUM/ ye shes dbang mdzad khro rgyal dbyug sngon can// oM AHhUM/ sems la dbang mdzad khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal// oM AHhUM/ rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad 'jigs byed stobs po che// oM AHhUM/ skye bzhi mngon par rdzogs mdzad hUM kA ra// oM AHhUM/ smon lam dbang mdzad 'dam skyes kuN+Da li// oM AHhUM/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dur khrod rdzas kyis chag chag gdab// bdud rtsi dri chen ye shes bcud ldan 'dis// de

bzhin gsang mchog rigs kyi dngos bsgrub pa'i// bka' gsang bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i chag chag 'debs// oM ma hA ba su maN+Da la hUM/ dam rdzas dag pa'i bdud rtsi dri chu 'dis// ye shes rang byung bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i bdud rtsi chen po'i chag chag 'debs/ ma hA sa ma ya ma ma ku ku la maN+Da la hUM/ bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod byang chub sems kyi ngang// mkha' dbyings rnam dag yum gyi gzhal yas su// rak+ta gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chag chag 'debs// ma hA rak+ta maN+Da la hUM/ ro yi tshor stod rnam bzhi yis// dur khrod rdzas mchog ma nyams btsal// dur khrod ro yi snying khung du// seng lding phur pa sor brgyad gdab// Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ oM AHhUM/ bya bas byin gyis brlabs la bzhag/ de nas dug gsum 'khor ba rang rgyud gcod pa'i bro brdung ngo// dur khrod gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dug gsum rabs rgyud gcod pa'i bro// sku gsung thugs su lhun gyis grub// dbang po 'bros pa'i sgo dgu ru// sku dgu bkod pa'i bro brdungs pas// ye shes dgu yi byin rlabs las// tshor zhing len pa'i rnam shes dgu// klong chen dgu ru lhun gyis grub// zhe sdang 'dus pa'i phung po la// hUM gi 'phro 'du 'khrugs pa la// mthing nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// klong chen dgu yi byin rlabs las// zhe sdang can dang dmyal ba'i gnas// dug gsum skye ba'i rgyun bcad nas// thig le chen po'i ngang du bsgral// sum b+ha ni sum b+ha nan/ gti mug 'dus pa'i phung po la// lta byed g.yas kyi phung po las// oM gyi 'phro 'du 'khrugs pa las/ bud+d+ha khrag 'thung sprin phung bzhin// smug nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gtum po rngam chen 'khrugs pa yis// gti mug can dang byol song gnas// stongs shing zad mdzad dbyings su bsgral// lta byed g.yon gyi dbang po la// AM gi 'phro 'du 'khrugs pa yis// pad+ma khrag 'thung sprin phung bzhin// dmar nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gtum po rngam chen 'khrugs pa yis// 'dod chags can dang mi yi gnas// stongs shing zad mdzad dbyings su bsgral// snom byed dbang po g.yas pa la// swA yi 'phro 'du 'khrugs pa yis// rat+na khrag 'thung sprin phung bzhin// ser nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gtum po rngam chen 'khrugs pa yis// nga rgyal can dang lha min gnas// stongs shing zad mdzad dbyings su bsgral// snom byed g.yon gyi dbang po la// hA yi 'phro 'du 'khrugs pa yis// karma khrag 'thung sprin phung bzhin// ljang nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gtum po rngam chen 'khrugs pa yis// phrag dog can dang yi dwags

rgyu// stongs shing zad mdzad dbyings su bsgral// nyan byed dbang po gnyis po la// hUM gi 'phro 'du 'khrugs pa yis// dbang phyug chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gtum po rngam chen 'khrugs pa yis// zhe sdang can dang dmyal ba'i gnas// stongs shing zad mdzad dbyings su bsgral// sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ g+h+r-i h+Na g+h+r-i h+Na hUM/ g+h+r-i h+nA pa ya g+h+r-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAn bi d+yA rA dza s+pho Ta baM// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu can// 'byung ba lnga yis bslad pa dang// nyon mongs lnga yis bcings pa rnams// stongs shing zad mdzad dbyings su bsgral// shAn+tiM ku ru a la la ho/ lho sgor gzi ldan yum byung ste/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas 'di ru// ye shes lnga yi klong dkyil du// gzi ldan yum gyi bro byung ngo// dug lnga dbyings su lhun gyis grub// dbang po lnga yi yul lnga la// yum chen lnga yis bro brdungs pas// sku lnga dbyings su lhun gyis grub// mno ba'i yul la bro byung ngo// bud+d+ha kro tI'i bro byung ngo// chags pa dbyings su sdud pa'i bro// gti mug gnas su dag pa'i bro// bro brdung byol song snying la brdung// gti mug gtso bo thal bar rlog/ byol song 'jig rten thams cad kun// dbyings su bsdu zhing klong du bsgral// mthong byed yul la bro byung ngo// pad+ma kro tI'i bro byung ngo// 'dod chags dbyings su dag pa'i bro// bro brdung mi yi snying la brdung// 'dod chags gtso bo thal bar rlog/ mi yi 'jig rten thams cad kun// dbyings su bsdu zhing klong du bsgral// nyan byed yul la bro byung ngo// rat+na kro tI'i bro byung ngo// nga rgyal dbyings su dag pa'i bro// bro brdung lha min snying la brdung// lha min gtso bo thal bar rlog/ lha min 'jig rten thams cad kun// dbyings su bsdu zhing klong du bsgral// snom byed yul la bro byung ngo// karma kro tI'i bro byung ngo// phrag dog gnas su dag pa'i bro// bro brdung yi dwags snying la brdung// phrag dog gtso bo thal bar rlog/ yi dwags 'jig rten thams cad kun// dbyings su bsdu zhing klong du bsgral// nyan byed yul du bro byung ngo// badzra kro tI'i bro byung ngo// zhe sdang dbyings su dag pa'i bro// bro brdung dmyal ba'i snying la brdung// zhe sdang gtso bo thal bar rlog/ dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad kun// dbyings su bsdu zhing klong du bsgral// kro ti shwa ra'i bde klong mkha' la 'dus// nub tu gsang ba'i he ru ka bzhi'i bro byung ste// nyan byed yul gyi dbang po la// gsang ba yab kyi bro byung ngo// rak+sha he ru ka yi bro byung ngo// rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud// tshor byed lce yi dbang po la// sa nu he ru'i bro byung ngo// 'da' dka' thugs kyi ye shes kyis// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud// chags par byed pa'i gsang

gnas la// gsang ba yab kyi brau byung ngo// g+hu h+ya he ru'i bro byung ngo// klong du gyur pa'i ye shes kyis// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud// reg bya yul gyi dbang po la// gsang ba yab kyi khro byung ngo// yak+sha he ru'i bro byung ngo// dbyings su sgrol ba'i ye shes kyis// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ g+h+r-i h+Na g+h+r-i h+Na hUM/ g+h+r-i h+NA pa ya g+h+r-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya to/ b+ha ga wA na/ bid+yA rA dza hUM badzra s+pho Ta baM/ byang sgor gsang ba yum gyi phro byung ngo// nyan pa'i yul la bro phyung ngo/ rak+sha kro tI'i bro byung ngo// drod las skyes pa'i gnas bcom nas// skye bzhi phyag mas btab nas ni// phyag rgya bzhi yi ngang du rdzogs// tshor byed yul la bro byung ba// sa nu kro tI'i bro byung ngo// 'dod chags skye ba'i gnas bcom nas// skye bzhi phyag mas btab nas ni// phyag rgya bzhi yi ngang du rdzogs// skye gnas yul la brau byung ba// gu h+ya kro tI'i bro byung ngo// brdzus nas skyes pa'i gnas bcom nas// skye bzhi phyag mas btab nas ni// phyag rgya bzhi yi ngang du rdzogs// reg bya'i yul la bro byung ba// yak+sha kro tI'i bro byung ngo// sprul te skye ba'i gnas bcom nas// skye bzhi phyag mas btab nas ni// phyag rgya bzhi yi ngang du rdzogs// gsang chen bzhi yi phyag rgya yis// btab pas thig le'i ngang du rdzogs// de nas byang shar mtshams su spro bar bya'o// thig skud bcu tshal gdab par bya// mgo lus yan lag lnga po la// mtshon bya lnga yis spro bar bya'o// de nas bskos gdab bo// bskos la spyan brang ngo// 'og min chos kyi pho brang nas// dgu klong 'bar ba'i bskos la spyon// dbang po dgu ni yab kyis bskos// de yi yul dgu yum gyis bskod// dpal chen 'khor tshogs bskos la spyon// de nas smon lam gdab// ho dgongs su gsol lo// stong gi rab 'byams 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad/ 'khor ba dang ngan song las thugs rjes bsgral/ sku gsung thugs su sbyar nas/ gdal ba chen po'i ngang du lhun gyis grub par gyur cig/ de nas byang shar mtshams su phung po bshig go/ ma traM gi dbang po lnga rigs lnga'i he ru ka'i rdzas su dbul/ dbus nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// sku mchog bud+d+ha he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas mchog 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM/ shar nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// thugs mchog badzra he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM badzra shrI he ru ka hUM/ lho nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// yon tan rat+na he ru ka/ dur

khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM rat+na shrI he ru ka hUM/ nub nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// gsung mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su ga sol// oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka hUM/ byang nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// phrin las karma he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM karma shrI he ru ka hUM/ shar lho mtshams nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// phrin sbyor ba yang las rak+sha he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM rak+sha shrI he ru ka hUM/ lho nub mtshams nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// sbyor dam tshig kyang ba yak+sha he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM yak+Sha shrI he ru ka hUM/ nub byang rang byung grub pa'i lha// gsang ba g+hu h+ya he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM b+hu h+ya shrI he ru ka hUM/ byang shar rang byung grub pa'i lha// sgrol ba yak+sha he ru ka/ ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// dur khrod chen po'i gnas mchog 'dir// dug gsum bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM yak+sha shrI he ru ka hUM/ dbus kyi yum chen mi phyed ma// gtso la brten pa'i bdag nyid ma// bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI'i sku// dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid ni// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// shar gyi yum chen mi phyed ma// gtso la brten pa'i bdag nyid ma// badzra kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+wam// dgyes pa chen po'i stobs kyis ni// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// lho yi yum chen mi phyed ma// gtso la brten pa'i bdag nyid ma// rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+wam// dgyes pa chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// nub kyi yum chen mi phyed ma// gtso la brten pa'i bdag nyid ma// pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+wam// dgyes pa chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// byang gi yum chen mi phyaid ma// gtso la brten pa'i bdag nyid ma// karma kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ dgyes pa chen

po'i tshul gy-is ni// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// shar lho'i yum chen mi phyed ma// gtso la brten pa'i bdag nyid ma// rak+sha kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ dgyes pa chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// lho nub yum chen mi phyed ma// gtso la brten pa'i bdag nyid ma// sa nu kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ dgyes pa chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// nub byang yum chen mi phyed ma// gtso la brten pa'i bdag nyid ma// g+hu h+ya kro d+hi shwa rI s+t+waM// dgyes pa chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// byang shar yum chen mi phyed ma// gtso la brten pa'i bdag nyid ma// yak+sha kro d+h+wi shwa rI s+t+waM// dgyes pa chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// de nas b+han+da blangs la/ mtshan dang dbus gsol byang blangs la 'di skad do// 'phrul zhal yid bzhin phra men brgyad kyis klubs// rkang med mkha' la 'gro ba'i tog tog rkan sgra rdeb// sngon gyi skyes mchog sgrub pa'i rdzas yin te// su zhig dngos grub 'dod pa da lta nga las long// gang zhig bka' ltar mi byed dam la mi gnas na// 'di yi sgra thos gzugs nyid mthong bas kyang// lus ngag yid gsum mod la brlag par 'gyur// dkar po zang yag 'tsher ba ni// sngar bas 'das pa'i bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi sku dang rab ldan zhing// 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// rlon pa lcang lor ldan pa ni// da ltar bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang rab ldan zhing// da lta 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// dmar po ra ri chags pa ni// slad nas 'byon pa'i bcom ldan 'das// sprul pa'i sku dang rab ldan zhing// 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// zla gam gyi ni dbus su gzhag/ bskul ba'i rdo rje aM ku sha/ rta gdong dkar mo gshegs su gsol// bskul ba'i rdo rje pa shA hUM// phag gdong sngon mo gshegs su gsol// skul ba'i rdo rje s+pho Ta baM// sdom byed chen mo lcags sgrog ma// rmongs byed chen mo gshegs su gsol// skul ba'i rdo rje g+haN+De hoH// ljang gu thal byed g+haN+De hoH// thal byed ljang nag gshegs su gsol// 'di bzhi don gyis bgod// rdo rje dril bu rig pa 'dzin// rdo rje thabs kyi rang bzhin dang// dril bu shes rab rang bzhin ni// dkyil 'khor dbus su brtan par dgod// de nas mchod pa dgram pa ni// lha bshos zla gam la rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas la/ dam rdzas tshang ba'i gtor ma la tshil chen gyi zhal bka' drang ngo// de nas sgrub pa po kun gyi mdun du/ b+han+da'i bzed phor dang/ dmar gyi ar+g+ha drang ngo// til chen gyi me mar dgu gtang/ de nas sgrub pa po la rtags dang mtshan

gdab ste/ zhag zhal yang/ blangs la/ don dam bcud kyi rgyas btab pas// kun tu 'od kyi sa mnan nas// dpal chen dgu dang mnyam par sbyor// thal chen gdug pa 'dul ba'i rgyan// sprul pa'i sku dang ldan pa yis// 'khor lo tshogs chen sa mnan nas// ma tshogs phra men tshogs dang sbyar/ ho// rak+ta thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan// pad+ma can gyi sa mnan nas// yum chen dgu dang mnyam par sbyor// nang mi dam par mdzad du gsol// rgyan spel te bzhugs su gsol// de nas brda' sgo dbye// dur khrod brgyad kyi gzhal yas khang// ye shes brgyad kyi sgo phye zhig/ mkha' dbyings dag pa'i gzhal yas khang// mi gnas ye shes chen po'i sgo phye zhig/ de nas dngos grub gsol te// skye shi med pa tshe yi dngos grub dang// 'du 'bral med pa gzungs kyi dngos grub dang// 'pho 'gyur med pa gnas kyi dngos grub ste// gsum po 'di rnams dus 'dir stsal du gsol// de ltar dngos grub gsol nas// da ni dam bca' ste/ dur khrod gnas pa'i dpal chen he ru ka/ rtog mtha' rmongs pa'i 'byung po za byed cing// rngam pa'i tshul gyis srin pa'i tshul ston pa// mkha' mnyam dbyings nas nyams pa rdul tsam med// hUM thugs rje chen po'i ngang las ma 'da' zhig/ rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs las ma 'khrugs shig/ dpal chen he ru khro rgyal yab yum rnams// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal stongs par mdzod// hUM oM/ mi sring srid pa'i gnyen rnams dgrar gyur te// bdag gi lus 'di dum bu stong gtubs kyang// 'phags pa'i spyan sngar bdag gis dam bcas pa// sun par mi bgyid mgon khyod sku mi bslu// hUM/ de ltar dam bcas nas/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim gyis bsgoms nas/ zhi khro gzhung bzhin bskyed nas/ spyan drang phyag bya brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ lha re re la bsnyen pa stong rtsa brgyad dbul lo// 'dzab rdzogs nas stong tshigs kyi mchod pa 'bul/ thugs dam bskul zhing phrin las bcol ba dang/ gtor ma dgong dang tho rangs btang/ lhag ma yang rjes la drang bar bya'o// bsgrub pa 'di'i lugs kyis/ thub par bya ba'i dam tshig bdun bsrung ba dang/ nyams su len pa'i bar chod lnga bzlog par bya'o// dam tshig la yang bsrung bar bya ba gsum dang/ khyad par gyi dam tshig bzhi ste bdun bsrung ngo// bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig gsum ni/ rdo rje slob dpon yi dam gyi lha bzhin du dran par bya ba dang/ bsgrub pa'i dus su rkyen cis bdas kyang/ tshig gi mtshon mi shor bar bya ba dang/ bsgrub pa'i dus su gnyid chang gi dbang du mi gtong ngo/ khyad par gyi dam tshig gi bzhi ni/ srid pa pho bsgral nas dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor du shes par bya ba dang/ khams gsum

dbang du bsdus nas dug gsum mchod par sbyar ba dang/ de lta bu'i rdzas la blo la khu 'phrag med par dang du blangs pa'i dam tshig dang/ de lta bu'i mdzad spyod ci mdzad kyang/ ye chos nyid byang chub sems las ma g.yos par bya ba'i dam tshig dang bzhi'o// nyams len bar chad bzhi bzlog ste// de yi 'dul skal chen mo ni// dgongs kyi ting 'dzin mi gsal na// sngon gyi nyams len chen mo ste// grib so sdud pa'i dbang mo che// rdzu 'phrul bya rog skad sgyur ma// de yi 'dul skal chen mo ni/ kha dog nub ka'i dmar thag 'dra// ral pa sprin dmar 'khrigs pa bzhin// ral pa sprug pa'i skra gseb nas// gza' rgod mig dmar char du 'bebs// a la la yi phyag mtshan ni// gnam lcags zhun ma'i khro chu bskol/ khros nas gnyen por rbad pa'i tshe/ khro chu khol ma'i skyin thang 'bebs// srid pa'i gnam sa dkrugs pa skang// srin po'i 'jig rten rba la g.yeng// dam las 'das pa btso sreg byed/ khyod kyis phrin las skal phogs pa// dgong ka'i bar chad byed pa'i bdud// dgra bgegs thams cad thal bar rlogs// rak+Sha ru tra yA yak+sha tshal pa khA hi/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ srod la ting 'dzin mi gsal na// sngon gyi nyams len chen mo ste// phyogs skyong bu mo ma rungs ma// de yi 'dul skal chen mo ni// thogs med rlung ltar 'phyo ba yi// srid pa'i rgyal mo srog gi bdag/ srid bdag chen mo kun gyi rje// ye shes 'od stong 'bar ba'i rdzu 'phrul can/ khyed kyi phrin las skal phogs pa// srod la bar chad byed pa'i bdud// dgra bgegs thams cad thal bar rlogs/ rak+Sha ru tra yA yak+sha tshal pa khA hi/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ nam phyed ting 'dzin mi gsal na// dkar mo phyogs kyi ma rungs ma// de yi 'dul skal chen mo ni// ral gri'i lus la rkang lag glog/ ral pa sem sprin 'khrigs pa 'dra// spyan ni nyi zla zhun ma la// sngags pas gdung bas bos pa'i tshe// mchi ma thu lum char du 'bebs// mchi ma thu lum thigs res kyang// dkar po'i bu phran ma lus kun// gzhob sgog rdog pas brdzis pa bzhin// gso glags med par dmyal thag gcod// rgyal ba'i ngag nyan dam tshig can/ khyod kyi phrin las skal phog pa// nam phyed bar chad byed pa'i bdud// dgra bgegs thams cad thal bar rlog/ rak+Sha ru tra yA yak+sha tshal pa khA hi/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ tho rangs ting 'dzin mi gsal na// tho rangs bar chad byed pa'i bdud// hor ston bu mo ma rungs ma// de yi 'dul skal chen mo ni// mgo ni seng ge'i mgo bo la// phur mo seng ge'i nga ro sgrogs// srid pa'i gnam sa grum pa skad// ral pa ser sprin 'khrigs pa bzhin/ khyod kyi phrin las skal thogs pa// tho rangs bar chad byed pa'i bdud// dgra

bgegs thams cad thal bar rlogs// rak+Sha ru tra yA yak+sha tshal pa khA hi/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ shar ka'i ting 'dzin mi gsal na// shar gyi zer la bar gcod ma// srab mda' zer la zhon pa mo// de yi 'dul skal chen mo ni// dung gi gdong la shel gyi lce// ral pa ser sprin 'khrigs pa 'dra// gnam lcags thog gi ser chen 'bebs/ khyod kyi phrin las dus la bab// shar ka'i zer la bar gcod pa'i// bdud dgra thams cad thal bar rlogs// rak+sha ru tra yA yak+sha tshal pa khA hi/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ nyams len lnga de ltar bzlog go/ bsgrub pa zhag du dam bcas pa'i phyed de nub/ gtor ma tsho gsum du bcad de/ tsho gcig sbyin bsreg bya/ tsho gcig la mkha' 'gro ma bskyang/ tsho gcig mi zad pa'i gter du sba/ de nas he ru ka'i sbyin bsreg bya ste/ 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul zhing gshegs mdzad pa// shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pas rgas rgud stongs/ gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa// gti mug rdo rje bud+d+ha he ru kar// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg bya// bud+d+ha he ru ka la mchod pa 'bul// mi gnas pa'i klong na dpal chen khrag 'thung bzhugs pa la sems can nyon mongs pa gti mug gi dbang gis 'khor ba'i mtha' la zhen pa thams cad bsdus te phul bas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang ldan par gyur to// ye shes rdo rjes nyon mongs 'khor ba 'joms// thabs 'dzin mtshon chas bskal pa'i dngos po 'jig/ zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa'i// zhe sdang rdo rje badzra he ru kar// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// badzra he ru ka la mchod pa 'bul// mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong na rig pa'i rgyal po badzra he ru ka bzhugs pa la sems can nyon mongs pa zhe sdang gi dbang gis 'khor ba'i mtha' la zhen pa thams cad bsdus te phul bas me long lta bu'i ye shes su gyur to// rin chen dbyings ltar re 'dod kun skong zhing// bdag la gnyis med chu yi bskal pas 'khru// nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa// nga rgyal dpal chen rat+na he ru ka/ ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// rat+na he ru ka la mchod pa 'bul// mi gnas pa'i klong na dpal rat+na he ru ka bzhugs pa la sems can nyon mongs pa nga rgyal gyi dbang gis 'khor ba'i mtha' la zhen pa thams cad bsdus te phul bas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su gyur to// 'khor ba'i 'dam nas pad ltar sku 'khrungs kyang// lhag mthong shes rab bskal pa'i me yis bsreg/ 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms

mdzad pa// 'dod chags dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka/ ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// pad+ma he ru ka la mchod pa 'bul// mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong na rig pa'i rgyal po pad+ma he ru bzhugs pa la ma rtogs pa'i sems can nyon mongs pa 'dod chags kyi dbang gis 'khor ba'i zhen pa thams cad bsdus te phul bas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur to// phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing// shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog dpal chen karma he ru ka/ ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// karma he ru ka la mchod pa 'bul// mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong na dpal karma he ru ka bzhug pa la sems can nyon mongs pa phrag dog gi dbang gis 'khor ba'i mtha' la zhen pa thams cad bsdus te phul bas bya ba nan tan ye shes su gyur to// de nas yum khrag 'thung gi dbang mo lnga la mchod pa 'bul te// thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs kyang// snying rje mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag/ rtogs pa'i reg bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad pas// sra brtan khro bor dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// badzra kro tI'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong na yum badzra kro tI bzhugs pa la sems can nyon mongs pa nam mkhas bslad pa thams cad bsdus te phul bas ye shes chen po'i ngang du thim mo// sku yi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs kyang/ shes rab mthar phyin gti mug rnam par dag/ phyag rgya sku yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad pa'i// chos la dbang bsgyur nam mkha'i khro mo'i rgyal// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsis 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// bud+d+ha kro d+hI sku la mchod pa 'bul// mi gnas ye shes chen po'i klong na bud+d+ha kro ti shwa rI bzhugs pa la sems can nyon mongs pa sas bslad pa thams cad bsdus te phul bas ye shes chen por thim mo// yon tan longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs kyang// sbyin pa mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag/ longs spyod dri yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// mnyam nyid gnas la dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// rat+na kro tI'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong nas rat+na kro tI shwa rI bzhugs pa la sems can 'byung ba chus bslad pa thams cad bsdus te phul bas

ye shes chen po'i ngang du thim mo// gsung gi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs kyang// tshul khrims mthar phyin 'dod chags rnam par dag/ gsung rab sgra yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad pa// lhag mthong ye shes dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// pad+ma kro tI'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong na pad+ma kro tI shwa rI bzhugs pa la sems can nyon mongs pa mes bslad pa thams cad bsdus te phul bas ye shes chen por thim mo// phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs kyang// bzod pa mthar phyin phrag dog rnam par dag/ bzod pa dri yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad pa// thogs med las la dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// karma kro tI'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong na yum karma kro tI shwa rI bzhugs pa la sems can nyon mongs pa rlung gis bslad pa thams cad bsdus te phul bas ye shes chen po'i ngang du thim mo// mtshams kyi he ru ka bzhi la mchod pa 'bul te// sgra yi cha dang dngos po yis// bag chags rtog pa 'joms mdzad pa// ye shes dpal chen rak+sha he ru ka/ g+ha na chen po'i tshul gyis spyan drangs nas// thugs rje chen po'i sbyor bas 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// rak+sha he ru ka la mchod pa 'bul// bcom ldan rak+sha he ru ka la snang srid phyin ci log tu bltas pa bsdus te phul bas 'khor ba thams cad bde ba chen po'i klong du thim par gyur to// myong byed rtog pa 'joms mdzad pa// dam tshig dpal chen sa nu he ru ka/ dgongs spyod thugs dam zab mo yis// rtsa ba nyams pa sor 'dzud pa// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// sa nu he ru ka la mchod pa 'bul// bcom ldan sa nu he ru ka la snang srid rtsa ba nyams pas 'khrul 'khor thams cad bsdus te phul bas/ dam tshig nyams pa thams cad bskang bar gyur to// mtshan ma'i skye gnas rtog pa 'joms mdzad pa// gsang ba g+hu h+ya dpal chen he ru ka/ nyon mongs skye gnas thams cad 'joms mdzad pa// bla med gsang gnas dpal chen he ru kar// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsrig 'di// g+hu h+ya he ru ka la 'chod pa 'bul// bcom ldan g+hu h+ya he ru ka la skye gnas kyi mtshan ma thams cad bsdus te phul bas/ 'khor ba'i rtod phur phyung nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings

su thim mo// reg bya'i rtog pa 'joms mdzad pa// bla med dpal chen yak+sha he ru ka/ reg bya gzugs kyi rtog pa bcom nas ni// bde ba chen po'i dbyings su sgrol ba'i ngang// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rts-i 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// yak+sha he ru ka la mchod pa 'bul// bcom ldan 'das yak+sha he ru ka la gzugs su snang ba'i reg bya thams cad bsdus te phul bas reg bya'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad gtan spangs nas skye shi dang rgas rgud med de chos kyi sku'i dngos grub thob bo// da ni gsang ba'i yum chen mo bzhi la mchod pa dbul te// sgra rnams rtog pa 'joms mdzad ma// rak+sha khro mo nyid kyi sku// drod las skyes pa'i gnas rnams 'joms// skye bzhi dbyings su sgrol mdzad ma/ ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// rak+sha kro tI'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// yum rak+sha kro tI la sgra'i yul du snang ba thams cad bsdus te phul bas chos kyi gsung rnam par dag par gyur to// tshor byed yul rnams 'joms byed ma// sa nu kro tI shwa rI'i sku// chags pa'i sems can 'joms mdzad pa// skye shi phyags mas dbyings su 'debs// mkha' bzhi dbyings su rdzogs mdzad ma// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// sa nu kro tI'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// yum sa nu kro tI la tshor ba'i yul du snang ba thams cad bsdus te phul bas zla gam gyi ljags rnam par dag pa'i dngos grub thob bo// skye gnas yul rnams 'joms mdzad ma// g+hu h+ya kro tI shwa rI'i sku// brdzus pa'i skye gnas thams cad 'joms mdzad ma// skye bzhi mkha' bzhir phyags mas 'debs// b+ha ga bzhi yi ngang du rdzogs// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// g+hu h+ya kro tI'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// yum g+hu h+ya kro tI shwa rI la skyes gnas yul du snang ba thams cad bsdus te phul bas mkha' bzhi'i klong du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// reg bya'i yul rnams 'joms mdzad ma// yak+sha kro tI shwa rA'i sku// sprul te skye ba'i gnas bcom nas// skye bzhi mkha' bzhir phyags mas 'debs// b+ha ga bzhi yi ngang du rdzogs// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i sbyin bsreg 'di// yak+sha kro tI'i sku la mchod pa phul// yum rak+sha kro tI shwa rI la skyes gnas mtshan ma'i yul du snang ba thams cad bsdus te phul bas dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i sku thob par gyur to// don gyis mchod pa bsgom bzhi la dbul lo// de ltar tsho gcig la sbyin bsreg bya/ tsho gcig gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol du

khyer te/ lhag ma'i gnas bdun bya/ gom pa bcu gsum bor zhing gnas re re byas shing las bcol lo// gom pa bdun cu rtsa gsum tsam du phyin pa dang/ hom khung zla gam du brkos la/ dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin bsreg bya/ de nas slar log nas/ b+han+d+ha la rigs lnga'i mtshan byang bris pa slob dpon gyis blangs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su seng ge'i gdan la 'dug la/ slob mas ru lu gar gyi bros bskor la dngos grub gsol lo// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// bang rim dmar po dag la rten bcas shing// zla gam dmar po'i steng du dbang nod nas// me mar dgu pa dag la mdangs phyung nas// b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan dag la tha tshig bsgos// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnams/ bdag cag bsgrub mchog rnams la stsal du gsol// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ dpon slob kun gyis bzlas/ de nas slob dpon gyis rim bzhin dbang bskur ro// bdag nyid dngos grub blang ba 'di skad do// dpal dang ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha mchog/ rang bzhin gnas pa'i lcang lo can// bdud rtsis bka' bas che mchog ste// thams cad dbang gi rang bzhin la// bdag nyid dbus su 'dug nas ni// rang bzhin rang byung ye shes lha rnams la// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub mchog/ phyi ma'i dus la mi bzhed par/ da lta bdag la rtsal du gsol// zhes brjod la ngang la bdag nyid kyis dngos grub blang ngo// de nas slob ma rim bzhin du dbang bskur ro// slob ma rnams kyis kyang// dur khrod kyi me tog thal mo'i bar du bcug la/ 'di skad brjod do// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// dur khrod rdzas kyi me tog bor nas kyang// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// de skad brjod nas dkyil 'khor la 'bul lo// de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i lag tu rdo rje byin nas/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// byang chub rdo rje'i lam la drangs nas ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag la dbang bskur ro// ngang la me mar dang b+han+d+has dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// ye shes gnyis med 'khyil pa'i rgya// sna tshogs tshogs chen 'byung ba'i rgyu// skal ldan 'di la dbang chen bskur ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi mchog bsgrub dam rdzas ka pA la// gsang rdzogs thugs kyi dngos grub 'di la sbyin// badzra dzA yu dzA yu/ de nas sku lngas dbang bskur te 'di skad do// mthing nag gru gsum 'gyur med sku// rtag tu hUM chen klong na 'khyil ba'i sa// bde chen byang chub sems su mngon rdzogs pa// badzra he ru ka yi dbang bskur ro// chags pas mi gtang dbang gi rgyal po ste// byang chub gter ldan lnga dang rtag tu

'khyil ba'i sa// 'khor ba ma lus mya ngan las 'das pa// pad+ma he ru ka yi dbang bskur ro// dkar bas chos nyid cir yang gsal ba'i sku// mkha' mnyam dbyings phyug brgyad dang rtag tu rol pa'i sa// srid pa'i chos la yid kyis dbang sgyur ba/ d+hI/\u0f74/ bud+d+ha he ru ka yi dbang bskur ro// ser po yid bzhin yon tan rgyas pa'i sku// ri rab chen po spyi skor brgyad dang rol pa'i sa// 'dod dgu yid bzhin re ba skong mdzad pa// rat+na he ru ka yi dbang bskur ro// ljang gu phrin las sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur ba'i sku// bsnyen pas sbyangs pa'i gdan dang rol pa'i sa// 'gro ba ma lus byang chub 'di la bkod// karma he ru ka yi dbang bskur ro// badzra he ru ka yi che ba dag/ pad+ma he ru ka yi dbang 'du+u dang// bud+d+ha he ru ka yi dngos grub dang// rat+na he ru ka yi brtan pa dang// karma he ru ka yi byin rlabs dang// he ru ka lnga'i grub pa mi 'gyur bar gnas so// da ni gsang ba'i he ru ka bzhi'i dbang bskur te/ 'khor ba dbyings su sbyor bas dbang gi rgyal po ste// 'khor ba'i sems can ma chags klong du sbyor// chags med pad+ma bde chen 'khyil pa'i sa// rak+sha he ru ka yi dbang bkur ro// thugs rjes mi bsnyel 'khor ba'i mtha' la dgongs// thugs dam gzugs kyis 'grel pas rtag tu dgongs// dam tshig rdzogs chen bla med 'khyil pa'i sa// sa nu he ru ka yi dbang bskur ro// gsang ba'i thugs rje gzungs kyi byin rlabs kyis// nyon mongs tha ba klong du brlan mdzad cing// gsang ba 'khyil ba bde chen yum gyi mkha'// g+hu h+ya he ru ka yi dbang bskur ro// nyon mongs 'khor ba ma lus rtsad gcod cing// thugs rjes ma lus bde chen dbyings su sgrol// drag shul rngams pas srin po tshar gcod de// don dam byang chub sems la gsal bar mdzad// yak+sha he ru ka yi dbang bskur ro// de ltar rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ni che ba yab kyi mkha'// pad+ma'i dbyings phyug ma ni gsang ba yum gyi dbang// rin chen dbyings phyug ma ni yon tan rdzogs pa'i dbang// las kyi dbyings phyug ma ni phrin las rgya mtsho'i dbang// mkha' la dbyings phyug ma ni spyi 'byams rgyal mo'i dbang// dbyings phyug rgyal mo lnga yi dbang bskur ro// 'byung lngas bsdus pas kun gyi rgyal por 'gyur// rak+sha kro tI chags med skyon bral dbang// sa nu kro tI dam tshig rdzogs pa'i dbang// g+hu h+ya kro tI skye shi med pa'i dbang// yak+sha kro tI 'khor ba rtsad gcod dbang// gsang ba yum chen bzhi yis dbang bskur bas// 'du 'bral med pa'i klong du lhun gyis grub// de nas dang la b+han+d+has dbang bskur te// mtshan ma'i skyon bral b+han+d+ha'i rdzas mchog 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub 'thob par

'gyur// b+han+d+has dbang bskur bas chos skye ba med pa'i don rtogs nas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ de nas byang sems kyi dbang bskur te// skye med byang chub sems kyi rdzas mchog 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur bas ma 'gags pa me long lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ de nas sha chen gyis dbang bskur te/ khams gsum bsgral ba'i rdzas mchog sha chen 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// rin chen rigs mchog dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sha chen gyis dbang bskur bas rin po che'i rigs kyi dngos grub thob nas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ de nas rak+tas dbang bskur te// gsang ba mchog gi rak+ta dam rdzas 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// gsung mchog pad+ma rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// pad+ma rak+tas dbang bskur bas pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub thob nas/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ de nas dri chus dbang bskur te/ las mchog grub pa'i rdzas mchog dri chu 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur bas// las kyi rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// dri chus dbang bskur bas las kyi rigs kyi dngos grub thob nas/ bya ba nan tan ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig/ grub pa'i rdzas dang yon tan la// dang du mi len blo chung na// 'di ni spang zhing dbyung bar bya// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas bkra shis zas kyang pa'i rdzas dang/ rdo rje'i tshe gsol bas 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur cig/ smon lam btab nas/ dkyil 'khor nas dbyung sgrub pa po rim pa nas dbang bskur ro// de nas las thams cad dngos grub du bya/ dngos grub dbang du bya ba ni// zla gam dbang gi lha bshos dang/ spyan gzigs sna tshogs pas drangs te// dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed/ dbang gi dngos grub ni/ zla gam gyi lha bshos la bstim mo// bshos kyang stabs la gsol lo// de nas grub pa phyin pa dang/ slob dpon la yon dbul gtang rag gtong/ de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu/ dkyil 'khor mtha' nas mi bsdu rgyu// snang srid 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// bde chen klong du dril ba'i don// da ni dkyil 'khor mtha' nas bsdu/ dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs kar bsdu/ dbus kyi gtso bo phyag mtshan rdo rjer bsdu/ phyag mtshan rdo rje yi ge hUM la bsdu/ yi ge hUM ni skye shi med pa'i don/ mtha' yi pho brang dbus kyi 'khor lo'i lte bar bsdu// 'khor lo'i lte bar spros pa med pa'i ngang// spros med skye

shi med pa bde ba chen po'i klong// da ni snang srid mtha' nas bsdu// snang srid mtha' nas mi bsdu rgyu// snang srid thams cad sangs rgyas rgyu// dug gsum sku gsung thugs su bsdu// nyon mongs lnga ni ye shes lnga ru bsdu// smad cing bshud pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga ru bsdu// snang srid thams cad kun bzang klong du bsdu// phyi nang snod bcud thig le'i dbyings su bsdu// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas gter sbas te/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// sgrub mchog byang chub lam du zhugs pa'am// snang srid thams cad mi rtag dus byung na// zad med mi 'dzad gter gyis mdun nas bsu// skye shi med pa'i tshe dang 'phrad par shog/ dug gsum sku gsung thugs su gter du sbas// dug gsum rnam par dag pas 'khor gsum ngang// sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang du sba// 'gyur ba med pa thig le'i gter du sba// rdzogs pa chen po thig le bde chen klong// thig le bde chen klong du gter sbas pas// snang srid thams cad bde chen lam la dgod// lam gyi nang nas nye lam 'dir rdzogs pa// thabs kyi nang nas ma nor dam pa ste// zag med byang chub sems kyis gter sbas pas// dus gsum sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// mi 'dzad gter gyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// hUM dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// 'phrul zhal yid bzhin b+han+d+ha'i rdzas mchog dang// ma rig mun sel me mar dgu po dang// zla gam bco brgyad gsang ba'i gnas 'di ru// ngan song 'khor ba rnams kyang bsgral lags la// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyang mchod lags shing// dpal chen he ru ka yang bsgrubs lags te// ma sring rgya mtsho rnams kyang bsgrubs lags la// dngos grub byin rlabs mchog rnams blang lags shing// mi gnas ye shes thugs kyang bsgrubs lags kyis// dang po'i gnas mchog chos kyi dbyings su gshegs// de nas slob dpon gyis smon lam btab ste/ mi gnas ye shes chen po thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'gyur ba med pa lhun gyis grub pa dang// rab 'byams rgyal ba'i bka' la dbang thob nas// 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal du 'gyur bar shog/ 'di lta bu yi man ngag lung ston pa'i// bka' drin che ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang// srog gi lu gu rgyud kyis sbrail pa rnams// 'og min lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog tu// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par 'grogs pa dang// gsang ba chen po thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// bla med sku gsung thugs su grub par shog/ de nas phur pa cod pan bkrol la// gtor ma gcig bshams la// rgyal chen dang phyogs skyong la bsngos la// mtshams glod lus bsrung/ bzod par

gsol/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ zla gam bco brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub lugs te gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ste/ ma traM zhal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs par zhir ldan nas// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sa bdag rnams la sa rin gzhal// blang dang sbyang ba tshul bzhin bya// phyogs bzhi dag tu mtho bzhi brtsig/ bsrung dang mtshams kyi las rnams bya// mtshams kyi dus phur bu dar gyi cod pan btags la// oM badzra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ ts+tshin+ta ts+tshin+ta hUM phaT/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ stegs bu 'dom gang sa bcu la gdab/ de nas ma traM mnan par bya ste/ ma traM bya ba'i sdig can khyod/ sngon yang dpal chen he ru kas// bsgral nas dur khrod chen por mdzad// da yang rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// bsgral nas dkyil 'khor chen por mdzad// dzaHhUM baM hoH ma hA shri he ru ka/ ma traM rU tra/ ha na ha na/ ha ha ha ha/ pra be sha ya hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po yis// rU tra chen po bsgral nas ni// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// ma traM mgo lus yan lag la// dkyil 'khor bcu gcig bri bar bya// dkyil du mthing nag gru gsum bya// yam shing dag gis brdzangs nas ni// sbyin sreg rnam gsum tshul bzhin bya// snying gar gru gsum sum brtsegs la// dkyil 'khor bang rim gsum pa bya// phur bu nyi shu rtsa bdun dgod// lte bar gru gsum mthing nag la// tshal bu dgu la kha T+wAM dgu// phur bu bcu dang sbrags la gzhag/ steng 'og phyogs mtshams brgyad du gzhag/ gnas brgyad dag tu dkyil 'khor bri// bskal pa'i me ri 'bar bas bskor// gzhung bzhin rdzas kyang dgod par bya// b+han+d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa la// dpal chen yab yum mtshan bris te// bang rim dang po'i steg du gzhag/ bar ma me mar dgu po dgod// tha ma b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan bzhir// rigs bzhi yab yum dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po brgyad po la// ma mo chen mo brgyad dgod do// dbus nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// thugs mchog badzra he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// ma traM bsnol ba'i gzhal yas la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// shar nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// sku mchog bud+d+ha he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong

dkyil du// ma traM bsnol ba'i gzhal yas la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// lho nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// yon tan rat+na he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// ma traM bsnol ba'i gzhal yas la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// nub nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// gsung mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// ma traM gi ni gzhal yas la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// byang nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// phrin las karma he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// ma traM gi ni gzhal yas la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// rgya gar yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo gau rI'i gnas// dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// 'di yi lag pa g.yas pa la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// li yi yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo tso'u ra'i ma// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di yi lag pa g.yon pa la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// bal po'i yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo pra mo ha// dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// 'di yi rkang pa g.yon pa la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// tho gar yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo be hA lI// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di yi rkang pa g.yas pa la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// za hor yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo puk+ka sI// dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// 'di yi dpral bar bzhugs su gsol// u rgyan yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo g+hasma rI// dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// 'di yi mkhal ma g.yas pa la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// sing ga'i yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo sma sha nI// dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// 'di yi mkhal ma g.yon pa la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// gling dgu'i yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo tsan+d+ha lI// dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen 'dir// 'di yi pho mtshan dkyil 'khor la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// 'di yi dpung pa g.yas g.yon la// stag seng gnyis dang rgod kang gnyis// stod cing za ba'i tshul du gzhugs// brla ni g.yas dang g.yon pa la// wa spyang gnyis da nga bya rog 'ug/ stod cing za ba'i tshul du bzhugs// g.yas g.yon lag pa'i bol gnyis la// lcags kyu zhags pa stod pa'i tshul// 'di yi rkang bol g.yas g.yon la// lcags sgrog dril bu stod pa'i tshul// 'di yi 'khor lo'i sgal tshigs

la// g.yag mgo can la sogs pa yi// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyang// za zhing stod pa'i tshul du bzhugs// de nas rdzas dgram ste// lha bshos zla gam la/ rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas la// dam rdzas tshang ba'i gtor ma la// sprin chen gyi zhal khebs can spyan drang ngo// sgrub pa po'i mdun du b+han+d+ha'i bzed phor dang// dmar gyi ar+g+haM drang ngo// rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub lugs so// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sum brtseg la/ phur bu nyi shu rtsa bdun dgod// ma nor lhun grub dbyings kyi dang// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i klong// de las sems kyi 'bras bu bskyed// gdod nas ma skyes lhun gyis grub// de nas gzhal yas byang chub sems// de ni rgyu 'bras ma bkag chos// de nas phur bu byang chub sems// rgyu 'bras gnyis ka mya ngan 'das// de nas bdag gi byang chub sems// srid pa gsum la dbang bskur zhing// bcom ldan 'das dang skal pa gcig/ gsang ba byang chub sems su bstan/ khams gsum ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// grub pa'i ye shes tshon gang ba// gsang ba sngags kyis btab nas ni// sku dang ldan par rab brgyan te/ khams gsum khro bos gang bar mdzad// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rtsal 'phang gis// bsgral nas hUM gi rang bzhin te// phung po chos sku thob par 'gyur// sku gsum rgyal ba'i sras su skye/ khams gsum kun gyi don byas nas// spros pas stong gsum lhun gyis grub// snang srid srog ste sangs rgyas thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon te// snang srid he ru ka yi thugs// thams cad rab tu brjid bsgral bas// de nas sems nyid mya ngan 'das/ khams gsum dur khrod khrag yin te// thugs rje chags pas bsgral phyir ru// snang srid gdar sha bcad nas kyang// spyod pa rnam pa bcu dang ldan// mdzad spyod thams cad kun bzang klong// thams cad yi ge hUM ni skal pa bzang// snang srid dbang du 'dus nas kyang// snang srid kun las 'das par bsgom// gzung 'dzin rnam gnyis gtan spangs nas// rig pa'i ye shes skad cig la// snang srid gnyis 'dzin rtogs pa rnams// bsad pa las kyang mya ngan 'das// snang srid mya ngan las 'das pas// kun bzang klong du ngang gis sbyor// srid pa gsum yang mya ngan 'das// snang srid 'khor ba'i skye rgyun bcad// byang chub sems kyi gol sa bcad// de ni byang chub sems kyi don// byang chub sems kyi phur bu 'di// dril bas 'khor ba rtsad nas bcad// snang srid phur bus thebs zhes bya// snang srid thig le'i ngang du rdzogs// lte ba gru gsum mthing nag la// zur la thod pa zhal gsum bri// gzhung bdun dgra s+t+wa brgyad kyang dgod// phur bu dgu dang kha T+wAM dgu// rtsang dmar drug cu rtsa brgyad

dgod// dbus su rdo rje rgya gram mo// ske tshe sha khrag len tshwa rnams// dug dang bsres la gtor ma bya// thugs rje chen po'i zhi ba las// gdug pa'i las rnams gtan spangs te// shin tu gdug pa'i gtum po la// zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yis/ khros pa'i sku mchog 'bar ba dang// sprul pa'i khro bo mang po yis// gdug byed ma lus btul nas ni// dug gsum rtsa ba bcad nas ni// gtan du 'pho ba'i las rnams bya// 'byung ba'i dgongs pa gtan 'pho'i las bya'o// de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum bskyed// 'dzab dbul 'dzab them pa dang/ dngos grub gsol/ phrin las bcol/ gtor ma dgong dang tho rangs gtang/ sbyin sreg gzhung bzhin bya/ bsgrub pa mthar phyin pa dang// gtor ma gcig rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong ba bsngos la// gtang rag gtang// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ ma traM zhal gy-i sgrub lugs te bzhi pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las dug gsum gyi dkyil 'khor bang rim gsum pa 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// 'jig rten sa bdag lha klu la// sa rin gzhal nas sa bslang ngo// sa gzhi de yi phyi rim du// tho bzhi dag kyang gzug par bya// spyan drangs byin gyis brlabs la bzhag/ bsrung dang mtshams kyi las rnams bya// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed la// phyi yi spang skong gzhung bzhin bya// gzungs ma byin brlab thig skud bkal// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la// bsgrub lugs chen po bco brgyad do// yang dag thabs mchog rdzogs pa yis// sangs rgyas bde chen gcig pu nyid// 'bras bu'i bde chen kun 'dus pas// rnal 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs// nges par brtags pa'i sa gzhi la// slob ma nges pa'i lung 'di bstan// ro yi sgrub thabs chen po ni// lung dang man ngag gtan tshigs so// blta ba 'di las ma 'das na// bsgrub pa rnams kyang de bzhin bsgrub// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi la// bar ma mthing nag gru gsum pa// ya tha dmar nag zla gam mo// b+han+da mtshan dang ldan pa la// dpal chen he ru yab yum bris la bzhag/ tshom bu brgyad la gau rI ma brgyad bris la bzhag/ tshil chen gyi me mar dgu btang/ bar ma la sha chen dang zhing ras/ tha ma la phyag rgya bzhi dgod/ phur bu dar gyi cod pan can bcu khro bo bcu'i rdzas su dgod de/ thub par bya ba'i dam tshig dang/ gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i brtul shugs can/ de dag goms nas nyams su blang// blo zhan shes rab chung bas ni// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// phung byed gnyis ka bsreg byas

nas// de bas gzhan du spel ba med// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtags nas ni// dkyil 'khor dmar nag gru bzhi la// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bya// de yi dbus su ro bzhag nas// snang mdzad sku ru bsgoms nas ni// de la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gdab// rdzogs pa'i blta ba'i ngang du bzhugs// mtshan ma byung nas dngos grub blang// mtshan ma dka' na spog par bya// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khrau bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ dug gsum bang rim gsum pa'i sgrub lugs te lnga pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan gyi sgo nas/ phrin las gyi sgrub pa zla gam drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'i sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sa bdag rnams la sa rin gzhal// bslang dang sbyang ba tshul bzhin bya// phyogs bzhi dag tu mtho bzhi btsug/ bsrung dang mtshams kyi las rnams bya// sdig sbyang byang chub sems kyang bskyed// phyi yi spang skong gzhung bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// gzungs ma byin brlabs thig skud bkal// dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab bo// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// sgo bzhi dag dang ldan par bya/ de yi phyi rim snam bu ni// dmar po sgo bzhi ldan par bya// de yi phyi rim me ri la// lag chu hwa dang ldan par bya// dbus su dpal chen yab yum la// de yi phyi rim khrag 'thung yab yum mo// rtsibs la gau rI ma brgyad dgod// rtsibs mchan la sing ha ma brgyad dgod// sgo bzhi dag tu phyag rgya ma// de yi phyi rim dmar nag la// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod// de yi phyi rim lag chu hwa/ khro bo chen po bcu rnams dgod// ba su ta yi rgyu 'phreng gis// dkyil 'khor chen po bskor bar bya// 'gebs pa'i g.yang gzhi chen po ni// bla re dag tu bri bar bya// dgu+u 'am drug cu rtsa brgyad dgod// de nas sgrub pa po rgyan bzhi dang dbang yang bskur ro// de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor la/ rdzas dgram pa ni/ lha bshos zla gam la/ rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas pa dang/ dam rdzas tshang ba'i gtor ma la/ sprin chen gyi zhal kheb can drang ngo// b+han+da'i bzed phor tshil chen gyi me mar/ dmar gyi ar+g+ha dang bcas pa dgram mo// de nas zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed/ 'dzab rdzogs pa dang/ stong tshigs kyi mchod pa 'bul/ dngos grub gsol/ gtor ma dgong dang tho rangs gtong/ slad ma yang drang/ lha bskyed mchod pa dbul/ 'dzab grangs/ de nas bsgrub pa phyin pa dang/ gtor ma tsho gsum du bcad la/ tsho gcig la sbyin sreg bya/ tsho gcig mi zad pa'i gter du sba/ de nas pra we shas sgo dbye dkyil 'khor nas byung/ dbang bskur yon phul/

gtang rag btang/ de nas phyi rol du gtor ma cha gcig srung ma la mchod/ slar gshegs su gsol/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ zla gam drug cu rtsa brgyad pa ste drug pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi sgo nas/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gang bu gcig pa'i sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sa bdag lha klu thams cad la// sa rin bcal te sa bslang ngo// sbyang dang bsrung ba tshul bzhin bya// de nas bsgrub pa gzhung bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// dur khrod chag chag rnam gsum bya// dbus su b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan gzhag/ shar du b+han+d+ha zlum po gzhag/ lhor sul mangs gzhag/ nub tu zla gam gzhag/ byang du gru gsum gzhag/ dbus su dri chen/ shar du byang sems/ lhor sha chen/ nub tu pad+ma rak+ta/ byang du dri chu/ dbus su glang po che la sogs pa rmig pa kha brag/ shar du stag dang seng ge la sogs pa mche ba can/ lhor mi la sogs te rkang le ba// nub tu rta la sogs te rmig zlum/ byang du nam mkha' lding la sogs te 'dab chags/ dbus su ka ko la/ shar du ru ka/ lhor dzA ti pha la/ nub tu ti ki sham/ byang du lce pog dkar po/ dbus su a ru ra/ shar du ga bur/ lhor gur gum/ nub tu li ga dur/ byang du rtsi bo che/ dbus su oM/ shar du hUM/ lhor swA/ nub tu AM/ byang du hA/ dbus su dpal chen po yab yum/ phyogs bzhir rigs bzhi yab yum/ b+han+d+ha tshal bu brgyad la/ go'u rI la sogs brgyad kyi snying po bri la dgod/ til gyi mar me/ dur khrod kyi ro ras/ 'di skor yig nor phren yod 'dra/ yum ni dus gsum gyi phye ma/ zla gsang dkar dmar rlung dkar lci/ nyung yang pany+tsa yan bcad do// mi phyed pa ni bdud gnas pa'i// thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa ni// re dogs med par dngos grub blang// de tshe 'bras bu gdams par bya// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad do// las kyi gtsor ni bskang gso bya// sbyang dang btsag dang sbal pa dang// nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus bya// the tshom med na nges par 'grub// ces bka' stsal pas shin tu rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la bstod pa// e ma'o sangs rgyas las byung ba'i/ byang chub bde chen nyid la rdzogs/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gang bu+u gcig pa'o// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la/ sman dang 'o ma gnyis bsres te/ lcags kyi par bu steng dang bcas/ de yi steng du mtshan ldan gzhag/ dar dkar dag gis kha bcad de/ gzungs thag dag gis btags la bsgrub/ rdo rje rigs ky-i sgrub lugs khrau bo puN+Da ri ka'i

rgyud las/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i sgrub lugs te bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ bdud rtsi chen pos sgrub lugs pad+ma 'dab brgyad phye ma sbyang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sbyang dang blang ba tshul bzhin bya// de nas sgrub pa gzhung bzhin bya// bdud rtsi'i sgra las drangs nas// b+ha ga pad+ma ldan pa ru// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa ru// thams cad ye shes lnga ru 'grub// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi ru// dur khraud chag chag rnam gsum gdab// d+ha ra hi zhes brjod nas ni// pad+ma 'dab brgyad thig tu gdab// de nas pad+ma 'dab brgyad du byas la/ de'i phyi rim du zla gam dmar po sgo yod pa bri/ mtha' rdo rje'i ra bas bskor ba bri/ de nas rdzas dgram pa ni/ dkyil 'khor dbus su b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan sul med ces bya ste// srubs med pa gzhag shar du b+han+d+ha sul 'greng zhes su ste/ tshangs pa'i skud pa can gzhag/ lhor b+han+d+ha sul mangs zhes bya ste// gtsug na 'bur bzhi yod pa gzhag/ nub tu b+han+d+ha zla gam zhes bya ste// gshong bu gnyis pa gzhag/ byang du rgya gram zhes bya ste// gshod bu bzhi pa gzhag/ dbus su byang chub sems/ shar du dri chen/ lhor sha chen/ nub tu pad+ma rak+ta/ byang du dri chu/ dbus su pa na se/ shar du a ru ra/ lhor smin pa a mra/ nub tu gu+u na ba ta/ byang du ne ba ta/ dbus su a ru ra/ shar du ga bur/ lhor rgun 'bru/ nub tu pa na se/ byang du na li ke ra/ dbus su ka ko la/ shar du du ru ka/ lhor dzA ti pha la/ nub tu ti ki sha ma/ byang du lce pog dkar po/ dbus su dzA ti pha la/ shar du ga phur/ lho ru ba lig/ nub tu li shi byang du kyi lce dkar po/ dbus su se'u 'bru/ shar du sug smel/ lhor li dong gra/ nub tu shing tsha/ byang du mu la/ dbus su cong zhi/ shar du brag zhun/ lhor til zhun/ nub tu sbrang rgod/ byang du yung mar/ dbus su dzA ti pha la/ shar du ga bur/ lhor ba log/ nub tu li shi/ byang du kyi lce dkar po/ dbus su gangs chu/ shar du mtshe chu/ lhor 'bab chu/ nub tu 'dam chu/ byang du nag chu/ chu sna 'di skor 'dra min yang bas dpyad/ dbus su hUM/ shar du oM/ lhor swA/ nub tu AM/ byang du hA/ sman sna stong/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya/ sdong po yal ga me tog dang// lo ma 'bras bu shun pa dang// mi chen kla klo'i snying la sogs// gzhung bzhin 'byor pa de ni gzhag/ de nas bdud rtsi bsgrub pa ni// dbus su b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan la/ yab yum snying po bris la gzhag/ phyogs bzhi dag gi zla gam la// b+han+d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa la// rigs bzhi'i snying po bri la gzhag/ de yi phyi rim zla gam

la// tshal bu brgyad la ma brgyad bris// dkyil 'khor phyi rim bskor la gzhag/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i mtha' skor du// sha dang zhing gi ras ma gzhag/ zhal zas tshang ba'i gtor ma la// sprin chen gyi zhal khebs kyis bkab la drang ngo// b+han+d+ha'i bzed phor dmar gyis ar+g+ha drang ngo// dkyil 'khor gzhung bsrang ngo// chos sku ye nas dag pa la// sgyu mas bslad pa ma yin yang// rang rig byang chub sems kyi ngang// dug lnga ye nas bdud rtsi lnga// rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu ste// sku lnga ye shes lnga ru gsal// mu tig dkar po dri med dang// tsan dan smug po rma med dang// bse phor mtshan ldan srub med dang// rgya phor nang dmar gzhung ldan dang// bdud rtsi chen po'i don ldan dang// chos nyid chen po rang rtags dang// bde ba chen po rgyu gcig brgyad// de brgyad tshogs pas dpal dang ldan// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// kun tu bzang mo yum gyi gzhal yas su// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i byin rlabs las// snod bcud bdud rts-i bye brag rab sbyangs te// thams cad ye shes lnga ru gyur nas kyang// 'bras bu'i sku gsung thugs su rab sgrub ste// skye shi med pa'i bdud rtsi chen por bya// de nas btag dang btsag par bya'o// de nas b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan la// btag pa tsag tshar nas blugs nas ni// dar dkar dag gis kha bcad de// gsang ba'i rgya yis btab nas ni// gzungs thag dag gis btags nas ni// dbus su btags la bskor bar bya// oM A hUM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM hrI thA/ oM dz+nyA na badzra hUM phaT/ bzlas shing bsgrub pas rtags rnams 'byung// rtags rnams myur du ma byung na// spogs dang sbyar ba'i las rnams bya// 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par byed// de tshe dam tshig gzungs ldan pas// yi dam lha la mchod pa 'bul// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// b+han+da dpal dang ldan par bsgom/ b+han+d+ha dpal dang ldan bsgoms pas/ chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i ngang/ dang por lha la mchod byas pas// lha dang gnyis su med pa ste/ yi dam lha yi thugs dam bskang// lta ba rdo rje thig chen no// nam mkha' rdo rje mtha' yas par// 'khor lo rdo rje bskor bskul zhing// 'di ni pany+tsa a mr-i ta// lha la mchod pas thugs dam bskang// rnal 'byor mched la mchod byas pas// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad bsal nas/ ngan song sbyong shing mtho ris thob// mi mthun bgegs la gtor byas pas// brag po gtum po'ang lhan ner 'gyur// oM AHhUM/ pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM hrI thA// de nas dngos grub gsol te// oM dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba// rdo rje me phyed sku dang ldan// deng bdag sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pas// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzod cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga

ta kA ya badzrA swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM dpal ldan rdo rje gsung 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsung dang ldan// deng bdag sangs rgyas gsung 'dzin pas// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzod cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA' ka swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM// hUM dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba// rdo rje'i mi phyed thugs dang ldan// deng 'dir sangs rgyas thugs 'dzin pas// byin gyis bslab pa'i gnas mdzod cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA At+ma ko\u0f85 haM// bdud rtsi'i sgra las drangs nas kyang// b+ha ga pad+ma ldan pa ru// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// thams cad ye shes sku ru 'grub// las 'di'i lung gis bsgrub bya ba// mi spang ba dang dang du blang// spyad pa'i dam tshig bco lnga bsrung// de yang ma hA sa ma ya/ bzhi po rdzogs nas kun tu bzang// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod pa// mnan zlog dug ni gcig tu'o// de nas bdud rtsi grub pa dang// tsho gcig ye shes lha la 'bul// tsho gcig slob dpon sgrub pa po la 'bul// tsho gcig rnal 'byor yongs la drang// bdud rtsi byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la// ye shes lnga ru sgrub pa 'di// tsho gcig ye shes lha la 'bul// ye shes lha la mi 'bul rgyu// sku gsung thugs kyi mnga' bdag lags// tsho gcig slob dpon yab la 'bul// slob dpon yab la mi 'bul rgyu// sgrub po rnams kyi mnga' bdag la// tsho gcig rnal 'byor yongs la drang// rnal 'byor yongs la mi 'dren rgyu// dngos grub yongs kyi skal pa lags// de nas bsgrub pa phyin pa dang// gtor ma tsho gsum du bcad la/ gcig sbyin sreg bya/ gcig gis mkha' 'gro ma bya skyong// gcig mi zad pa'i gter du sba/ pra be shas sgo dbye/ dbang bskur/ dkyil 'khor bsdu/ gtor ma cha gcig mgon po la gtang rag gtang// gats+tshas gshegs su gsol// bar chad med las dag tu bya/ gcig la gcig bzod par gsol/ bshags pa bya/ gtang rag gtang/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ sman phye ma sgrub lugs te brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ bdud rtsi chen po'i sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// bslang dang sbyang ba tshul bzhin bya// de nas sgrub pa gzhung bzhin bya// thams cad ye nas dag pa la// lo tog rnam pa gnyis su 'grub// thams cad 'byung ba lnga las skyes// thams cad tshang zhing dri med las// rnam rtog mi mthun so sor gyur// la la'i sman la la la'i dug/ sman du ma gyur gang yang med// dug tu ma gyur gang yang med// thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig las// mi mthun khyad par so

sor snang// sus kyang ma byas su byed yod// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor bcings// lus gnas longs spyod sna tshogs dang// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor sna tshogs dang/ khams gsum phyin ci log bzhi dang// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sbyong bar byed// rnam par thar pa lnga rdzogs te// sa bcur rdzogs te sangs rgyas byed// de phyir sman 'di rab tu bsgrub par bya// kun la phan pa sman yin pa// de phyir nga dang bdag ma 'dzin// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo rtog bor// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du spyod// rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rdzogs// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa spyod// snying rjes chud ma zos par gyis// bdud rtsi'i chos ni mnyam pa'i dbyings// bdud rtsi'i don ni skye shi med// bdud rtsi'i gnas ni byang chub sems// bdud rtsi'i las ni rnam rtog sbyong// bdag gi dpal tshogs 'gro don mdzod// sman gyi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// ngan song sbyangs shing bla med sgrol// gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel zhing// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grub// rkyen las gyur pa'i dug rnams dang// rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ klu dug rbod gtong dug la sogs// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// dus rnams ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor ma lus tshang bar bsgom/ de nas dkyil 'khor dbyings su bstim// dang po dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni// bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bsgom// sku mdog gangs la nyi shar 'dra// zla ba pad+ma'i gdan khri la// nyi ma stong gi dkyil 'khor ldan// lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyi bdag/ khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyar bcas// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// shar du rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan te// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas so// byang du don yod grub pa'o// thabs dang shes rab ldan par bsgom// phyag rgya rnams kyang gsal bar bsgom// snying po 'bru gcig gsal bar bzlas// de nas bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni// b+han+d+ha yid bzhin 'bar ba ste// re ba yid bzhin skong bar byed// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan par byed// dngos grub chen po bla med pa'o// bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed// sgo bzhi phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan// a mr-i ta yi rgyu 'di ni// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang// dri chen dri chu mAM sar bcas// pad+ma rak+ta la sogs te// gzhan yang 'dod yon sna tshogs bcas// dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye bar// bdud rtsi nyid du byin gyis brlab// rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// gtsang sme med par bza' bar bya// dbyings su yang ni thim par bya// phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom// bzhi

brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad bsal nas// dug gsum sdug bsngal med pa dang// bskal par yun ring gnas pa dang// dngos grub chen po 'thob 'gyur te// tshogs gnyis rdzogs zhes yang dag gsungs// de nas sman tsho gsum du bgo/ gtor ma tsho gsum du bcad/ gcig mi zad gter du sba// gcig la sbyin bsreg bya/ gcig la mkha' 'gro ma bskyang/ sgo dbye dbang bskur ro// dkyil 'khor bsdu/ bar chad med pa'i las drag tu bya/ gcig la gcig bzod par gsol/ bshags pa bya/ gtang rag gtang/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da ra'i ka'i rgyud las/ bdud rtsi chen po'i dkyil 'khor sgrub lugs te dgu pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor la tshe'i las 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sbyang dang bslang ba tshul bzhin bya// bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa yi// thugs kar sems dpa'i hUM las ni// dbus su A dkyil bsam pa ni// bin dur gyur pas A yu'o// steng du baM las rdo rje yi// lu gu rgyud kyis rgya gram du// 'di ni A yu bcing ba'o// de nas A yu dgug pa ni// lag sor bsnol mar bkro byas la// A+oM badzra mu ka ta ho// 'di ni lan gsum brjod pa yis// 'jig rten bcings pa bkrol 'gyur te// A yu dbang du sbas pa ni// lha mo dkar mo lcags kyu can// mang pos de bkug bsam pa ni// A yu dgug pa'i cho ga'o// de nas A yu bsnan pa ni// nA sa gnyis nas hUM bsgril nas/ khyad par sems can mang po yi// tshe zad nad pa bder 'gyur te// shes rab thabs su 'brel ba yis// bo d+hi tsit+tas dbang bskur ro// A yu'i steng du mu tig bzhin/ khu 'phang dkar po 'dril ba bzhin// 'di ni A yu bsnan pa'o// hUM ni rnam bzh-i bkod pa yi// yum gyi phyag rgyar gyur pa yi// thams cad ma lus mkha' 'gro yi// dbang bsdus tshe dbang phun sum tshogs// thugs kar tshon gang gzugs las ni// skud pas me tog dkar po gnyis// sngags bzlas brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bya// langs nas gzi mdangs 'khrungs par 'gyur// snga ma'i rgya gram nang du ni// gzugs 'gyur bos nas spyi nas su// bsnyen pa'i bum pas dbang bskur ro// gzugs can dkyil 'khor de dbus su// b+han+d+ha dpal dang ldan par bsgom// zla gam dmar po'i steng du ni// tshe yi dngos grub gsol byang gzhag/ bcol ba'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe sgrub pa ste bcu pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas gsang ba'i dkyil

'khor la tshe sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan pas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// btsal dang bzung ba bslang ba dang// sa gzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi brtsig/ tsa da dar hi zhes thig gdab// dkyil 'khor pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// dbus su zla gam gcig pa la// mtha' la rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// sgo bzhi pa dang ldan par bri// b+han+d+ha mtshon dang ldan nang du// chang dang tshe 'bras kyis bkang ste// b+han+d+ha gcig la mgon po tshe dpag med yab yum bris te// b+han+d+ha kha sprod du byas te/ sgrub pa po yab yum gsang mtshan dang dngos grub ci gsol ba bris la gzungs thag gis btags la dbus su gzhag/ de yi phyi rim ste khyams la/ b+han+d+ha tshal bu bzhi la/ yab yum bzhi bris la gzhag/ shar du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'/ lhor rin chen 'byung ldan/ nub tu rnam par snang mdzad yab yum/ byang du don yod grub pa yab yum/ sgo bzhir tshal bu bzhi la sgo ba bzhi bris la dgod/ til gyi me mar dgod/ de'i phyi rim du mda' dar sna can bzhi gzug/ rgyan cha rnams kyang dgod par bya'o// de'i phyi rim du phur bu dar gyi cod pan can bcu thams pa khro bo bcur mnga' gsol/ de nas mchod pa dgram pa ni/ lha bshos zla gam la/ rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas pa dang dam rdzas tshang ba'i gtor ma b+han+d+ha'i bzed phor/ dmar gyi ar+g+ha drang ngo// mkha' 'gro ma'i khrus bya/ rtags dang mtshan mas gdab bo// rgyan spel te bzhugs so// rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor tshom bu lngar/ hUM nub phyogs pad+ma dbang gi dkyil 'khor nas// byams ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// thugs kyi dpal be'u zla gam ga'u nas// byang chub sems kyi A yu dmar po 'di// rtse gcig bdag cag sgrub pa'i tshe lags na// byin gyis brlabs shing bdag la tshe dbang stsol// phyag rgya'i tshogs chen ye shes gsang ba'i tshe// 'byung ba dang ni 'bras bu byang chub sems// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor nas// bde gshegs yab lnga gsang ba'i thugs// sha yi khams nas tshe nyams na// sa yi khams nas dgug par bya// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum mchog sangs rgyas spyan// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba sa yi khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs nas// sha yi gnas su bstim par bya/ khrag gi khams nas tshe nyams na// chu yi khams nas dgug par bya// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum mchog mA ma kI// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba chu yi khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs nas// khrag gi gnas su bstim par bya// drod kyi khams nas tshe nyams na// me yi khams nas dgug par bya// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum mchog na

bza' dkar// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba me yi khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs nas// drod kyi gnas su bstim par bya// dbugs kyi khams nas tshe nyams na// rlung gi khams nas dgug par bya// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum mchog dam tshig sgrol/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba rlung gi khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs nas// dbugs kyi gnas su bstim par bya// yid kyi khams nas tshe nyams na// nam mkha'i khams nas dgug par bya// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum mchog kun tu bzang// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba nam mkha'i khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs nas// yid kyi gnas su bstim par bya// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// me chu sa rlung la sogs te// 'byung ba chen po lnga yi rang bzhin no// 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe la dbang mdzad ma// shar phyogs dkar mo shel gyi zhing khams nas// dkar mo mgyogs ma zhi byed 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs// tshe dang gzi byin dgug pa'i las mdzad ma// rdo rje'i tshe mchog dgug pa'i las mdzod cig/ lho phyogs bai DUr+ya yi zhing khams nas// sngon mo drag shul 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs// tshe dang ye shes dgug pa'i las mdzad ma// rdo rje'i tshe mchog dgug pa'i las mdzod cig/ nub phyogs pad+ma dbang gi zhing khams nas// dmar mo dbang sdud 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs// tshe dang ye shes dgug pa'i las mdzad ma// rdo rje'i tshe mchog dgug pa'i las mdzod cig/ byang phyogs in+d+ra nI la'i zhing khams nas// mgyaugs byed ljang gu 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs// tshe dang ye shes dgug pa'i las mdzad ma// rdo rje'i tshe mchog dgug pa'i las mdzod cig/ ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdus nas ni// 'od du gyur te dkyil 'khor dbus su bstim// zhes brjod do// rnal 'byor byang chub sems kyi A yu dmar po 'di// chos nyid skye ba med pa'i dbyings su bsdu// de la phyag rgya bdun gyis gdab// dang por sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// gnyis pa rdo rje rgya gram rgya// gsum pa rta mchog dbang gi rgya// bzhi pa gser gyi zor ba'i rgya// lnga pa gar mkhan mchog gi rgya// drug pa zla gam dbang gi rgya// bdun pa chos nyid dbyings kyi rgya// chos nyid dbyings su tshe sbas pas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas kyang// de la gzung zhing gtang du med// de lta bu'i bsgrub pa mthar phyin nas// gtor ma tsho gsum du bcad la/ tsho gcig sbyin bsreg bya/ tsho gcig gis mkha' 'gro ma bskyang/ tsho gcig mi zad gter du sba/ sgo dbye dbang bskur/ bkra shis dbul/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ rdzas dang dkyil 'khor la tshe

sgrub pa ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ tshe'i khro bo'i sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag pa dang// dbus kyi gtso bo dpal pad+ma he ru ka yab yum gyi snying po bri/ b+han+d+ha gcig tshe skyems dang/ tshe 'bras kyis bkang nas/ b+han+d+ha kha sprod du byas la/ gzungs thag gis btags la/ dbus kyi gtso bo la mnga' gsol/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma'i lte khyams la/ b+han+d+ha tshal bu bzhi la/ gsang ba'i yum bzhi bris la gzhag/ bar du dpal rdo rjai he ru ka bris la gzhag/ go'u rI puk+ka sI/ sing ha gr-iD+ha ma dang bzhi/ lhor rat+na he ru ka/ 'khor tso'u rI/ g+hasma rI byA g+h+rI ma/ kang ka ma dang bzhi/ nub tu b+hud+d+ha he ru ka/ 'khor pra mo ha/ sma sha nI/ sr-i gA la ma/ kA ka ma dang bzhi/ byang du dpal karma he ru ka/ be tA lI/ tsan+d+ha lI/ shwa na ma/ u lU ma dang bzhi/ rdzas la khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed/ de nas tshe bskul dgug pa dang/ tshe bsdu zhing gnas bya ba la sogs pa bya/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ khro bo tshe sgrub pa ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas dpal rdo rje he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ phrin las kyi dkyil 'khor la tshe sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sbyang dang bsrung dang bslang bar bya// ma traM he yi dkyil 'khor du// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs
