brgyad pa// de dbus 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dgod// drug cu rtsa brgyad don bsgoms nas// yig 'brus phyogs bcur gang bar gnas// b+h+rUM dzaHhUM baM hoHyis dgug/ sku gsung thugs kyi snying po'i mchog/ lus ngag sems la bstim par bya'o// de nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mchod// bum pa'i mchog ni bzang po yi// tshe gzhag gnas ni de yin te// yang nas yang du bkug byas nas// mngon sum smin par gyur pa dang// dbyings su yang ni sba bar bya// rdo rje cho gas bsrung ba yin// brtan zhing 'khor los brgyan par bya// snying por 'bru lnga nang du bstim// sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kun// rgyal ba tshe dpag med par bsgom// sku mdog gangs ri 'tsher ba la// rgyan phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba dang// rin chen rgyan dang za ma tog/ gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don bya ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ bgegs kyis nr-i rnams mi ster na// tshe dpag med kyang khro bo ste// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// sgra skad drag po brten nas ni// thams cad ma lus gdul bar bya// dbang du tshe dpag med pa bsgom// tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang// tshe bsgrub dang ni bsgrub chen

dang// thabs dang shes rab 'byor ba yis// ci 'dod las rnams bsgrub par gsungs// tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'phel lo// dkar mo mdog la 'od 'phro 'bar// phyag mtshan sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// gnas pa'i 'gro drug ma lus kun// phan pa'i tshe dbang 'dir sbyin no// de las lhag pa'i rgyud 'phel med// de yi bzlas pa'i chen po 'di// rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul bar// sngags bzlas cho ga rgyun ma gcad// oM hUM swA AM hAM baM b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hUM AHoM/ tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na// bde gshegs lnga dang tshe dpag med// sku gsung thugs kyi gzungs kyis ni// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// phyag rgya tshogs chen sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nas// 'gro lnga'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdus// phyag rgya'i gshol la sogs pa yis// 'og gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs nas// gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe bkug ste// snying po lnga la bstim par bya// phyag rgya'i 'khor lo chen po yis// steng gi 'jig rten khams bskor te// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs dang// bar snang khams rnams rgyu ba las// nr-i'i tshe rab tu dgug par bya// 'khor lo'i dbus la bstims nas ni// de nas yi ge 'bru lnga ste// nr-i ni nam mkhar bstim par bya// oM oM oM/ badzra ka ba tsa rak+Sha haM/ oM sarba thA ga ta badzra a b+hi tiSh+Tha swA hA/ phyag rgya srung ba'i cho ga ste// 'bru la yi ge 'bru gcig ste// 'bru gcig mi dmigs dbyings su thim// a yid bzhin bum pa rin po che// rgyan dang rin chen phreng bas brgyan// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang// 'bru lnga spos lnga yungs kar bcas// sngags mkhan rab ldan blo brtan pas// yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas bsgom// rgyan cha lnga dang ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mnyes mchod dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de lta bu yi don rtogs nas// bsgrub pa zin nas/ gtor ma cha gsum du bcad nas/ tsho gcig sbyin bsreg bya/ tsho gcig gis mkha' 'gro bskyang/ tsho gcig mi zad pa'i gter du sba/ pra dbye/ dbang bskur/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ phrin las kyi dkyil 'khor la tshe sgrub pa ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi sgo nas/ gsang ba chen po 'di gsungs so// ye shes chen po bde ba che// ye nas rnam dag kun bzang klong// rnam dag lam chen bsgral ba'i ngang// ma skyes pas na 'gag pa med// chen po lnga nyid bde chen klong// chen po lnga yi ngang nyid du// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas so// thams cad thig le'i rang bzhin te// snang srid thams cad mya ngan 'das// thams cad hUM

gi rang bzhin te// yi ge hUM yang dngos gzhi kun dang bral// ye nas dag pas bde chen byang chub sems// chen po lnga yi ngang du snang srid thams cad sbyor// thig le gcig gi ngang du sbyar bas dus gsum lhun gyis grub// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ spyir btang ba'i man ngag sgrub lugs te bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ bsgral ba'i lung 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sa bdag lha klu thams cad la// sa rin bcal te sa bslang ngo// sbyang dang bsrung ba tshul bzhin bya// de nas bsgrub pa gzhung bzhin bya'o// snang srid thams cad skye med dbyings su bsgral// yi ge b+h+rUM ni byang chub sems kyi ngang/ khrag dang rus pa sems dang dbugs la sogs// bsgral ba'i rgyu la dpa' bo 'bru lnga dgod/ khro chen bcu ni rngam pa'i stangs stabs can// de ltar bsgral na don gyi snying po yin// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo luN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ ta na bsgral ba'i lung gi sgrub lugs ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// ga Na'i sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// ma skyes dbyings su mi 'gag sbyar// kun tu bzang mo'i ngang du snang srid thams cad sbyor// pad+ma can dang dung can dang// bu mo mig rings zhes bya'o// zla gsang dkar dmar rlung dkar lci// ljon phran dang ni lhug phran dang// ri mo can dang sdong gcig ma// me rig dang ni rigs ngan mo// mtshams gcad byin brlab dbang bskur nas// dai la sbyor ba'i cho ga ni// ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal bar bsgom// de nas tshom bu nyi shu rtsa lnga dgod// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ ga Na chen po'i sgrub lugs te bcu drug pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ ma traM bzhi bsnol gsang ba gter gyi sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sa bdag lha klu thams cad la// sa rin gzhal nas sa bslang ngo// sbyang dang bsrung ba gzung bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi bya// gra yi stegs bu mkhyid re bya// de steng ma traM bzhi bsnol bya// mtha' ma rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// de yi phyi rim me ri dgod// de yi phyi rim thod pa bri// de yi phyi rim stegs bu la// me yi spu gri 'bar ba bri// de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi bri// de yi phyi rim sgo khyud la// zhing gi za ra tshags bri'o// de nas b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan la// dpal chen yab yum snying po bri/ tshal bu la ral pa can brgyad bri/ de'i phyi rim tshal bu la phra men ma brgyad bri/ tshal bu

bzhi la sgo ma bzhi bri// thar pa gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du/ gdol ba 'byung po nga rgyal can// zhe sdang rnams kyis bslad pa'i rgyu// de yi dus gsum gzhig pa'i phyir// don gyi bsgrub pa chen po bshad// bgegs ni mi rtog sems las byung// ma dag rnam gsum rgyu yi rtsa ba yin// thugs rje 'byung ba bcom ldan 'das// sgrub pa don gyi dkyil 'khor rtsa ba yin// dug gsum bslad pa rnams kyi rtsa ba yin// dur khrod chen po'i gnas kyang yin// brj-id ldan sku brnyes dpal chen he ru+u ka/ bdag gzhan 'joms pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// stong gsum ru+u trA'i khog sbubs su// dur khrod bdag po spyan drangs te// ma rig sbubs kyi kha phye nas// dug gsum 'byung ba'i sgo phye nas// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin mtshams bcad de// ngan song gsum du dug gsum gyi// nyon mongs sems can sdang byed pa// zhe sdang dang ni gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog lnga po yang// che ba'i ye shes chen po yis// bsdus nas sems can nam mkha' che// bde ba sbyin pa'i mchod pa yis// ro mchog lnga dang mnyam sbyor bas// bde chen sbyin pa'i mchod pa che// sna tshogs bde bar bsgrub pa'i phyir// dam nyams mchod par bor ba bzhes/ khams gsum dra ba gzhom pa'i phyir/ khro bdag phyag rgyar bcas pa ni// mgyogs ma'i pho nyas bskul bar bya// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bsgral// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bsgral// yan lag gling bzhi'i yul du bsgral// lag pa g.yas pa'i dur khrod ni// rgya gar yul du bsgral bar bya// de yi bdag mo ko'u rI ma// mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// mche gtsigs rkan brdeb dur khrod sgrol// dur khraud lag pa g.yon pa ni// li yi yul du bsgral bar bya// de yi bdag mo tso'u rI ma// ser mo 'bar ba'i ral pa can// mche gtsigs rkan brdeb dur khraud sgrol// dur khrod rkang pa g.yas pa ni// bal po'i yul du bsgral bar bya// de yi bdag mo pra mo ha// dmar mo 'bar ba'i ral pa can// mche gtsigs rkan brdeb dur khrod sgrol// dur khrod rkang pa g.yon pa ni// tho gar yul du bsgral bar bya// de yi bdag mo be tA lI// nag mo 'bar ba'i ral pa can// mche gtsigs rkan brdeb dur khrod sgrol// dur khrod 'di yi mgo bo ni// za hor yul du bsgral bar bya// de yi bdag po puk+ka sI// dmar ser 'bar ba'i ral pa can// mche gtsigs rkan brdeb dur khraud sgrol// dur khrod mkhal ma g.yon pa ni// u rgyan yul du bsgral bar bya// de yi bdag mo g+hasma rI// dkar ljang 'bar ba'i ral pa can// mche gtsigs rkan brdeb dur khrod sgrol// dur khrod 'di yi pho mtshan ni// seng ge'i yul du bsgral bar bya// de y-i bdag mo sma sha nI// mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral pa

can// mche gtsigs rkan brdeb dur khrod sgrol// dur khrod mkhal ma g.yas pa ni// gling dgu'i yul du bsgral bar bya// de yi bdag mo tsaN+Da lI// ljang ser 'bar ba'i ral pa can// mche gtsigs rkan brdeb dur khrod sgrol// dur khrod dpung mgo g.yas g.yon ni// phra men stag dang seng ge'i rdzas// dur khrod brla ni g.yas dang g.yon// phra men wa spyang bya rog 'ug/ pho nya'i rgyal mo de yi rdzas// dur khrod thar pa'i rkang lag bzhi// pho nya 'gug ma de bzhi'i rdzas// dur khrod bdag mo spyan drangs te// bgegs kyi rgyal po rU tra bsgral// bde ba chen po'i ngang yin no// de ni dur khrod dbang phyug ste// sangs rgyas sku ste ye shes yin// 'jam dpal rnon po'i mtshon cha yin// log rtog 'khor ba'i rgyun bcad do// oM ma hA shri he ru ka/ pany+tsa badzra ma hA kro ng+ha hUM phaT// stong gsum rU tra'i khog sbubs la// za byed lnga dang 'jigs byed lnga// dur khrod gnas su bkod byas nas// rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin dbyings su spro bzhes bya/ khro bo dbu lnga hom lnga'i dkyil 'khor du/ khro bo khrag 'thung yam shing brdzangs pa la// ye shes lnga yi me spar la// nyon mongs lnga yi rdzas bsregs pas// zhe sdang khro bo zhal gyi hom khung du// rdo rje khrag 'thung yam shing brdzangs pa la// me long lta bu'i me spar la// zhe sdang rdzas rnams bsreg byas pas// rdo rje'i rigs kyang mnyes gyur nas// thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// gti mug khro bo zhal gyi hom khung du// bud+d+ha khrag 'thung yam shing brdzangs pa la// chos dbyings ye shes me sbar zhing// gti mug rdzas rnams bsregs byas pas// bde gshegs rnams kyang mnyes gyur nas// sku yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// nga rgyal khro bo zhal gyi gom khung du// rin chen khrag 'thung yam shing brdzangs pa la// mnyam pa'i ye shes me spar zhing// nga rgyal rdzas rnams bsreg byas pas// rin chen rigs kyang mnyes gyur nas// yon tan dngos grub stsal du gsol// 'dod chags khro bo zhal gyi hom khung du/ pad+ma khrag 'thung yam shing brdzangs pa la// rtog pa'i ye shes me spar bas// 'dod chags rdzas rnams bsregs byas pas// pad+ma'i rigs kyang mnyes gyur nas// gsung gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// phrag dog khro bo zhal gyi hom khung du// karma khrag 'thung yam shing brdzangs pa la// nan tan ye shes me spar bas// phrag dog rdzas rnams bsreg byas pas// las kyi rigs kyang mnyes gyur nas// phrin las dngos grub stsal du gsol// za byed khro bo'i hom khung du// phud dang lhag ma'i rdzas rnams bsregs/ khrag 'thung rak+Sha mnyes gyur nas// bstan pa srung ba'i dngos grub stsol// cho ga phyi ma gzhan dang mthun// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo paN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/

ma traM bzhi bsnol gsang ba gter gyi sgrub lugs te bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las las// mchog bsgrub chen po 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// rdzas dang sa bzhi brtag par bya// sa bdag lha klu thams cad la// sa rin bcal te sa bslang ngo// sbyang dang bsrung ba tshul bzhin bya// de nas bsgrubs pa gzhung bzhin bya// sdig sbyang byang chub sems bskyed do// bshags sbyang spong skong tsha tsha gdab// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// zhi rgyas sbyin bsreg tshul bzhin bya// rgyas par rab 'bring gzhung bzhin 'don// sbyin pa rgya chen dus bzhir bya// de nas bsgrubs pa gsung bzhin bya'o// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi bya// phyogs bzhir bris las dkyil 'khor bya// dbus su dkyil 'khor brtsegs ma bya// de dkyil zla gam brgyad du bya// phyogs bzhi dag ni me yis bskor// lnga yi phyi rim thod phreng bskor// de yi phyi rim me dpung bri// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi dgod// dbus su b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan la// yab yum snying po bris la gzhag/ de yi phyi rim zla gam la// ma mo phra men brgyad kyang tshul bzhin dgod// nag po la ni me ris bskor// ser po la ni thod pas bskor// dmar po la ni sha chen gzhag/ sgo la sgo ba yab yum ste// sgo khyud la ni dbang phyug ma// de nas sgrub pa po'i mdun du// b+han+d+ha'i bzed phor re dang/ dmar gyi ar+g+ha yang drang ngo// khro bo'i phrin las gzhung bzhin bya// stong tshigs mchod pa gzhung bzhin dbul// 'jigs byed bskal pa'i dkyil 'khor du// za byed lnga yi dkyil 'khor bcas// thod pa tshar gnyis bsgral ba'i phyir// drod tshad gsum gyis gtan la dbab// dag pa gsum gyis bsgral bar bya// mtshan bzang po ni yod pa rnams// de nyid bsgrub pa'i rgyu yin te// za byed lnga yi dkyil 'khor du// 'jigs byed lnga yi cho 'phrul gyis// bu gu sgo lnga'i dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi lnga yi zil dngar gyis// bu gu lnga yi thig btab bo// nga ni za byed tshogs bkod de// dbus nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// thugs mchog bud+d+ha he ru ka/ rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ thugs mchog rak+Sha he ru ka/ dbus kyi pho brang zlum po la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// shar nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// sku mchog badzra he ru ka/ rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ sku mchog rak+sha he ru ka/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// lho nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// yon tan rat+na he ru ka/ rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud

pa'i mchog/ yon tan rak+sha he ru ka/ lho phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// nub nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// gsung mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ gsung mchog rak+sha he ru ka/ nub kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// byang nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// phrin las karma he ru ka/ rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ las mchog rak+sha he ru ka/ byang phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ma mo chen mo gtum khro'i gzugs// mthing nag rak+ta'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ma mo chen mo gtum khro'i gzugs// ser nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ lho yi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ma mo chen mo gtum khro'i gzugs// dmar nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ nub kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ma mo chen mo gtum khro'i gzugs// ljang nag rak+ta'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ byang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// phra men mgyogs ma rngam pa'i gzugs// gser mdog seng ha rak+ta'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ shar lho 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// phra men mgyogs ma rngam pa'i gzugs// dmar nag byA g+h+rA rak+ta'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ shar lho 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// phra men mgyogs ma 'jigs pa'i gzugs// mthing nag shwa ma rak+ti'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ nub byang 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// phra men mgyogs ma rngams pa'i gzugs// dmar nag sr-i la rak+ta'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ byang shar 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng

du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ma mo chen mo gtum khro'i gzugs// dmar ser rak+ta'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ma mo chen mo gtum khro'i gzugs// dkar ljang 'bar ba'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgraul ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ lho yi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ma mo chen mo gtum khro'i gzugs// mthing nag rak+tA'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ nub kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ma mo chen mo gtum khro'i gzugs// ser nag rak+ta'i ral pa can/ rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ byang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// phra men mgyogs ma rngam pa'i gzugs// dkar ser rak+ta'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ shar lho'i 'khor ba'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// phra men mgyogs ma rngam pa'i gzugs// skya snar 'bar ba'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ lho nub 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// phra men chen mo gtum khro'i gzugs// mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can/ rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ nub byang 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// phra men mgyogs ma rngam pa'i gzugs// sna tshogs rak+tA'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ byang shar 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dgyes shing brtan par zhugs su gsol// bskul ba rdo rje aM ku sha/ dkar ljang 'bar ba'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar sgo ru// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// 'ching byed rdo rje pA sha hUM// ser nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i lho sgo ru// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// sdom byed rdo rje s+pho Ta baM// dmar nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i

mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i nub sgo ru// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// thal byed rdo rje g+haN+De hoH// ljang nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol ba'i lha// dug gsum dbyings su sdud pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i byang sgo ru// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ khro bo chen po Ar+ya a tsa la// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// dkar ljang rak+ta'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// rin chen 'bar ba'i lte ba la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// mthing nag rak+ta'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// rin chen 'bar ba'i lte ba la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ khro bo chen po rta mchog dpal// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// dmar nag rak+ta'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// rin chen 'bar ba'i lte ba la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// ljang nag rak+ta'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// rin chen 'bar ba'i lte ba la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// rdo rje chen mo snyems chen mo// dbu gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// g.yas pa gtso bo'i sku la 'khril// g.yon pa b+han+d+ha gtso la stob// rak+ta'i ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// gtso la brten pa'i bdag nyid kyis// rin chen 'bar ba'i lte ba la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// rdo rje dur khrod bdag chen mo// dbu gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// g.yas pa gtso bo'i sku la 'khril// g.yon pa b+han+d+ha gtso la stob// rak+ta'i ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// gtso la brten pa'i bdag nyid kyis// rin chen 'bar ba'i lte ba la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ rdo rje khro mo gtum chen mo// dbu gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// g.yas pa gtso bo'i sku la 'khril// g.yon pa b+han+d+ha gtso la stob// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// gtso la brten pa'i bdag nyid kyis// rin chen 'bar ba'i lte ba la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// rdo rje khro mo sgra 'byin ma// dbu gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// g.yas pa gtso bo'i sku la 'khril// g.yon pa b+han+d+ha gtso la stob// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// gtso la rten pa'i bdag nyid kyis// rin chen 'bar ba'i lte ba la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// shar nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// sgrol ba rak+sha he ru ka/ mthing nag rak+ta'i ral pa can// sngon tshe bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa'i lha// sngon yang thugs dam dbyings su gcig/ zla gam dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// dgyes

shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// lho nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dam tshig sa nu he ru ka/ ser ljang 'bar ba'i ral pa can/ sngon tshe bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i lha// sngon gyi thugs dam dbyings su gcig/ zla gam dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// nub nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// gsang ba g+hu h+ya he ru ka/ dmar nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// sngon tshe ye nas bsnyen pa'i lha// sngon gyi thugs dam bdag dang gcig/ zla gam dbang gi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// byang nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// sbyor ba rak+sha he ru ka/ ljang nag rak+ta'i ral pa can// sngon tshe ye nas bsnyen pa'i lha// sngon gyi thugs dam bdag dang gcig/ zla gam dbang gi gzhal yas su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// yum bzhi yang dgod/ byang gi dkyil 'khor du dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyang dgod/ khyams zla gam du bri/ de nas dpal gyi sbyin bsreg bya/ de nas gtor ma tsho gsum du bcad la/ mchod pa bgyi/ phur pa dbyung/ khrus bgyi/ gtor ma gcig byin gyis brlabs la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi mchod/ slar gshegs su gsol// de nas smon lam btab la yon dbul ba dang slad ma kun gzhan dang mthun/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las mchog bsgrub chen po ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ lang ka'i dkyil 'khor ral pa can gyi sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// phun gsum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtag par bya// sa bdag lha klu thams cad la// sa rin bcal te sa bslang ngo// sbyang dang bsrung ba tshul bzhin bya// sdig sbyang byang chub sems bskyed de// bshags sbyang spang skong tsha tsha gdab// de nas dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bya// lang ka'i khor sbubs bsgyel ba la// snying gar 'dom gang gru bzhi bya// dur khrod chag chag gsum gyis gdab// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad thig tu gdab// dbus su rin chen zur brgyad bri// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// de yi phyi rim me ri bya// de yi phyi rim rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi bri// steng nas 'gegs pa'i g.yang gzhi/ 'og thar pa'i rkang lag/ bar b+han+d+ha lcang lo can// phyi ma b+han+d+ha'i bzed phor/ dmar gyi ar+g+ha/ rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas pa drang/ de nas rdzas dgod/ dur khrod 'bar ba'i pho brang du/ lang ka'i khog spubs su/ ral pa rnams sbyangs nas// rdzas dang bya ba gzhung bzhin bya// rak+ta 'joms pa'i pho nya ni// za byed lnga yi ral pa can// dbang mo lnga ni rdzas la dbang// mgyogs ma brgyad ni dur khrod

'joms// gtum mo brgyad ni dbyings na rol/ khro bo brgyad ni rol pa mdzad// ra k+ta 'bar ba'i ral pa can// srid pa nam mkha'i thun phyed na// dpal ldan ma mo las byed cing// rdzas la dbang byed mthu 'phrog pa// de nas khro bo'i 'dzab stong drang// stong tshigs mchod pa 'bul/ thugs dam bskul/ bzod par gsol/ dngos grub blang/ dbang bskur/ pra dbye/ de nas gtor ma tsho gsum du gcad/ tsho gcig la sbyin bsreg la sogs bya/ de nas yon dbul/ gtang rag gtang/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las// lang ka'i dkyil 'khor ral pa can gyi sgrub lugs te nyi shu pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi sgo nas/ bam bsgrub chen po zla gam brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// phun gsum tshogs pa bzhir ldan pas// rdzas dang sa bzhi brtag par bya// sa bdag lha klu thams cad la// sa rin btul te sa bslang ngo// sbyang dang bsrung ba tshul bzhin bya// sdig sbyang byang chub sems bskyed de// bshags sbyang spang skong tsha tshwa gdab// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// bsgrub pa'idakyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dur khrod chag chag rnam gsum gdab// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad thig tu gdab// dbus su thig bzhi btab la ling tshe dgu bya// dbus su zla gam dkar dmar gnyis/ phyogs mtshams su zla gam bri/ de'i phyir rim du kha nang du bstan pa bri/ de'i phyir rim du phyir bstan pa bri/ de'i phyir rim du bzhi nang du bstan pa bri// de'i phyir rim du zla gam bzhi kha nang du bstan pa bri/ de'i phyir rim du zla gam bcu kha phyir bstan pa bri/ de'i phyir rim du zla gam nyi shu rtsa drug kha phyir bstan pa bri/ de'i phyir rim du zla gam bzhi kha nang du bstan pa bri/ de nas rdzas dgod pa dang/ las la bya ba kun 'phel sdud la ltos/ b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas khang du/ lha gzhung bzhin bskyed/ b+h+rUM ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang chen rgya gram zla gam gtams pa la// rdo rje ye shes mi phyed dgu 'bar ba// che ba dgu yi khyad par bye brag las// dpal chen dgu ni sku la rdzogs// yum chen dgu ni dbyings su rol// rdo rje dgu ni thugs la 'bar// hUM chen dgu ni klong na 'khyil// che ba dgu ni skad du rdzogs// b+han+d+ha dgu ni dpal gyi sku// zla gam dgu ni yum gyi dbyings// thig le dgu ni byang chub sems// me mar dgu ni ye shes dang// de ltar dgu dgu dgu byung ba// dgu klong 'bar ba gcig gi ngang// dgu bkag gcig phye thig le'i don// zhes brjod la spro bsdu bya/ de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du mchod pa drang ba ni/ lha shos zla gam la/

rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas pa dang/ dam rdzas tshang ba'i gtor ma yang drang/ slad ma yang 'phen bsdud la blta/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ zla gam brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'i bam bsgrub ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas dpal he ru kas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// mchog phran gi sgrub lugs 'di phyung ste gsungs so// phun gsum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// gnas dang sa bzhi brtag par bya// sa bdag lha klu thams cad la// sa rin bcal te sa bslang ngo// sbyang dang bsrung ba tshul bzhin bya// sdig sbyang byang chub sems bskyed de// bshags sbyang spang skong gzhung bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dur khrod chag chag gdab par bya// dbus su zla gam gcig pa la// mtha' ma rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// gnas yul phyag rgya don gyi dgod// mchog phran de yi lus po ni// gtsang ma'i spos dang sman gyis bkru// lce yi dkyil du gzungs thag btags// man ngag lung ldan phyag tu dbul// bla mas ting 'dzin gsal bar bsgom// dkar dang ser po dmar dang ljang// so so'i rigs kyi kha dog bzhin// goms par byas ste nyams su blang// phyag mtshan snying po phra mo dang// brtan par gyur te mkha' la dgod// snying po phyag mtshan sku mdog dang// so so'i rang bzhin cir bstan yang// byang chub sems ni lhun gyis grub// thams cad bde chen gcig gi ngang// zhes gsungs so// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du mchod pa dgram pa ni/ 'dzab drug stong drug la/ stong tshig kyis mchod pa 'bul/ nang par gtor ma btang/ phud bcad la bzhag/ dkyil 'khor stong par mi gzhag/ re mos langs/ stan byin gyis brlab/ lus bsrung/ skang tshogs pa dang/ mtshams bcad/ de nas mchog phran de'i sha skams la/ de'i lo dus su bdud rtsi'i bsgrub pa bya/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las// mchog phran gtsang ma'i sgrub lugs te rtsa gnyis pa'o//// rus pa thal chen du bsgrub/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub thabs/ khro bo puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so//// dpal kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal nas gsungs so// sdud po rdo rje sems dpas bsdus// las kyi bsgrub pa gzhung pad+ma saM b+ha bas bsrang/ las mde'u chung hUM kA ras bsrang ba'o//// rgya gar skad du/ ta thA ku la sa ng+ha gu h+ya ag+Ni tsit+ta tan+t+ra// bod skad du/ de bzhin rigs kyi sgrub thabs gsang ba me dpung thugs kyi rgyud/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ stong gi stong chen po 'jig rten dpag tu med

pa'i khams/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang brdal ba chen po na/ 'khor rigs lnga'i rgyal ba sdud pa po rdo rje rnon po dang/ chos de nyid bshad pa'i gnas kun gzhi'i pho brang na bzhugs so// de nas thugs thams cad mkhyen pa'i klong nas/ mya ngan chen po las 'das pa'i/ lta ba chen po'i gdeng du bka' stsal to// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kyang// phyag rgya chen por rang snang zhing// de yang snang ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rang bzhin med las ye shes shar/ mtshan ma med pa'i gzugs rnams kun// mtshan ma'i gzugs rnams kun la khyab// gzugs dang dngos por 'dzin snang ba// de ni sems kyi bye brag snang// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyang// rig pa rnam dag sems las byung// rang byung nyid kyang rgyal ba'i sku// chos sku byang chub sems su gsal// byang chub sems su rnam bshad pa// ma skyes pas na snying por bshad// mi spang 'dzin pas dbu ma'o// snang ba dag pas sems zhes bya'o// sems nyid mi 'gyur rdo rje ste// sems dpa' rdo rje ye shes don// thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ gdod nas ma bcos nyid la rdzogs// ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// theg pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rtse// theg le'i don las gang gol ba// de ni mu stegs rtag chad 'dra// chos rnams sgyu ma bzhin te snang la med// mi dmigs dmigs su med pas bya byed kun dang bral// skyon med rnam par dag pas byang chub sems// mi g.yo mi 'gyur bde ba chen po yi// gzod nas ma skyes thig le brdal ba che// chos rnams nam mkha'i ngo bo 'dra// med bzhin snang la snang bzhin stong// srid gsum 'gran zla med par dbang phyug che// bdag dang gzhan du mi snang bas// bdag nyid thig le chen po rdzogs// sems kyi khyad par nam mkha' la// re dogs med pas nyam mi nga// che'o che'o ye shes gter// thig le rang byung rtsol dang bral// kun bzang bdag nyid che ba'i lha// me chu sa rlung nam mkha' lnga// sangs rgyas nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ nga nyid byang chub sems kyi rgyan/ kun bzhi kun 'byung sa chen te// kun bzang che ba'i sku gsung thugs// thig le bla rje ye 'byams rmad du grags// ye shes thig le khams su khyab par rdzogs// sangs rgyas bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir// bdag nyid bdag gi rtag par bsgom// mtha' dbus kun kyang bdag gi thugs// bdag nyid bsgoms pas kun kyang bdag/ stong gsum nga yis nga yi dbang// sangs rgyas thams cad nga yi sras// 'jig rten thams cad nga yi zhing// sdug bsngal dbyings su gsad pas byang chub sems// nga yi ye dbang rdzogs pas go 'phangs rdzogs pa'i thugs// gsang chen gsang chen gsang ba de kho na

nyid// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ man ngag lta ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// ye shes gsang ba las byung ba// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs// rdo rje thogs med bsdus pa 'di// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// e ma ho// gsang ba rang byung thugs kyi mchog/ rang snang nyid kyang dbyer med lha yi lha// dang por ting 'dzin rnam gsum gyis// bsgom pa'i rim pa mchog tu gsal// dang por skye med rnam bshad sems kyi dbyings// me long lta bur rang shar te// gdod nas ma bcos de bzhin gshegs// gtan tshig chen pos rab tu gces// mi bsgrib dang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// thams cad nam mkha'i tshul du gnas// gsal ba dang 'dra go 'byed de// me long ye shes ngang nyid las// thams cad ma bsgrib kun tu snang// rgyu yis thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// skye ba'i ngo bor rab tu snang// cho 'phrul chen po snang ba'i phyir// de nyid rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin te// gtan tshigs chen por rab tu gces// de ltar ting 'dzin gsal bsgom nas// yid kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la// yi ge a yi cho 'phrul bsgom// b+hUM bi shwa bi shud+d+ha tsakra badzra rat+na raM/ stong gsum zla gam yum gyi gzhal yas su// dur khrod gzhal yas bskyed nas ni// bdag gi khyad par bskyed pa'i phyir// lha chen dbang phyug gdan du gting// dbus kyi gdan gyi khyad par ni// ma hA de ba sna bsnol kha// shar du dri za ni bsnol kha// lho ru gshin rje ni bsnol kha// nub tu klu chen ni bsnol kha// byang du gnod sbyin ni bsnol kha// dbang phyug lha yi gdan bting nas// dur khrod khro bo dbangaphyug bskyed// yid kyi ting 'dzin khyad par las// yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du bskyed// cho ga gsum gyi byin rlabs las// lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dbyings nas 'don// hUM hUMM hUM/ hUM hUM/ ha ha ha ha/ ha ha ha ha/ he he he he// he he he he// phaT phaT phaT phaT// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ thugs rje rnam dag rgyal ba'i pho brang nas// bde gshegs khro bo'i rgyal po spyan 'dren mchod// lha chen dbang phyugs gdan la bzhugs su gsol// de nas dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor la// thabs kyi phyag rgya chen po mchog/ 'byung ba lnga yi cho 'phrul las// 'ur 'ur chem chem rab tu 'khrugs// dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni// ma hA de ba'i gdan la bzhugs// smug nag 'jigs pa'i rgyan dang ldan// shar gyi khrag 'thung chen po ni// dri za bsnol ba'i gdan la bzhugs// mthing nag 'jigs pa'i rgyan dang ldan// lho yi khrag 'thung chen po ni// gshin rje bsnol ba'i gdan la bzhugs// sngo nag 'jigs pa'i rgyan dang ldan// nub kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni// klu men

bsnol ba'i gdan la bzhugs// dmar nag 'jigs pa'i rgyan dang ldan// byang gi khrag 'thung chen po ni// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i gdan la bzhugs// ljang nag 'jigs pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ khro bdag khrag 'thung rgyal po lnga// so so'i gdan la nga rgyal bskyed// dbus kyi za byed dbang mo ni// ma chags mdangs kyis gtso la 'khril// b+hud+d+ha kro ng+hI shwa rI dza/ shar gyi za byed dbang mo ni// ma chags mdangs kyis gtso la 'khril// badzra kro ng+hI shA rI dza/ lho yi za byed dbang mo ni// ma chags mdangs kyis gtso la 'khril// rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI dza/ nub kyi za byed dbang mo ni// ma chags mdangs kyis gtso la 'khril// pad+ma kro ng+hI shwa rI dza/ byang gi za byed dbang mo ni// ma chags mdangs kyis gtso la 'khril// karma kro ng+hI shwa rI dza/ 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// mkha' 'gro bcu drug dbyings nas bskyed// sngon mo dbyug to go'u rI dza// log rtog rdul du rlog pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bsnyen bsgrub dbang gi dngos grub stsol// ser mo mda' 'gengs tso rI dza// dbyings nas bskul ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bsnyen bsgrub dbang gi dngos grub stsol// dmar mo chu srin pra mo hA// tshangs ma'i tshul gyis dbang mdzad ma// bsnyen bsgrub dbang gi dngos grub stsol// nag mo rdo rje be tA lI// sa dgu 'byongs pa'i rtags dang ldan// bsnyen bsgrub dbang gi dngos grub stsol// dmar ser rgyu zhags sdog 'phen pu ka si// dus gsum dbyings su 'dren pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ bsnyen bsgrub dbang gi dngos grub stsol// ljang nag khrag 'thung g+hasma rI// thugs rje chags pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bsnyen bsgrub dbang gi dngos grub stsol// mthing nag snying zan sma sha nI// tsit+ta thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// bsnyen bsgrub dbang gi dngos grub stsol// dkar ser mgo gcod tsaN+Da lI// ya mtshan che ba'i dkyil 'khor du// bsnyen bsgrub dbang gi dngos grub stsol// seng gdong phra men za byed seng ge'i mgo/ mi 'jigs dbang po zil gnon dngos grub stsol// stag gdong dmar mo dpa' brtul stag gi mgo/ dpa' rtul 'jigs byed dngos grub stsol// dmar mo zhag chen wa mgo sr-ing gA li// g.yeng med las mdzod dngos grub stsol// mthing nag rngams khro sha zan spyang ki'i mgo/ sgrin byed rngam pa'i dngos grub stsol// dmar ser mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya rgod mgo/ skems byed kun tu slebs pa'i dngos grub stsol// dur khrod kun tu nyul byed dur bya'i mgo/ dur khrod tshogs kyi dngos grub stsol// nag mo bya rog rnam dag chos kyi sku// dug gsum skyon bral dngos grub stsol// sna tshogs spyan ldan 'ug pa'i mgo/ thugs rje rnam dag spyan gyi dngos grub stsol// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rim na// dkar mo 'gugs pa rta yi mgo/ sngon mo

phag mgo zhags pa can// dmar mo nyid zla lcags sgrog ma// ljang gu spyang mgo drul bu ma// bka' nyan las byed dngos grub stsol// gzhan yang pho brang chen po na// dbang phyug mkha' 'gro nyi shu brgyad// dbang mdzad mthu yi dngos grub stsol// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bya ba'i phyir/ rdzas kyi khyad par bstan par bya// sgrub pa'i gnas rab dam pa ni// bkra shis rtags can dben pa'i ri bos bskor// gsang ba'i bsgrub zla gzungs ma de// dug rnams med cing dad pa che// zab mo thub pa'i yul la bsgrub// mtshams med phyir yang mtshams bcad de// 'byung po'i gtor ma btang nas kyang/ sgrub pa nang gi don la zhugs// dkyil 'khor stegs bu btsigs nas ni// dmar dang dkar gyi thig gdab bo// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// rak+ta'i byang chub byugs nas kyang// de la par bu brko bar bya// rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i cho ga mdzes// steng 'og dar gyi pho brang dgod// de nas bsnyen pa gzhung bzhin bgrang// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas kyang// ting 'dzin yang dag chen po dbab// gsang ba med dpung gi rgyud las/ sgrub pa'i gling bzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// da ni bde ba rang byung bsgrub bshad de// ma spangs pas ni bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu nyid// rang la rdzogs par shes na dngos grub mchog/ bsgrub med bsgrub na bsnyen bsgrub yin// rdzas dang yan lag gzhi la tshang// 'bad cing btsal ba med pa'i mchog/ bde chen lhun grub byang chub kun gyi gter// de las mtshon pa'i dga' bas tshig gi mtha' las 'das// mi rtog dmigs dang bral bas shes rab zab mo'i klong// dmigs pa snang bar shar phyir bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus su byin rlabs gnam thig gdab// dkyil 'khor yum gyi mkha' la thig btab pas// mi mngon rnam dag dbyings nas rgyal ba'i pho brang bskyed// thig gdab dkyil 'khor ri mo bri// dbus su zur brgyad rin chen tshal// a dang mUM gyi dbus su bzhag/ de nas dkyil 'khor rgyan gyis brgyan// mnyam pa sangs rgyas chen po la// sdug bsngal byang chub sems su snang/ kun tu bzang po'i dbyings nyid du// bde ba'i yon tan gdod nas rdzogs// bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor chen po yang// rtsa ba chen po nyid du 'dus// ma chags rnam bshad bdag nyid chen po ste// bdud rtsi rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ bsnyen bsgrub yan lag ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la// drod tshad las su rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus// g+hu h+ya gsang chen thugs kyi klong// thugs chen thugs kyi bsgrub pa ste// kun bzang bde chen dbyings su 'dus// gsang ba med dpung gi rgyud

las/ thugs kyi sgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// las kyi rgya mtsho lta ba'i mdzod bstan te// srid gsum thugs rje'i dbyings su bsgom/ khams gsum ye 'byams dkyil 'khor chen po la// stong gsum yum gyi klong 'byams la// rtsi shing nags tshal rgyan gyi dra ba ste// ri brag lha yi skur gsal mchog/ rang byung ye nas gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'chi med rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs// ma bris gdod nas gsal ba'i gnas// gsang ba'i pho brang rdzogs par bsgom// bsgrub pa chen po'i dus nyid du// zhi rgyas dbang gi rgyas btab la// lcags zangs dngul gyis sbyar bar bya// rgya mtsho las kyi rkang pa ru// 'byung ba lnga yis bsgrub par bya// 'bras bu lnga yi khu ba yang// bcud du gyur pas thams cad bsgrub// thams cad rang byung bdud rtsir 'khyil// byin pa lnga dang rgyas pa drug/ ma spangs ye nas kun tu bzang// de bas rgyal po rnal 'byor pa// don dam rnal 'byor sems kyi snying po ni// theg pa kun gyi rgyal po yin/ 'di nyid rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang rdzogs// stong gsum kun gzhi'i klong du 'dus// srid gsum sku gsung thugs su gsal// sems kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas la// sangs rgyas gzhan du btsal mi dgos// dmyal ba'i khams nyid bla med la// ye gsang thugs kyi sgrub pa ste// re dog rtsol dang bral bas bsgrub pa nyid// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ g+hu h+ya gsang mdzod kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyings 'byung ste// sgrub pa chen po brtsams pa'i phyir// gnas dang sa bzhi brtag nas ni// sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas par byed// de nas dkyil 'khor brtsam pa ni// sgrub pa'i rgyal po dbang gi sa gzhi la// rdo rje rgya gram brag chen 'bar bas gtams// thugs rje yum gyi dkyil 'khor bsam pa'i phyir// thig skud rgyu ni man ngag bka' brgyud la// shes rab mtshan dang ldan pas bkal ba yi// thig skud byang chub sems dang ldan pas gdab// gnod byed bgegs bskrad drag pos mtsham bcad do// phaT/ na maHsa man+ta/ tad+ya ba ra sha nong pak+sha ku sha/ ku sha rak+sha s+pha ra ya phaT/ rmad byung rol pa chen po'i ngang nyid kyis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyings nas bskyed nas chag chag 'debs// ti ra baM rak+ta maN+Da la hUM/ skye med rnam bshad bdud rtsi'i mchog/ ye shes gsal don me long ye shes te// gsang ba'i tshom bu dgu+u yi dkyil 'khor dgod/ stong gsum brdal ba yum gyi dkyil 'khor du// thugs rje 'gyur ba med pa'i thig gdab pas// srid pa'i pho brang rab 'byams dbyings su gsal// stong gsum sa gzhi yum gyi dkyil 'khor du// srid pa sku+u gsungathugs kyi thig gdab pas// rang

byung 'byung ba lnga yi khyad par las// 'od kyi gzha' tshon ye shes lnga ru rdzogs// dag cing dri med 'bras bu lnga ru bsgom/ badzra dz+nyA na/ bud+d+ha dz+nyA na/ rat+na dz+nyA na/ pad+ma dz+nyA na/ karma dz+nyA na/ srid pa'i pho brang rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// sems kyi kha dog rnams kyi bye brag dbye// mi zad rin chen lnga yi tshon du gsal// stongagasum 'jig rten khams rnams su// pho brang rang byung 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rtsi shing mang po'i tshogs rnams kyang// nga rgyal khro bo 'bar ba'i gzugs// 'jig rten khams kun dbang du sdud// drag po gzer gyi mtshams cad do// kI li kI la ya hUM/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yang// dur khrod rgyan gyis chas su bzhugs// de nas rnal 'byor mang ba yis// drod tshad las rnams kun byas nas// mtha' ma dmod bcol bshag sbyang bya// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor las kyi dang po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog chen po'i gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// za byed me yi rgyal po sbyin sreg gtso// mchod pa'i sbyin bsreg bshad phyir me yi man ngag bstan// dur khrod dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa ste// zla gam dmar po dbang gi hom// stong gsum yum gyi gzhal yas brtsig/ zur gsum mthing nag drag po'i hom// dur khrod chen po'i klong dkyil brtsig/ zlum po zhi ba'i hom khung ste// ma skyes thig le chen por brtsig/ gru bzhi rgyas pa'i hom khung ste// 'jig rten dur khrod khyad par du// 'bar ba'i hom khung brtsig par bya// sa gzhi gzhal yas brtsig pa ru/ khro bo 'bar ba'i hom khung brtsig/ stong gsum stong gi dkyil 'khor du// 'byung ba lnga yi hom khung brtsig/ kun bzhi 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// ye shes mchog gi hom khung brtsig/ kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings su// rtog pa chen po'i hom khung brtsig/ zla gam yum gyi mkha' la brtsig/ gru bzhi phran las bzhi ru brtsig/ gru gsum sku gsung thugs su brtsig/ zlum po thig le chen por brtsig/ hom lnga yang thog brtseg mar brtsig/ hom dgur yang thog dgu ru brtsig/ de rnams yang thog brtseg mar bya// dbus su dri chen lde gur sbyar// rnam par snang mdzad sku yi gtso// dbyings dang ye shes rgyas gdab bo// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs kyi gtso// me long ye shes rgyas gdab bo// rin chen 'byungaldan yon tan gtso// mnyam nyid ye shes rgyas gdab bo// snang ba mtha' yas gsung gi gtso// sor rtog ye shes rgyas gdab bo// don yod grub pa phrin las gtso// bya grub ye shes rgyas gdab bo// skye med rnam dag dbyings kyi hom khung du// log rtog mtshan ma med pa'i yam shing la// rtog pa ye shes 'od kyi me sbar bas// g.yo dngami g.yo snod bcud kun bsreg

te// kun mkhyen 'od gsal ye shes byang chub gter// ye shes klong yangs 'bar ba'i hom khungadu// bde ba chen po'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// chos nyid spros pa med pa'i hom khung du// de yi yul du snang ba'i yam shing la// rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi me spar bas// ma rigs las kyi sdug bsngal bsregs pa ru// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// bde ba chen po'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// stong gsum brdal ba yum gyi hom khung du// srid gsum skye bar snang ba'i yam shing la// gnyis med rnam dag mchog gi me spar te// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// bde ba chen po'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// snod kyi 'jig rten yum lnga'i mkha' klong hom khung du// bcud kyi 'jig rten bdag 'dzin yam shing la// rtogs pa gnyis med snying po'i me spar te// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// bde ba chen po'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// ma skyes rnam dag dbyings kyi hom khung du// skye ba'i cho 'phrul mang po'i yam shing la// rtog pa ye shes 'od kyi me spar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// bde ba chen po'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// klong yang nam mkhar gsal ba'i hom khung du// srid pa chen po bzhi yi yam shing la/ rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi me sbar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// nam mkha'i dbang mo'i sku la mchod par 'bul/ thugs rjes 'degs byed sa yi hom khung du// srid gsum skye bar snang ba'i yam shing la// rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi me spar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// rdo rje dpal mo'i sku la mchod par 'bul// thugs kyi ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i hom khung du// sdug bsngal skyon gyis sbags pa'i yam shing la// rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi me sbar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// rin chen dbang mo'i sku la mchod par 'bul// thugs rje sreg sbyong me yi hom khung du// mtshan ma bud pa'i yam shing mang 'bul bas// rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi me sbar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du/ pad+ma dbang mo'i sku la mchod pa 'bul/ thugs rje g.yo med rlung gi hom khung du// sdug bsngal bag chags bud pa'i yam shing la// rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi me spar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// las kyi dbang mo'i sku+u la mchod par 'bul// thugs rje 'byung ba lnga yi hom khung du// srid pa'i sdug bsngal tshogs pa'i yam shing la// rtogs pa ye shes 'od kyi me spar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// 'dod pa'i dbang mo lnga yi sku+u la mchod par 'bul// b+ha ga yum gyi hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i yam shing la// rtogs pa ye shes 'od

kyi me spar nas// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// bde chen yab yum sku la mchod par 'bul// zla gam dmar po nam mkha'i hom khung du// rang byung rgyal po'i sku mchog bud+d+ha'i dpal// phung po gnas gyur bud+d+ha he ru la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// mi 'gyur sku yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rang byung rgyal po'i thugs mchog he ru dpal// rnam shes gnas gyur dpal chen rdo rje la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// skye med thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rang byung rgyal po yon tan rat+na dpal// tshor ba gnas gyur dpal chen rat+na la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// yon tan lhun grub dngos grub stsal du gsol// rang byung rgyal po'i gsung mchog pad+ma dpal// 'du shes gnas gyur pad+ma he ru la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// ma chags gsung gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rang byung rgyal po phrin las karma dpal// 'du byed gnas gyur dpal chen karma la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// las rnams rdzogs pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// thugs rje rnam dag rgyal po'i pho brang du// srid gsum dbang sdud sku yi sbyor ba mo// chags pa'i rgyal mo bud+d+ha kro d+hI la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// gnyis med byang chub mchog gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// skye med rnam dag thugs kyi sbyor ba mo// chags pa'i thugs rjes khams gsum rgyas 'debs ma/ khrag 'thung zhe sdang badzra kro d+hI la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// gnyis med byang chub mchog gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// mi zad rin chen lta bu'i gter mnga' zhing// yon tan dbang gis lo rtog rdul du rlog khrag 'thung rat+na badzra kro d+hI la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// gnyis med byang chub mchog gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ma chags pad+ma lta bu'i sku mnga' zhing// 'dod chags dbang gis khams gsum kun la sbyor// chags med sbyong mdzad pad+ma kro d+hI la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// gnyis med byang chub mchog gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// las rnams rdzogs byed thugs rje ngad dang ldan// phrin las rdzogs pas rgyud drug rtsad nas gcod// thugs rje thabs ldan karma kro d+hI la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// gnyis med byang chub mchog gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// za byed sreg pa me yi hom khung du// chags pa'i yum du bcas pa'i sbyin sreg gi/ chags lnga byang chub dbyings lngar lhun gyis grub// sbyin sreg lnga yi mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// bdud rtsi mchog gi mchod pa dngos grub stsal du gsol// dam nyams dam skong mthu dang

dngos grub stsol// sreg byed dur khrod me yi hom khung du// mkha' 'gro mgyogs ma bka' nyan brgyad rnams la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// log rtog 'khor ba rdul du brlag slad du// dur khrod zhing gi dbyug pa phyag na bsnams// srid gsum sgrol mdzad sngon mo'i go'u rI ma// dam rdzas bdud rtsi mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// thugs rje thabs dang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ba// log rtog las kyi skyon rnams dbug slad du// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i mda' 'phen cing// dbyings kyi ngang las sbyor ba'i ser mo tso'u rI ma// dam rdzas bdud rtsi mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// 'khor ba mang po thugs rjes sgral slad du// mi nub chu srid rgyal mtshan phyag na bsnams// sangs rgyas rgyal srid gtso mdzad dmar mo pra mo he// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// sa dgu 'joms pa'i rdo rje rtse dgu 'phyar// rU tra sgrol mdzad ye shes dbyings la sbyor// nag mo 'jigs tshul ston mdzad bait+tA lI// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// rgyud drug 'khor ba gnas nas drang slad du// dur khrod zhing gi rgyu zhags phyag na bsnams// chos kyi dbyings la sbyor ba'i dmar ser puk+ka sI// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// ye shes lnga dang ldan par mdzad slad du// dbang po lngar ldan thod pa phyag na bsnams// ye shes lnga la sbyor ba'i rdo rjes dkrug/ thugs rje thabs mkhas sngo ljang g+hasma rI// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// zhe sdang chen po gtan nas 'joms mdzad pa// zhing mchog tsit+ta dmar po tshems kyis 'dren// nga rgyal sems la sbyor ba'i mthing nag smra sha nI// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// log rtog skyon rnams so sor bsgral slad du// thugs rje thabs kyis mgo lus so sor 'bral// ser skya 'jigs pa'i tshul can tsaN+Da lI// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// za byed 'bar ba'i me yi hom khung du// ma chen 'bar ma chen mo brgyad rnams la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// dur khrod sreg byed me yi hom khung du// rol pa'i phra men brgyad la mchod pa 'bul// za byed zhen pa dkar ser seng ge'i mgo/ mthu rtsal 'phrog mdzad rtsal 'phags seng ha ma// dmar mo mgo gcod dpa' brtul stag gi mgo/ 'chi bdag bdud kyi sde 'joms byA g+h+r-i ma// dmar mo khrag ldag srin mo wa yi mgo/ zhing chen khong nas 'dren byed sr-ing gal ma// rus 'cha' mthing ga g.yeng ba'i spyang ki'i mgo/ gzugs phung 'jig mdzad khrag ldag shwa na ma// gdeng tshad dkar por kun brlag bya rgod mgo// khong khrag rtsad nas 'byin pa'i gr-id+d+ha ma// dur khrod zhing za sna tshogs dur bya'i mgo/ nyon mongs tshe srog

'phral ba'i kang ka ma// nag mo chol thog rnam dag bya rog mgo tshig gcig chad// u lU mun mthong sna tshogs 'ug pa'i mgo/ nyon mongs glo snying 'byin pa'i u lU mar// za byed sreg pa me yi hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// bla med sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// dkar mo lcags kyu 'gugs pa rta yi mgo/ sngon mo zhags chen 'ching byed phag gi mgo/ dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom byed dom gyi mgo/ sngon mo dril thogs thal byed spyang ki'i mgo/ thar pa'i sgo 'byed sgo ma bzhi rnams la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bla med sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// za byed dur khrod me yi hom khung du// dmar mo mgo brnyan mi 'khrugs nyi shu brgyad// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// dbang phyug mkha' 'gro nyi shu brgyad// la la smug nag tri shUl thogs pa g.yag gi mgo/ la la dmar skya rtse lnga thogs pa sbrul gyi mgo/ la la ser nag dbyug sdig 'byin pa gzig gi mgo/ la la dkar dmar rgyu zhags thogs pa sre mo'i mgo/ la la ser nag 'khor lo thogs pa pha wang mgo/ la la dmar skya dbyug to thogs pa dred kyi mgo/ la la dmar mo rgyu zhags thogs pa dom gyi mgo/ la la sngo nag rin chen bum pa thogs pa chu srin mgo/ la la sngo skya khog smad thogs pa sdig pa'i mgo/ la la ljang nag zangs gri thogs pa khwa yi mgo/ la la dmar nag rgyu zhags thogs pa wa yi mgo/ la la mthing nag snying thogs stag gi mgo/ la la dmar nag 'khor lo thogs pa bya rgod mgo/ la la dmar mo rdo rje thogs pa rta yi mgo/ la la dmar mo zangs gri thogs pa khyung gi mgo/ la la dmar ser khog smad thogs pa khyi yi mgo/ la la dkar dmar pad+ma zhags pa thogs pa pu shud mgo/ la la ljang ser ro thogs sha ba'i mgo/ la la dmar nag rnge'u chung ral gri thogs pa spyang ki'i mgo/ la la dmar ser gsal shing thogs pa skyin gyi mgo/ la la nag mo mche zhags thogs pa phag gi mgo/ la la ljang nag rnge'u chung thogs pa khra yi mgo/ la la ljang nag bam chen thogs pa glang gi mgo/ la la ljang nag bdud rtsi thogs pa rta yi mgo/ la la nag mo lcags kyu thogs pa khu byug mgo/ la la sngon mo rgyu zhags thogs pa ra yi mgo/ la la dmar mo lcags sgrog thogs pa seng ge'i mgo/ la la dmar nag dril chen thogs pa skye ka'i mgo/ dbang phyug mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa 'bul// bla med sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las// sbyin sreg gi le'u ste drug pa'o//// bcom ldan zhi phro 'bar ba'i tshogs// me dpung 'bar la phyag

'tshal lo// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtags nas ni// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad de// sgrub pa nang gi don la 'jug/ stong gsum me ris bskaur ba'i dbus// srid pa'i ri bo bzhi yi bar// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'jing dkyil du// gsang ba'i sgrub pa chen po brtsam// phro bdag srin mo lnga 'dul dpal// gsang ba'i chas kyis rnam par brgyan// phyag na sreg pa'i me dpung bsnams// de nyid 'thor rlung rgyas pas 'bud// mtshams bcad bgegs kyi tshogs 'drogs nas// de nas sgrub gnas gnas rab stsal// de yi gnas rab dam pa ni// srid pa'i gzhal yas khang chen du// srid pa'i yum lnga gsal mchod nas// de yi pho brang dam pa ru// 'gro drug dpal gyi rgyas btab la// rtsi shing nags tshal rgyan du bkram// bskal pa'i me dpung 'khrugs dkyil du// srid pa'i 'du 'dzi med par bya/ khams gsum bgegs chen stong par brdzi// stong gsum DU tra dbyings su mnan// mtshams kyi rgyal po me yi khro bdag gis// srid pa'i mtshams ni de ltar bcad// gzugs kyi phung po 'dzam gling la// sdug bsngal bag chags rkyen gyi rnams// thugs rje me yis mtshams bcad pas// me yi rgyal po chen po bsgom// rnam shes khams kyi dkyil 'khor du// nyon mongs lnga las bde ba yang// rtog pa ye shes med phung rgyas/ khams gsum sreg pa'i dbang phyug gis// nyon mongs lnga mtshams bcad par bya// rtsi shing ri brag ma lus kyang// me dpung rgyal po khro bo'i sku// 'ur 'ur chem chem 'bar ba'i 'od// bskal pa sreg byed rgyal pos mtshams bcad do// raM krod+ha raM/ ha la raM/ to sha ya raM/ raM raM/ raM ti shaM/ kro b+hi kha naM yo ga raM phaT/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni// zlum po zla gam gru gsum ste// de yi dbus su 'byung ba lnga// de yi me dpung rgya gram dgod// de yi dkyil 'khor phyi rim la// thod pa rlon pa'i phreng chen dgod// de yi dkyil 'khor phyi rim yang// zhing gi bam rim phreng ba dgod// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rgya gram phreng ba dgod// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// snang ba chen po lnga ru dgod// mig nas me ri zhags pas drang// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// yi ge raM gyi phreng bas bsdom// yaM las rlung gi zhags pas drang// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rtse gcig phreng chen la// yi ge hUM gi zhags pas drang// de y-i phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje phreng chen phyogs med la// yi ge yaM gi zhags pas drang// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// gzi chen me mar kha dgu gtams// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// thod pa rak+tas bkang ba dgod// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// zla gam dgu yi dkyil 'khor dgod// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor

la// ba su ta yi zhags pas drang// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// mtshon cha lnga yi gur dbub bo// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// de la phyag rgya rdzogs par dgod// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gsal bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ khro bo 'jigs byed spyan 'dren na// me dpung rab 'bar gdan la gshegs// hUM/ nam mkha'i gtos dang 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i rgyal po gshegs su gsol// me ri 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab bkod nas// zhing rkyang bkram pa'i gdan la bzhugs// srid pa'i ri bo dbus kyi dkyil// chen po lnga yi dur khrod klong// rgya mtsho gting dpag yangs pa'i nang// me dpung gsang ba'i gnas mchog tu// 'thor rlung rdo rje rgya gram gtams// chags pa'i rak+ta rba klong 'khrugs// zhing gi ri rab brtsegs pa'i sa// dur khrod keng rus ka bar brtseg/ dregs pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs dang ldan// thod rlon rnam gsum gzhal yas 'bar/ kha bad lcang lo 'khyil pas brgyan// gnam lcags gzer chen dbyings su 'debs// dur khrod gzhal yas de nang du// dbang phyug chen po gdan du bting// u ma de wa sne bsnol khar// shar du dri za'i rgyal po mnan// lho ru gshin rje ya mAn ta// nub tu klu bdag sbrul mgo can// byang du gnod sbyin 'bod sgrogs mnan// dbang phyug lnga yi gdan steng du// zhing gi gdan chen re re gding// de steng nyi zla 'bar ba'i gdan// de yi dbus su khro bdag bsgom// yi ge 'bru tshogs 'od 'phros 'dus// cho ga gsum gyi byin rlabs las// me dpung khro bo phyag rgyar gsal// hUM kro d+hI shwa rI he ru ka pa la sha phaT// dbus kyi me dpung dkyil 'khor nas/ khro bdag b+hud+d+ha'i rgyal po'i sku// ser nag ral pas me dpung 'thor// 'bar ba'i gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// shar gyi me dpung dkyil 'khor nas/ khro bo badzra he ru ka/ mthing nag ral pas me dpung 'thor// 'bar ba'i gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// lho yi me dpung dkyil 'khor nas/ khro bdag rat+na rgyas pa'i sku// ser nag ral pa me dpung 'bar// 'bar ba'i gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// nub kyi me dpung dkyil 'khor nas/ khro bdag pad+ma rgyas pa'i sku// dmar nag nag pas me dpung 'thor// 'bar ba'i gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// byang gi me dpung dkyil 'khor nas/ khro bdag las kyi rgyal po'i sku// ljang nag ral pa me dpung 'thor// 'bar ba'i gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dbyings kyi yum chen dpal 'bar ma/ khrag 'thung rgyal mo dpal gyi yum// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren

gshegs// bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM// dbyings kyi yum chen dpal 'bar ma/ khrag 'thung rgyal mo dpal gyi yum// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// badzra kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM// dbyings kyi yum chen dpal 'bar ma/ khrag 'thung rgyal mo dpal gyi yum// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM// dbyings kyi yum chen dpal 'bar ma/ khrag 'thung rgyal mo dpal gyi yum// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM// dbyings kyi yum chen dpal 'bar ma/ khrag 'thung rgyal mo dpal gyi yum// me dpung gdan la spyan gshegs// karma kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM// dbyings kyi yum chen dpal 'bar ma/ khrag 'thung rgyal mo dpal gyi yum// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// de ltar gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ khrag 'thung rgyal mo me 'bar ma// go rI brgyad rnams spyan 'dren na// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// ye shes ma brgyad spyan 'dren na// me dpung rab 'bar gdan la gshegs// dur khrod gling gi mtha' shed nas// ya mtshan chen po bsil ba'i tshal// ye shes ma chen gau rI ma// sngon mo dbyug thogs mche ba can// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dur khrod gling gi mtha' shed nas// ye shes ma chen tsau rI ma// ser mo mda' 'phen mche ba can// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dur khrod gling gi mtha' shed nas// ye shes ma chen pra mo he// bdud rgyal chu srin rgyal mtshan phyar// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dur khrod gling gi mtha' shed nas// ye shes ma chen be tA lI// mthing nag zhing za rdo rje 'phyar// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dur khrod gling gi mtha' shed nas// ye shes ma chen puk+ka sI// dkar ser rgyud zhags mche ba can// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dur khrod gling gi mtha' shed nas// ye shes ma chen g+hasma rI// sngo ljang khrag 'thung mche ba can// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dur khrod gling gi mtha' shed nas// ye shes ma chen sma sha nI// mthing nag snying zan mche ba can// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dur khrod gling gi mtha' shed nas// ye shes ma chen tsan+Da lI// ser skya mgo gcod mche ba can// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// badzra gau rI ha ru lu b+h+yo dzaH/ badzra tsau rI ha ru lu b+h+yo dzaH/ badzra pra mo he ha ru lu b+h+yo dzaH/ badzra be tA lI ha ru lu b+h+yo dzaH/ badzra puk+ka sI ha ru lu b+h+yo dzaH/ badzra g+hasma rI ha ru lu b+h+yo dzaH/ badzra sma sha nI ha ru lu b+h+yo dzaH/ badzra tsiN+Da lI ha ru lu b+h+yo dzaH/ rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// phra men chen mo spyan 'dren na// dbu brnyan brgyad rnams spyan

'dren gshegs su gsol// rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// za byed phra man ral pa can// ser mo rngam pa seng ge'i mgo// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// za byed phra men ral pa can// dmar mo stag mgo 'bru tshugs blta// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// za byed phra men ral pa can// nag mo wa mgo rkang ldag ma// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// za byed phra men ral pa can// mthing ga spyang mo rus chen 'joms// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// za byed phra men ral pa can// dmar mo rgod mgo gri thogs ma// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// za byed phra men ral pa can// snar mo dur bya zhing khur ma// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// za byed phra men ral pa can// nag mo bya rog rgyu tshil rol// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// rgya gar yul gyi mtha' shed nas// za byed phra men ral pa can// mthing ga 'ug mgo glo snying za// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// seng ha he b+h+yo ru lu badzra raM// bya g+h+r-i he b+h+yo ru lu badzra raM// sr-ing gal he b+h+yo ru lu badzra raM// shwa na he b+h+yo ru lu badzra raM// gr-id+d+ha he b+h+yo ru lu badzra raM// kang ka he b+h+yo ru lu badzra raM// kA ka he b+h+yo ru lu badzra raM// hu lu he b+h+yo ru lu badzra raM// dur khrod gling gi shar sgo nas/ khro gtum rta mgo ral pa can// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// dur khrod gling gi lho phyogs nas// sngon mo zhags 'phen phag gi mgo/ me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dur khrod gling gi nub sgo nas// dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom byed ma// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dur khrod gling gi byang sgo nas/ khro gtum spyang mgo ral pa can// ljang gu dril 'khrol rdul du rlog/ me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dza dza dza dza/ raM raM raM raM/ ri rab chen po'i phyi rol tu// dbang phyug chen mo spyan 'dren na// me dpung rab 'bar gdan la gshegs// smug nag khrag 'thung srin mo'i gzugs// thod rlon bkang ba phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// ser nag khrag 'thung tshangs pa'i gzugs// pad+ma 'dab brgyad phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dkar ljang khrag 'thung lha yi gzugs// rdo rje tri shUl phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// sngon mo khrag 'thung khyab 'jug gzugs// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// dmar mo khrag 'thung

gzhon nu'i gzugs// ye shes mdung thung phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// dkar mo khrag 'thung brgya byin gzugs// in+d+ra rdo rje phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// ser mo khrag 'thung rdo rje'i gzugs// b+han+d+ha rak+ta phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dmar mo khrag 'thung nyi ma'i gzugs// bdud rtsi bum pa phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dkar mo khrag 'thung za ba'i gzugs// pun+da dkar mo phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dkar mo khrag 'thung za ba'i gzugs// rdo rje b+han+d+ha phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// ljang gu khrag 'thung rdo rje'i gzugs// be con sngon mo phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dmar po khrag 'thung srin mo'i gzugs// b+han+d+ha rak+ta phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// ljang nag khrag 'thung za ba'i gzugs// rdo rje ba su phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// dmar mo khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rdo rje zangs gri phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dkar mo khrag 'thung stobs bzang gzugs// rdo rje gshol mda' phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// ser mo khrag 'thung rdo rje'i gzugs// rdo rje spu gri phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dmar mo khrag 'thung gzhon nu'i gzugs// ye shes mdung thung phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// dkar mo khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rdo rje bum pa phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// ljang mo khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ba dan ljang gu phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// sngon mo khrag 'thung glang gi mgo/ rdo rje b+han+d+ha phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dmar mo khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rdo rje ral gri phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// dmar mo khrag 'thung me lha'i gzugs// rdo rje gsal shing phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// sku mdog smug nag phag gi gzugs// rdo rje zhags pa phyag na bsnams// me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la gshegs// dmar mo khrag 'thung chu lha'i gzugs// rdo rje sbrul zhags phyag na bsnams// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// ri rab chen po'i shar phyogs nas// nag mo lcags kyu 'dren byed ma// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs//

ri rab chen po'i lho phyogs nas// ser mo ra mgo zhags pa ma// me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// ri rab chen po'i nub phyogs nas// dmar mo sdom byed seng ge'i mgo/ me dpung gdan la spyan 'dren gshegs// ri rab chen po'i byang sgo nas// sna tshogs ljang gu dril 'khrol ma// me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// spyan 'dren mchod stobs bsnyen pa 'bul// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo// raM raM raM raM raM raM raM// raM raM raM raM raM raM raM// raM raM raM raM raM raM raM// raM raM raM raM raM raM raM// gdung ba'i tshul gyis dngos grub blang// de nas bdag nyid thig les gdab// spyan drangs bzod gsol phrin las bcol// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ sgrub pa las rgya mtsho'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// rdo rje me dpung dkyil 'khor du// lcags kyu zhags pa tho ba gri// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor du// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rnon po la/ phra men sha za brgyad rnams dgod// bskal pa'i me ris 'khrigs pa bri// de yi phyi rol dkyil 'khor du/ khrag gi rgya mtsho'i gzugs bris la// de yi zhabs su rus chen dgod// tha ma me ri dmar po dgod// dkyil 'khor de yi yang thog tu/ khro bdag me yi rgyal po bri// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sgrub pa chen po brtsam pa'i phyir// bgegs kyi rgyal po rU tra bsgral// de yi cho ga chen po bstan// thar lam gnas brtan dpal gyi dkyil 'khor du// 'byung po gtum po gdol pa can// mthar byed sgrub pa 'di la bsgrub// dug lnga gtan du 'bar ba 'di// mtshon cha lnga yis sbyang bar bya// de yi drag po'i gri thogs nas// shin tu bshungs te smre sngags 'don// thugs rje'i bdag po'i zhabs drung du// smreng ba'i tshul gyis 'di skad gsol// 'bangs su mchi'o 'bangs su mchi// 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying// dum bu brgyar ni gtub par 'gyur// rul myags zag nas nyams par byed// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// rdo rje me dpung 'bar ba yis// rab tu bsregs shing rdul du rlogs/ de phyir dpal chen zhabs drung du// bdag cag rnams ni skyabs su mchi// zhes smre sngags 'don no// de nas dpal chen me yi rgyal po yis// rngam pa'i skad gyis sdug bsngal sbyangs// rdo rje'i zhabs kyi 'og tu brdzis// 'gyur bzlog med par rab tu bsdus// bsgrub chen brtsam phyir rU tra bsgral// gtum khro gdug pa'i tshogs bcas gzhom pa'i phyir/ khams gsum sreg byed me dpung dpal gyi sku// 'jigs pa'i tsham rngams glog ltar 'gyu// bdud 'dul khro rgyal dpal chen he ru ka/ rU tra bsgral phyir che ba'i nga rgyal

bskyed// 'dzam gling lho yi gling khams nas// dbang phyug bdud kyi bsgral thabs 'di// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// lag brkyang rkang brkyang pho brang bskyed// tho ba lcags kyu spu gri yis// dug gsum bsgral phyir 'jigs tshul bstan// bdud ma traM thal kha sngo skya la// lus po ri rab kyi gtos tsam de mgo lho nub mtha' thug pa med pa/ rkang pa byang shar mtha' thug pa med pa der bsgyel to// snying ni dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal// rgya gar yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo gau rI ma// sngon mo dbyug to thod pas bsgyings// me dpung zla gam dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// lag pa g.yas ni li yul grub pa'i tshal// li yi yul du grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo tso rI ma// tsau rI mda' 'gengs ral pas bsgyings// me dpung zla gam dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// lag g.yon bal yul grub pa'i tshal// ma mo chen mo pra mo he// pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams// me dpung zla gam dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// rkang g.yas tho gar dur khrod tshal// tho gar yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo be tA lI// be tA byi za rdor 'phyar nag/ me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// rkang g.yon za hor grub pa'i tshal// ma mo chen mo puk+ka sI// dmar ser rgyu 'dren ral pa can// me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// lte ba au D+yan grub pa'i tshal// au D+yan yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo g+hasma rI// g+hasma dung dmar khrag 'thung ljang// me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// pho mtshan sing+ga grub pa'i tshal// sing+ga'i yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen mo sma sha nI// sma sha mthing nag byis snying za// me dpung zla gam dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// mkhal ma dur khrod gling dgu'i tshal// gling dgu'i yul nas grub pa mo// ma mo chen po tsaN+Da lI// tsaN+Da ser skya mgo lus 'dral// me dpung zla gam dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// rU tra'i gzugs kyi phung po la// phra men dur khrod gnas grub pa'i// ma mo spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// gru mo g.yas g.yon mkhrig mar bsnol// rkang ba g.yas g.yon gling mo bsnol// thar pa chen po'i gnas brgyad las// zla gam dmar po'i dkyil 'khor la// me dpung mang po'i phreng du bskor// sha za khrag 'thung mgo brnyan sogs// la la seng ge rngams pa'i tshogs// la la dpa' brtul stag gi tshogs// la la sgrol byed khrag ldag

wa// la la rus 'joms rngam pa'i gzugs// la la lding tshogs bya rgod gzugs// la la dur bya zhing khur tshogs// la la rngam stabs bya rog gzugs// la la nang khrol 'joms pa 'ug pa'i gzugs// dur khrod me yi dkyil 'khor du// mgyogs tshogs phra men spyan 'dren na// rngams pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// shar sgo zla gam me dpung dkyil 'khor du// 'gugs pa'i rol tshogs spyan 'dren na// rngams pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// lho sgo zla gam me dpung dkyil 'khor du// 'ching ba'i rol tshogs spyan 'dren na// rngams pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// nub sgo zla gam me dpung dkyil 'khor du// sdom byed rol tshogs spyan 'dren na// rngams pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// byang sgo zla gam me dpung dkyil 'khor du// rlog byed rol tshogs spyan 'dren na// rngams pa'i stabs kyis gshegs su gsol// sngo skya thal skya rU tra'i gzugs// gdol ba drag po mi bzad pa// gsod la 'jigs pa gzugs kyis sgrol/ kha T+wAM 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// rol pa'i stabs kyis rU tra bsgral// 'dzam bu'i gling gi dkyil 'khor na// stong gsum thar pa rU tra'i gzugs// 'byung ba lnga yi cha las skyes// gzugs kyi phung po'i sdug bsngal 'di// sa me chu rlung nam mkha' lngas// 'thor byed chen pos dbyings su sbyor// zhe sdang 'dus pa'i phung po la// yi ge hUM gis bzhu btul nas// gnas 'gyur rdo rje sems dpa' gtso// sa gzhi yum gyi ngang du sbyor// de ltar rdzogs te mtha' yas mchog/ nyon mongs lnga yi phung po la// 'byung lnga gnas 'gyur thar pa'i sku// 'bar ba'i gnas su gsal bkod nas// phung po lnga gnas dkyil 'khor du// gnas 'gyur dbang mo lnga yi sku// srid pa'i ma lngas thugs rjes bsgral// ma traM gzugs kyi phung po ni// dur khrod me yi gnas brgyad dang// dur khrod phyed dang gsum du snang// mnyam gzhag phung po'i dkyil 'khor du// lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dbyings su gsal// lhag mthong las kyi dkyil 'khor du// thugs rjes rmad byung rol pa las// spar ba'i las mchog chen po brtsam// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ bdud btul ba'i le'u ste dgu+u pa'o//// de nas las bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir// dbus su dkyil 'khor zlum po bri// shar du zhi ba zlum po bri// drag po zur gsum lho ru bri// 'dod chags zla gam nub tu bri// rgyas pa chen po byang du bri// phung po lnga dang tshon lnga dang// sman lnga dang ni rdzas lnga dang// yum lnga dang ni rgyu yab lnga// zhib tu bsags la phrin las brtsam// de nas lha ting gsal ba dang/ 'phro 'du gsal la phrin las bcol// rdzogs pa'i las ni rnam bzhi brtsam// de nas che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed// grub pa'i ting 'dzin

brtson par bsgom// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ las rnam bzhi'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bsgrub pa brtsam pa'i phyir// me yi dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa ni// dbu dag brtags pa'i gnas su brtsam// ma dag pa yi mtshams bcad brtag/ dngos grub gnas rab btsal bar bya// rtsi shing nags tshal rgyas pa'am// bkra shis dben pa'i sa phyogs su// bsgrub pa chen po brtsam pa'i phyir// de yi lag cha mchog tu bsngags// mtshon cha lnga dang rdzas lnga dang// sman lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga/ khrag lnga dang ni 'o ma lnga// sha lnga chu lnga dug lnga dang// de yi blug snod dam pa ni// rus sbal mgo 'am zhal bu'am// sbrang rtsi bum mgo rgyal rigs mgo// dngul lam zangs phor gang yang rung// gang yang rung bar stsal te bsgrub// dbus su rin chen zur brgyad bri// shar du zlum po bris nas ni// rdo rje'i ra bas de la bskor// lho ru gru gsum brtsegs pa bri// me yi spu gri 'bar bas bskor// nub tu zla gam gcig pa bri// rdo rje rgya gram 'bar bas bskor// byang du gru bzhi rgyas pa bri// 'ja' tshon sna lngas de la bskor// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor du// thod pa'i phreng bas bskor bar bya// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// mar me dgu yang dri bar bya// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor du// zla gam bcu drug bris pa la// me dpung 'bar bas bskor ba bri// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor du// sgo bzhi zla gam bri bar bya// me yi phreng bas bskor bar bya// de yi phyi rim dkyil 'khor la// mtshon cha lnga yis bskor ba la// ba su ta yi rgyu phreng bri// de ltar bris pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// byang chub sems la spyan gyis bskor// yi ge hUM gis bzhu btul bya// shar du dri chen rdzas kyis bskor// yi ge oM gyis bzhu btul bya// lho ru sha chen rdzas kyis bskor// yi ge swA yis bzhu btul bya// nub tu rak+ta'i rdzas kyis bskor// yi ge AM gis bzhu btul bya// byang du dri chu'i rdzas kyis bskor// yi ge hA yis bzhu btul bya// rdzas lnga tshom bu lnga rdzogs nas// nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhag gcig bgrang// de nas rdzas kyi rtog pa sbyangs// tshom bu lnga yi 'od zer 'phro/ khro bo lnga yi sprul pa 'gyed// nye ba'i bsnyen pa de rdzogs nas// bsdus nas bdud rtsir btag btsag bya// 'phro 'du lnga yi dkyil 'khor du// dgu pa'i 'dzab kyis bsnyen pa bya// btags nas b+han+d+ha'i nang du stsal// tshom bu lnga yi rgyas btab dbus su sgrub// grub rtags rnam lnga gang byung yang// dngos grub dbang bskur mchod pa 'bul// bder gshegs lha la gtang rag gtang// sgrub pa po yang bkra shis gsol// thub pa'i ting 'dzin rtse gcig bsgom// nan tan gyis ni mchog tu bsgrub// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu chud mi za// gsang ba me

dpung gi rgyud las/ bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// rngam pa'i thugs rje me yi dkyil 'khor du// dbang phyug chen po lha tshogs kun gyi rang bzhin te// 'dod spyod snying rjes brlan te rdzas lnga bsgrub// bcom ldan tshe yi lha la dngos grub slong// zhal bu bkra shis phra men bdud rtsi mchog gi sman stsal bar// 'bru lnga gsal bkod 'phros pa'i byin rlabs las// sbom po dbang mo'i rtse la hrIHbsgom ste// dug gsum skyon gsal bdud rtsi lnga yi ngang// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bsgrub pa dang// bsgrub pa chen po'i rab sgrub shing// bsnyen pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// gsang mchog pad+ma 'dab brgyad dkyil 'khor du// sgrub pa po yi dngos grub zla srog stsal du gsol// dbus kyi zhal bu mtshan ldan la// 'chi med bdud rtsi byang chub sems// nye ba'i bsnyen pas rab sbyangs te// bcom ldan dpal chen he ru ka'i// gnyis med rol pa'i dngos grub stsol// shar gyi zhal bu dpal ldan du// 'chi med bdud rtsi dri chen sman// nye ba'i bsnyen pas rab sbyangs te// bcom ldan dpal chen badzra he ru ka'i// gnyis med rol pa'i dngos grub stsol// lho yi zhal bu bkra shis la// 'chi med bdud rtsi sha chen sman// nye ba'i bsnyen pas rab sbyangs te// bcom ldan dpal chen rat+na he ru ka'i// gnyis med rol pa'i dngos grub stsol// nub kyi zhal bu dbang ldan la// 'chi med bdud rtsi rak+ta sman// nye ba'i bsnyen pas rab sbyangs te// bcom ldan dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka'i// gnyis med rol pa'i dngos grub stsol// byang gi zhal bu rtags ldan la// 'chi med bdud rtsi dri chu sman// nye ba'i bsnyan pas rab sbyangs te// bcom ldan dpal chen karma he ru ka'i// gnyis med rol pa'i dngos grub stsol// 'dzam bu bkra shis dkyil 'khor du// ma chen gau rI brgyad tshogs la// nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub stsol// gsal ba'i me mar dgu bltams la// nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub stsol// rol ba'i phra men brgyad rnams la// nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub stsol// zla gam dmar po'i sgo bzhi la// 'joms pa'i khro mo brgyad rnams la// nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub stsol// phyi rol zla gam nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// dbang phyug mkha' 'gro nyi shu brgyad// dbang mdzad mthu yi dngos grub stsol// dus gsum rgyal ba khrag 'thung rol pa'i 'khor// phyag brnyan 'jig tshogs bka' yi dngos grub stsol// pho nya mngag pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'gugs pa las kyi dngos grub stsol// nye bar bsgrub pa'i dam tshig la// yi dam lha yi dngos grub stsol// mthol bshags mchod stobs dngos grub stsol// byin rlabs dbang mchog bskur du gsol// nan tan mchog tu bskyed pa

gsungs// lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dbyings kyi lha// bsdu ba'i gnas ni sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje che// rdo rje lta bu'i dngos grub stsol// gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud las/ me dpung dngos grub kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// da ni sbyor ba rgyan gyi le'u 'byung ste// ga Na sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang mchog sbyor ba'i lung bstan te// mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i yum// smin khyug ring la lag sor phra// tshigs mdo zlum zhing phra zhes bshad// mig ni zur gsum gdong mdog phyed/ kha nas ud+pal ngad ldang zhing// lus la ga pur tsan dan dri// dri zhim mtshan ldan sked skabs phyed// skra 'jam nag po'i mthon mthing 'khyil// skad ni ngang pa gzhon nu'i skad// snyan par sgrogs shing mdzes tshul stabs dang ldan// 'di ni bkra shis mtshan ldan pa'i// mi mo mdzes pa'i blo gros yin// de la sbyor ba'i cho ga ni// yum gyi gzugs kyi phung po la// bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga// 'phro 'du lnga yi byin rlabs las// spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// oM ldan 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlab dbang bskur nas// snang mdzad chen po'i sku mchog bsgom// snying ga'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// hUM ldan gsal ba'i tshogs su bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlab dbang skur nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku mchog bsgom// lte bar rin chen dkyil 'khor la// swA ldan gsal ba'i tshogs su bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlab dbang bskur nas// rin chen sems dpa'i sku mchog bsgom// ljags kyi pad+ma 'dab rgyad la// oM ldan gsal ba'i tshogs su bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// pad+ma sems dpa'i sku mchog bsgom// gsang gnas rgya gram dkyil 'khor du// hA ldan gsal ba'i tshogs su bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlab dbang bskur nas// las kyi sems dpa'i sku mchog bsgom// de ltar gsal bar rab bkod nas// yum gyi mkha' la me ri bsgom// de yi dbus kyi zla gam la// byang chub sems kyi spro bsdu bya// dbang bskur rgyal ba'i sku ru bsgom// de ltar gsal na sbyor ba'i mchog/ byang chub mchog tu de snang la// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor thig chen 'debs// cho ga rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor dgod// rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin rtsal 'phang can// de dag goms pas nyams su blangs// mi 'bral gzugs kyi ting 'dzin te// de ltar rtag tu sbyar ba dge/ gsang ba me dpung gis rgyud las/ sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// da ni thugs rje sgrol byed kyi le'u 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya che/ khrag 'thung rgyal po sbyor bcas la// mi phyed dad pas phyag 'tshal nas// de nas bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor

brtsam// sgrub pa'i gnas rab dam pa ni// ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su// rdul rnams bsal nas mtshan brtag pa// rtsi shing 'dab rgyas klu yi gnas// gzugs rdo srin bag med pa'i sar// sa yi lha mo brtan ma la// sa gzhi bslangs la byin gyis brlab// bgegs bskrad mchod sbyin chen po dgyed// 'byung po'i gtor ma der btang nas// rdzogs pa'i las ni rnam bzhi brtsam// dbang rgyas zhi ba mngon spyod dang// man ngag zlog dang rdzogs las bya// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan pas// de gzhung bsgrub pa chen po brtsams par bya// mgo la zhugs nas rgyab la dbyung/ de nas bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus su bri/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs la sbrul mgo bri// 'khor lo de yi phyi rim yang// thod pa'i phreng bas bskor bar bya// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// bskal pa'i me re'i klong du bri// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// sgo bzhi khro bo zla gam bri// de la me ri dmar pos bskor// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// de la zla gam nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod// bskal pa'i
