yum bshad na// ro stod nu ma mkhrang ba dang// ro smad sha ni rgyas pa de// sked pa phra zhing 'gros yang dal// de yi lta stangs bstan pa yang// skyes pa mthong na mig mi 'dzum// dbugs dang dri yang gla rtsi bro// ri dwags gla ba 'dra bar bshad// glang po can zhes bya ba'i yum// lus sha che la yan lag thung// stobs che mig chung sna bshal ring// rdul dbyung tshe na dri yang zhim// khog shed che la mdzangs pa ste// khyad par bung ba'i tshogs rnams ldang// dung can ma yi gzungs ma ni// rus pa rags la sha 'jam dkar// lus kyi stobs ni che la myur// lte bar ri mo byung ba ni// dung chen g.yas su 'khyil pa 'dra// skad kyi gdangs yang che zhing ring// dung gi chos dang rab ldan pas// ri mo can zhes ming du grags// ri mo can gyi rig ma ni// mdog ni dmar la sha yang chung// de yi lte ba'i steng na yar// ri mo 'greng bu gsum yod pa// smin mtshams mdzod spu'i bu ga na// ri mo 'greng bu gcig kyang yod// mgo yi mur gong mtha' gnyis na// dar thod lta bu'i ri mo yod// tshogs rnams thams cad ring ba dang// de ni khyad par dag tu bsngags// sna tshogs can gyi sbyor yum ni// bzhi ka'i yon tan ldan pa'am// gsum mam gnyis kyi yon tan ldan// sbyangs pas dag pa'i bu mo ni// thos bsam dang ni

bslab pa yis// rgyud yang yongs su dag par bya// dbang gis dag par bya ba yang// phyi nang dbang yang bskur bar bya// rnal 'byor rang bzhin dag par bya// phyi dang nang gi khrus byas nas// gser dngul rgyan dang rab ldan pa// spyi gtsug 'khor lo rna rgyan dang// mgul pa phyag zhabs gdugs 'khor dang// gos dang dar gyis legs par brgyan// nub kyi dkyil 'khor zla gam la// slob dpon ji bzhin stan bder gnas// g.yon gyi phyogs su rab gnas bya// yid 'ong 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// yab yum lus ngag mnyam pa ni// yi dam lha yi phyag rgyar bsgom// gsang ba'i sngags kyang bzlas par bya// bdag gi sems dang lha yi thugs// sgom par yab dang yum dag gis// tha dad med par rab gyur nas// lus dang ngag sems rab mnyam pa// rnal 'byor dpa' bo dpa' mo yin// mnyam pas sprul skur byin brlabs te// yi dam lha nyid sprul pa'i sku// byin rlabs mnyam par byed gyur pa// mkha' gsang bsnol mar byin gyi brlab// yab kyi gzungs ma'i mkha' byin brlab// mi dmigs stong pa'i ngang las AH// pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad pa// ze'u a yis byin brlabs sam// yum gyis yab kyi rdo rje ni// mi dmigs stong pa'i ngang las hUM// rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa// lte ba hUM gis mtshan pa yi// de yi bu gar bsam bya ba// dmar nag gyen la mgo bstan phaT// nor bu oM gyi byin brlabs pas// swa las rin po che yi tog/ byin rlabs mnyam par gyur pa na// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur byin brlab// 'dod pa mnyam par gyur pa ni// bdag nyid rig ma la brten nas// lha skyes ye shes mngon byas te// mtha' drug rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod// rig ma'ang bdag la brten byas nas// de bzhin byang chub 'dod par mnyam// de ltar 'dod pa mnyam gyur nas// chos kyi sku ru byin gyis brlab// yab yum sbyor ba'i tshul bstan pa// dang por byang sems dbab pa ni// rten ni yongs su dag pa ste// nye ring ran par rab bzhag la// de yi gzugs sgra dri ro brtag/ 'dod chags me 'bar thig le dbab// bde ba la ni bsgom par bya// bsgrad pa'i mtha' bsrung gsang thub bya// de bzhin lus gnas ci rigs par// rig bcing bde ba bsgom par bya// bsgom nyams ci skyes byung rgyal bskyang// de ltar thig le dbab cing sel// spel zhing gzung bar bya ba dang// gzung zhing rim gyis bzlog pa'o// skad cig mar ni dang po la// bde ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba// bsnyen pa'i man ngag yin par gsungs// pol+la ka ko mnyam sbyar zhing// 'dod chags me 'bar thig lai dbab// bde ba bsgom zhing bsgrad pa'i mtha'// blta ba'i 'gyur

bas srung bar bya// gsang thub dam tshig la gnas pa// skad cig ma ni gnyis pa la// mchog bde'i ye shes zhes bya ba// nye ba'i bsnyen par bshad pa yin// bsnyen pa nye ba'i bsnyen pa gnyis// thig le 'bab cing bde shugs che// thig le 'bar ba'i drod ces bya// de nas rdo rjes pad+ma bsrub// bde ba mi rtog ldan 'gyur te// dbab cing bde ba mi rtog bsgom// bsgrad pa'i mtha' bsrung gsang bar bya// skad cig ma yang gsum pa la// bde bral ye shes zhes bya ste// thig le g.yo ba'i drod ces bya// thig gi gzung yang bka' yang bsgyur// steng rlung rnam par 'gog pa yi// 'gyur ba rnam drug thig le bsrung// lus kyi spyod lam brten byas nas// lag g.yas nyi ma g.yon pa zla// pus mo gnyis la bsnol mar dgag/ hUM thung hUM ring bdun du dgu// g.yas g.yon dag tu gsum gsum ste// 'bud pa gsum dang rngub pa gsum// 'khor ba dag tu sbyar bar bya// nyi ma dag ni gsum pa la// sba ba sbubs su nub par 'gyur// srin po'i lam ni cung zad bsdam// gung mdzub gnyis ni drag tu gzhib// mig gnyis steng du bsgrad par bya// 'dis ni thig le 'dzin par 'gyur// yang na hal hal drag tu brjod// lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gzhan yang bya// 'dis kyang thig le 'dzin par 'gyur// glang chen hig gis lte ba dang// stag mo'i rdur gyis snying ga nyid// gcan gzan skyugs kyis mgrin pa'o// wa ltar snom pas spyi gtsug tu// rim pas gyen la drang bar bya// 'di ni shin tu gsang ba'o// rnam grol phyag rgyas lus la dgram// de las mi mkhas bzhi 'byung ste// dbab pa'i las la mi mkhas na// thig le myur du nyams par byed// gzung ba la ni ma mkhas na// bde la yun yang thung ba yin// bzlog pa'i las la ma mkhas na// de ni chu dang bsdongs pa yin// dgram pa dag la ma mkhas na// des ni nad du 'gyur ba'o// de yi gnyen po mkhas pa bzhi// dbab la mkhas pa rus sbal 'gros// gzungs mkhas lus ngag 'gyur ba bya// bzlog mkhas dud 'gro'i 'gyur ba bzhi// khyad par bya ba bdag la mkhas pa yis// de ni rnam grol phyag rgya bya// rlung gi skye rags bcings pa dang// zhags pa 'phang dang gtun shing bskor// bu chung lta bu'i spyod pa bya// bsrung ba dka' bar gyur pa na/ skad cig bzhi par bsrung bar bya// de dus rtags rnams 'byung ba ni// srin lam bem bem lci bar byed// rtsub rtsub byed cing dri chen dang// dri chu yang ni res mi thon// res dga' mi thong byed pa dang// skra rtsa zed zed byed pa dang// g.yal dang mchil ma 'byung bar byed// de dag ci rigs byung ba'i tshe// de ni thig le zin pa yin// bsgrub pa zhes ni de la bya// rten ni yongs su dag pa yis// gzungs ma

dag la sga bstad nas// rtsa sna btsal ba'i sbyor ba yi// byin brlab gsum po sngon song bas// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan 'gyur bas// yab yum sbyor ba'i tshul bstan pa// rdo rje dang ni pad+ma gnyis// rtsa gnyis thig le rnam pa gnyis// rlung gnyis kha sbyor gyur pa las// bde dang stong pa zung chud cing// bde ba ngos bzung bral ba yi// ting nge 'dzin yang skye ba ste// ting 'dzin bskyang zhing bsgrad mtha' bsrung// gsang yang thub par bya ba yin// 'gyur ba drug gis bsrung ba ni// rgya mtsho ri rab dag la skam// gling bzhi dbang du bsdu ba dang// ro 'dzin rang gi gnas su sbyar// dbang po'i mchog kyang steng du bzhag/ ngag stobs hUM drag ring bar bgrang// ting 'dzin hUM phaT mda' gzhu 'phangs// skad cig ma ni bzhi pa la// lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba ni// thig le brtan pa'i drod ces bya// gdon gyis 'dzag na sngags kyis bsrung// bag chags 'dzag na gnyen po brten// nad gzhis 'dzag na drod sman sbyar// rmi lam 'dzag na blta bas bsrung// phyi nang thams cad bde ba yi// lhag cig gi skyes pa'i ye shes la// go rim ltos pa'i bde ba bzhi// skad cig bzhi la snang ba de// rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig dang// rnam par nyed dang rnam par smin// mtshan nyid bral ba'i skad cig yin// phyis nas ltos pa'i bde ba bzhi// lus kyi khol bur skye ba dang// lus rnams phal cher skye ba dang// lus kun thams cad khyab par skye// snang ba'i dngos po bde bar 'char// nang gi gnas la ltos pa bzhi// spyi bo nas ni mgrin pa dang// mgrin pa nas ni snying gar bde// snying ga lte ba'i bar du ni// lte ba gsang gnas bar du'o// spang bya ltos pa'i bde ba ni// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog rags rim 'gog/ bdag gi rnam rtog rang rim 'gog/ phyag rgya'i rnam rtog 'gog pa dang// bde ba gsum po'i rnam rtog 'gog/ rang gi ngo bo ltos pa ni// bde ba'i nyams myong chung ba dang// bde ba che bar 'bar ba dang// bde ba mi rtog pa dang ldan// bde ba stong pa gnyis med do// bde ba'i ye shes bcu drug gis// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du// lta ba rnam par dag pa bstan// sangs rgyas sems can ma lus kun// yab yum bde ba chen po yis// ngang du thams cad 'dus pa ni// yum gyi b+ha ga'i gzhal yas nas// khams gsum sems can thams cad dang// bde gshegs sku dang gsung dang thugs// mi bzad rgyan gyi 'khor lo gnas// gsang ba'i mchod pa dbul ba ni// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam bzhag nas// thig le ba spu bu ga nas// phyi yi snang ba lha mo bzhi// nang gi bde ba sgeg sogs bzhi// gsang ba'i lha mo rnam pa bzhi// sgo ba bzhi yi lha mo rnams// bde ba'i ye shes bcu drug mchod// bde ba rlung

gi gtum mo yis// rlung gi gzhu la me yi mda'// byang sems haM gi 'phen la brdeg/ myur du ye shes 'chang bar 'gyur// sbyar ba'i sbyor ba med pa'o// yab yum rol pa'i byang chub sems// slob ma'i kha la bcug pa ni// gsang ba'i dbang yang bskur ba yin// dkyil 'khor bzhi las byung ba yis// bde ba'i ye shes rnam pa bzhi// rnal 'byor ming sring bsgom pa ni// shes rab ye shes dbang yang bskur// g.yas pa ro ma gzung ba la// g.yon gyi rkyang ma 'dzin pa de// dbus ma kun 'dar gzung 'dzin spangs// srog shing gsum gyi rba rlabs laM// g.yas g.yon dbus la bsgom pa ni// bde ba chen po'i dbang bskur yin// 'dzag pa'i dus su sbyar ba yis// lus khams bdud rtsi dkar dmar yang// bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i rdzas mchog de// sman gyi nang du blug par bya// zhes ston pas gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi chen po lnga'i rang bzhin rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i yum gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa la/ sbyor ba'i bsnyen bsgrub bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgral ba'i spyod pa 'di dag gsungs so// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba yang// ma trang bsgral pa chen po ste// rU tra thar pa nag po dang// de yi g.yog po dan phag gnyis// slob dpon thub dka' gzhon nu la// rnal 'byor lam la zhugs pa yis// thar pa khams gsum 'khor bar zags// dan phag rdo rje gnod sbyin 'dul// thub dka' rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sangs rgyas rnams ni bka' bgros nas// khams gsum bdag po 'dul bar byed// de nas 'jigs byed he ru ka/ dpa' bo sgeg po 'jigs su rung// rgod cing gshe la rngam pa dang// ngo mtshar snying rje zhi ba'i gar// 'bar ba chen po yum dang 'khril// thugs rje'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab// stong gsum ma lus khro bos bkang// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi ldan sku// dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa// khams gsum gnas pa'i gdug pa can// khro bo 'chol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdus// ma tang gi ni rnams shes yang// nges par rang gir gzugs la phab// ta ki'i zhabs ni g.yas pa yis// rU tra'i ling+ga steng du mnan// thar pa'i lam 'dod skal ldan rnams// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor g.yo ba lta// ngan song gsum gyi sgo bcad kyi// skal dang ldan pa 'dir shog cig/ ston pas gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos// gzung 'dzin log par blta ba yis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas su ltung// skye med chos nyid rtogs na bde// gzung 'dzin mdud pa dgrol bya'i phyir// bdud bzhi zhabs kyis mnan pa

yang// sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi khyon// bdag po rkang pa'i mthil gyis mnan// gnas kyi sgo 'di bdag bcad pas// bde gshegs thugs rjes gzung du gsol// ma hA de ba stobs bzang dang// khyab 'jug gtogs 'dod dga' byed dang// bi nA ya ka biSh+Nu dang// gsod byed brgyad la smras pa ni// dregs pa'i gzung 'dzin ngas gzhom phyir// rdo rje gri gug chen po yis// log rtog dra ba dbyung bar bya// zhen pa'i thag pa ngas bcad do// mthar byed brjid pas sdig pa bcom// khams gsum 'khor byed rtsa ba drangs// gnas kyi sgo 'di dbye ba yang// ro ma rkyang ma kun 'dar ma// rnam thar gsum gyi rang bzhin te// nyi zla gza' yi zin pa ltar// gzung 'dzin gnyis med mya ngan 'das// thar pa'i lam la gzud par bya// sgo 'di thams cad 'khor bas na// 'khor ba'i dra ba rgyun bcad do// bcom ldan bde gshegs mchog gi sku// khams gsum dag la bsdu bar bya// de ltar sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// dpa' bo chen po'i sku la bdud// thugs rje dgongs nas bskyab tu gsol// de nas de lus dur khrod gnas// rgya gar yul na bsil ba'i tshal// bde byed mchod rten shir sha'i shing// bal yul ya ma bya tri kha// bya khri kha shor ka ran tsa// sing ga'i yul na sku la rdzogs// ri bo ta la tsu ta'i shing// tho gar yul na gsang chen la// mchod rten mgo mang shing ral rta// kha che'i yul na he chen rol// ka ni shir bar ka ba ti// za hor khu yug klong dgu na// bde byedagazhon du ka kol shing// li yul 'jig rten mngon par rdzogs// gau de shan dang shing pa ta// bkra shis ya mtshan 'byung ba'i gnas// 'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral phyir// byang gi dkyil 'khor steng du bzhag/ mi che gla gli 'phyo ba yang// shar lho nub byang dbus su bzhag/ nges don gcig tu bstan pa dang// rgyud lngar 'khor ba bsgral bar bya// denas 'jigs byed sku bskyed la// dkyil 'khor gru gsum steng du bzhag/ gnas sbyong ting 'dzin bsgom par bya// lan gsum dang po 'dod khams sbyang// dang po rang gnas sbyong ba yang// lha yi sa bon a dkar po// de la rlung sems mnyam 'dus na// lha yi nyams ni sems la 'char// rang nyid lha yin snyam byed 'byung// gar ni lus la 'char ba de// me tog phreng sogs brgyan pa dang// sngags kyang dag la 'char ba dang// saM skr-i ta yi skad yang brjod// mthong snang yul la 'char ba ni// rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang mthong// rang nyid lha yi gtso bor mthong// gzhan rnams lha yis 'khor du mthong// bag chags rmi lam 'char ba yang// de dag ci rigs rmi lam 'byung// lha min su yig ser po

la// nyams ni khro zhing tshig pa za// gar ni mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// sngags kyang rgyob sod du ma 'byung// mthong snang ri rab khong seng na// lha ma yin gyi 'thab rtsod dang// bdag gzhan der yang khrid pa mthong// bag chags ci rigs rmi lam rmi// mi la nr-i yig sngon po ste// mi nyams 'jig rten chos la dga'// gar ni yul dang cha lugs 'gyur// sngags ni so so'i yul gyi skad// mthong snang gling bzhi gling phran mthong// bdag dang gzhan yang der khrid mthong// mi rigs mi mthun du ma mthong// rmi lam de dag ci rigs rmi// lha dang lha min mi dang gsum// 'dod khams mtho ris gnas gsum ste// dge ba bcu yi lam las 'byung// de dag mchog 'bring tha ma yin// dud 'gro du yig dud ka de// nyams ni dud 'gro sngar bas blun// gar du ba glang spyod lam 'gyur// sngags kyang dud 'gro du ma'i skad// mthong snang phyi yi rgya mtsho mthong// byol song chu srin la sogs pa// bdag gzhan de ru khrid pa 'byung// de dag ci rigs rmi lam rmi// yi dwags pre yig dmar po la// nyams kyang bkres dang bskom pa dang// gar ni lus che yan lag phra// sngags kyang pre ta ngan skad smra// mthong snang grong khyer ser skya mthong// yi dwags bkres dag bskom pa dang// bdag dang gzhan yang der khrid mthong// rmi lam bag chags de dag rmi// dmyal ba'i tri yig nag po de// sems nyams tsha grang sdug bsngal 'byung// lus gar gsum btab gdung zhing tel// sngags kyang dag tu kyi hud sogs// mthong snang lcags kyi khang sgrom 'bar// dmyal ba tsha grang can sogs mthong// bdag gzhan der yang khrid par mthong// rmi lam de dag ci rigs rmi// de dag ngan song gnas gsum de// mi dge bcu yi lam gnas pas// 'dod khams tha ma'i gnas su ltung// mchog 'bring tha ma'i las yin no// gnas sbyong bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so// rnal 'byor gang gis 'byongs pa des// mtshan nyid sna tshogs 'char ba'i nyams// rang bzhin rang bzhin stong pa dang// ngo bo zung du 'jug pa dang// rim pa yin min nyams skye bas// phyi nang srin bu spong ba dang// ngan song mi 'gro gdeng thob de// mtho ris gnas su 'gro bas na// phyir mi ldog pa'i sar gnas pas// byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang thob// drod rnams byung rgyal bskyang bar bya// gzugs khams bsam gtan oM du gnas// rtog pa dang ni bcas pa dang// dpyod pa dag dang bcas pa yi// shes rab bzab mo'i ting nge 'dzin// dga' ba bcas shing gnas pa dang// bde bar bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bde bral 'ga' tsam ting nge 'dzin// btang snyoms yongs dag ting nge 'dzin// rim pa yin min skye ba nas// drod kyang byung

rgyal bskyang bar bya// gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi'i nyams// shes rab a la rlung sems 'dus// chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' tsam// rang gi rnam par shes pa tsam// yod med las kyang 'das pa las// ci yang med par nyams skye bas// de yang rim pa yin min skye// tshad med bzhi la gnas byas nas// tshangs gnas gzugs khams skye ba dang// mi g.yo stong pa yid la byed// gzugs med skye mched mu bzhir gnas// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer mchog/ snying po'i a las rlung sems 'dus// spang bya gzung 'dzin rnam rtog sdang// thob bya chos sku bde chen thob// zung 'jug hUM la rlung sems 'dus// rang byung ye shes chen po yi// ting 'dzin rgyud la skye ba ni// lus ni yang la sems ni gsal// dper na nam mkha' sprin med 'dra// 'khor 'das nyams myong skyes pa na// sgrol ba tshad dang ldan pa yin// chos nyid skye 'gag bral ba la// ma rtogs 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// rtogs na rang bzhin lus ngag sems// 'khor 'das rdzogs par shes pa bya// dus la bab pa'i sems can de// drod tshad gnas sbyang 'byongs pa yis// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// gang yin rnam shes dgug par bya// thar pa'i lam 'byed gsang ba yi// dkyil 'khor chen po khyod shog ces// rgyu drug gnas pa'i gdul bya rnams// ngan song gsum po sbyang bar bya// oM na mo b+ha wa ti sarba dur ga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni// rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba a ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ oM badzra shrI he ru ka a nr-i su tri pre du dza/ pa tsa pa tsa sar+b+ba tir ya ka te he tu+u hUM phaT/ ma tha ma tha sar+b+ba pre tha ga te he tu hUM phaT/ da ha da ha sar+b+ba na ra ga te he tu hUM phaT/ de nas ngan song gnas sbyangs nas// sdug bsngal gsum gyi sgo yang dgag/ raM yaM khaM/ gang yang rung ba'i sems can de// yab yum hUM las lhar skyed de// 'og min gnas su 'phang ba yis// rgyal ba'i sras su skyes pa la// rnam shes rig pa chos kyi skur// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur bas// sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings bzhugs pa'i// zhabs drung ye shes rlung gis bgrod// bsam yas zhing khams dpag med na// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nyan// sa bcu gnas pa'i sems dpa' sogs// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa 'bul// sdug po bkod dang kun tu+u 'od// 'khor lo pad+ma can la gnas// yang dag nyid la yang dag bsgral// chos sku dri ma med pa thob// dri chen rnam par snang mdzad nyid// byang chub sems ni mi bskyod pa// mAM sa dkon mchog dpal yin te// rak+ta snang mtha' tshe dpag med// dri chu don rab grub pa nyid// bsgral ba rdzas kyi bdud

rtsi ni// thugs rje chen po rtsi yin pas// ma rig dug yang sel bar byed// thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin// rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las bsgral ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam tshig 'di gsungs so// dug lnga mi spang ye shes lnga// dam rdzas lnga ni dang du blang// ngag brlang rdzun sgrol ma byin sbyor// phung sogs rigs lngar shes par bya// yan lag dam tshig nyi shu la// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// re re la yang lnga lnga ste// de yang lnga lngar dbye bar bya// de nyid thabs dang shes rab gnyis// bsgrub par bya ba rigs lnga nyid// rtsa ba sku gsung thugs dang bcas// dam tshig stong dang rtsa brgyad bsrung// bum dbang gsang ba'i dbang bskur zhing// shes rab ye shes bde chen dbang// dam tshig bsrung bar bya ba yang// rnam grangs rab tu phye nas bsrung// mnyam bzhag rjes spyod bzung ba dang// bsrung dang mi 'bral dam tshig yin// gang zhig bum pa'i dbang thob pas// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom byas la// snang stong zung 'jug blta ba dang// bdud rtsi lnga yi ril bu bza'// dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad bsrung// rdo rje dril bu mi 'bral 'chang// phyi pa dag dang mthun pa yod// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang thob na// rtsa rlung tsaN+Da lI yang bsgom// rang byung ye shes zhes bya ba// nyon mongs rnam par rtog pa dang// smin smel yang bzhi gsal zhing yang ba yi// stong gsal zas su bza' bar bya// rang byung rlung dang 'gal bar bsrung// zhi drag gang rung mi 'bral lo// shes rab ye shes dbang thob pas// mnyam bzhag dkyil 'khor 'khor lo che// rjes spyod lhan skyes bcu drug la// bsrung ba thig le 'dzag pa drug/ dngos sam ye shes phyag rgya la// mi 'bral dang du blang ba nyid// bde ba chen po'i dbang thob pas// rdo rje rba rlabs rnam gsum bsgom// shin tu rnam dag de kho na// rgyu mthun pas ni skra dkar 'joms// 'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'ong 'gyur// rnam par smin pas stobs ster byed// mngon par shes pa cung zad 'char// skyes bu byed pas rnam par 'phel// 'jig rten ro rnams longs spyod nus// dri med pas ni 'chi med 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul cung zad ston pa'o// bde chen bde stong bza' bar bya// shes bya'i sgrib pa bsrung ba dang// pad can phyag rgya mi 'bral zhing// mi nyams bsrung ba'i tshul yang bzhi// tshul bzhin rgyud la bskyed pas bsrung// rnam grangs rjes dran mi nyams bsrung// nyams myong ci skyes mi nyams bsrung// pha la gus pas khyad par can// nyams par 'gyur pas rnam pa gnyis// srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'dren pa yi// dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad po// thog mar bum dbang dam bcas so// lam gol ring du 'khor

ba yi// zab mo dbang gsum dam tshig de// nyams na las sbyor dngos grub ring// nyams na bskang ba'i las bshad pa// dam tshig thams cad nyams gyur na// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bla ma la// phyi yi 'dod yon rnam lnga dang// nang gi gzungs ma mtshan ldan dbul// mnyam bzhag dam tshig nyams pa na// ye shes mkha' 'gro longs sku nyid// 'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la// lta ba tshad du bskyal par bya// rjes spyod dam tshig nyams pa na// ma mo mkha' 'gro sprul sku la// bsgom pa zab mo'i bsam gtan dang// blta ba tshad du bskyal bar bya// lhag ma'i dam tshig nyams pa la// sha za mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams la// gtor ma gtang zhing lhag mas mchod// dam tshig mkha' 'gro rdo rje'i spun// tshogs kyi 'khor lo rgya chen bya// zhes gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i sngags kyi dam tshig bstan pa ste le'u bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig la gnas pas// byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur// nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i dam tshig gis// dam tshig rab tu brtan par byed// sgrub pa mchog la rab gnas na// dngos grub shin tu nye ba dang// bsgrub chen dam tshig rdzogs byang chub// mchog dang thun mong thob gyur pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// shin tu don du gnyer ba'o// gang zhig bsnyen pa byed 'dod na// bsgrub pa'i yul yang brtag par bya// mnyam zhing snum pa'i sa phyogs la// ro rnams rab tu gral bar bya// btsal nas blang bar bya ba yang// 'jig rten sa bdag lha klu la// rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// sa rin btsal te sa blang ngo// rang byung gnas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di// las dang bya ba ting nge 'dzin// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya// rko dus lto 'phye shes par bya// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug gnas su// bskrad cing byin gyis brlabs pa'o// sbyang dang sgrib pa bsal ba'i phyir// phyi yi bshags pas dag par bya// bskang ba dang ni lus ngag yid// bag chags dag pa bya phyir bshags// mtshams dang bgegs rnams bsrung bya na// bgegs rigs rnams la gtor ma gtong// rgyal po bzhi la gnyer yang gtad// ma trang gnan par bya ba dang// khro bcu srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom// ma dag pa ni mtshams gcad phyir// dam sri mnan cing sgo byang gdags// nye ba'i bsnyen pa bya ba yang// dkyil 'khor rab tu gru bzhir bya// bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga byugs nas// rak+ta dmar gyi chag chag gdab// ras bal pad+ma'i snal ma dang// ba su ta yi rgyu ma dang// dam tshig skud pa gsum sgril lam// ye shes thig skud chen po yis// rdo

rje grogs dang ldan byas nas// mkhas ldan chen po yab yum gyis// rdo rje thig yang gdab par bya'o// ting 'dzin bar chad skyon yin yang// gzugs brnyan rdul tshon dam tshig ste// de phyir dam tshig tshul shes bya// shar gyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// sgrub rdzas thams cad spungs la bzhag/ lhor ni mchod pa'i tshogs mchog ste// nub tu yab yum sbyor ldan la// byang du rgyu mchog bsgral bar bya// de nas bsre bsnan bya ba yang// ma 'dres pa dang bsre bar bya// 'dres pa rnams la dam tshig bsnan// de phyir chag nyams skong ba'o// las bzhi skos la gdab pa yang// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod la// zhi ba'i tshe na shar na gnas// rgyas pa lho la dbang ni nub// byang du drag po lhun 'grub dbus// sa chu me rlung rgyu dus bya// zhi ba'i cha lugs rgyan dang bcas// khro bo dur khrod rdzas kyis brgyan// de nas sgrub pa brtsams pa yang// zhi khro'i phrin las gzhung bsrang la// sgrol sbyor nang gi dam rdzas dang// phyi yi rdzas su bya ba yang// sman gyi rtsa ba tshang gyur nas// sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// rab tu bsgrim nas bsgrub par bya// zhes gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi chen po lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bsgrub par bya ba sman gyi rtsa ba 'di dag gsungs so// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i// rigs 'dzin rnams kyis rab zhus pa// nang gi rtsa ba bdud rtsi ste// de ni sgrol dad sbyor las byung// phyi yi rtsa ba sman nyid de// ji ltar gnas pa bshad du gsol// drang srong rnams la kun bzang gis// nges par rab tu gsungs pa ni// bcud kyi dam pa sman gyi mchog/ khyed la bshad kyis legs par nyon// de yang thugs rje'i byin brlabs las// 'byung ba gzhi las skyes pa'i sman// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung// sman rnams ma lus skyed pa'o// de bzhin srog chags thams cad kun// sman rnams kun la spyod pa ste// 'chi gsos rkyen dang ngan gsos sman// de phyir bdud rtsi sman gyi mchog/ sems can sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i rdzas// rnal 'byor dngos grub thob par byed// chu yi bcud la kun spyod bzhin// de bzhin 'byung lnga sman gyi bcud// ro dang nus mthu ldan par grub// thams cad srid pas chags pa'o// de dag kun gyi yon tan yang// rtsa ba brgyad ldan ro dang mdog/ mthu dang las dang rang bzhin dang// nus pa du mar ldan pa yin// sman gyi rgyal po ro rnams ldan// lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra// rigs 'di rnam pa bdun ldan pa// tshangs pa kun 'gro chen pos bsgrubs// shar lho nub byang brag phug nang// yum bzhi'i rak+ta zags pa ni// sman gyi rgyal po brag zhun mchog/ drang srong nabs so ljang

sngon bsgrubs// srid pa chags pa'i nyi zla'i chu// star bu rgun 'bru rnam pa gnyis// de ni tsa ra ka yis bsgrubs// de nas drang srong bdud rtsir bkrus// Sha nas thigs gnyis lhung ba dang// ram nye ba dang nye shing ba// drang drong nabs so skyes kyis bsgrubs// de nas drang srong drag sha sna// lha chen khros pa'i lug mig pa// drang srong tha skar bu yis bsgrubs// de nas rtsi yi lha mo ni// rak+ta zags pa'i rtsa ba de// drang srong chen po lhas skyabs bsgrubs// rgyal bu don grub sku gdung las// grub pa tha skar rdo rje dang// drang srong rgyun shes khyod nyidabasgrubs// de nas lha yi lag pa lhungs// dbang po lag pa zhes bya ba// drang srong g.yon phyogs lha yang bsgrubs// pur+Na'i rna ba a shwa ka/ drang srong thang la gnas yang bsgrubs// b+ha hu lug mig chen po yang// drang srong me bzhi 'jug gis bsgrub// tsi tra ka dang la ba'i snying// gtso bo snying ni zho sha ste// drang srong rkang gnyis spyod yang bsgrubs// bud med ser mo ban glang can// me tog ha dmar klad pa rnams// drang srong ka ya na ka las yang yis bsgrubs// ha lce ki ya de pa dang// snye ba u dum+bA ra yang// drang srong shing khyer chen pos bsgrubs// srid pa'i bdag po'i nal bu'i lce// drang srong ljang sngon bu yis bsgrubs// me tog sma lo kril kril ni// drang srong nyi ma'i bu yis bsgrubs// rtsa ba ma hA mgo na srig/ do ba zla ba'i bu yis bsgrubs// dung dang 'brug rus rtsa la sogs// rin po che dang gau te sha na bsgrubs// rgya mtsho chu la sogs pa rnams// klu yi drang srong 'jog pos bsgrubs// 'di dag ston pa'i thugs rje yis// sa steng khyab par skyes pa yis// tha mal sman du+u sbyar ba yang// nad ni bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sel// bcud len sman du bsgrubs pa yis// tshe yi dngos grub thob par byed// yon tan brjod las 'das pa yang// sman rnams kun las byung ba'o// de bzhin skye bo rnam par spyod// thams cad bdud rtsi chen po lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi chen po phye ma sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// de nas gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor yang// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// 'khor lo brgyad dang pad+ma brgyad// sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bya// de la yig 'bru+u gsal bkod nas// rang sngags srog dang ldan par bya// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dbus su yang// b+han+d+ha dgu sbyar rab tu bya// ting 'dzin gsum las byung ba yi// dam pa rigs brgya bsgom par bya// spyan drangs phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul// bstod nas 'dzab bzlas dngos grub blang// lha la 'ju 'dul rdzogs rim bsdu// de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis de dag gi gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM dz+nyA na sa twa A/ e maN+Dal e/ yaM karma yaM/ baM ma ma ki ri baM/ suM su me ru suM/ laM gar+b+he laM/ raM dz+wa la raM/ b+h+rUMbi shwa bi shud+d+hi b+h+rUM/ baM pad+ma maN+Da la paMM/ ma sUr+ya maN+Da la maM/ a tsan+d+ra maN+Da la a/ hUM badzra d+h+r-ig muM d+hA tI shwa rI/ oM dzi na dzika/ lAM b+he Sha ra ti/ swa rat+na d+h+r-ika/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ aM A ro lika/ pyAM rA ga ra ti/ ha pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ tAM badzra ra ti/ hUM k+ShiM hi rA tsa ya/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM A gar+b+hA ya/ traM mA le sa ma s+t+waM/ hriM ha hUM pad+ma pAd ma/ hriM gI ti rA ko\u0f85 haM/ dzalhiM ku ru pA Na hri/ aM nIrati rA ga yA mi/ mai d+hA ra ne/ dza d+hu pe pra be sha/ th+l+hIM nis+sa raM b+hA ya/ hUM puSh+pe A be sha/ sa rA dzA ya/ baM dI pa su ga rI/ muM shrI aM rA gA ya/ ho gan+d+he tsit+ta ho/ oM mu ne kriM swA hA/ oM mu ne truM swA hA/ oM mu ne sruM swA hA/ oM mu ne draM swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ hUM hUM badzra tsit+ta hUM/ a a badzrI b+ha drAr+Sha sa man+ta A/ hUM ya mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM badzra d+ha ro ma hA kro tI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM big+h+nAM ta kr-ita phaT/ oM rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM karma d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ thod pa mtshan ldan nang du ni// bkra shis rus sbal khog pa'i nang// de yi nang du gtso bo lnga// rgyal po lta bur rab tu che// rgyud lnga'i 'bras bu rnam pa lnga// blon po lta bur gnas pa la// dri zhim bcud ldan kun skyongs pa// mang po 'dul bas mthu byin ldan// yang na rtsa ba rnam pa brgyad// phyi dang nang du sbyar ba yin// phyi yi dbang po rnam pa lnga// sha lnga dag dang sbyar ba dang// de yi 'phrad du bya ba yang// nang gi dbang po rnam pa lnga// shing thog la sogs rnam pa lnga// phyi yi bcud du bya ba dang// dri ni chen po sbyor ba dag/ rnam pa lnga yang shes par bya// yang na rgyal po dri lnga yang// de yi skyabs su sbyar ba'o// de bzhin a ka ru+u la sogs// spos lnga dag dang sbyar ba dang// gser dngul la sogs rin chen lnga// yon tan dpag tu med pa dang// sna tshogs ra sa ya na'i rdzas// ma lus lus pa med par bsags// rigs mthun dar gyis b+han+d+ha dgab// yang na gnod sbyin nor rdzas bcings// de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi ni// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gcig tu na// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// rigs lnga ling tshe dgu la bzhugs// rang sems bar do yi ge hU~M// gsung gi cho gar rab gnas nas// pha ma'i cha shas rdo rje sogs// thugs kyi cho ga chen por gnas// chen po lnga las skur grub pas// yongs su rdzogs par yang dag gsal// oM badzra ak+Sho b+h+ya hUM/ badzra d+hA tI shwa rI hUM/ oM bud+d+ha bai ro tsa na oM/ bud+d+ha lo tsa nA oM/ badzra rat+na saM

b+ha ba traM/ badzra rat+na saM gi traM/ badzra pad+ma a mi ta b+hA hri/ badzra ban+d+har ba hri/ badzra a mo g+ha sid+d+hi ha/ oMbadzra sa ma ya tA rA ha// bde gshegs rdo rje rin chen dang// pad+ma las de rigs lngar bcas// dbyings phyug spyan dang mA ma ki// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma dang// rigs lnga yab yum 'di dag kyang// 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed// hUM badzra satwa hUM/ badzra lA s+ya hUM/ badzra rA dza hUM/ badzra d+hA be hUM/ badzra rA ga hUM/ badzra aM ku sha ya hUM/ badzra sA d+hu hUM/ badzra ti sha tA ra hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu 'dren// rdo rje chags pa mda' gzhu 'gengs// rdo rje legs pa se gol dkrol// sgeg mo 'gying bag spos me ma// lcags kyu ma dang rdo rje sgrol// shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gnas// rdo rje rigs su rnam par grags// badzra rat+na trAM/ badzra mA le trAM/ badzra sUr+ya trAM/ badzra puSh+pe trAM/ badzra ke tu trAM/ badzra pA sha trAM/ badzra ha sa trAM/ badzra rat+na ne tra trAM/ rdo rje rin chen nor bu 'dzin// rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma bsnams// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rin chen tog/ rdo rje bzhad pa so 'phreng bgrangs// phreng ba ma dang me tog ma// zhags pa ma dang rin chen spyan// rin chen rigs kyi sems dpa' ste// lho yi rtsibs bzhi dag la gnas// badzra d+harma hri/ badzra gIr ti hri/ badzra tik+ShA hri/ badzra A lo ke hri/ badzra tsakra hri/ badzra s+pho Ta hri/ badzra b+ha Sha hri/ badzra rA ga ra ti hri/ rdo rje chos ni pad+ma 'dzin/ rdo rje rnon por ral gri bsnams// rdo rje 'khor lo 'khor lo bskor// rdo rje smra ba lce yang bsnams// pi wang ma dang mar me ma// lcags sgrog ma dag gsal bkra ma// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la// pad+ma rigs kyi sems dpa' gnas// badzra karma ha/ badzra nIr ti hri/ badzra rak+Sha ha/ badzra gan+d+he a/ badzra yak+sha ha/ badzra g+haN+De ha/ badzra sa na d+hi ha/ badzra ra ti ha/ rdo rje las ni rgya gram bsnams// rdo rje bsrung ba go cha 'dzin// rdo rje gnod sbyin mche ba 'chang// rdo rje khu tshur khu tshur nyid// gar mkhan ma dang dri chab ma// dril khrol rdo rje 'bebs ma ste// las kyi rigs kyi sems dpa' rnams// byang phyogs rtsibs bzhi dag la gnas// sems dpa' sems ma bcu drug ni// mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis yin// thabs shes dbu rgyan rigs lnga ni// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur gnas// badzra Ar+ya te dza teng dza/ badzra a mu khe hUM/ badzra lo ka baM/ badzra b+hasmi ba la yab tu ho// lcags kyu shar la zhags pa lho// lcags sgrog nub la dril bu byang// sgo bzhi dag la rab tu gnas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ro// rgyu yi dbang ni bla mas bskur// lam du rang nyid dbang blang ba// bum dbang ye shes rnam pa lnga// zab mo'i dbang gsum sku gsum thugs// oM ma hA shU n+ya na badzra swa b+hA wa Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM

ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM mahA kr-i tA nuSh+ThA na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA wa Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA wa Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ 'og min chos dbyings pho brang nas// rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas// bla med lha dang lha mo yi// grub pa'i byin rlab bsam mi khyab// sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// de bzhin sprul sku thub drug dang// mthu chen khro bo khro mor bcas// bde ba chen pos yongs brgyan te// rdo rje sems gtso mdzes mdzad ma// brtse phyir gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi ma hA b+ha ga wan/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sha ho/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dpa' bo chen po mthu ldan pa// bdag la byin gyi brlabs mdzad cing// bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// grub par byin gyi brlab tu gsol// chos sku nam mkha' bzhin du dbyer med kyang// gzugs sku 'ja' mtshon bzhin du so sor gsal// thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes pa'i// rigs lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// mdzes pa'i sku mchog sems can sgrol la mkhas// ngo mtshar pho brang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum// shes rab thabs kyis gtso la mnyes mdzad ma// rigs kyi yum gyur rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bsod nams tshogs chen yongs su rdzogs pa la// 'gro drug 'gro ba ma lus smin bya'i phyir// dpe byad mtshan gyis yongs su brgyan pa yi// sems dpa' sems ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// yid chos rnam dag kun bzang yab yum dang// 'gro don rdzogs mdzad sprul sku thub pa la// rab tu dngas bas phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs tshul rngam pa khyad par gyis// gdug byed thal bar rlog mdzad pa// bdud bzhi dpung bcas 'joms byed pa// sgo ba yab yum brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho/ pra ti ts+tsha ho/ a la la ho/ rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi// lus khams bdud rtsi chen po 'dis// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa bzhes// snang stong rdo rje chos dbyings las// ye shes sgyu ma'i sku mnga' ba// rgyal ba sangs rgyas sras dang bcas// rab tu dang bas bstod phyag 'tshal// chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngo bo la// ma rtogs rtog pa gsal bar bya// de nas bzlas pa bya ba yang// rdo rje bzlas par yang dag bshad// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sa ya na ta na dz+nyA na gu ya sid+d+hi hUM hrIHtha/ spyi bo bde chen dkyil 'khor nas// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la// thub drug kun bzang yab yum

dang// gshin rje'i gshed po yab yum las// sku yi dam pa rigs brgya spro// don mdzad sman la rab tu thim// mgrin pa longs spyod dkyil 'khor nas// snang ba mtha' yas gos dkar mo// spyan ras gzigs dang glu ma dang// kun tu bzang po mar me ma// rta mgrin yab yum bcas pa la// gsung gi dam pa rigs brgya spro// snying ga chos kyi dkyil 'khor nas// mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa' yum// sa yi snying po sgeg mo dang// byams pa spos ma byang chub sems// shes rab mthar byed yab yum la// thugs kyi dam pa rigs brgya spro// lte ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum la// nam mkha'i snying po phreng ba ma// sgrib sel me tog ma dang bcas// yon tan dam pa rigs brgya spro// don mdzad slar 'dus sman la thim// gsang ba'i me rlung dkyil 'khor nas// don grub sgrol ma sku la 'khril// phyag na rdo rje gar mkhan ma// 'jam dpal dri chab bsgo bar bcas// las kyi dam pa rig brgya las// gsang sngags rlung gi rta la 'phro// snod kyi b+han+d+ha yum gyi mkha'// bcud kyi sman nyid lhar gsal bas// snod bcud dam pa rigs brgyar gnas// gnyis su rtsa brgyad stong zhes bya// don dam spros med thig le las// kun bzang dngos grub blang bar bya// oM a mr-i ta sid+d+hi ha ha kan// rnam smin 'bras bu rigs 'dzin 'gyur// nyi zla lta bu'i tshe yang 'dzin// bdag nyid kun bzang yab yum gyi// gnas lnga'i rigs mi lnga brgya dang// snod bcud dam rdzas lhar gnas pa'i// rigs lnga'i rigs ni lnga brgya nyid// stong la 'dzab kyis bzhu btul nas// bdud rtsi sprul skur sangs rgyas so// zhes gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi chen po lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ dam pa rigs brgya'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi rigs lngar sangs rgyas pa 'di gsungs so// mi shigs mdzod ldan ka pA la// dbus su yang dag gzhag par bya// sku gsum lhun grub ka pA la// shar gyi zhing khams rdo rje'i rigs// yid bzhin gter ldan ka pA la// lho nas 'byor pa rgyas par byed// khams gsum dbang sdud ka pA la// nub na mtha' yas bsod nams sdud// cho 'phrul rtags 'byin ka pA la// byang na las rab rdzogs pa ni// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor g.yas dag tu// snod bsdus dbang du bsdu bar bya'o// dbus su byang sems dri chen shar// mAM sa lho la rak+ta nub// dri chu byang ste byang chub sems// lus khams bdud rtsi chen por gnas// rang bzhin gsum las bdag nyid lha// bde chen oM la longs spyod AH// chos mdzod hUM yig sprul par swA// gsang dbang yi ge hA gnas te// rlung lnga 'byung

ba'i 'phro 'du ni// don mdzad gsung gi mdzad pa spro// slar 'dus sman la thim pa ni// de nyid rgyal ba rigs lnga'i sku// gsung dang phyag mtshan skur rdzogs gsal// rang rig cha shas chen po lnga// de nas 'phro 'du+u bya ba yang// spyir ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags mchog/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ dz+nyA na badzra tsit+ta a mr-i Tha sa ma ya swA hA/ de nas sbyor ba byas pa yis// byang chub sems ni sbyar ba bya// oM AHhUM badzra satwa hUM/ sarba e'u shud+d+he a mr-i ta su kha ma hA yo ga hUM tsit+ta hUM/ ak+Sho b+h+ya rA' Sha ra tri sa ma ya staM/ lho ru kha bltas mAM sa byang// sna tshogs bsgral ba'i sha rnams nyid// oM AHhUM rat+na saM b+ha ba ma hA mAM sa ma ya/ ma hA sa ma ya rA go\u0f85 haM/ rat+na ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ nub nas pad+ma rak+ta la// snang ba tha' yas sngags kyis sbyang// oM AHhUM pad+ma a mi ta b+hA/ rak+ta mU la a mr-i ta// rA ga ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ byang nas dri chu'i snod blang la// don yod grub pa rta mchog sngags// oM AHhUM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ badzra ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dbus snod dri chen rnam snang gis// sbyang bar bya ba gsang ba'i sngags// oM AHhUM bud+d+ha be ro tsa na ma hA yo ga a ti s+pha ra Na/ ba lin a ti sta u ti sta oM/ mo ha ra ti sa ma ya badzra ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bdud rtsi rnam lngar byin phab nas// ye shes rnam pa lnga yang gsal// de nas 'bru bcud chang rnams la// gsang ba'i sngags kyis sbyang bar bya// oM a mr-ita badzra gad pra ba ta swA hA/ oM te na hUM/ te te hUM/ bi ta saM sho d+ha ya/ kro tishwa rI swA hA/ 'o ma sna tshogs sbreng bya zhing// de yi bcud kyang mar ltar sbyang// oM AHhUM a mr-ita bi tha saM sho d+ha ya hUM hrIHtha/ rin chen sna tshogs brdar byas nas// yon tan dpag tu med pa'o// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-ita rat+na tsit+ta hUM hrIHtha/ chu rnams sna tshogs tha dad pa// lan tshwa'i ro ltar sbyang bar bya// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta pa ni kuN+Da li hUM hrIHtha/ bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga po ni// rang gi lus kyi khams yin pas// phung po lnga nyid gso mdzad cing// rigs dang ye shes 'ju 'dul bya'o// zhes gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi chen po lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ de nyid rigs lnga'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi chos kyi skur sangs rgyas pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs so// dbus kyi pho brang chen po ru// bdud rtsi chen po'i snod bzhag pa// byang chub sems kyi chu bo la// 'khor 'das chos rnams 'dus pa ltar// mdor na sangs rgyas lnga rnams ni// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la 'dus// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// ting 'dzin gsal bas lha yi sku// 'og min gnas nas spyan drangs nas// gnyis med sku la gnas par bya// de nas 'dzab dgongs bzlas pa yang// gsung ni rlung gi sgra la gnas// de rgyus

srog shing rnam pa gsum// ldang 'jug gnas pas sgra rnams sgrogs// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta badzra satwa hUM/ mtshan don bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ni// dngos grub dag kyang blang bar bya'o// mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// ji snyed bsam yas bdud rtsi rnams// byang chub sems su rnam par zhu// thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ sman phye ma sbyang pa gsang chen rigs gcig gi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khrol bu la dngos grub blang ba 'di gsungs so// de nas zhi ba'i lha tshogs rnams// rigs rnams so so'i yig 'bru yang// bdud rtsi chen po sman la bstim// gsang ba'i sngags kyis rab tu bya'o// oM a mr-i ta sarba sa ma yo ga hUM/ badzra sa ma ya hUM/ ma hA sarba a mr-i ta ma hA su kha hri/ oM sarba bi shud+d+he/ oM kro tI shwa rI/ sarba sho d+ha ya/ oM AHhUMM badzra a mr-i ta hUM/ gsang sngags rgyal po mchog 'di yang// rab tu bzlas par bya ba nyid// de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi ni// lha tshogs mang por gnas pa kun// sangs rgyas dang ni rig ma yum// byang chub sems dpa' lha mo dang// sprul pa sgo ba rnams la bstod// sman pa'i che ba yon tan brjod// ngo mtshar chen po rab bskyed bya// slob ma kun gyi spyir bzhag de// lus khams bdud rtsi chen po 'di// khams dgu 'dus pa'i dngas ma nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa dang// rang nyid bsgom zhing bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsngags// mchog gi dngos grub sku gsum 'grub// thun mong grub chen brgyad la sogs// ma lus 'di yis 'grub pas na// dngos grub dam pa blang bar bya// sprul sku sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs// longs sku rgyal ba rigs lnga nyid// lhag pa chen po chos kyi sku// sku gsum sman nyid sangs rgyas pas// de phyir 'ju 'dul dgongs pa yang// las rnams gzhugs la bya bar ni// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// zhes gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi chen po lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ sman khrol bu la dngos grub blang ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhi khro mtshams sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// sgrub pa'i ging rnams chas su zhugs// glang po'i go ba thang ba nyid// tshul khrims zhing lpags chos gos dang// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// de nas tsar ma'i zhing lpags la// ta kr-ita dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// ye shes snying po'i gnas bzhugs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i chos// rtsa brgyad yan lag stong sbyar ba// rtog pa'i mtshan ma sngags kyis dag/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ da ha da ha hUM

phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ rang bzhin rnam pa gsum po yang// dbyer med bdud rtsi nyid la 'khyil// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drang yang// bdud rtsi nyid la thim par gyur// sha chen la sogs bdud rtsi lnga// rnam rtog dbyings su dag pa'o// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM hrIHtha/ de nas btsag par bya ba ni// mtshan ma dag par byed pa ste// ho pa ya bi shud+d+he swA hA// de nas bsre bar bya ba ni// 'dres shing shin tu bsres pa'o// a mr-i ta mu+u sa la mu+u sa la swA hA/ de nas sbyar ba'i bya ba ni// rab tu dri mdog ldog yang/ ldan par bya// ka ma la kuN+Da li hUM hrIHtha/ de nas gzhal zhing tshad brtags te// sbyin bsregs me phung sman du blug/ ha ya grI ba hUM// pad+ma ta kr-ita hUM/ hu lu hu lu hri/ kuN+Da li hri/ de nas b+han+d+ha kha sbyar nas// dar gyis gril la rgyas btab de// tshon skud bcings nas bum par dril// zla gam dbang sdud gnas su gzhug/ ces gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi chen po lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ btags btsag mtshams sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrub pa chen po sman pho brang bum pa'i sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// pho brang de la byin brlabs nas// mtshams bcad bar chad med par bstan// de nas dkyil 'khor rtsigs pa ni// 'dom gang gru bzhi legs byas la// dri sna lnga yi maN+Dal la// chag chag bdud rtsis rab byugs shing// thig gis rab tu gdab pa yang// cha chen cha brang snyoms la phyed// tshon rnams byin gyis brlabs nas ni// le'u tshe brgyad la 'khor lo brgyad// rin chen brgyad la sgo bzhir ldan// dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// de dbus pho brang bum pa'i snod// bcud ldan dbus kyi zla gam nyid// mda' dang ral gri phur pa yang// dar dang bcas pas brgyan du bskor// glu dang gar dang stabs bcas pas// sangs rgyas rig 'dzin byin dbab bya// bdud rtsi dbus bzhag mtha' bskor nas// phyogs bzhi nas ni yon tan brjod// ma dag pa la mtshams bcad nas// las kyi gtsor ni bskang bshags byas// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang// rgyu las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// 'byung ba lnga yi rim pa nyid// hUM dang e yaM raM dang ra// baM keM bruM las byung ba ni// gzhal yas phyi nang med pa de// dur khrod khang pa rab tu bsgom// rdo rje brag chen bco brgyad gdan// e steng che mchog he ru ka/ dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// dus gsum sangs rgyas dbu la bzhugs// phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la// phyag mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bsnams// yum ni dbu dgu bco brgyad phyag/ oM ma hA shrI he ru ka raM dz+wa la raM/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ gzhan yang rigs bzhi he ru ka/ badzra khrag 'thung rnam

pa lnga// badzra shrI he ru ka/ bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka/ rat+na shrI he ru ka/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ karma shrI he ru ka/ stong gsum khro bos rab bkang nas// khro bo gnas su yang dag bzhugs// oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha ni la daN+Da hUM/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka hUM/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta hUM/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ rta mgrin bdud rtsi'akhyil ba dang// ye shes sems dpa' sa nur gsal// hri pad+mAn+ta kr-ita ha ya grI ba hriH/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM dza/ hUM dz+nyA na sa twa hUM/ hUM sa ma ya sa twa hUM/ de nas tshul bzhin dbang yang bskur// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM kA ya wAka tsit+ta oM AHhUM/ ye shes dkyil 'khor chen po yang// chos kyi dbyings nas spyan yang drangs// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ma hA shrI he ru ka pad+mAn+ta kr-ita ha ya grI ba hUM dza/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ A kar+Sha ya hUM dza/ nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam ma lus pa// bdud rtsir gnas la kun phyag 'tshal// a ti pu ho/ pra tI ts+tsha ho/ a la la ho/ rim bzhin che mchog khro mkhar du// go rim bzhin du bzhugs su gsol// ka ya wA ka tsit+ta sa ma ya lhan// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// de kho na yi mchod pa 'bul// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las// che ba rnams kyi sgo nas bstod// dngos grub ye shes gang yin pa// 'dod pa'i don la smon lam gdab// nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'byung lnga'i 'phro 'dus bsdu bar bya// gu ya lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// rta mgrin dpa' bo gsal bar bya// de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni// byang sems bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin ni// rnam par mi rtogs chos kyi sku// zhe sdang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// zhe sdang byang sems dag bya'i phyir// sprul sku'i yi ge 'bru dgu yis// bcu gnyis tshul du rnam par dag/ oM ni sku yi rang bzhin te// ji snyed snang ba'i chos rnams kun// chos kyi sku las ma g.yos pas// lhums su zhugs pa'i tshul dang sbyar// AHni gsung gi rang bzhin te// skye ba med las skye pa'i tshul// ting 'dzin rnam gsum tshul yin pas// lhums nas bltam pa'i tshul dang sbyar// hUM ni thugs kyi rang bzhin te// khams gsum sems can thams can la// thugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas// gzhon nu rol rtsed mdzad pa'i tshul// sa ni yum gyi rang bzhin te// bder gshegs rgyal ba'i ye shes lha// thams cad bskyed pa'i gzhi yin pas// khab tu bzhes pa'i tshul dang sbyar// rba ni rlung gi rang bzhin te// thams cad bskyod pa'i mthur ldan

pas// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par bskyod// khab nas rab tu byung ba'i tshul// panya ni chu yi rang bzhin te// byang chub sems kyi chu chen po// thams cad rlan zhing snum par byed// dka' thub mdzad pa'i tshul yin no// tsa ni me yi rang bzhin te// ye shes chen po'i me long gis// nyon mongs thams cad sreg byed pas// bdud rnams brtul ba'i tshul dang sbyar// a ni byang chub sems kyi ngang// 'gro drug sems can thams cad kun// skye med dbyings su rnam dag pas// sangs rgyas pa yi tshul dang sbyar// mr-i ni dug gsum rtsad bcad ste// lus ngag yid gsum thams cad kun// sku gsung thugs su rab ldan pas// cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i tshul// ta ni 'gro ba so so la// bstan pa'i don gsung gnyis med bka'// theg pa chen po'i chos ston pas// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// hrIH ni thams cad dbang du sdud// thugs rje'i 'od zer thams cad kun// slar la bsdus te mi dmigs pas// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'o// tha ni tha tshig chen po ste// khams gsum srid gsum thams cad la// thugs rjes kun la khyab pas nas// sku gdung bgos pa'i tshul dang sbyar// sprul skus de ltar don mdzad nas// nyon mongs byang chub sems su dag/ sems nyid ye shes ngang du gsal// mi gnas ye shes chen po'i ngang// bya bral bdud rtsi klong phyag bdud// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrIHtha// oM las 'od byung a yis spel// hUM gi bdud rtsi rnam dag bskyil// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM hrIHtha// rtags dang mtshan ma 'byung ba ni// byang sems 'od dang dri chen dri// mAM sa'i 'phel ba rak+ta'i sgra// dri chu'i du ba 'byung ba de// spyi 'dus lha mo'i gzugs su ston// rtags med nyams chag bskang ba dang// spogs pa sgrub thabs bskyar la bya// thang gcig yud tsam nyin zhag gcig/ bdud nam nyi shu rtsa gcig de// phyi ma'i dus la mi ltos par// tshe 'dir 'bras bu thob par byed// de nas bdud rtsi dbab pa yang// sngags dang phyag rgya gting 'dzin dbab// oM me pra be sha ya pheM pheM/ de nas zla gam dkyil 'khor du// klu bdag rgyal pos dbang du bya// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta pad+mAn+ta kri ta ha ya grI ba e ka dza ti hu lu hu lu A yur+Shetsa a// de nas mtshan don bsnyen pa dbul// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag bzlas// oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta many+dzu shrI bya ba lo ki te hUM hrIHtha/ oM ma hA gu ya sid+d+hi hrIHtha/ de nas lha tshogs thams cad la// gus pas gsol ba gdab par bya// slob ma dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yi// sngon nas slob dpon rig pas 'jug/ phyi ni rA sa ya na'i dbang// khrol bu bsgrub pa'i dus su bskul// nang ni bdud rtsi bum pa'i dbang// gsang ba'i dgongs pa smin par byed// oM AHhUM

sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ kA la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ gsang ba thabs dang shes rab dbang// sbyor ba'i dus su bskur bar bya// dngos grub rab ni sangs rgyas te// phyag rgya chen po mchog thob bo// 'bring ni rig 'dzin go 'phang thob// tha ma tshe dang mngon shes 'byung// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ a ho su kha d+harma kA ya ni/ a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hrIH skye med na ro thig le'i gdangs// sku de dang po rten med gsung// gre 'byung gdangs yang thig les spras// kun gyi sems la yang dag gnas// sa rlung chu me nam mkha'i gnas// skye med skye mtshon so lce sbyar// sngags rnams kun gyi rtsa bar shar// klad du che ba rgyal po 'dra// chos skus kun la khyab par gnas// bdud rtsi chen po su 'chang ba// rigs lnga nyid la gnas pa de// mkha' 'gro kun dang 'grogs pa dang// yon tan brjod las 'da' ba'o// thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi nyid// rang byung rang za rang la thim// ril bor 'dzin pa'i bsam gtan yang// rjes su gzhig nas chos skur grol// mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir// rgyal bas gsung phyir de don bsngo// dus dang gnas skabs ma lus pa// rang la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi la// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bral mi bya// chu bo rgyun gyi ting 'dzin gnas// lus dang grib ma ji lta bar// rnal 'byor lus khams bdud rtsi sbyar// zhes gsungs so/ thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ sgrub pa po sman phye ma dngos kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis blta ba bdud rtsi chen por la bzla ba 'di gsungs so// lus kyi khams dgu 'dus pa yi// bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin yang// spros med chos skur gnas pa las// ma rtogs 'gro ba rnams su shar// rtogs na rdzogs sangs rgyas pa rnams// gzhi las 'bras bu'i bdud rtsi la// su zhig rnam par gang gis 'byed// nam mkha'i ngang gis 'byung ba la// 'byung bar phye yang nam mkhar gcig/ rang bzhin chos sku chen po yin// rnal 'byor don du gnyer ba rnams// bdud rtsi lnga la rlung sems 'dus// nyams ni sems la 'char bar byed// sngags kyang ngag tu 'bru lnga la// gar ni lus la rigs lngar 'byung// mthong snang yul 'di bdud rtsi lnga// bag chags rmi lam rmi ba rnams// bdud rtsi lnga ni dang po'i nyams// bar du rigs lnga longs spyod rdzogs// tha ma ye shes rnam pa lnga// khams kyi 'dug lugs rnam gsum gyi// dang po bar dang tha ma yin// sgoms shig rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams// zhes gsungs so// thams cad bdud rtsi chen po lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ mjug lta ba thig le chen por la bzla ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas

bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams kyis/ bdud rtsi chen pos mchod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol ba 'debs shing bsngags pa chen po brjod do// lta bas thag bcad rgya mtsho zab// de phyir dngos por thag bcad pas// tha mar la bzla ngo mtshar che// gsang ba chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// spyod pas la dor dam tshig bsrungs// de phyir dam tshig dang por gsungs// bar du sgrol dang sbyor ba yis// bdag gzhan spyod pa khyod phyag 'tshal// bsgrub pas nyams su blangs pa ni// bsnyen pa phun sum tshogs pa nas// sa chog bshags pa mtshams rnams bcad// nye bsnyen dkyil 'khor sta gon rdzas// bsre bsnan las bskos gdab pa dang// rgyan btags phrin las gzhung bsrang ba// nang gi dam rdzas sbyor sgrol dang// phyi yi dam rdzas rtsi sman btsal// bsgrub pa khrol bu rnam pa gsum// rigs brgya rigs gcig rigs lngar bsgrub// phye ma btags btsag zhi khro spel// sgrub chen che mchog bum pa'i lung// sgrub pa nyams len khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes rjes su yi rangs nas/ ston 'khor chos kyi sku dri ma med pa'i ngang du thim mo// thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin/ rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud las/ rjes su yi rangs pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// bdud rtsi gsung gi rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta bi ma la mi tra dang/ bod kyi lotsA ba gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur ro////@#/ / rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta ma hA su kha tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ yon tan phrin las ma lus lus pa med pa'i bdag nyid/ khams gsum pa'i sems can gyi de kho na nyid dang dbyer med pa/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku+u gsung thugs rdo rje/ rdo rje snying po'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ srid gsum pa'i bud med dang dbyer med pa'i bde stong chen po/ lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi rol pa chen po la yang dag par bzhugs pa/ de nyid gyi sras rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa yum dang bcas pa dang/ de dag gi sras phyi nang gi byang chub sems dpa' yab dang yum dang ldan pa dang/ khams gsum pa'i rigs drug 'dul ba'i ston par gyur pa sprul pa'i sku thub pa chen po drug kyang mchod rten chen po brgyad kyi mdzad pa spro ba dang/ gdug pa 'dul ba'i khro bo yab yum dang bcas pa bzhugs so// sangs rgyas dang/ yul dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ gzungs ma dang/ sprul pa dang/ khro bo dang/ rig mar bcas pa rnams kyang/ lus

kyi khams dgu 'dus pa'i dngas ma chen po/ bdud rtsi chen po gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ yang gsang rmad du byung ba/ snying po las kyang snying po/ 'khor ba bdud kyi dug can la/ mya ngan 'das pa mgon po ye shes kyi rtsi gtong bar byed pa'i bdag nyid/ lus kyi khams bdud rtsi chen po'i dgongs pa la tha mi dad par spyod pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bde ba chen pos khyab pa de nyid ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul mdzad pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mdzad pa ni/ gnas spyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang/ byin gyis brlab pa'i rdzu 'phrul mdzad do// chos gnang ba'i cho 'phrul ni/ 'khor sdud pa dang/ chos rnams snang bar bskul pa mdzad do// de nas 'khor gyi nang nas rdo rje chos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsar seng ge'i 'gro stangs kyis dong nas/ zhabs spyi bor bzhag ste glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas/ khams gsum gyi ston pa 'khor 'das kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces zhus so// ho ma lus skur snang nam mkha' lta bu'i sku// nyi ma'i snying po bzhin du rab gsal ba// stong nyid shes rab thabs kyi snying rje can// stong nyid snying rje'i snying po khyod bzhengs la// lus khams bdud rtsi'i lus la ji ltar gnas// bgrod byed gom pa lam du ji ltar bsgrub// bdag gzhan dngos grub dbang gi 'bras bu gang// 'gro la phan phyir khyod kyis da ltar gsungs// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad par zhal gyi bzhes pa 'di gsungs so// ye nas bdud rtsi lus gnas gzhi// de nyid nyams len bgrod pa lam// nar son mthar phyin 'bras bu nyid// lus la rten 'brel rab bsgrigs nas// tshang mas gtan la phab nas ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'da' bya'i phyir// dgongs pa brda' yis rab bshad pas// 'gro ba'i don du rab nyon cig/ ces longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus dgongs pa brdas bshad do// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'irgyud las// gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gzhi dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs 'di 'gro ba'i ched du+u gsungs so// kye ho 'khor 'das dbyer med chen po 'di// bcing med grol med rig pa nyid// thams cad kun bas nga sngar shar// dbyer med bdud rtsi chen por gnas// ma rig las dang nyon mongs kyis// khams gsum 'khor bar snang ba ni// thog ma tha ma med dus na// snod bcud 'khor ba 'khrul par snang// ma rig pa nyid ye shes la// las nyid bde bar rang snang bas// ye

shes mnga' bdag rigs lnga nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas mes po yin// sems can lus la bdud rtsi gnas// rang byung bdud rtsi chen po ni// byang chub sems ni rgyu yi rtsa// bcu tshan gsum gyi steng du gnyis// de ni gnyis 'dus kun bzang gzugs// don dam gzugasakyi bdag nyid do// de yi gtso bo gsum gsum ni// shes rab ting 'dzin la la nA// thabs kyi rang bzhin ra sa nA// de kho na nyid gnyis med gzugs// a bad+hU tI chos 'byung gnas// dkyil 'khor de la rab gnas pa// mi bskyod rgyu ba la la nA// rak+ta rgyu ba ra sa nA// a ba d+hU tI byang sems rgyu// 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad ni// phra mo phra mo'i rang bzhin can// de ni la la nA zhes bya// chos rnams thams cad brjod du med// de yi rang bzhin ra sa nA// dbyer med pa yi bdag nyid ni// a ba d+hU tI zhes bya'o// rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi// gnas dang de bzhin ming bstan pa// rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong na// de yi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir// ming ni a b+hi da zhes so// rkang pa dag gi byin pa ni// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin phyir// de ming su k+Sh+ma ma rU pA// brla ni g.yon pa dag na yang// 'dod pa lnga yi bdag nyid phyir// bdud rtsi di byA rgyu zhing gnas// gsang ba'i g.yon na de kho na// dmigs pa'i shes rab byed pa'i phyir// lus khams bA mA ru zhes so// lte ba phyag rgya chen po dang// rgyu mthun dag gis pA mi nI// snying ga lte ba'i g.yon pa na// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// kha sbyar gzugs phyir kUr+m+madzA// nu ma g.yon na gnas pa ni// bde chen sgom pa b+hA ba kI/ mgrin pa g.yon na gnas pa ni// dri ma med byed she ga'o// lag mthil g.yon na dang po btsogs// dus byad ba ni doShA'o// ma mchu dag la gnas pa yang// bde chen 'bebs pa'i Sh+tA'o// mkhur tshos g.yon na gnas pa ni// rnam pa blta ba mA ta rA// mig g.yon bde ba chen pos ni// 'khru ba dag gis sarba rI// rna ba g.yon pa'i rtsa na yang// rlung rab shes pa shrI ta dA// ldan pa dag ni g.yon pa na// ma skyes phyir ni uSh+mA Na'o// spyi gtsug rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// mos dang dga' byed la la nA// spyi bo spros pa dang bral phyir// a ba d+hU tI zhes bya gnas// spyi bo'i gtsug ni g.yas pa na// mya ngan dga' phyir ra sa nA// blta ba dag na gnas pa dang// sku sogs bdag gi sra ba NA// ldan pa g.yas na mi bskyod pa// bdag nyid kr-iSh+Na bar+N+NA'o// rna ba g.yas pa'i rtsa ba na// thams cad rjes 'gro sa ma n+yA// mig g.yas byed pa'i bdag nyid du// gyur phyir he tu dA yi kA/ mkhur tshos g.yas na dpa' bo yi// dga' ba bral ba'i yo gA'o// ya mchu dag la gnas pa yang// thams cad 'gro ma pre ma NI// mgrin pa g.yas ma thog ma yi// rang bzhin med

phyir sid+d+ha'o// lag mthil g.yas sgeg tshogs pa yi// ro byed phyir na pA ba kI// nu ma g.yas na lus 'bral ster// thob byed sum nA gnas so// snying ga'i g.yas na sku gsung thugs// bdag nyid yin phyir tr-i pr-id+tA// lte ba'i g.yas na 'dod pas ni// dga' ba'i phyir na kA mi nI// chos 'byung g.yas na sangs rgyas rnams// gnas pa'i phyir na ge hA'o// brla g.yas thams cad bde chen pos// khyab byed tsaN+Da At+ma'o// byin pa g.yas na bgegs rnams ni// med byed ka t+ya ya nI'o// mthe bong g.yas na sdug bsngal rnams// mi 'jug ma dA ri ka'o// de ltar rtsa ni sum cu gnyis// lus gnas lugs dang lugs las bzlog/ rtsa ni de dag rnal 'byor pa'i// dngos po yongs su gyur pa'o// lus la stsogs pa rang bzhin bcings// bde ba chen pos yongs su 'gyur// khams kyi bdag nyid rgyu ba la// tshes grangs bzhin du phur pas btab// dur khrod mkha' 'gro'i mthu ru 'gyur// grang bzhin bde ba bsgoms pas ni// tsaN+Da lI yi gnas brtags pa// bde ba 'dzin pa'i bsgom du 'byung// a la sogs pa'i A li dang// ka la sogs pa'i kA li dang// rdo rje dang ni pad+ma dang// thabs dang de ni shes rab dang// bde chen longs spyod chos dang sprul// dpa' bo'i dga' ba mchog tu dga'// bral lo lhan cig skyes pa dang// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams so// e baM ma yA'i yi ge bzhi// e ni chos kyi 'byung gnas dang// stong pa nyid dang dga' ba dang// lha mos sangs rgyas spyan ma'o// baM ni chu dang mtshan ma med// mchog tu dga' ba mA ma kI// ma ni ma dang smon pa med// dpa' bo dga' ba gos dkar mo// yA rlung mngon par 'dus ma byas// lhan cig skyes dga' sgrol ma yin// lte ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor na// 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la// kA li sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// lugs dang lugs las bzlog pas na// yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi'o// pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa ste// re rer ka la sogs pa bzhi// stong pa bcu drug yi ge ni// rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas pa// rang gi ngo bo yongs gyur pas// 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i// rnam pa chos kyi 'byung gnas 'khor// snying ga chos kyi dkyil 'khor na// 'dab brgyad yi ge brgyad gnas pa// a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya// sha yi sde tshan dang po rnams// 'byung ba 'byung ba las gyur pa// phra mo la ni phra mo'i gzugs// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'o// mgrin pa longs spyod dkyil 'khor na// 'dab ma bcu drug gnas pa la// A li bcu drug gnas pa de// stong pa bcu drug rnam par gnas// lo yang bcu drug lon pa yi// shes rab longs spyod rnam pa'o// de phyir 'dab ma bcu drug pa// longs spyod dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// spyi bo bde ba chen po

yis// dkyil 'khor 'dab ma sum cu gnyis// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// rnam dag 'dab ma sum cu gnyis// ji ltar 'khor lo bzhir bshad pa// skad cig ma yang rnam pa bzhi// rnam pa du mar rnam par smin// rnam par 'joms dang rnam mtshan ni// nyon mongs rnams la bden pa bzhi// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang// lam dang 'gog pa'i bden pa yang// rgyu yi theg pa rnams la snang// de kho na nyid bzhir snang ba// bdag sngags lha dang ye shes kyi// kho na nyid bzhir snang ba yang// gsang sngags phyi ba thabs rgyud la// dga' ba bzhi ru snang ba ni// dga' ba mchog tu dga' ba dang// dpa' bo dga' ba lhan cig skyes// ma hA a nu dag la snang// sde ba bzhi ru snang ba ni// gnas brtan pa yi sde pa dang// thams cad yod par smra ba dang// legs dpon ba yi bde ba dang// dge 'dun phal chen sde pa'o// de ltar skad cig dang ni bde ba dang// de kho na nyid bye brag dang// sde pa'i dngos po chung ngu dang// 'bring dang chen po la sogs pa'i// bye brag gnas gzhir rnam par gnas// zla ba g.yon la nyi ma g.yas// A li phra mo kA li rags// saM krAn+ti yang bcu drug ni// me Sha dang ni pr-i Sha dang// mai thun na dang kar ka dang// sing ha dang ni ka n+yA dang// tu la dang ni pr-i ts+tsha dang// d+ha nu dang ni ma ka ra/ kum+b+ha dang ni mI na dang// tsan+d+ra d+ha ra sur+ya d+har// ti la ka dang A ka sha/ saM krAn+ti ni bcu drug rags// khu ba g.yon nas dkar po dang// g.yas nas bskor ba'i bye brag gis// gnas kyang bcu drug ldog pa yi// rim pas sa[] krAn+ti bshad de// nyi ma dang po mthe bong a// gnyis par A ni byin pa na// brla la gsum pa i zhes bya// I ni bzhi pa gsang ba na// lte ba na yang lnga pa u// drug pa U ni snying ga na// nu ma na ni bdun pa r-i// brgyad pa r-I ni mgrin pa na// lag mthil na ni dgu pa li// bcu pa la ni mkhur tshos l-I// e ni mig la bcu gcig la// snang ba'i rtsa ni bcu gnyis e// bcu gsum o ni dpral ba na// au ni spyi bor bcu bzhi pa// g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbus na yang// yongs su gang ba'i aM dang AH// de dang de ltar khu ba yi// rnam pa phra mo la sogs pa// rim gyis rgyu bar byed pa'o// bdun pa de dag dril nas bstan pa la// de la gsum de grangs bzung ba dang// dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang// dus kyi cha dang ldan pa dang// skar ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang// nyi ma bco lnga gza' dgu dang// saM krAn+ti yang bcu gnyis kyis// dus kyi cha yang gzung bar bya// nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo la// dbyug gu'i grangs ni drug cu ste// bzhi ni 'phel dang 'grib pa'o// de ltar gzung bar byas pa na// dus dang dbyug gu drug ci bzhi// thabs dang shes rab kun rdzob

dang// kun rdzob med pa'i bye brag gis// ji ltar bstan pa'i gnas su ni// saM krAn+ti yang bcu drug po// rnam par dag pa khu ba yi// bye brag rgyu ba gzung ba ste// dbyug gu'i grangs ni de dag ni// gnas pa sum cu rtsa gnyis so// de dag thams cad 'khor lo bzhir// legs par gzung bar bya ba ste// bzhi po de yang lte ba nas// tsaN+Da lI ni 'bar ba yis// phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid 'gyur// nyi ma phyed la dbugs kyi grangs// de yang lnga stong bzhi brgya'o// nyi ma gcig la dbugs kyi grangs// de yang khri dang brgyad brgya'o// chu tshod gcig la dbyug gu'i grangs// sum brgya dang ni drug cu'o// de ltar dbugs kyi grangs brtsis na// nyin mtshan gnyis la dbugs kyi grangs// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o// grangs kyi de nyid shes bya zhing// dus ni nges par gzung bar bya// chu tshod dbyug gu drug cu bzhi// dus dang dbugs kyi mtshan nyid ni// nges par gtan la dbab pa ni// yum la sbyar la bdud rtsi dbab// dgra bgegs gnas bstab bsgral bar bya// phyi yi bdud rtsi gnas pa ni// 'byung ba bzhi las skyes pa rnams// snod kyi 'jig rten chen po na// mu la daN+Da gel ba dang// da la buSh+pa balka dang// pha la hr-i da rnam pa brgyad// nA ka sa chu me rlung las// rigs ni rnam pa lngar yang 'khrungs// nad rnams ma lus sel bar byed// na ba gso zhing shi ba slong// de phyir bdud rtsi zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ lus khams bdud rtsi rang la gnas par rgyu'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gyi bdud rtsi lam gyi bdud rtsi chen po sgrub pa 'di dag gsungs so// ston pa rgyud lung man ngag shes// lta spyod sgom 'bras ldan pa la// gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bzhi yum// 'khor rnams lnga las nyung ba min// yo byad rdzas dang nad khams gso// phyi nang sman rnams tshang bar bsog/ dben zhing nyams dga' ba yi gnas// chu shing rab tu 'dzom par gnas// ston dpyid brgyad dang snga dro yi// dus la thams cad 'du bar bya// bgegs gtor rgyal chen mnga' gsol nas// dam sri mnan pa sgo byang gdags// khro bcu phyogs skyong phur pas gdab// ma traM khog pa'i gzhal yas khang// mtshon cha dra ba gur la sogs// 'gros dang stangs stabs bsrung bar bya// blang zhing brtags nas skyon bsal nas// sbyang zhing bsrung pa'i sa blangs la// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang khru gang ba// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab// ba su ta yi thig skud kyis// ling tshe dgu pa shin tu zlum// bcu drug 'khor los mtha' bskor cing// gru chad bar khyams sgo dang bcas// sgo rgyan rdo rje me dpung 'bar// rdul tshon sna lnga rab sbyar nas// dpa' bo 'bru

sngas byin brlabs te// de nas phyag rgya dgod par bya// rdo rje dbus la 'khor lo shar// shar lho spyan dri rin chen lho// lho nub rdo rje pad+ma nub// nub byang pad+ma rgya gram byang// byang shar ut+pal ling tshe dgu// bcu drug rtsibs la bri ba yang// shar du rdo rje lcags kyu dang// mda' gzhu se gol bri bar bya// lho ru rin chen nyi ma dang// rgyal mtshan tog dang so phreng bri// nub tu pad+ma ral gri dang// 'khor lo lce yang bri bar bya// byang du rgya gram go cha dang// 'tshe ba khu tshur bri bar bya// rtsibs mchan phyag rgya dgod pa ni// shar du me long bdug spos dang// lcags kyu dang ni 'od zer 'bar// lho ru phreng ba me tog dang// zhags pa spyan yang bri ba'o// nub tu pi wang mar me dang// lcags sgrog rab tu 'bar ba'o// byang du phur bu dri chab dang// dril bu rab tu 'bebs pa'o// shar sgor tho ba lcags kyu bri// lho ru be con zhags pa dang// nub tu thod sbrul lcags sgrog bri// byang du+u rgya gram dril bu bri// mda' dar ral gri me long dang// tshon skud phur pa brgyad brgyad bskor// de la snod ni bcu drug dgod// dbus ni ye shes lnga ldan pa// shar du sku gsung thugs ldan te// lho ru yid bzhin gter ldan la// nub tu khams gsum yongs sgrol nyid// byang du cho 'phrul rtags 'byin no// mi 'gyur g.yung drung thod pa dbus// shar lho mi shigs mdzod ldan la// lho ru srid pa phongs sgrol te// nub byang dug gsum gtan sprugs nyid// byang shar mtshan ma spros bral lo// gru chad bzhi la dgod pa yang// yon tan rdzogs ldan shar lho'i grur// bkra shis mtshan ldan lho nub grur// mi 'gyur sra mkhregs nub byang grur// A yu dpal ldan byang shar grur// sgo bzhir pad can pad+ma'i rigs// dung can ma ni rdo rje'i rigs// rin chen rigs ni ba glang can// ri mo can ni las kyi rigs// rigs mthun b+han+d+ha dgod par bya// de yi nang du blug pa'i sman// byang sems dkar dmar dri chen dang// pad+ma rak+ta mAM sa dang// dri chu nang gi rtsa ba lnga// ma hA de ba'i byang sems tshang// rdo dreg drang srong dri chen dang// lha yi mAM sa dbang po lag/ ram bu srin mo'irak+ta dang// cong zhi khyab 'jug chu dang lnga// phyi yi rtsa ba lnga zhes bya// ga pur dang ni cu gang dang// a ru ra dang suk+Sh+me dang// dza ti snying ni zho sha dang// mon cha ra dang li shi dang// gur gum mon lcam ka ko la// sman gyi rtsa ba rnam pa lnga/ mi lce yang grub thabs rnams su bza' skad yin par bshad/ mi che gla gli snying lnga ni// mi las gyur pa rnam lnga yang// sbal pa spre'u dred mo dang// phyi ba tsha ni mes po yin// mche ba can las gyur pa lnga// stag dang seng ge spyang ki dang// khyi dang dom ni lnga yin no// rmig pa kha brag gyur pa lnga// g.yag dang sha ba glang po che// ba glang phag dang lnga yin

no// rmig zlum rnam pa lnga snang ba// rta dang rnga mo dre'u dang// bong bu rkyang dang rnam pa lnga// gshog pa can las 'gyur pa lnga// rma bya khyung dang shang shang rte'u// bya wang dkar mo khyim bya dkar// de sogs klad pa dri chen sha/ khrag dang chu rnams bsgral rdzas ni// nyi shu rtsa lnga bsog par bya// mi sha glang po rta dang ni// ba glang bya khyi sha rnams blug/ ting 'dzin gsum las byung ba yi// 'byung lnga yum gyi b+ha ga ru// gzhal yas gdan dang bcas pa'i steng// mi bskyod kun tu bzang mo dang// rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas spyan// rin chen 'byung dang mA ma kI// snang ba mtha' yas na bza' dkar// don yod grub pa dam tshig sgrol// rdo rje sems dpa' sgeg mo dang// rdo rje rgyal po spos me dang// rdo rje chags pa lcags kyu ma// rdo rje legs pa sgrol ma 'od// rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma// rdo rje gzi brjid me tog ma// rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhags pa ma// rdo rje bzhad pa rin chen spyan// rdo rje chos dang pi wang ma// rdo rje rnon po mar me ma// rdo rje 'khor lo lcags sgrog ma// rdo rje smra ba gsal bkra ma// rdo rje las dang gar mkhan ma// rdo rje bsrung ba dri chab ma// rdo rje gnod sbyin dril 'khrol ma// rdo rje khu tshur 'bebs ma'o// stobs po che dang lcags kyu ma// gshin rje gshed dang zhags pas 'ching// rta mgrin lcags sgrog sdom pa mo// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dril bu 'bebs// dam pa rigs brgya mtshon dpe'i ched// dgongs pas lha dang sman ngo sprad// rtog pa sprul skur sbyang bar bya// gsang ba'i sngags kyi yan lag sbyang// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sA ya na ta na dza ya g+hu h+ya sid+d+hi hUM hrIHtha/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas gar la dgyes// nam mkha'i khams kun gar gyis bkang// dus gsum sangs rgyas gar la dgyes// sa gzhi kun kyang gar gyis bkang// do nub sangs rgyas gar la dgyes// gzhal yas 'di yang gar gyi bkang// gar gyi mchod pa bla na med// g.yas kyi se gol ta la ho// g.yon gyi thal mo bsham la brgya// ta la bsham pa bstan byas nas// smin mtshams dag tu thal sbyar bas// nam ni dag la btab bya'o// 'di ni 'byung med ye shes yin// phyag rgya yin par dpa' bos bshad// phyag rgya'i mchod pa sna tshogs yin// gzung 'dzin rdo rje brtan pa'i sa// me long ye shes rdo rje'i sku// rdo rje bdud 'dul phyag rgya 'dzin// phyag 'tshal rdo rje mi 'khrug la'o// snang stong rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings// chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag sku// rdo rje mchog gi phyag rgya 'dzin// phyag 'tshal rdo rje rnam snang la'o// rdo rje rin chen 'bar ba'i me// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sku// rdo rje mchog sbyin phyag rgya 'dzin// phyag 'tshal rdo rje rin chen 'byung la'o// mtha' yas rdo rje chos kyis sku// kun rtog ye shes rdo rje'i

sku// rdo rje ting 'dzin phyag rgya 'dzin// phyag 'tshal rdo rje mtha' yas la'o// don grub rdo rje bskyod mdzad rlung// nan tan ye shes rdo rje'i sku// rdo rje skyabs sbyin phyag rgya 'dzin// phyag 'tshal rdo rje don grub la'o// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag gsungs// rdo rje bdud rtsi bla na med// chos rje chos kyi dbyings bsgrags pas// las rab rdo rje byed par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang ba chen mo ni// rdo rje sangs rgyas lo tsa na// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid ma// phyag 'tshal rdo rje yum khyod la'o// rdo rje chen mo rin chen ma// ri mo can de mA ma kI/ rin chen dbyings ma dam tshig mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun mchog la'o// rdo rje mdzes sdug pad+ma can// man+da ra ba rab dgyes ma// dgyes par mdzad pa dam tshig bskong// phyag 'tshal rdo rje mdzes sdug la'o// rdo rje khro mo 'bul ba che// sa ma d+ha ra dam tshig skong// thams cad dgyes shing mnyes mdzad pa// phyag 'tshal rdo rje sgrol ma la'o// shin tu 'bigs pas rdo rje ste// mchog gi sbyor bas lcags kyu'o// phra bar 'bigs pa mda' yin la// mgu pas dga' bar byed pa'o// spro bas rin po che ru bshad// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid 'bar// bsgreng bas rgyal mtshan rjes su bshad// bzhad pas bzhad pa zhes su grags// 'dod chags dag pas pad+ma ste// nyon mongs dgra bcom ral gri'o// dkyil 'khor tshul du 'khor ba'o// tshig tu brjod pas smra ba'o// sna tshogs las ni rdo rje ste// mi tshugs sbyor bas go cha yin// 'jigs par byed pas mche ba ste// bcings pa'i phyir na khu tshur ro// rdo rje 'gyings ma 'joms pa ste// rdo rje phreng ba'i yon tan 'byung// rdo rje sgra dbyangs don mchog bzang// rdo rje rol mdzad rol pa che// rdo rje sdug pa 'dod pa che// rdo rje mdzes sdug pad+ma can// rdo rje mar me snang mdzad ma// rdo rje dri chab dag par byed// bde ba rgyas 'debs yum gyi phyag rgyar gsal// bde ba za byed dkyil 'khor phrin las mdzad// bde ba rmongs byed gnyis su med pa'i don// bde ba tshe 'phel skye shi med pa'i don// thugs rje'i lcags kyus thugs kyi rgyud bskul zhing// byams pa'i zhags pas gnas nas spyan drangs nas// dka' yi gnas thob pho nya lcags sgrog ma// dril bus gsungs rab rgya mtsho'i sgra sgrogs ma// stobs chen rtse gsum dug gsum 'jom// gshin rje mi g.yo log lta sol// rta mgrin thod sbrul klu dug sel// bdud rtsi rgya gram phrin las mdzad// bskyod ma lcags kyu thugs dam bskul// sdom ma zhags pas gnas nas bskyod// sdud ma lcags sgrog gzhu mdzad ma// 'bar ma dril dkrol dgyes mdzad ma// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod par bzhes// dam skongs mthu dbang dngos grub stsol// sems ma bcu drug g.yon

pa nas// lus kyi rtsa la rab tu gnas// sems dpa' bcu drug g.yas pa nas// lus kyi bdud rtsi gnas btsal nas// gyen 'gro thur du 'bebs par byed// rigs lnga yab yum 'khor lo bzhi// bsdam bya yin pas sdom par bya// nang gi phyag rgya dpa' bos bshad// ces gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ lam gyi bdud rtsi bsgrub pa las/ dam pa rigs brgya'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa longs skur thim pa'i lam bdud rtsi bsgrub pa 'di dag 'gro ba'i don du gsungs so// bum pa rig pa'i dbang lnga dang// gsang dbang bde ba tsaN+Da lI// shes rab ye shes dkyil 'khor bzhi// bde chen srog shing rnam gsum las// dbang thob rnal 'byor chen po yis// lus khams bdud rtsi bsgrub par bya// dkyil 'khor ling tshe dgu pa zlum// gru chad bar khyams sgo dang bcas// rta babs rdo rje me dpung 'bar// mkhas pas mtshon gyis bris nas ni// rigs kyi b+han+d+ha rnam pa lnga// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bkod nas// bdud rtsi byang sems rtsa ba brgyad// dri chen snang mdzad rtsa brgyad dang// sha chen rtsa brgyad dkon mchog dpal// pad+ma rak+ta rtsa brgyad snang mtha' yas// dri chu'i rtsa brgyad don yod grub// rigs lnga phye nas snod du blugs// byang sems dkar la 'tshor ba'i hUM// zhu nas rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// oM AHhUM badzra sa twa hUM/ sarba e ho shud+d+he/ a mr-i ta su kha hrIH/ ma hA yo ga tsit+ta hUM/ oM AHhUM/ a b+h+ya dwa Shar ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dri chen 'khor lor oM gser mdog/ zhu nas rnam par snang mdzad sku// oM bi ro tsa na mo ha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ma hA yo ga A d+hi pa ta na ba len te/ a mr-i ta/ u tsit+ta a d+hi tISh+Tha oM/ sha chen tAM yig ser po las// zhu nas rin 'byung dkon mchog dpal// oM AHhUM rat+na saM b+ha ba rat+na ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ pad+ma rak+ta AM dmar las// zhu nas snang ba mtha' yas sku// oM AHhUM/ ma hA pad+ma rak+ta mu la/ a mi de ba rA ga ra ti sa ma ya hUM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hrIHsu kha ho/ dri chu ljang gu yi ge hA/ zhu nas don yod grub pa'i sku/ oM AHhUM/ a mo g+ha sid+d+hi/ badzra sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi sku// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes gyur// mi bskyod sems dpa' rdo rje'i sku// me long ye shes dag cing gsal// rin chen 'byung ldan longs spyod sku// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes yin// snang ba mtha' yas mngon byang sku// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes nyid// don yod grub pa sprul pa'i sku// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes gnas// de nyid rigs lnga zhes bya bas// sku lnga ye shes lngar dgongs pas// sku dang ye shes longs sku ru// gsal gdab dgongs pas longs sku bsgrub// 'og rlung bskyod pa bya ba yang// lus kyi rba rlabs

bsgom par bya// mgrin pa zhi dang drag po yis// ngag gi rba rlabs bsgom par bya// pad+ma can nam dngos ni rab// ye shes phyag rgya la brten 'bring// ting 'dzin sems kyi rba rlabs rlog/ dang po thabs rgyud dag par bya// shes rab rgyud kyang dag par bya// gnyis rgyud dang por dag par bya// yab yum lus ngag mnyam pa dang// 'dod pa mnyam par gyur pa yis// thabs dang shes rab snyoms zhugs pas// yab yum khams kyi dngas ma nyid// mchog gi ze ba'i gnas su byon// thig le 'od 'phros rnam par 'gyur// g.yas kyi ro ma lte bar byon// nam langs nyi ma shar ba dang// gle ba bus pa lta bur ni// yal yal sangs sangs ltar ltar btang// ro ma snying gar chos gsum ldan// ro ma chos gsum mgrin par ldan// rna ba g.yas nas 'od zer 'phros// lhag pa lha yi dkyil 'khor spro// sems can rgyud las dbang bzhi bskur// de dag lhag pa'i lhar yang byas// gnyis bsres bdud rtsi'i bcud du gyur// tshangs pa'i bu ga'i sbyor zhugs nas// spyi bo chos gsum ldan par dran// mgrin pa'i gnas su byon pa yis// nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid ldan// snying gar kha dog lnga gyur pa// rtsa dag lte ba'i lam nas byung// de ni yum gyi mkha' la gnas// g.yas pa bzung ba'i rba rlabs rengs// rnam thar mtshan ma med pa'i sgo// de bzhin g.yon du bya ba ni// 'dzin pa'i rba rlabs rengs pa nyid// rnam thar smon pa med pa'i sgo// de bzhin dbu mar sbyangs byas pa// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi rba rlabs rengs// rnam thar stong pa nyid kyi sgo// 'bras bu gsum la sbyangs pa ni// thabs rgyud dag par byed pa'o// de bzhin shes rab rgyud la yang// g.yas g.yon gnyis nas 'phro ba med// dbu mar song nas tshangs pa'i sgor// spro dang bsdu ba rab tu
