bya// rba rlabs gsum dang rnam thar gsum// thabs dang shes rab rnam pa gnyis// so sor dag par bya ba'i phyir// yab yum gnyis kyi dbu+u ma nas// lus khams bdud rtsi'i dngas ma nyid// 'od zer gtsug tor mchog tu thim// yab yum sku lnga lhun grub dran// nyams ni gang skyes nges pa med// ci skyes byung rgyal gtang bar bya// rgyu mthun pa yi 'bras bu ni// lus kyi skra dkar 'joms pa'o// rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni// lus kyi stobs kyang ster bar byed// skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yis// lce dang dpung pa rnam par 'phel// dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu ni// nyi zla tshe mnyam 'chi med 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ lam gyi bdud rtsi bsgrub pa las// de nyid rigs lnga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku gsang chen rigs gcig 'di gsungs so// snod rnams tha

dad snang ba yang// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang du 'dus// bcud rnams mang por snang 'gyur yang// chos kyi sku yi ngang du 'dus// snod bcud ma lus thig le che// mdor na sangs rgyas lha rnams ni// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'dus// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso// rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'dzin// chos lnga rab tu mdzes par brgyan// oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta badzra tsit+ta hUM hrIHtha/ gsang tshan rigs gcig zhes bya ba// chos sku thig le nyag gcig yin// dgongs pas rdo rje sems dpa' gsal gdab// nang gi dgongs pas dus rnams su// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyun du bsgom// lam la bar chad yod srid na// sbyang dang goms pa la sbyar ba'i// 'pho bas rnam pa skad cig ma// rdo rje gsang lam chen po ru// man ngag cig char lam bgrod bya// rlung sbyang gang yang rung ba yis// nyi ma dang po srog rtsol rlung// khug pa bcu bdun thun bzhir nges// de bzhin nyi ma re re la// khug pa re re spel byas la// nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du sbyangs// nyi ma tha ma srog rtsol la// khug pa sum cu rtsa bdun 'gyur// nyi ma dang po gcig phri nas// de bzhin nyi ma re re bri// zhag grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig na// de yang sngar gyi tshad bzhin 'gyur// zhag kyang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su// rlung sbyangs rgyu ba gsal ba dang// rnam par nges pa 'byung ba'o// deng nas goms par bya ba nyid// sgra dang yi ge rnam pa gnyis// lus la sogs pa gnad phab la// hig kyang nyi shu rtsa gcig grangs// nyer gcig pa yang gso bar bya// yi ge goms par bya ba yang// phyi dang nang gi yi ge nyid// bshad pa'i sgo la sogs pa ru// gsang ba sgo dgu'i gnad dgu la// rkyang pa bzhi dang sba ba bzhi// yi ge ma bu'i sbyor ba yis// ngan song mtho ris gnas sgo dgag/ nang du dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi// rim pa yi ge bsten par bsam// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i srog shing la// A li bcu drug gyen bltas dmar// kA li dkar po thur la bltas// spel ma dag tu bkod pa bsgom// g.yas g.yon rnam pa gnyis bkag ste// rtsol ba'i dus nas mas gsal gdab// srog dus yas nas gsal gdab bya// thun bzhi zhag bdun bsgom pa'o// las sbyar bde 'gro 'gro gzhan dang// gling 'gro gzhan dang phyag rgya che// bde 'gro nges par 'chi ba'i tshe// tsog pur lus kyi phyi sgo rnams// yi ge bkag la mig sogs las// gang don sgo ni stong par gzhag/ snying gar rlung zla'i steng du hUM// hig gis nyer gcig mgrin par drangs// tha mar 'dod pa'i sgo nas 'phang// sgo yi drin 'brel de nyid kyis// bde 'gro de dang de sbyar 'grub// grong gzhan rgyal po'i bu sogs pa'i// rma med ma rul na tshod dang// rjes su mthun pa'i ro rten

blang// khrus byas gu gul dud pas bdug/ lhar bskyed gnas gsum bsrung ba dang// nub kyang dang por srung 'khor mtshams// gnyis par rten de gnas dben gzhag/ dam tshig sha za mkha' 'gro sogs// tshogs kyi mchod pas mnyes par bya// nyin zhag gsum pa dag la ni// rang rlung ting 'dzin shugs btags la// nye ring tshod ni zin byas te// ci rigs par ni lus gnad phab// phyi sgo yi ge'i sbyor bas bkag/ sna yi sgo gnyis stong par gzhag/ sngar sbyangs rtsolaba'i rlung gis ni// sems rten snying ga la gnas pa'i// hUM las bye nas sna g.yas byung// rten gyi sna bug g.yon par bcug/ de yi snying gar hUM bzhag ste// srog rlung ci bder 'od du gzhug/ de ltar yang nas yang byas pas// de yis rten la rtags 'byung ste// snying ga spyi bor drod kyang 'byung// de nas lus ni thams cad khyab// mig 'byed 'dzum sgra la sogs 'byung// sems gcig dag gis rten gnyis ni// gzung ba'i dus zhes bya ba ste// de nas drag por byed pa ni// hig ni nyer gcig mgrin par drangs// rtsa gcig sna bug g.yas phyung ste// rten gyi g.yon nas zhugs nas ni// snying gar zhugs par bsam pa'o// zhi bas byed na rtsol ba nyid// sems rten mgrin pa'i bar du drangs// phul sogs tha ma sna g.yon bton// rten gyi g.yon bcug snying gar gzhag/ srog 'jug pa dang bral bar bya// nges par las la sbyar te 'grub// de nas drin lan bsab pa'i phyir// rnying pa'i rten de ngang gis sbyangs// gsar pas 'gro don spyod sogs bya// gling dang skye gnas gzhan sbyor ba'o// lus sogs gnas la thab byas nas// phyi sgo thams cad yi ges dgag/ dri chen po'i lam// dri chu'i lam du+u ser po// lte ba sngon po la// mdzod pur sngon dkar po// lce rtsar zla ba suM dkar po// sna la zla ba yuM sngaun mo// yuM dmar zla ba rna ba gnyis// mig gnyis hUM sngon re re la// spyi gtsug khyung ni kha dog dkar// dmyal ba byol song 'dod khams gzugs// gzugs khams yi dwags gnod sbyin dang// grub pa'i lha mi mi rgyal gnas// tshangs sgo 'ba' zhig stong par bzhag/ snying gar rlung dang zla stengs su// sems rten mthing nag hUM bsam la// mgrin par nyer gcig hUM gis drangs// rtsa gcig gnad gsum 'dres tshul gyis// tshangs pa'i sgo nas 'phangs byas nas// rang nyid mngon bar 'dod pa yi// bde ba can la sogs pa yi// gling dang skye gnas la sogs par// brdzus skyes dag tu 'dod pa na// ut+pal pad+ma la sogs pa'i// snying po las ni brdzus nas skyes// mngal skye 'dod na bram ze dang// rgyal po la sogs btsun mo yi// mngal de yid kyi yul de ru// 'phangs nas mda' gzhu sgyogs dang ni// 'khrul 'khor

bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ lam gyi bdud rtsi sgrub pa las gsang chen rigs gcig pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gyi bdud rtsi phye ma yongs su btag pa 'di gsungs so// shun chen steng du tshags ma gding// rak+ta'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad dbus// zla gam dmar por sman spungs nas// dbyibs kyi b+ha ga shes rab stong// thabs kyi rdo rje snying rje nyid// mthar byed brgyad kyis rnam par brtag/ sman dang rtogs pa dgra bgegs dang// mtshan ma dbyings su dag par bya// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ha na ha na hUM phaT/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hUM phaT/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor zlum po ru// rdzas rnams gtun bus gtun tu btags// dbyings kyi rin chen gzhong pa ru// rig pa ye shes tshags ma yis// lho yi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ru// mchod rdzas me mar lnga brgya sogs// mchod cing sman rnams btsag par bya// dar tshangs seng rgod nyid la bya// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta sa ma ya sid+d+hi pha la hUM hrIHtha/ nub kyi dkyil 'khor zla gam du// yab yum sbyor ba byas pa ni// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// de kho na yis sbyor ba bzhis// byang sems 'o ma sna tshogs sbrengs// mar gyi bcud dang 'dra bar gnas// oM AHhUMsarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ho sa ma ya bi shud+d+he hUM hrIHtha/ rgya mtsho la sogs 'byung ba yi// chu rnams tha dad ro gcig sbrengs// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta sa ni sid+d+hi hUM hrIHtha/ gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa// rin chen sna lnga brdar ba bya// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mri ta rat+na b+he Sha dza sid+d+hi hUM hrI:tha/ sbrang chang bur chang la sogs pa'i// chang rnams ma lus sbreng bar bya// oM badzra kro tI shwa rI shod+ha ya/ sho d+ha ya saM sho d+ha ya oM te na hUM hrIHtha/ byang gi dkyil 'khor gru gsum du// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i sha khrag la// sbyin sreg byas la me yi phud// sman gyi nang du blug par bya// oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta raM dz+wa la ag+ne sid+d+hi sa ma ya hUM hrIHtha/ oM a b+hi tsAr+ya phaT/ oM ba shaM kU ru hrIH oM puSh+tiM ku ru swA/ oM shIn+taM ku ru hA/ rang byung zhal bu kha sbyar nas// rta mgrin dpal gyis rgyas btab ste// pho brang srang la gzhal byas nas// dkyil 'khor dbus gzhug gzungs thag gdags// rigs lnga'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur nas// rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung// sman gyi lha mo spyan yang drang// drang srong rnams kyi rtog pa bsal// gu gul phyi nang gsang ba yi// dud pas bdug la spyan drang zhing// gong gis bgegs rnams bskrad par bya// oM hUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ha ya grI ba a mr-i ta kuN+Da li r-i Shi ga Na sid+d+hi de bA+e tsa

ri pha la sid+d+hi pany+tsa ku la kA ya wAka tsit+ta hUM/ mtshan ma'i rtog sbyong dgongs pa yis// mtshan ma thams cad dag par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las// lam gyi bdud rtsi bsgrub pa las/ phye ma btag btsag pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi gang bu gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa 'di dag 'gro ba'i ched du gsungs so// thig bzhi btab pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbus su zla gam gru gsum mo// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// gru bzhi sgo dang rta babs ldan// mdun du dpa' bo bdud rtsi snod// mchod pa rdzas dang bcas pa dang// chos sku de bzhin nyid las ni// longs sku 'byung ba kun tu snang// sprul sku rgyu yi ting 'dzin ni// 'byung ba lnga dag yum lnga'i klong// nam mkha'i rlung dang khrag mtsho 'khyil// keng rus ri rab me dpung 'bar// dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba'i// bde gshegs khang pa rab tu bzang// mu tig asma gar+b+ha dang// nor bu mtshan nyid theg pa gsum// rdo rje rtse gcig rtse gsum lnga// kri yog gsang sngags phyi pa gsum// pad+ma kha sbyor nyi shu bzhi// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dag dang// 'du+u sa nye ba'i 'du+u sa ste// tshan+do nye ba'i tshan+do nyid// dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod du// dbang phyug pho mo nyi shu bzhi// kha sbyar ma hA yo ga yin// byol song gtso bo chen po brgyad// 'bar ba'i gdan rnams rnam par mdzes// stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du// mthar byed khro bo'i rnam pa brgyad// sku gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// he ru ka ni dgu klong 'bar// mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor du// khro mo gnas zhal yum dang gnas// 'chi med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal 'bar che mchog he ru ka/ sku gsung thugs su byin brlab pa'i// dgongs pas byin yang dbab par bya// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsis dgang ba dang// sbyor ba brgyad kyi 'ju 'dul bya// de nas 'dzab dgongs bzlas pa'i sngags// dgu pa 'di ni 'dzab du grags// oM badzra tsit+ta sa ma ya hUM hrIH/ gsang sngags rgyal po yang gsang ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs mchog las// gsang ba 'di ni rab byung nas// mdzad pa bcu gnyis 'phro 'du bya// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrIHtha/ chos sku'i ngang las bzhugs pa ni// lhums su gshegs pa'i ngo bo'i tshul// ting nge 'dzin yang rnam gsum gyis// sku bskyed pas na bltams pa'i tshul// 'phro 'dus 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// gzhon nu rol pa mdzad pa'i tshul// g.yon gyi phyogs su yum bskyed pas// khab bzhis mnga' dbang che ba'i tshul// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// dbyer med rab byung thar pa'i tshul// thabs dang

shes rab bskyod pa ni// de ni dka' thub mdzad pa'i tshul// yab yum lhan cig dgyes par rol// sku nyams bstar ba sangs rgyas tshul// phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ldan pas// bdud bzhi bcom pas bdud btul tshul// byang sems dkar dmar 'od 'phros pas// cho 'phrul bstan pas cho 'phrul tshul// 'gro la thig pa'i chos sgrogs pas// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul// slar la 'dus nas mi dmigs pas// mya ngan las ni 'das pa'i tshul// thugs rje kun la khyab bstan pas// de ni sku gdung bgos pa'i tshul// oM AHhUM badzra tsit+ta hUM hrIHtha/ dang po ston pa'i thugs rje yis// sa steng sman babs lhums su gshegs// de nas sa steng skyes pa ni// de ni lhums nas bltams pa ste// de nas sdong bur gyur pa ni// gzhon nu rol rtsed mdzad pa'o// de nas yal ga 'phel ba ni// yum ni khab tu bzhes pa'o// sman rnams brko zhing bregs pa ni// ston pa rab tu 'byung ba'o// bskams shing snod du bsrel ba ni// chu 'gram dka' thub mdzad pa'o// khrol bu tshom bu lngar phyed pas// rigs lngar sangs ni rgyas pa'o// nus mthus nad dang bdud sde bzhi// btul bas bdud ni btul ba'o// shes rgyud 'gro ba'i nyon mongs bcom// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// dri ro sgra 'od du ba sogs// 'byung bas cho 'phrul bstan pa'o// sman rnams btags dang btsags pas na// sku ni mya ngan 'das pa'i tshul// bdud rtsi rim par bgos pa ni// sku gdung rim par bgos pa'i tshul// oM AHhUM badzra a mr-i ta hUM hrIHtha/ de la drod rtags 'byung ba ni// byang chub sems las 'od 'byung zhing// dri chen dag la dri 'ong zhing// sha chen mang du 'phel ba dang// rak+ta la ni dud pa 'thul// dri chus sgra ni sgrogs pa dang// lus khams bdud rtsi lnga 'dus pas// lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par byed// de dus dbab dang bskyil ba'o// dgongs pas mtshan mar bstan par bya'o// 'chi med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// bde chen dkyil 'khor haM la dbab// mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor du// longs spyod dkyil 'khor aM las dbab// sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// chos kyi dkyil 'khor hUM las dbab// stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor a las dbab// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta me pra be sha ya pheM pheM pheM/ srog shing gsum gyi mdud pa la// bdud rtsi rab tu bskyil bar bya// la la na dang ra sa nA// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi nang du bskyil// nyi ma zla ba rnam pa gnyis// gzung dang 'dzin pa 'khor ba'i rtsa// dbyings dang ye shes bdud rtsir bskyil// a ba d+hU tI gzung 'dzin spang// gnyis med chos sku chen por bskyil// bde chen longs spyod chos dang sprul// rang gi

gnas su bskyil bar bya// lhan cig skyes pa bde stong 'khyil// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM hrIHtha/ de nas dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyi// phyag rgya rab tu bshad par bya// phyag rgya'i ngo bo lha yi sku// phyag rgya dag dang bcas pa'o// nges tshig rgyas ni 'debs par byed// gdab par bya ba rnal 'byor lus// 'debs par byed pa lha skur btab// bar chad las ni bsrung ba'o// dbye ba rnam pa'i dpe bshad pa// ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba yi// rgyal po'i phyag gi rgyas btab pas// lam gyi 'jigs pa ma lus rnams// nges par bsrung zhing sel 'gyur ltar// de bzhin tha mal lus nyid la// lha yi rgyas btab gyur pa gang// 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa dag las grol// dbye ba rnam pa bzhir gnas pa// phyag rgya chen po lha yi sku// dam tshig phyag rgya yum dang 'khril// las kyi mkha' gsang 'phro 'du byed// chos kyi sprul pa 'khor ba 'dren// phyag rgya zhes ni rgyal bas gsungs// hUM mdzad rdo rje tri shU la// rnam rgyal 'khor lo kha T+wAM ga/ dbyug sngon me dbal dbyug pa bsnams// gshin rje thod dbyug dgra s+t+wa dang// mi g.yo ral gri zhags pa la// rta mgrin dbyug to sbrul zhags bsnams// gzhan gyis mi thub lcags kyu zhags pa dang// bdud rtsi rgya gram dril bu la// khams gsum 'khor lo ne'u le bsnams// stobs chen thod pa zhags pa ste// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor dag la bris// bde gshegs khrag 'thung phyag rgya ni// 'khor lo dgra s+t+wa zhags pa g.yas// b+han+d+ha rnge'u chung kha T+wAM g.yon// rdo rje khrag 'thung chen po ni// rdo rje zhing dbyug kha T+wAM g.yas// b+han+d+ha zhing chen rgyu zhags g.yon// rin chen khrag 'thung chen po ni// rin chen gshol dang gtun shing g.yas// b+han+d+ha dgra sta rnge'u chung g.yon// pad+ma khrag 'thung chen po ni// pad+ma rnge'u chung ral gri g.yas// b+han+d+ha kha T+wAM thod phreng g.yon// las kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni// ral gri zhags pa rnge'u chung g.yas// b+han+d+ha rnge'u chung dril bu g.yon// khro bo rak+sha he ru ka/ dang po gri gug thod pa dang// bar ma rdo rje dril bu ste// tha ma kha TAM rnge'u chung g.yon// khro rgyal dam tshig he ru ka/ dang po gri gug thod pa la// bar ma rin chen dril bu ste// tha ma be con cang te'u bsnams// khro mchog yak+sha he ru ka/ dang po gri gug thod pa la// bar ma pad+ma dril bu ste// tha ma dgra s+t+wa Da ma ru// khro chen rak+sha he ru ka/ dang po gri gug thod pa la// bar pa rgya gram dril bu nyid// tha ma ral gri rnge'u chung bsnams// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gnas su bri// dkyil 'khor rdul tshon chen po la// lha yi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas// byin brlabs bar chad dag las grol// dus bzhi dus drug nyu le ma// bzlog cing bsrung bar byed pa'o// blta ba'i don gyis bsrung ba ni// khro bo

dpal ldan he ru ka/ 'bar ba'i gar dgu rab tu khro// sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung// rgod dang gshe dang rngam pa dang// snying rje ngo mtshar zhi ba nyid// dbang phyug chen po 'dod chags sgeg/ lha min ba su ka ra dpal// khyab 'jug 'jigs pa'i gzugs su+u sprul// sku yi gar gyi 'dul bar byed// gzhon nu smin drug rta gad dgod// tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan la gshe/ sgra gcan nyi zla mid pas rngam// gsung gi gar gyis 'dul bar byed// brgya byin snying rje'i sems kyi skyong// klu chen 'dre ldog ngo mtshar che// me lhas bsregs nas 'jig rten zhi// de dag thugs kyi gar gyis 'dul// nyams ni sems la shar bas thugs// sngags ni ngag du shar bas gsung// gar ni lus la 'chang bas sku// mthong snang yul la shar bas khro// bag chags rmi lam rnal 'byor ston// bcud ni rtogs pa bdag gi dpal// snod ni thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal// sbyor ba bdag la rtog pa dang// sgrol bas gzhan la thugs rjes skyong ba dang// zhi gnas bdag tu rtog pa zhi// lhag mthong gzhan rig rnam par rtogs// chos sku rig pa nang na gsal// gzugs sku thugs rje phyi la 'char// snang stong yul la dgyes pa ho// bde stong lus la chags pas ru// rig stong sems kyi mdzad pas ka/ chos sku yul la dgyes pas he// longs spyod rdzogs skur chags pas ru// sprul skus mdzad pa mthar phyin ka/ 'di ltar snang srid 'khor 'das rnams// dpal ldan he ru ka ru gnas// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ lam gyi bdud rtsi gong bu bsgrub pa ste le'u bdunapa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu'i bdud rtsi 'di dag 'gro ba'i ched du gsungs so// de nas dngos grub dkyil 'khor mchog/ zla gam sgo nishar du bstan// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// skya rengs 'char ba'i bar du bsgrub// dngos grub rdzas rnams rab tu bsog/ tshe dang gal dang zla rgyas dang// zla phrum 'jam des kun du rgyug/ bran mo g.yo can skyur po bsog/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa khro bo che// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ma ljang// rgya gram bsil byed ral gri g.yas/ 'di tho ba yin min dpyad dgos/ thod khrag tho ba kha T+wAM g.yon// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li a hUM su kha d+ha kA ya sid+d+hi pha la a la la ho/ thun mong grub chen brgyad dang ni// sna tshogs las rnams grub pa dang// mchog gi rig pa 'dzin pa dang// sku gsung dngos grub rgya chen blang// de nas dbang gi dkyil 'khor mchog/ dbang stegs zla gam sgo dang bcas// rta mgrin g.yas dkar g.yon sngo ba// rta mgo ljang zhur le brgan rngog/ kha T+wAM lcags kyu ral gri g.yas// thod pa mdung dang zhags pa g.yon// mi pham ma dang ral

pa gcig/ khro gnyer ma dang ro langs ma// thams cad dbang du 'dus nas ni// slob ma snod dang ldan rnams la// bdud rtsi mchog dbang rab tu sbyor// bum pa cod pan rdo rje dril// ming dang rig pa'i dbang lnga po// dam pa rigs brgya'i dbang du bsgyur// nyan dang 'chad dang bsgom pa dang// phrin las rdo rje slob dpon dbang// de nyid rigs lnga'i dbang du bskur// gsang dbang bde ba chen po dang// shes rab ye shes gsang dbang gsum// dngos grub len pa'i dbang du+u bskur// khro bcu khrag 'thung klong dgu ni// bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i dbang du bskur// bdud rtsi bum pa'i dbang chen ni// bdud rtsi mchog gi dbang du bskur// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ a b+hi Shi ka te sa ma ya shrI he ru ka/ zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ dngos grub bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung ba dang/ dbang rta mgrin gyi dbang du bya ba ste 'bras bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i gzhi lam 'bras bu'i don bsdus pa 'di gsungs so// de nas rten 'brel sgrig pa'i gzhi// rdo rje lus kyi mtshan nyid la// lus khams bdud rtsi lngar gnas pa// sku ni dam pa rigs brgya la// gsung ni de nyid rigs lnga ste// thugs ni gsang chen rigs gcig gnas// de ltar shes pas btag btsag gnyis// dbyer med gong bu gcig par gnas// rten 'brel thog mtha' bar bsten pa// thog ma kun gzhi rgyud gnas pa// lus ni thabs kyi rgyu nyid la// mtshan ldan mo la sbyor ba ni// byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi nyid// zhing bcu gnas nas sgrol ba ni// bsgral ba'i bdud rtsi chen po lnga// tha ma gnas 'gyur 'bras bu ste// sku bzhir mngon par sangs rgyas 'grub// rten 'brel nyid ni gang yin na// tshogs dang sbyor lam zhes bya ba// 'khor lo 'cham pa 'jig rten lam// bsgom dang mthong ba mthar phyin pa// 'khor lo bskor ba 'das pa'i lam// lam lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// lam bzhi las ni gang yin na// nyan thos mos pa chung ba dang// rang rgyal dmigs pa phra ba dang// byang chub sems dpa' dag dang ni// 'di ni byang chub chen po ste// thabs kyi gsang sngags khyad par 'phags// tshad ma bzhi ni gang yin pa// dang po'i lo rgyus tshad mar bshad// rten 'brel dpe mtshon mngon bya'i don// phyi nang bdud rtsi chen po bsgrub// rten cing 'brel ba du zhig gis// lam ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// rten 'brel bdun gyi gsang sngags kyi// rgyu lam 'bras bu rdzogs par byed// kun bzang rdo rje sems sogs pa'i// zhal nas byin gyis brlabs nas ni// dgongs pas 'khor du gang gsungs pa// bde gshegs

bka' yi tshad ma yin// rgyal ba'i rig 'dzin gang zag rnams// gang nas gang du rgyun gyur cing// gsang ba thugs la gnas pa ni// bla ma'i man ngag tshad ma yin// dbang po tha ma 'bring dang mchog/ thos bsam bsgom par rab sbyar nas// rang gi nyams su gang myong ba// rtogs pa rang rig tshad ma yin// phyi nang dngos po ma lus kun// sngon 'byung rjes 'jug la sogs pa'i// gtan tshigs byung khungs bcas pa rnams// dngos po lo rgyus tshad ma yin// drang srong chen po tshangs pa dang// ljang sngon dang ni tsa ra ka/ nab so skyes dang tha skar bu// lha skyabs dang ni rgyun shes dang// g.yon phyogs lha dang thang la gnas// me bzhi 'jug dang rkang gnyis spyod// ka ya na dang shing khyed dang// ljang sngon bu dang nyi ma dang// zla ba dang ni drang srong klu// gzhon nu sprin dang gzhon nu srid// 'dro bskyong dang ni rin po che// go'u ta ma dang mngon shes can// shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang ma// sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun// rtsi yi grub pa'i blo gros ma// nags kyi lha mo rma bya'i mgrin// 'di dag rnams la kun bzang gis// rten 'brel sman gyi sgrub pa bshad// a ru ra ni rnam pa bdun// rnam par rgyal dang gsum gyis bsgribs// gso byed dang ni bdud rtsi dang// 'jig byed dang ni 'phel byed dang// skem byed dang ni bdun yin no// rnam par rgyal ba'i a ru ra// maN+Dal steng du bzhag nas ni// bdud rtsi lnga dang rab sbyar nas// rdo rje sems dpar rab bsgoms te// gsang sngags bzlas par gyur pa na// tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin 'grub// oM badzra ak+Sho b+h+ya a mr-i ta badzra A yu+u She hUM a/ a ru ra ni gsum gyis bsgribs// bu ram sbyar ba'i ri lu la// rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms nas ni// nas re gnyis gnyis rtag zos na// mi de nad kun med par 'gyur// gsang ba'i sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya// oM bai ro tsa na a na ha ri tA kI dzi na dzika/ ro ga pra sha ma na swA hA/ a ru ra ni gso byed yang// ser skya ba yi mar dang sbyar// zos na tshe ring nad med 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ldan rab bsgoms nas// gsang ba'i sngags kyi rab tu gdags// oM rat+na sam+b+ha ba a na ha ri tA kI rat+na d+h+r-ika/ ro ga pra shA ma na swA hA/ a ru ra ni bdud rtsi yang// bu ram sbrang rtsi gsum po dang// cha mnyam zos na bcud len 'byung// snang ba mtha' yas rab bsgoms nas// zos na yid gzhungs drod skyed cing// stobs kyang ldan zhing rgas kyang sra// lus kyang dag pa nyid du 'gyur// oM a mr-i ta d+he ba e na ha ri tA kI a ro lika/ A yur+dz+nyA na tshe b+h+rUM/ a ru ra ni 'jigs byed ni// rlung nad la ni rgyam tshar sbyar// mkhris pa la ni pi pi ling// bad kan la ni sbrang rtsir sbyar// ma zhu ba la lga dang sbyar// rlung skran

rgyam tshwa mar dang sbyar// bad kan ma zhu lga dang tsha// skrangs pa'i nad la ba gcin sbyar// mdze nad sha kra can la ni// tsi tra ka dang dar bar sbyar// nad rnams kun la mar du btso// sangs rgyas don yod grub pa bsgom// oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a na ha ri tA kA pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ ro ga pra shA ma na swA hA/ a ru ra ni 'phel byed ni// rgu drus dom mkhris sbyar nas ni// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po bsgom/ oM badzra tsit+ta khrag nyag ram swA hA/ rma la btab na phan 'gyur te// sha khrag mi zad bar yang byed// rma rnams 'brub par byed pas na// mchog tu mtshon dpal 'joms pa'o// a ru ra ni skem byed kyang// gu gu'i shing kun ga pur dang// gla rtsi ba bla ldong ros dang// mu zi shu dag sgog par sbyar// bu chung lus la btags gyur na// gdon rnams bsrung zhing nad rnams gso// kun tu bzang mor rab tu bsgom// ma dang bu la bsrung ba gdags// oM badzra b+ha dra sa man+ta pu+u tra rak+Sha ga s+ya ya swA hA/ star bu'i cho ga bstan pa ni// grang dro snyoms pa'i dus bzang nas// dang po zho ni phyed dang gnyis// de nas nyi ma re re zhing// zho ni phyed dang gnyis gnyis skye// srang ni phyed dang gnyis 'thung na// zla ba gcig tu 'o ma dang// sbyar 'thungs zas gzhan ma bzos na// tshe dang stobs brtan gzugs bzang ste// mdangs dang lang tsho bcud len 'gyur// dbyings phyug ma ni bsgom par bya// oM d+hA trI shwa rI A yuHpha la b+h+rUM/ bdud rtsi dam pa nye shing pa// shun gsal nang gi snying po phyung// brdungs nas gtsang ma'i ras la btsag/ sbrang rtsi 'o ma sbyar ba ni// zhag re srang re bskyed byas nas// zhag brgyad 'thung ngam zla gcig bza'// de 'og ba 'or 'bras btsos bza'// nad kyi 'chi med bcud len yin// sangs rgyas spyan ni bsgom par bya// oM bud+d+ha lo tsa na A yu She hUM A/ dbang po lag pa zhes bya ba// mar dang 'o ma bu ram sbyar// sna ma tshig par me la bskol// mA ma kI ni bsgoms la bza'// oM mo ha ra ti A yu+u She hUM a// tshe ring bsam pa 'phel ba dang// lus yang sha yang mkhregs par 'gyur// brag zhun 'grungs pa'i khu ba'i nang// gur gum bu ram sbrang rtsi dang// a ba sbyar nas lcags kyi snod// sna ma tshig par mes bskol nas// ril bu gos dkar bsgoms la bza'// nad med tshe dang lang tsho ldan// oM rA ga ra ti A yu She hUM a// cong zi dang ni bu ram dang// sbrang rtsi ka ra 'o ma dag/ mar dag sbyar nas lcags kyi snod// sna ma tshig par legs bskol nas// zla ba gcig tu bza' ba mang// dam tshig sgrol mar bsgoms la bza'// nad med tshe ring bcud len 'gyur// oM badzra ra ti badzra A yu She hUM a// sman ni gnod sel zhes bya ba// tsan+dan dkar po pa ti ba// a ru ra dang gur gum dang// puN+Da rI ka

spang spos dang// chu srin sder mo shing tsha rnams// sna re cha ni bzhi bzhi dang// ru rta ut+pal sug sme gsum// sna re cha yang lnga lnga dang// ba le ka ni brgyad brgyad kyang// skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par la// char pa'i chus sprus sngags btab sbyar// dpral ba dag la bskus pa na// lha klu gnod sbyin srin po dang// lha min 'byung po zhi bar byed// dug nad can la chu dang sbyar// khong du 'thung na dug kun sel// mtshon gyis rmas pa'i rma byung na// rma khar bskus pas 'tsho bar byed// sdom dang sdig pa byi ba dang// dug sprul gcan gzan gdug pa can// gang dag zin pa'i mi de yis// thigs pa gsum ni sna ru blug/ mig bskus 'thung dang rma khar blug/ bdug pas zin pa'i dug las thar// rtag tu lag tu bcangs pa na// gdon rnams thams cad thub pa dang// don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de yi rig sngags 'di dag la'ang// sems dpa' bcu drug gang mos sam// sems ma bcu drug gang mos la// skyes pas sems dpar sgom dang gus// bud med yin na sems mar bsgom// mchod dang bstod dang mtshan thos bya// yang na yon tan dran byas la// sngags 'dis sman la gdab par bya// oM tad+ya thA ke she ke she bi mA ge pra la ma ba ma/ hi li hi li/ na mo bud+d+hA ya sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pA' da swA hA/ zhes ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ rten 'brel tshad ma gtan la phab pa'i sman bdud rtsi ra sA ya na las sman thun mong bcud len dang rig 'dzin sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas 'khor du 'dus pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bstod do// mi dmigs spros bral mnyam pa'i chos nyid las// thugs rje'i mdzad pa sems can don mdzad pa// shes rab stong nyid thabs kyi snying rje chen po las// snod kyi 'jig rten sman rnams bsgrub pa bcud len gyis// thun mong rig 'dzin lus kyi nad rnams 'joms// lus khams bdud rtsi bcud 'thung phung po'i nang/ sangs rgyas rang zhal mthong byed dkyil 'khor lus// 'khor 'das don ston sku la rab tu bstod// ces mgrin gcig tu rab tu bstod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gtad do// bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi chos// dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i sems// lus ngag yid kyi dri ma dag/ ma mo mkha' 'gro mchod pa yis// mthu dang rtsal gyi dngos grub thob// byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa yis// nad med tshe yi rig 'dzin thob// phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor mchod pa yis// dam tshig nyams skong dngos grub 'byung// snod bcud bdud rtsi gtan la 'bebs// ma 'ongs bsgrub pa'i man ngag

du// khyed rnams tshogs kyis zung la spel// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las// rgyud yongs su gtad cing bstan pa mi nub par bstan pa ste le'u bcu pa'o//// bdud rtsi bde ba cheb po'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta bi ma la mi tra dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba gnyags dz+nyA nas bsgyur ba'o//// #// rgya gar skad du/ sarba a mr-i ta pany+tsa b+ha ba dzA ti dza na ni pha la rat+na pra b+ho ta ma dz+wa la tan+d+ra/ bod skad du/ thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin du 'khrungs shing skye bar byed pa'i 'bras bu rin po che 'od ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs bdud rtsi blang dor med pa'i mdzad spyod de nyid dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad thams cad bdud rtsi sman du shes pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nu/ rigs dang ye shes kun gyi bdag po/ phyi dang nang dang mthar thug kun gyis kyang// bdud rtsi sman gyi rang bzhin dngos mdzad pa/ gdul bya gdug pa can dug lda dang nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis gzir ba rnams la sman gyi mchog tu bzhugs pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pa phyogs dang ris med pa/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i pho brang chen po'i gzhal yas khang na/ zhi ba'i lha tshogs bdud rtsi mchog nyid bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid yum bdud rtsi 'bebs ma/ rigs lnga ni bdud rtsi skyil ba/ khro bo bcu ni bdud rtsi srung ba/ lha dang klu dang tshangs pa rnams ni bdud rtsi 'thung ba'i 'khor grangs med pa bsam gyi mi khyab brjod kyi mi lang ba zhing gi rdul tsam gyis bskor ste bzhugs so// de lta bu'i 'khor gyi nang nas dpal phyag na rdo rje rang gi stan las langs nas zhu ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par bzhugs so// bdud rtsi rin po che ji ltar 'khrungs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba las gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang rdo rje khros pa des sa la gnas pa dang/ sa la spyod pa dang/ lam rim par bsgrub pa dang/ tshangs pa dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gza' dang skar ma dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha dang lha ma srin sde brgyad dang/ nam gru dang/ ro langs dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ mi dang dud 'gro dang/ dmyal ba dang/ yi dwags dang/ 'byung ba lnga dang/ rtsi shing dang/ nags tshal thams cad rdzu 'phrul spyan gyis gzigs nas/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du mkhyen to// de nas phyag na rdo rje rang gi stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor zhing brkyang phyag 'tshal nas bskor ba mdzad de/ rdo rje khros pa la zhus pa/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la// dug ces 'byung ba ci yi phyir// skye shi 'byung ba ci yi rgyu// 'di dag gso na ji ltar

lags// gdul ba'i thabs ni ji ltar bgyi// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje khros pas bka' stsal pa/ thams cad ye nas bdud rtsi la// dug ces bya ba ga la yod// rang gi sbyor ba log mod kyi// ha la nag po rma bya'i gsos// chu dang mar sbyar snying rlung sman// dug tu 'dzin pa sbyor ba'i skyon// grang ba can la ga pur rnams// sbyor ba log na 'chi bar nus// chu yis gsos na sman mar dug/ de bzhin bdud rtsi thams cad dang// sbyor ba log na kun kyang dug/ mkhas pas sman du shes gyur na// 'jig rten gsum du grag pa la// dug ces bya ba'i ming yang med// thams cad sman du gyur pa la// mkhas pas sbyor ba rig par bya// skye rga na 'chi'i chu bo la// 'khor ba'i sa bon rtsub mo rnams// sdug bsngal lam gyi rgyun du chags// rtsa ba bdud bzhi ma chod na// skye 'chi 'di las thar dus med// de dag gso ba rnam bzhi ste// skye ba gso na bsod nams tshogs// skye ba rnam bzhi kun dka' yin// na ba gso ba sman gyis gso// de la bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi yin// rgas pa gso na zas kyis gso// yang na rlung rnams zad pa yin// 'chi ba gso na bdud rtsi bsgrub// tshe yi rig 'dzin thob pa yin// gdul ba'i thabs ni sku gsung thugs// cho 'phrul zad mi shes pas 'dul// zhes bka' stsal pas/ yang phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu log pa'i sems can rnams// sman zhes bya ba'i ming med pas// bdud rtsi rnams kyang sgrib pas bsgribs// lus kyang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis nyen// ngag kyang de yi rjes su 'brel// 'du ba'i dbang po de yis su// sems kyi skye shi thag ma chod// shin tu rmugs pa'i sems can la// gdul thabs sprul pa mdzad par rigs// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje khros pas dka' stsal pa/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sprul pa mdzad pa/ sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la// sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// brgyad pa'i sa la rigs gsum mgon// tshangs rig rnams la lha chen gzugs// lha rnams kun la brgya byin te// lha min rnams la thags bzang ris// gza' skar rnams la khyab 'jug gzugs// klu rnams kun la 'jog po ste// dmyal ba rnams la gshed po ste// sgrib pa rnams la kha 'bar ma// dud 'gro rnams la seng ge'i tshul// mi rnams kun gyi 'jig rten du// shAkya thub pa'i tshul bstan nas// la la khyim pa lta bu'i tshul// la lar khab nas rab tu 'byung// la lar dka' thub dka' ba spyod// la lar byang chub shing dbang drung// la lar bdud bzhi 'dul bar ston// la lar mya ngan 'das tshul ston// la lar sku gdung ring bsrel ston// la lar chos kyi glegs bam ston// zhes thams cad

bdud rtsi sman gyi rang bzhin du btul lo// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba las/ gleng slong ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ rdo rje khros pa la zhus pa/ de tshe 'gro drug sems can rnams// bdud rtsi'i don gyi thul lags te// 'jig rten bkod pa'i sa shed na// rU tra nag po ma thul ba// thugs rje'i bdag pos gdul bar rigs// thugs rje'i bdag po bde gshegs te// rtsa ba sdong po yal ga shun lpags dang// ngar ba lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas// sems can rnams kyi gsos su byin brlabs pas// khyed kyi bsten pa 'di la gzud// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad dang bral// skye 'chi bya ba'i ming yang med// ces bka' stsal pas/ rU tra nag po des se gol lan gcig brdabs nas/ khams gsum srid gsum nga yi yul// 'gro drug sems can nga yi zas// rtsi shing nags tshal nga yi gsos// sa phyogs 'dir ni khyod ci gtogs// zer nas kho ma nyan no// bdud rtsi rin po che ji ltar 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba las ma dad pa gdul ba'i le'u+u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas zhus pa// log pa'i rU tra chen po de// rgyu dang rkyen ni ci las byung// rigs dang sde ni gang du gtogs// 'bras bu smin pa ci zhig lags// btul na yon tan ji tsam thob// ma btul ba yi skyon ni ci// bka' stsal pa/ rgyu ni gzung 'dzin smon lam rgyu// rkyen ni chags sdang spyod la zhen// rigs ni 'khor ba'i rigs can te// sde ni 'byung po gdol par gtogs// sems la dug gsum rgyun bcangs nas// 'khor ba'i lo 'dab rgyas pa yis// sems can sman du ma shes par// 'jig rten khams kun dug tu spyad// 'bras bu rU tra chen por smin// btul ba'i yon tan dpag las 'das// dug gsum rtsad gcod 'khor dong sprugs// 'khor ba chos nyid chen por 'gyur// sems dang rdo rje sems dpar gnas// khog pa dur khrod brgyad du gyur// phung po bdud rtsi sman du 'khrungs// dug ces bya ba'i ming yang med// srid pa gsum gyi 'jig rten yang// rA' sa ya na sman du 'gyur// thams cad bdud rtsi byang chub sems// ma gtul ba yi skyon bstan pa// lha dang mi yi srid brlag nas// kha lo log par bsgyur nas ni// lus la 'khor ba'i gter chags pas// sman zhes bya ba ming yang med// 'jig rten gsum yang dug tu spyod// de bas mngon par 'du mdzad nas// thugs rje chen pos gzigs par rigs// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba las 'bras bu gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bka' bgros pa ni/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' bgros

pa// rang sems bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la// dug ces bya ba'i ming med de// shin tu 'khrul pa'i dug tu bzung// de bas mngon par 'du mdzad rigs// zhes bgros so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis bgros pa/ phung po ye nas bdud rtsi la// dug tu gzung bas skye shi byung// de bas mngon par 'du mdzad rigs// zhes bgros so// rin chen rigs kyis bgros pa/ 'du shes bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la// sbyor ba 'khrugs pas dug tu 'gyur// de la mngon par 'du mdzad rigs// zhes bgros so// pad+ma rigs kyis bgros pa/ 'du shes bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la// 'dzin pa log pas dug tu 'khrul// de la mngon par 'du mdzad rigs// zhes bgros so// las kyis rigs kyis bgros pa// 'jig rten gsum gyi rU tra 'di// las kyis 'jig rten khams 'dir byung// drag po rang dag 'thub tshod kyis// srid pa gsum gyi bdag por smin// 'jig rten khams kun 'jig par byed// tshangs pa lha dang klu dang mi// gnod sbyin gza' dang rgyu skar dang// sman gyi drang srong yin mod kyang// kho yi 'khor du bsdus nas ni// srid pa 'jig rten snang srid kun// dug tu spyod pa'i rU trar gyur// lha mo klu mo mkha' 'gro ma// rtsi dang nags tshal sman rnams kyi// ye nas lha mo yin pa la// slas dang byi mo bran mor bsdus// nad dang rims kyi rkyal pa bskur// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi shin tu 'khrugs// nad kyi bdag mor mnga' yang bskur// gtsang rigs mgon po bdun cu dang// bai shra ba dang dzaM b+ha la// bdud dang gshin rje mu stegs dang// rgyal po btsan dang 'byung po'i tshogs// kha rlangs bsam sbyor dug tu bsgyur// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad kyis 'gengs// thams cad bdud rtsi sman chen la// drang srong tsam du bzhag pa yi// gdug pa'i rU tra drag pos sgrol// zhes bgros so// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba las bde bar gshegs pa bka' bgros pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de ltar bgros nas bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu bsdus nas/ rU tra chen po de'i tshul dang bstun pa'i phyir na/ de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad spros pa dang bral bas mtha' dang dbus med par khyab po// kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyon mongs pa dug gsum dang dug lnga dang/ bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nyen pa rnams la/ thugs rje nam mkha' lta bu gcig gis khyab par mdzad do// thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin dug lnga 'joms pa'i rang bzhin yi ge hUM du gnas so// de lta bu'i yi ge las 'od 'phros te// e zhes pa'i sgra las nam mkha'i rang bzhin go 'byed pa'i bdud rtsir shar ro// yaM zhes pa las bsgul bskyod thogs med rlung gi bdud rtsir shar ro// raM zhes

pa las sreg par byed pa me'i bdud rtsir shar ro// 'ju+u ba dang smin par byed pa'i rkyen byas so// khaM zhes pa las chu'i bdud rtsi chen po rlan cing gsher ba gcig tu gyur to// kun mkha' bskyed cing sgeg pa'i las byed do// su zhes pas thams cad pa'i bdud rtsir gyur te/ thams cad bskyed pa dang skye ba'i gzhi byed do// laM zhes pas spyir sdud pa'i bdud rtsi shar ro// de ltar 'byung ba lnga shar ba'i bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyis shar ba de nam mkha'i bdud rtsis go 'byed/ sa yis gzhi stsal/ byang chub sems kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi sa bon btab/ chu yis rlan stsal/ me yis drod stsal/ rlung gis bskyod par byas/ de bzhin du rtsa ba brgyad lo ma dang bcas par smin no// rten 'brel bcu gnyis la brten te 'jig rten gyi/ khams thams cad bdud rtsi chen po'i gzhal yas las dug gi snang ba ming yang med par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de'i dus na bdud rtsi blang dor med pa la dgongs nas khros pas cho 'phrul mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khro bo 'chol pas mer gyis bkang ngo// tsham rngams drag pos 'dir zhing brdzi ba'i tshul mdzad/ khro mo bcus bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i phrin las mdzad/ khro bo bcus ni ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bsrungs/ rigs kyi yum lngas ni/ ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bskyil/ rigs kyi sras lngas bdud rtsi 'bebs so// mche gshog nyi shus bdud rtsi 'gugs/ dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa ni bdud rtsi'i ngo bor bzhugs/ dbu la bud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi ni dug bzhi bcu rtsa bzhir bsgyur zhing bdud rtsi'i mchog tu bzhugs so// shin tu brjid che zhing che mchog dbu dgu ru brtsegs te thams cad bdud rtsi'i ngang du shar ro// bdud rtsi'i ngang du shar bas rU tra des lan ldon pa dang spobs pa'i glags ma rnyed do// rus sbal rgyar zhugs pa bzhin gnas so// thugs rje chen po'i lcags kyus gzung ste/ ra tri rU tra ra ka sha'i sgra bsgrags pas rU tra nag po de na re ye shes khyod kyis gzung ba la nyam thag pa ma yin te nga'i gnas 'khor gzi brjid la ltos dang zhes zer ro// der dpal chen pos kho'i 'khor la gzigs pas gnas 'khor de'i phyi rol na ma dang chung ma bu mo bran mo'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzigs nas dbang du bsdus te sbyor ba mdzad nas/ thams cad dbang du bsdus nas thams cad bdud rtsi sman gyi lha mor bzhag go/ gdug pa can gyi chags stag dang dom dang mgo can gyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dbang du bsdus te bsgral la khad pa tsam du mdzad do// gzhal yas khang gi gnas 'khor phyi rol na/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin go ro tsa na dang keM rus bsam gyi mi khyab pa rnams/ gsang ba byang chub sems las bdud rtsir sprul te/ zhal du rol lo// mi

gtsang ba'i 'dam rdzabs sna tshogs yod pa de dag ni/ dri chen las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul te zhal du rol lo// gnas 'khor de na rnag dang chu ser gyi zham chu bsam gyi mi khyab pa gcig gnas pa de rnams dri chu las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul te rol lo// gnas 'khor de na rak+ta'i rgya mtsho 'khyil pa rnams pad+ma rak+ta las bdud rtsir zhal du rol lo// der rU tra gzi brjid nyams so// nyams pa de la gdab pa'i sngags drug gi 'khor lo drug rdzogs par bskor nas/ mig gnyis bar snang la khams su bskyur bas/ nyi zla gsal ba thob bo// kho'i longs spyod kyi rgyan du dur khrod chas brgyad la sogs pa phyogs der gnas/ de yang ye shes kyi phur pas btab nas bsgral lo// ga go thad thed ni zhal du gsol/ bde ba'i lto ru ming de gnas so// yan lag dang ba spu kha cig ni ye shes kyi me dpung gis bsregs nas sku dang gsung du gnas so// lus kyi yan lag rnams bshigs te 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gtor ro// lam phyin ci ma log par gnas so// snying brgya rtsa brgyad tshangs pa'i gnas su brgyud pas tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan par gyur to// glo ba lha'i yul du bskyur bas lha longs spyod dang blo tshad du ldan no// lce gnod spyin yul du bskyur bas gnod spyin mthu stobs che bar gyur to// mig gnyis bar snang khams su bskyur bas nyi zla gnyis kyi gsal ba thob bo// rkang pa 'byung po'i yul du bskyur bas 'byung po khyab che'o// mgo srin po'i yul du bskyur bas/ srin po gdon che zhing sha za ba'i las byed do// lag pa g.yas pa shar lho'i gling du bskyur bas bzo mkhas shing sgyu ma'i gling du gnas so// lag pa g.yon pa bdud kyi gling du bskyur bas/ bdud stobs dang ldan no// pho mtshan sgra mi snyan du bskyur bas/ tshe lo stong las mi 'gyur ro// snying 'dzam bu gling gi yul ma ga d+har bskyur bas/ sprul sku'i zhabs kyis bcag pa dang/ slad nas byon pa'i snying stobs che/ lte ba klu yi yul du bskyur bas/ srid pa'i ma tha tsam byed pa'i gtan tshigs byung/ slad ma lus kyi bye brag rnams// 'jig rten khams kun khyab pa ru// thams cad bdud rtsi sman du sprul// phyag gis drangs nas btsir nas ni// rU tra chen po snam du bton// shin tu rU tra 'gyod pa skyes// ngu zhing 'gyod pas bshags par byas// bdud rtsi chen po'i don gnyis byas// lhag ma'i lus kyang gdan du phul// sems ni rdo rje sems dpar brtags// 'jig rten khams 'di khyab pa ru// bdag gi rnam shes sman du shog/ ces dmod bor bas lus bshig tshad sman du gyur nas/ dpyid rtsa ba'i sman/ dbyar sdong po'i sman/ ston me tog dang 'bras bu snying po'i sman dgun shun lpags dang thang chu nyil ba'i sman/ rang rang gi rtsa ba

brgyad la yon tan stong dang ldan zhing 'jig rten khams su sa las gnas so// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba las/ rU tra bsgral nas lus 'jig rten du gyur pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas rang gi stan langs nas rdo rje khros pa la/ e ma ho rdo rje khros pa'i gtso// sangs rgyas yab gyur dam pa'i bdag/ bdud rtsi nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// dbu la sangs rgyas bzhi bcus brgyan// bdud rtsi mchog la phyag 'tshal bstod// che mchog dbu ru brtsegs nas bzhugs// bdud rtsi 'bebs la phyag 'tshal bstod// gdug pa slad kyis tshar bcad nas// 'jig rten khams kun bdud rtsir 'khrungs// sman pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal bstod// thams cad sman du bsgyur ba de// bdag cag 'khor bcas ngo mtshar che// thugs rje chos kyi char sprin gyis// steng dang 'og med 'jig rten gsum// ri rab rtse dang ri sul dang// thams cad khyab pa'i thugs rje yis// bdud rtsi'i char chen dbab tu gsol// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos bdud rtsi'i drod nam mkha'i rlan bzhin du g.yos// bdud rtsi sbed par byed pa'i sprin mgo ni phyogs ris med par gtibs// bdud rtsi'i skye gnas sa dang gangs dang ri brag klung shong dang// brag sul nam mkha' chu dang ri khyud dang// rtsi thog rang bzhin drod ni g.yo mdzad pa// rang bzhin 'brug dang glog sgra yang// bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs pa'i rkyen// thugs rje chos kyi char sprin gyis// phyogs ris med par khyab par babs// me yis bdud rtsi drod phab nas// smin pa 'byung ba 'di lta ste// rtsa ba sdong po yal ga rnams// rU tra'i lus las skyes par mdzad// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba las/ rU tra'i lus bshigs nas bdud rtsi sa bon du btab pa la thugs rje'i char sprin phab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje gzhon nu yi// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// srog pa rtsa yi khrag yar bas// rgya mtsho klu yi yul du yar// rtsa ba dmyal ba'i yul du zug/ sdug bsngal sel ba'i sman brgyad byung// tsha ba brgyad dang grang ba brgyad// chos kyi rgyal po'i lag na spyod// sdong po klu yi yul du zug/ bdud rtsi shu dag dkar po byung// rtsa rgyus kun la phan pa'i sman// shin tu skrangs pa'i lums la 'jibs// bcangs na klu yi kha rlangs 'jil// klu yi drang srong bcu pos spyod// ngar ba bar snang khams na 'phyo// bdud rtsi chen po thang kar babs// skar ma'i drang srong bcu gnyis spyod// yan lag lha min yul du skyes// stobs dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi babs// gza' yi drang srong brgyad rnams spyod// 'dab ma gzhong thogs lha la sgrib// zas dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi 'khrungs// 'bras

bu sum cu rtsa gsum kyi// lha yi yul kun khyab par 'khrungs// de yi snying por gyur pa ni// 'bras bu sman mchog a ru ra// lha yi dbang po brgya byin dang// nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// sman mchog de la skyod pa yin// sman de zos pa'i nus pa yis// 'chi ba med pa'i g.yung drung thob// lha rnams bsod nams che zhes bya// lha rnams kun kyang ngo mtshar nas// shing la bskor ba lan gsum byas// ngos ngos dag nas ming yang btags// shar gyi lha yis ming btags la// rtsa ba rtse mo tshun chad la// dpag tshad khri tsho bcu bdun bcas// sems can kun la bzhon par 'dug/ ming yang dpag tshad bzhon shing zhes// shar gyi lha rnams kun gyis btags// rtsa ba sdong po yon tan stong// yon tan de bzhin 'byung bas na// byang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi// kha le stong 'byams zhes su btags// ri rab chen po'i dkyil brtol nas// nub na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi// yongs 'du+u sa brtol zhes su 'dogs// 'dzam bu gling gi dbus shed na// lha rnams kun gyis bkra shis gsol// tshe ring longs spyod 'phel 'gyur bas// 'di ni lha yi bsod nams yin// shing chen byams ldan zhes su btags// shing gi yal ga dum bu kun// byis pa kun gyi rtse rgyur pas// skad cig yud la lus bong rdzogs// shing bu+u bil ba zhes su grags// bkra shis chos rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu// 'bras bu sman chen a ru ra// 'chi ba med pa a rur btags// med kyang chags pas ra ru btags// rigs ni rnam pa bcu ru gyes// ngo mtshar ldan pa'i a ru ra// snying gi dkyil dang 'dra ba gcig/ tshangs pa'i yul du gyes te song// tshangs pa kun grol chen pos zos// tshe yi rig 'dzin chen po thob// tshangs pa'i drang srong brgyad rnams dang// bu dang tsha bo yang tshar bcas// tshangs pa'i drang srong bu rnams kyis// 'chi ba med pa'i dngos grub thob// sman de zos pa'i nus pa yis// tshe lo 'bum dang khri ru 'gyur// gcig ni dga' ldan gnas na spyod// dga' bar ldan pa'i a ru ra// dbyibs ni rin po che ru 'dug/ rgyal ba byams pa'i byin gyi brlabs// sbyar na 'chi ba'i nad kun sel// blo rnams rno ba'i yon tan thob// gcig ni lha yi yul du spyod// dpag tu med pa'i a ru ra// che chung tshad ni pi ni kha// stod dang sman dag phra bar 'dug/ sul bu dag kyang med pa la// dkar ser mdog kyang gting na 'tsher// 'jam dpal rnon pos byin gyis brlabs// bzhag pa tsam gyis nad rnams sel// lha rigs lta bu'i mi rnams sam// bsod nams can la sbyar ba las// gzhan gyis de ni thub pa med// gcig ni gnod sbyin yul du 'khrungs// stobs dang ldan zhing gcu thabs can// kha dog dag kyang nag por gnas// che

chung tshad ni bca' ca'i stod// rtse mo rdo rje'i dbyibs su 'dug/ phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur bas// mthu dang stobs su ldan pa yin// bgegs kyis spyod pa'i nad la gtang// gcig ni gza' yi yul du yar// dbyibs ni rwa yi dbyibs su 'dug/ che chung tshad ni sbyangs dang mnyam// baiDUr+ya yis byin gyis brlabs// drag shul spyod pa'i nad la gtang// gza' yi drang srong brgyad rnams spyod// gcig ni ri bdun kha la babs// srid pa gzhom pa'i a ru ra// dbyibs ni zla ba'i dbyibs su 'dug/ ser la dmar ba nyi ma'i mdog/ sul bu phyogs gcig dag nas skye// phra zhing mang bas nyi zer 'dra// 'od kyi rgyal pos byin gyis brlabs// che chung tshad ni ldab dri tsam// grang bas nyan pa rnams la sbyar// gcig ni klu yi yul du babs// 'joms parabyed pa'i a ru ra// sul bu shin tu phra la zhib// sul bu dmar zhing logs rnams dkar// gyen du gas pa'i ser ga can// che chung tshad ni nag pi tsam// spyan ras gzigs kyis byin gyis brlabs// rma mi grang bdun kha ru babs// rlung dang bad kan dkar po'i spran// gcig ni gtsug 'dzin yul du babs// shin tu che zhing pags pa mthug/ ya yo med cing zlum la 'dril// che chung tshad ni di 'bi ta// grub pa'i blo gros byin gyis brlabs// sha rnams rab tu skam pa dang// rlung dang rgas par gyur pa yi// sha tshil me ltar 'bar bar byed// gzhon nur 'gro la the tshom med// gcig ni gtsang ma'i gnas su babs// dbyibs ni sgo nga'i dbyibs su gnas// sul bu med cing yu ba can// che chung lug pho'i long ga tsam// lha mo sgrol mas byin gyis brlabs// 'jam chos kun la rab tu bsngags// de ltar 'jig rten dgu po ru// zos pas tshe lo khri 'bum thub// bsgrubs pas rkyen maid dngos grub thob// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams kun// 'jig rten dgu ru ldang ma nus// shin tu ngo mtshar gyur nas ni// 'di ni tshad med shing gi sman// rtsa ba dmyal ba'i yul na yod// rtsa ba bcad pas sdong ma 'gyel// klu yi bsod nams yin par nges// sdong po bcad pas ngar ma chags// lha min gza' skar bsod nams yin// ngar pa bcad pas yal ma bskams// drang srong brgyad kyi bsod nams yin// yal ga bcad pas 'dab ma yongs ma nyil// gzhong thogs lha yis bsod nams yin// lha ma yin gyi ral gri yis// lha rnams kun la zhe sdang langs// 'bras bu 'dab ma'i mtshams su bcad// lha yi bsod nams ma bri bas// 'bras bu bar snang khams su smin// me tog u dum wa ra yang// bdun gyi mtha' ma bskor nas gnas// snga ma bas kyang mdangs dang ldan// me tog u dum wa ra la// lha rnams kun gyis bltas gyur pas// spyan gyi dngos grub

chen po thob// rig pas lus kyi nad rnams byang// zos pas tshe yi rig 'dzin thob// lha rnams kun gyi ngo mtshar thob// lhung ba'i dpag bsam ljon shing 'di// lha yi bsod nams las las grub// klu dang dmyal ba gza' skar gyis// bcad de thung bar mi 'gyur la// bzhog ste phra bar ma gyur la// lha ma yin ni zhe sdang gis// lo ma phral yang 'bras bu smin// ya mtshan me tog gting nas skyes// 'di yi ngo mtshar che tshod la// shing la lha gcig mi bdog gam// sman la srung ma mi bdog gam// zhes nam mkha' la bltas te nam mkha' la dmod pa bor ro// de nas cung zhig lon pa dang// lha rnams bsod nams che ba dang// mdun gyi nam mkha' dag las ni// 'di lta bu+u yi sgra rnams byung// e ma ho// ngo mtshar che ba'i shing dang sman// skyes pa rU tra'i srog rtsa yin// ma chod pa ni rU tra'i mthu// me tog lha yi bsod nams yin// 'bras bu smin pa kun gyi gsos// 'dis ni lha mo rim par 'byung// zhes bya ba'i sgra byung nas/ mdun gyi nam mkha' na srin po kro d+hI shwa rI zhes bya ba bdud dang rU tra'i chung ma de byung nas/ bdag gi gtso bo dpag bsam gyi shing du skyes nas 'dug go/ shin tu gdung ba'i sems kyis ni// shing la hril gyi 'khril nas 'dug/ 'od ni dpag tshad gcig dang chas// shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang mar// lha rnams kun gyis ming yang btags// shin tu+u dung ba'i mchi ma ni// thang la thigs gcig lhung ba las// ga bur dmar rtsa can gcig 'khrungs// byang chub sems kyi skyobs yin te// dkar la dmar rtsa chags pa zhig/ bltas na gting rnams shin tu 'tsher// dri yang bro mo dag tu mnam// khrag gis mig rnams long la phan// shin tu chags pa skyes pa las// mngal gyi g.ya' chu thigs gcig 'thigs// lha rnams kun la ngo tsha nas// tsan+dan shing gi sdong bu yis// g.ya' chu blangs te sa la bskyur// 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su skyes// bdud rtsi ga pur zhes su grags// de yang shel gyi pog phor dri// mkhregs shing dkar la mdangs ldan// dri yang lha mo'i mngal du mnams// tsha ba'i nad rnams phyogs med la// shin tu bsil ba'i bdud rtsi yin// yab kyi byang sems lhag ma gcig/ shin tu chags pas g.yos pa'i rtsad// lha mos chu gcig gtang ba las// dri chu sna la lug ste byung// lha rnams kun la ngo tsha nas// dung chen skyogs kyi lhums kyis bcus// rgya mtsho'i nang du sib kyis pho// bdud rtsi mu tig dag tu smin// rgya mtsho'i mtha' kun khyab par smin// chu las chu thigs sngon po 'khrungs// mu tig dkar po dri ma med// nyi ma'i 'od bas shin tu 'tsher// zla ba'i bkrag pas shin tu dkar// rus pa chags pa kun gyi gsos// stobs kyang zla ba nya ba

bzhin// sems rnams gso bar shin tu shis// byang chub sems kyi gtso bo yin// chu las chu thigs byung ba ni// nyi ma'i zer gyis phogs pa ni// nam mkha'i thigs pa 'thigs pa 'dra// kha dog 'od ni ut+pa la// dri ma med cing bkrag mdangs ldan// skyobs chen bdun gyis rab brgyan nas// chu rnams slags sa kun la phab// sa dang chu ru 'dres pa las// mu man theg rgyu'i rdo ru smin/ kha sngo sa yi mdog tu gnas// snum gyis phog na bkrag kyang gsal// skyobs chen drug gis khrid gyur na// glang rnams na ba'i sman du 'gro// de nas lha rnams mdun mar 'dus// 'u cag bdud rtsi'i rgyal po 'dus// rma rnams byung yang sos gyur bas// lha ma yin la dmag drangs zer// lha yi g.yul ngo chen po bzlog/ lha min rnams la dmag drangs bas// lha yi g.yul ngo rab tu rgyal// shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang ma// zhal nas sman mchog a bar gsol// lho ru bltas te 'dzum gcig shor// sman mchog a ru ra gcig ni// lho yi 'dzam bu'i gling du yar// der skyes rgyal po bsod nams can// dza zhes bya ba'i khang steng du// dro kha gcig la babs te byung// tsit+ta pi ta bya ba'i shing// ya mtshan can la 'khrungs te byung// ming yang rnam par rgyal bar bya// che chung g+ho ra'i b+han+d+ha tsam// dbyibs ni bum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug/ dkar dang ser dang dmar ba'i bkrag/ spri yi bar na nag po yod// bdas pa'i shun ni sngon po ldang// zur gyis tsha ba'i nad rnams sel// skyibs kyi grang ba'i nad rnams sel// sha yis rlung gi nad rnams sel// pags pas rma rnams dag kyang 'tsho// dri yis 'dus pa kun kyang sel// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams la// btang na mi phan gcig kyang med// sbyor ba kun kyang 'jil ba'i sman// rgyal po dza zhes bya ba des// gsol pas tshe lo khri khrag thub// sul bu brgya dang bco lnga gnas// ro res na ba bzhi bzhi sel// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i gnyen po la// bcu gcig rgas pa gso ba'i sman// lha mo rnams kyis bskor ba bgyis// chos skyong mgon pos srung ma bgyis// shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlabs// byang chub sems dpa' bkra shis gsol// mi rnams kun gyis ngo mtshar brjod// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa yis// bsam gtan mdzad pa'i shar phyogs su// kha ni shar du bltas nas skyes// lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra// lha srid sde brgyad kun gyis ni// bkra shis ngo mtshar kun gyis gsol// gza' chen khyab 'jug skyug pa bdun// lha rdzas de yi mgul du lug/ rigs bdun sa la lhung ste smin// lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra// rigs bdun sa la lhung ba ni// brgya byin bdud rtsi 'thung ba'i tshe// thigs pa bdun ni sa la lhung// rlung gis khyer te sa la skyes// bdud rtsi'i gtso bor rab

tu grags// dngos su a ru'i 'bras bu ste// rigs ni rnam pa bdun yod de// rnam par rgyal ba dang/ gsum bsgribs dang/ gsod byed dang/ 'jigs byed dang/ rtsi byed dang/ skyes byed dang/ gser 'dra dang bdun te/ de dag gi yon tan ni/ rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang// dus kyi nad dang 'dus pa'i nad// dus min 'chi las thar bar byed// ces smos te/ a ru ra la yang ro rnam pa lngas sel bar byed pa ni/ shun lpags bska bas rlung nad sel// rus pa mngar bas mkhris pa sel/ nang tsha bas bad kan sel/ dbus skyur bas chu ser sel/ de kun spyir 'dus pas 'dus nad sel/ rang bzhin nus mthu de 'dra na// man ngag can gyis bsgrub gyur na// byin rlabs ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// tshong dpon bu mo nor bzang ma// nor bu rin chen yon du phul// bkra shis mchog tu 'di brjod do// 'dzam gling rgyal po bsod nams can// ma brlan mkha' las byung ba yi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i gnyen po 'di// bdag gi dang du blang bar bya// zhes phyag tu bzhes pas/ mi rnams kun gyis 'jig rten du/ sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun zhes su grags// u dum 'bar ba bdun po la// ya mtshan che ba'i bya bdun chags// snying po za ba rma bya byung// sman gyi bya yin dug rnams za// lha mo kun kyang rma bya'i mgrin// nags kyi lha mo zhes su grags// gegs dang kun ta kun ti gdang// bzang mo rma bya bkra shis 'gro// khyung la sogs te lding ba'i bya// sman las gyur pas dug rnams thub// spyir yang mkha' lding bya rnams kun// shin tu tsha ba'i stobs dang ldan// dpag tshad dag gis gar khyab pa// mthu dang drang srong rnams kyis ni// gza' dang skar ma brtsi zhing sbyar// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba las/ rU tra'i srog pa rtsa las dpag bsam gyi shing bu ji ltar skyes pa dang lha mo gsum gyi byung tshul dang a ru ra'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// rU tra chen po bsgral ba yi// srog chags bsad pa'i khrag rjes kun// kro d+hI ma yis 'ubs kyis bsdus// thu+u ba g.yas su bcug gnas khyer// lha rnams rol mo byed par mnyan// yengs pas thu ba'i mgul nas shor// nga yi sgra la nyan pa de// ba yin ma rung zer na brang gcig brdungs// 'dzam bu gling gi nub tu skyes// rtsa rnams 'jam pa'i phyogs su 'khrungs// nub tu kha bltas kun tu skyes// dbyibs ni a ru dang 'dra ste// sul bu med cing ba bco'i mdog/ yu ba can ni nad klong yin// shin tu skyur la kha ba'i ro// ming yang bi tsa gyi rtse bya// zlum zhing 'khyil ba sman gyi mchog/ ro yang skyur zhing mdangs dang ldan// khrag rnams zags pa kun la gtang// 'bras bu+u gsum du sbyar gyur na// sha rnams skye zhing tshil rnams

rgyas// ha cang mang na lci bar byed// mkhas pas sman gyi cha snyoms nas// a ru ra dang gsum sbyar nas// gtsig rkyang gtang ba ma yin no// de yi ming yang skyu ru ra zhes btags// a mr-i ta ni kun la dgod// sman rnams kun gyi nus pa slong// btogs nas zhag gsum bar du ni// gcan gzan spu yis byibs te bzhag// phyi shun rang gis 'byed 'don na// drod tshad dus la babs pa yin// grib ma spangs la me nyer bskam// ha cang tsha bar gyur na ni// nus pa cung zhig 'dzag pa yin// grang sar phyin te bskam par bya// sbyor ba gang dang gang rgyug pa// sum cu tham pa'i cha gcig gtang// bung ni gtso bos mjal ba yin// sman tshad dag tu sbyor gyur na// phul gang phan chad chu yis ni// nyen par byas pa ma yin no// gam phye dag la gtong 'gyur na// ran la mdzes pa'i chang du sbang// drod kyis zhag gcig 'bug la gtang// gal te zangs thal byung ba na// mi tsha de yi cha gcig dang// kha mo phabs la sbyar te gtang// de yis khrag gi zil ba rnams// bdud rtsir ba me men bur skyes// spang rnams rgyas pa'i sa ru 'khrungs// phal cher sa la 'khrungs mod kyang// rtsa ba phra la sdong po 'khyog/ 'dab ma ra yi rna ba 'dra// ngar pa smug la me tog dkar// 'bras bu ske tshe 'dra mod kyang// kha gting med par mngar ba'i ro// bad kan smug po'i gnyen po yin// 'khru dang skyugs pa gcod byed cing// sman rnams kun gyi phabs su 'gyur// kha bsil zhu rjes cung zhig tsha// rig pa can gyi bya rnams za// mi rnams kun gyis zos gyur na// khong gi nad rnams khad kyis 'byang// mnan nas zos na nus pa 'byung// phabs su byas nas kun la 'jug/ gcig ni ki ni pi tses bya// mkha' lding gong mo kun gyis tshor// rtsa ba lo ma ram pu 'dra// 'bras bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtsa ba brkos te sman byas na// khong nad rnam pa kun la byams// sbyar nas sman rnams langs pa'i sman// khrag zags ba la rab tu bsngags// rU tra'i so ni yar ba las// shing chen ma gi ta ru skyes// mu le gram shing mgul du skyes// de las sa steng khyab pa la// dpya ru bdud rtsi cu'u gang byung// mdog ni dkar la dri ro med// gro sogs 'dra ste shin tu sgron/ skyes/ shin tu bsil te glo la 'jug/ rU tra'i ba spu yar ba las// bdud rtsi chen po ba le ka/ phra mnyen sna lam lag sdogs 'dra// dkar ser mdog dang mdam gyi dri// ston pa rab tu+u byung sar skyes// kun la rab tu+u snyoms pa'i sman// rU tra'i lte khrag yar ba las// tsan dan smug po dag tu 'khrungs// shin tu smug cing dri yang ldang// kha bsil gting yang tsha ba bskyed// bgegs rnams kun gyi gnyen po yin// khrag gi nad dang lte ba mgul// pho

brang kun la cung zhig phan// rU tra'i skra yi skra tshoms gcig/ sa yi steng du yar ba las// gan+d+ha b+ha dra'i sman du 'khrungs// dbyibs dang gzugs ni ma nges te// shing gi yal ga dag dang 'dra// nad rnams rtsa ru zhugs la phan// mchin khrag de yi steng du yar// bdud rtsi gur gum zhes su grags// sman mchog de yi me tog ni// kha che'i rgyal khams kun tu skyes// ston pas khab ni bzhes pa'i sar// dmar rtsa ldum bu rtsa ru skyes/ kha ba'i ro ldan mchin pa'i sman// mig ni rgud pa kun la phan// de las gyes pa'i yal ga yang// sman mchog bdud rtsi a ba bya// rtsub pa brag ri'i sked la 'khrungs// ldum bu smug po rtsa yi dbyibs// rtswi thog mar dang sbyar gyur na// de yi nus pas mig nad sel// rU tra'i rlig 'bras yar ba las// bdud rtsi de yi steng du babs// snga skya'i mdog ste mi mgo'i gzugs// ming ni dza ti pha la bya// dri yang bzang zhing stobs dang ldan// rlung nad kun la rab tu bsngags// gal te 'gyangs par gyur na yang// dri dang stobs kyis nad 'jil nus// sbyor ba dag tu gyur pa na// me dang chu yi nyen mi bya// kun la snyoms pa bdud rtsi yin// snying rlung kun la rab tu bsngags// kha ru tsha dang cha snyoms nas// rtsi thog mar gyis sna khrid na// zos pa tsam gyis snying rlung rnams// nges par ming yang med par 'gyur// rU tra'i mdzub mo yar ba las// kha brag lam gsum mdo chen dang// gas gle brag gi sne la 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po ka ko la// 'dab ma rin chen phyir slog 'dra// snying po re'u thul phyir slog 'dra// mgu pa shin tu dra ba la// yan lag shin tu mang bar gnas// 'bras bu rU tra'i mdzub mo 'dra// zhu rjes grang ba kun la snyoms// ston zla 'bring po'i nya la brda// grib ma dag la bskams te gtang// rU tra'i mchan khung dri ma ni// rgya gar bal po'i mtshams su yar// thang ga sa brag gle dag dang// ru rtsub dag gi shing du 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po sug smel yin// rtsa ba ngan zhing shin tu phra// snying po phra zhing 'dab ma leb// 'dab rtse zur gsum rtse mo rno// me tog dmar rtsa 'bras bu rtsub// dbyibs kyang gru gsum dkyil du sbom// ston zla tha chung tshes brgyad la// brngas nas zhag gcig ras kyis byib// nyi ma'i 'od la bskams te gtang// tsan+dan me la bsros gyur na// grang ba kun gyi sman du bshad// ma smin pa la brngas gyur na// tsha ba kun gyi sman yin no// dus gsum brngas par gyur na ni// tsha grang kun la snyoms pa yin// rtsa rtse'i khra yis khrid gyur na// drod nad kun gyi snying po yin// ru tra'i mtsher khrag yar ba las// bdud rtsi chen po li shi 'khrungs// khrag gi gzer bu zhes su grags// dro zhing zhi rjes rab tu tsha// mtsher pa'i nad la rab tu

bsngags// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyun zhes bya ba las/ rU tra chen po bsgral ba las yar rjes khrag gi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yis// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// de yis mkhris pa yar ba las// thigs pa bdun du rab tu yar// gcig ni sa yi bdud rtsir yar// spar+N+Na zhes pa'i ming du grags// chu bo chen po'i mgul du byung// na bun rmugs pa'i dkyil du gnas// nag mtshur dag gis mdangs phyung na// nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan par 'gyur// rin po che yi gtso bo ste// skye rgyud mi 'phel 'dod pa na// lha rtsa 'tsher pa'i bdud rtsi yin// gcig ni bdud rtsi skyer par 'khrungs// sa phyogs nges pa med par skye// gdug pa'i tsher ma kha lngas brgyan// sa smug mchin pa 'dra ba'i ri// shin tu+u nag pa'i dkyil na brko// sbyor ba legs par gyur na ni// mig nad rims nad bal nad dang// dug nad kun la rab tu bsngags// steng du 'thon pa drug gcig tsha// sa 'og sdong po bsil ba ste// phyi dang nang la bya ba min// bar shun sor mo dag dang sbyar// dbyar zla gsum la nad rnams slong// ston zla gsum la mkhris pa ldog/ dgun zla 'bring po dag dang ni// dpyid zla 'bring po dag la brko// sha mkhris smin pa'i dus min no// thigs pa gcig ni yar ba las// skyer ni kha 'da' dag tu 'khrungs// lo ma kyog por gnas pa las// ngar ba'i tshogs kyang kyog por gnas// me tog dmar smug gzhu+u sku'o/ rgyu// pha rgan rtsub mo'i sa la 'khrungs// ston zla dgun zla'i mtshams su skye// grib ma dag la rab tu bskam// shin tu bsil ba'i thang du shis// thigs pa gcig ni yar ba las// bdud rtsi chen po tig ta byung// rtsi shing 'dres pa'i gseb dag dang// rdo bran mang ba'i ri la 'khrungs// 'dab ma pha wang rna ba 'dra// sdong po cung zad phra ba la// ngar pa lcag gu de bzhin phra// me tog zlum zhing bu gu phra// ston zla tha chung mar ngo la// brngas te dbyangs la gdags par bya// snga phyi shor na nus pa med// kha ba'i ro la myong na gdong// nad rnams 'khyogs pa'i go 'byed yin// zas rnams kun gyi lde mig yin// shin tu gdeng ba'i sman zhes bya'o// thigs pa gcig ni yar ba las// ji lta gser gyi shing du+u skyes// kha dog skyed pa 'dra mod kyang// sro ma bi kar lta bur skye// ri mo mgul klog 'dra ba skyes// pra rtsi gtang ba'i mdog dang ldan// lo ma chung zhing rtsa ba sdom// shin tu dro ba'i brag la 'khrungs// khrag gis sbyar bar gyur ba dang// bal nad dag gi bdud rtsi yin// thigs pa gcig ni yar ba las// bdud rtsi chen po dga' ru skyes// rtsa ba shin tu phra ba las// lo ma ne le'i gshogs pa 'dra// ngar ba sbu gu me tog phra// g.ya' dang gangs

kyi mtshams su 'khrungs// ston zla tha chung dus su brnga// lo ma mar dkar tshwa dang bcas// chu dang bsres te thang du gtang// bad kan nyid kyi bdud rtsi yin// zas su zos na yi ga 'byed// gal te dul bar gyur ba na// bad mkhris bcas te ldog par 'gyur// gdul ba'i thabs ni chu lud de// gla ba sha ba'i ril mas dgab// lo gnyis bar du brngas shing bskyur// lo gsum lon nas 'dab ma brnga// rtsa ba ngar ba ma yin no// lo ma legs par brnga te skam// shin tu zhib par btags nas ni// tshos bar btso ba rab tu gces// zas rnams 'khrem pa'i bdud rtsi yin// 'du ba kun la rab tu byams// thigs pa gcig ni yar ba las// bdud rtsi chen po muny+dzar 'khrungs// 'khrungs pa gangs kyi ltongs su+u 'khrungs// snying po nag la me tog dkar// lo ma spre'u'i gzhug ma 'dra// dgun zla ra ba'i stod la brnga// zhag gsum bar du sbal la bsub// ngar ba ral ba'i chu yis bran// legs par snod du bsag gyur na// zhu mkhan lta bu'i dri 'byung ste// chu dang mar du sbyar gyur na// tsha ba'i nad rnams kun la phan// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba las/ rU tra chen po bsgral ba las drag bsil mkhris pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas rU tra chen po de'i// bcud kyi chu brgyad byung ba las// sems kyi bcud ni klad pa de// tshan pa bdun du yar te song// klad pa'i phyi rgya yar ba las// man dar rgya dar ldib shor 'khrungs// spang dang na thang mtshams su yang// nyi lcabs tshul du 'khrungs pa yin// btags te snam bur byas gyur na// rma yi chings dang yan lag chings// thun mong sman gyi skyobs su byung// klad khrag thigs gcig yar ba las// smug po sbal rgyab khrag sha'i mdog/ bcag na zur can zhib na 'bol// g.ya' spang byi ba'i rdo ru 'khrungs// kha mo'i chang gis khrid gyur na// klad pa nyams pa'i bdud rtsi yin// kla dkar thigs gcig yar ba las// gangs dang chu 'thabs bar du 'khrungs// mdog dkar mkhregs shing btags na 'jam// phyi nas bi tsis khrid gyur na// rus pa dum bu stong song yang// 'byar bar 'di la the tshom med// klad pa mtha' nas yar ba las// de yang rnam pa gnyis su yar// gcig ni mtsho 'gram pa la yar// shin tu 'bol ba'i sa la yar// bdud rtsi chen po 'brug rus te// che chung pho 'dom gsum gyi tshad// nya phyis lta bu'i kha dog la// srab mo shun lpags brtsegs mar gnas// ma he'i ko ba lta bu'i tshul// zhib btags rtsi dmar dag dang sbyar// nu zho 'thung ba'i byis pa la// rus pa sra mkhregs lcags su 'gyur// ji ltar rgas kyang shed mi 'chor// rgas pa rang yang 'ong ba

dka'// klag ste bud med gzhon nu la// btsod kyi khrag dang sbyar te gtad// byis pa bu mo skye mi srid// rkyen gyis rus pa chag gyur na// btang na lta ba 'chor mi srid// yang na na tshas gang zin pa// zhib tu btags te snum dang bsres// bsku mnye byas par gyur na ni// lus zungs dag kyang 'chor mi srid// rU tra'i 'gram pa'i rus pa ni// gcig ni sa la yar ba las// rgya mtsho chen po'i sne las 'khrungs// lteng chu phra mo'i nang du 'khrungs// sems can br-ish+tsi ka ru 'khrungs// btags te zhig dkar brngos gyur te// klad pa rgya dang sbyar gyur nas// mar dkar dag gis khrid gyur na// skra rnams nyal gyis byi gyur la// shin tu 'jam zhing la ba yi// skra rnams skye la the tshom med// ba spu gso ba'i bdud rtsi yin// klad pa'i dkyil nas yar ba las// rgya mtsho'i gting gi dung du 'khrungs// de yang rigs ni gsum du 'khrungs// g.yas su 'khyil ba'i dus byung ba// kau shi kas byin gyis brlabs// pho dung mo dung gnyis byung ba// klu rgyal 'jog pos byin gyis brlabs// btags te seng ge'i zho dang sbyar// skyu ru ra yis phabs byas te// zhag gsum bar du mnan byas te// brgyad cu lon pa'i rgan po yang// so ni gting nas med gyur bar// lo bcu lon pa'i byis pa bzhin// bkrag dang bcas nas so rnams skye// gzhon par 'gro la the tshom med// gal te seng ge'i zho med na// btsod dang kyang yang nam kyungs la sogs pa yi// ri dwags sum cu rtsa gcig zho// rtswa ma zas pa'i rgod kyi bu// de yi glo dang 'bri mar dang// a ru ra dang sbyar gyur na// rgas pa gzhon la the tshom med// klu yi lus dang ldan par 'gyur// klad pa'i khrag rtsa yar ba las// rgya mtsho dngas pa'i gting du 'khrungs// sa yi dngas ma mtshal du 'khrungs// zhag bdun bar du btags byas nas// sgo nga'i rtsa dang cong zhi sbyar// lha ba 'tsho ba'i bdud rtsi yin// klad pa'i rtsa chen yar ba las// rgya shugs 'od zer dag tu skyes// brag med spang med rtsub pa'i ri// gting na grang ba yod la 'khrungs// shun lpags mngar zhing 'bras bu skyur// lo ma thang chu mngar la 'khyil// de yi pags pa bshus gyur nas// chu+u yi nang du cung zhig sbang// stobs ni du ba bzhin du 'ong// shin tu bsgrubs nas 'thung gyur na// lhu dum rus pa chags pa rnams// tsha ba'i nad rnams langs gyur na// bsil bas rab tu 'jil bar 'gyur// de las gyes pa'i yal ga yang// gcan gzan stag gis khyer de song// nags tshal kun gyi gseb tu skyes// mang yang stag pa dkar po bya// de yi grang thang btang gyur na// bsil bar nus pa'i bdud rtsi yin// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ rU tra chen po bsgral ba las sems

bcud klad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas rdo rje gzhon nu yis// rU tra snams nas bton pa'i tshe// mchi ma gsum ni sa la shor// mig 'bras nag po'i mchi ma las// gnod sbyin rgod ma kha ru skyes// dpyid nas ston gyi bar du ni// g+ho ra rta ru rdzus te sdod// rta yang rang rang gsum tsam na// bdud kyi bud med ral pa can// mi rnams za ba dpal gyi gzis// nam mkha'i mthong nas phyag rgya bsdams// mchi ma sa la brul ba yis// kha ser spang gi steng du skyes// spang gi rgyan du rnam par grags// rtsa ba phra zhing lo ma phra// ut+pa la yi mdog can de// rul lam bam sum ma khyer bar// dgun zla ra ba'i stod la brnga// mig rnams gso ba'i sman du gtang// rU tra'i mig sprin dkar po las// mchi ma thigs gcig sa la yar// spang dang shing gi bar du 'khrungs// spang rgyan dkar po bdud rtsi yin// ka ra dkar dang sbyar byas nas// grangs ba'i thang du 'thung gyur na// dpag tshad gsum du grag pa yi// mgrin pa bde ba'i bdud rtsi yin// mig sprin dmar po'i mchi ma las// nags kyi gseb tu yar ba las// rgya shug glang ma'i mgul du 'khrungs// rtsa ba phra zhing lo ma phra// dar ba'i tshad ni mtho gang skyes// phyi ljang nang dag smug po la// ming yang u mu ta ru grags// mig la rkyen gyis bslad pa la// go snyod dag gis sna khrid nas// mar dkar dag dang cung zhig sbyar// lto ru za bar bya ba'am// rkang mthil lag mthil spyi bo ru// lums kyi thabs su dus byas na// mig ni tsha la sogs pa rnams// 'bras bu zhar bar gyur pa ni// gsal bar 'gyur te the tshom med// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyud las/ rU tra chen po bsgral ba las mig bcud mchi ma'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje gzhon nu yis// lha yi snyan dbang 'thob bya'i phyir// rU tra'i rna ba yar ba las// cha ni bcu gcig yar nas song// gcig ni tshangs pa'i yul du yar// ya mtshan 'phrul gyi me tog skyes// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'chad pa thos// gcig ni dga' ldan gnas su yar// u dum wa ra'i me tog 'khrungs// tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs drug cu thob// gcig ni lha yi yul du yar// byams pa'i bstan bcos kun kyang thos// gcig ni gnod sbyin yul du yar// bai DUr+Ya yi me tog 'khrungs// phyag na rdo rje'i rigs sngags thos// gcig ni ri bdun kha la yar// me tog rgya bye smug por 'khrungs// 'khor lo mtshon cha'i sgra yang thos// gcig ni klu yi yul du yar// rin chen me tog lta bur 'khrungs// lnga ni 'dzam bu gling du yar// gcig ni brag spang bar du 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po tshe yi bya// lus rnams rengs par gyur pa dang// rma rnams dengs par 'gyur pa

yi// bdud rtsi yin te lums gyi sman// thigs gnyis sa la yar ba las// srin po khros pa'i ri la 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po hong len yin// sdong po brul bas rtsa ba chung// lo ma seng ge'i rna ba 'dra// rtsa ba'i sbug la sul bu yod// ro mchog kha bar gyur pa la// kun rgyug bden pa'i bdud rtsi yin// thigs gsum sa la yar ba las// sa phyogs nges med kun tu 'khrungs// rtsa ba phra bar gyur pa la// 'dab ma lug gi rna ba 'dra// snying po gung gang ma sems can bzhin// ming yang rtag gu+u la dkar skyes// dbyar zla tha chung smad la brngas// mar dang sbyar nas zos na 'tsho// cung zhig tsha sa rkyen gyur na// yi ga 'gags pa'i bdud rtsi yin// bdungs te lums su byas gyur na// rma rnams rengs ba kunakyang 'tsho// thigs bzhi sa la yar ba las// gangs stongs bal po'i mgul du 'khrungs// ldum bu re ral zhes su grags// lo ma phu la yal ga med// khams ser spang ni mi mtho ste// dug nad gso ba'i bdud rtsi yin// thigs lnga sa la yar ba las// mtsho dang g.ya' yi mgul du 'khrungs// bdud rtsi 'ug pa re ral yin// rtsa ba lo ma shin tu ngan// shun pa 'ug pa'i phod dang mtshungs// sha dug gso ba'i bdud rtsi yin// drod rnams bral bar ma gyur na// shi ba sos par the tshom med// bdud rtsi rin po che'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i rgyud las rna bcud rna sbabs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje gzhon nu yis// sna yi dngos grub 'thob bya'i phyir// snabs ni gsum du yar ba las// thang gcig brag dang chu la yar// chu la yar bas chu shel 'khrungs// bzung na yod la blta na med// bye ma ka ras sna khrid na// glo ba'i nad kyi bdud rtsi yin// brag la yar bas cong zhi byung// sram gyi mchin pa dag dang sbyar// rang gi lus kyi dri ma rnams// zas la sbyar te btab byas na// bu mo gzhon nu la sogs pa// lha mo klu mo mdangs can rnams// snying sdug shin tu dang chags nas// 'gugs par byed pa'i bdud rtsi yin// gcig ni sa la yar ba las// lce pog dkar po dag tu skyes// rtsa ba phra zhing me tog phra// lo ma de dag de bzhin phra// ro tshor dri yang mi zhim ste// nad log bying ba'i bdud rtsi yin// gcig ni mtsho gting mgul du yar// ston zla dgun zla mtshams su 'khrungs// shel tsha me tsha sman tsha dang// lce myang tsha dang zi ra'i tsha// rgyam tsha shing tsha thal tsha dang// ra tsha dang ni kha ru tsha// nad rnams 'dril bar gyur pa dang// skran rnams rengs dang ma zhu dang// mngar ba'i zas kyis ro 'don zhing// gnas su bstims pa'i bdud rtsi yin// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ rU tra chen po bsgral ba las sna bcud snabs kyi le'u ste bcu

bzhi pa'o//// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu yis// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// smra ba'i seng ges dbang bskur te// lce bcud mchil ma'i bdud rtsir gyur// thigs pa bzhi ru yar ba las// khrag dang mchil mar 'dres pa las// gnod sbyin chen po kha 'bar byung// shAkya thub pa'i gam du phyin// rang gi lce bcad phul ba las// bdud rtsi chen po gser ba byung// mi bde rtsub pa'i sa ru 'khrungs// rtsa ba 'dril zhing ngar pa shar// shing mdog smug la me tog dkar// 'bras bu dmar ba'i mdog tu 'khrungs// rtsa ba skyur la mngar ba'i sman// bad kan la sogs nad rnams la// cung zhig phan par byed mod kyang// bsdus nas khu ba btang gyur na// chu ser gtan nas 'dod pa'i sman// thigs gnyis sa la yar ba las// dpal 'bar chen mo khro mo byung// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin// lce bcad yon du phul ba las// bdud rtsi chen po dro bar skyes// rtsa ba 'dril la ngar ba sbom// 'dab ma rnga mo'i rna ba 'dra// me tog lce 'dra gser gyi mdog/ mi smra ba kun smra bar byed// dig pa gso ba'i bdud rtsi yin// bad kan dag la cung zad gnod// thigs gcig sa la lhung ba las// yi dwags kha 'bar ma ru byung// shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin// lce bcad yon du phul ba las// bdud rtsi rma lo kril kril byung// shing phran skyes pa'i ma ru 'khrungs// rtsa ba 'dril zhing ngar ba 'khril// me tog sngo zhing lce yi dbyibs// shin tu bsil ba'i sman yin te// sbyar lag gtang ba ma yin te// zos pa tsam gyis nad rnams 'tsho// thigs gcig lha yi yul du yar// bya ni ngang mo gcig tu skyes// mi yi yul du chags te byung// bu drug bdun tsam skyes pa las// lha yi bya gcig 'dir byung ste// mi rnams kun gyis 'dzi btags// ngang mo lha yi yul du phur// bu brug kun la sman bzhag pa// hag ces gre ba dag nas bton// smu gnag thal ba'i mdog 'dra la// che chung skye tshe'i tshad du byung// ngang mo de yis dmod bor bas// nga yi lha zas 'bru chung 'di// bu rnams kun gyi gsos su shog/ rngo mi dgos te btags mi dgos// ldum bu ljang bu zos pas chog/ btsos na lha yi ldum bu yin// btsos te skams par gyur na ni// sdan la za ba'i bdud rtsi yin// btang na dug gi sbyor ba rnams// mu stegs bus ni tshugs mi 'gyur// 'byung ba kha cig 'ju bar byed// ro mngar zhu rjes med par bstan// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ lce bcud mchil ma'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon bu yis// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// shin tu bred nas rngul gcig byung// yar ni thigs pa gsum du yar// skra yi rtse nas rngul

byung bas// sa phyogs sa spo dag tu 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po rngul dngul lam/ rdo byung// chu mdog dkar sngo'i mdangs dang ldan// a ru ra yi snan sbyar rnams// khong du+u bza' bar byed pa'i dus// lus kyi dri ma bkrus gyur te// phyi yi yul du byugs gyur na// phung po mi 'jigs bdud rtsi yin// shi ba'i ro la bkrus gyur na// sems de khug par mi 'gyur kyang// lus kyi gzi byin mi 'chor bar// bskal pa ma zhig bar du ni// phung po brtan pa'i bdud rtsi yin// mchan khung spu yi rngul gcig ni// shing chen shug pa'i steng du yar// shing gi 'bras bur gyur ba la// 'dab ma dbyar skyes dgun ni skams// 'bru yi zan la mnan gyur na// phabs su gyur pa'i bdud rtsi yin// nad la bdud rtsi'i bcud bton na// sems kyi rtsal shugs bskyed pa dang// rlung nad kun gyi bdud rtsi yin// shing chen de yi 'bras bu yang// lo gcig ba spu'i tshul du 'khrungs// lums su bgyis na nad rnams 'tsho// lo gnyis ma smin sgo ril 'dra// gsher dug kun gyi sna 'dren yin// lo gsum lon nas smin pa yang// rU tra'i rngul nag 'dra ba gcig/ ro mngar thang chu'i bag dang ldan// brdungs te chu la sbyar gyur na// chu ba rengs dang yan lag rengs// rlung dang chu ser bsdongs la phan// pho mtshan spu las rngul byung ba// bye ma mu tra'i sgang la yar// bdud rtsi g+ha na pa tir 'khrungs// rtsa ba rtsub rtsing 'dab ma rtsub// 'bras bu rtsub ste ra mgo 'dra// cung zhig ma smin pa la brda// yang na dus de nyid du'am// nyi mas legs par bskams la ni// gdus pa'i khu bar gyur na ni// rlung dang chu ser kun gyi sman// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ ba spu'i bcud rngul gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu yis// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// khrag gi bcud ni mchin pa las// thigs pa bdun du yar gnas song// gcig ni rin chen zangs rdor 'khrungs// shin tu brdar bar gyur na yang// dud 'gro ra lug rnga mo yi// mig la ling thog byung ba'i sman// thigs gnyis sa la yar ba las// bdud rtsi g+ha na a mr-i ta// brag dmar mo mtshan 'dra ba'i shod// sa phyogs shin tu 'jam par 'khrungs// rtsa ba'i ring zhing dar ba shar// grangs med me tog ser la smug/ 'bras bu khrag gi thigs pa bzhin// mo nad gso ba'i bdud rtsi yin// thigs gsum sa la yar ba las// ga ru Ta yi shing du 'khrungs// thang chu dmar ser kha ba'i ro// de yang mo nad gso ba'i sman// thigs pa bzhi ru yar ba las// smug ldem a gad ba ru'i shing// 'bras bu che zhing snying po bsil// smug skya zil bur gyur pa de// nad rnams kun la byams par

'khrungs// mchin pa'i nad la rab tu bsngags// thigs lnga rdo la yar ba las// bdud rtsi chen po mug chen byung// g.ya' dang bye ma 'dres sar 'khrungs// rma rnams kun gyi rtsi ru 'khrungs// mchin pa'i rtsa g.yas yar ba las// bdud rtsi chen po la rtog ni// snyi la 'bol ba'i sa ru 'khrungs// lo ma 'bad cing rtsa ba ring// skyur la mngar ba'i ro dang ldan// kha dog dmar zhing lcug phran 'dra// rtsa nad tsha bas zin pa dang// glo dang mchin la tshad zhugs na// gtan nas 'byin pa'i bdud rtsi yin// mchin pa'i rtsa g.yon yar ba las// bdud rtsi chen po ma nur skyes// rtsa ba dmar zhing 'dab ma lteb// rtse la spu yi tsher ma yod// me tog smug la thur du gug/ de yang rtsa yi sman yin no// bdud rtsi rin po che chen po 'khrungs pa'i rgyud las/ khrag bcud mchin pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// bcom ldan
