rdo rje gzhon nu yis// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// rtsa bcud chu+u ba yar ba las// de yang thigs pa bzhi ru yar// gcig ni gangs kyi stongs su yar// bdud rtsi chen po la chu+u ba// mngar la zhim pa'i ro dang ldan// rtsa ba ser zhing rtsa mtshams dkar// dar ba smug cing 'dab ma shog/ snying po 'bras bu med pa'i rtsi// btsos te zas su zos gyur na// bad kan gnyis ka ming yang med// thigs pa lung pa'i srol du babs// bdud rtsi chen po chu chung ba// rdza mo lung pa'i dkyil du 'khrungs// 'dab ma chung zhing dar ba smug/ 'bras bu bra po'i zan bcangs 'dra// ro ni skyur la cung zhig 'phrigs// bcos ste zos par gyur na yang// ban kan smug po gtan nas len// thigs gcig sa la yar ba las// sra brtan brag gi sked la 'khrungs// 'dab ma ngar ba gong bzhin te// snying po pi wang lta bu ste// ro ni skyur la gdang bar ston// btsos ste zos par gyur na yang// bad kan dkar po ming yang med// sol bur zos par gyur na yang// bad kan dag la cung zhig phaT// gong gi ro dang mi ldan zhing// sa phyogs dro sar skyes gyur na// de la bdud rtsi sman mi 'byung// thigs gcig sa la yar ba las// ri klung chen po'i 'dabs su skyes// bdud rtsi chen po ldum bu skyes// dbyibs rnams chu+u ba 'dra mod kyang// ro ni cung zhig sbre la kha// pho la dgos pa ma yin te// mo rnams kun la nal ba'i sman// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyud las/ rtsa bcud chu ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// bcom ldan rdo rje khros pa yis// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// de yi glo ba bshegs pa las// thigs brgyad sa la yar ba las// tsan+dan dkar po'i bdud rtsi yin// 'khrungs ni nags tshal dbyibs su 'khrungs// rtsa ba zab cing ngar ba bshan// 'dab ma dag kyang sprin bzhin gyi// dkar

zhing mdog ste chung zhing sob// de yang rigs ni gsum du gnas// gdang ba'i dri dang mngar ba'i dri// cung zhig tsha ba'i dri dang gsum// gdang ba'i dri ni gsher la 'khrungs// tsha ba'i dri ni shing dag zad pa'i ze la 'khrungs// rkyen gyis ral dang lcugs kyis lteb// ci rigs rim pa dang sbyar nas// glo rnams gso ba'i bdud rtsi yin// mngar la gyur ba'i tsan+dan la// 'dab chags bya yi tshang bcas na// bsil bar 'gyur te byar mi 'gyur// gal te bya yis mi 'tshal nas// mnyam 'dra shing dang mtshungs pa la// bsil ba'i chu yis bran nas ni// gzhan gyi zil pa zhu gyur kyang// de yi zil pa zhu mi srid// gal te mi yis tshol gyur na// mnyam 'dre'i shing gnyis bsreg pa rab// 'tshig dang mi 'tshig shin tu gsal// thigs gcig sa la yar ba las// mtshan pa gsum du gyes te song// shing chu gtong dang ltengs ka'i mtshams// sa ma brag gi gseb tu yar// shing gi chu las byung ba ni// ka ra smug po'i rgyu ru 'khrungs// rlung gis btab pa'i glo la phan// ltengs ka'i bar nas byung ba ni// ka ra dkar po'i rgyu ru byung// dug gis zin pa la sogs dang// tsha ba'i nad rnams kun la btang// tsha ba'i glo la rab tu phan// sa ma brag la yar ba ni// shin tu dkar la rtsub par 'khrungs// bye ma ka ra zhes su grags// de la rigs kyang gsum yod de// brag ting sa ting shel ting gsum// brag ting kha ba bzhin du sob// sa ting mdog kyang cung zhig smug/ shel ting zla ba nya ba bzhin// brag ting rus pa tsha la gtang// sa ting sha rnams tsha la gtang// shel ting bya ba'i bsil ba de// ga pur lta bus thob pa min// skyobs kyis khrid na tsha mi nus// ston ka'i zla ba nya dang mtshungs// shel ting btsal ba'i thabs bstan pa// chu rnams rab tu bskor ba la// shel ting btab par gyur na ni// khol shi chu grang tshad du 'gyur// chu yis btsal ba'i man ngag yin// me yi blta bar gyur na ni// ji tsam brngos kyang mdog mi ldog/ rlung gis blta bar gyur na ni// lcags kyi rdo dang bsres te 'phyar// snyigs mar las na shel ting yin// mnyam par 'dug na brag ting yin// sna la khyer na sa ting yin// thigs pa gcig ni yar ba las// g.ya' dang gangs kyi ltongs su+u 'khrungs// g.ya' yi bdud rtsi zla ba'i 'od// sro lo phung po bdun gyis bskor// ri rnams gzhan yang mtshan gyis 'gengs// lung mdo sru+u ba yi sa bcad// lha shing sur bu'i zur du skyes// skad 'don chu yi ral pa bzhin// brtag la la chu ba yis bskor// brag dang 'khan pa sngo yang 'khrungs// mthong ba'i ri rnams shin tu 'jam// rtsa ba dag kyang bdun du gyes// rtsa ba'i lcugs pa cung zhig dmar// lo 'dab sro lo dkar dang 'dra// me tog ti

pas dkar ser 'byung// zhag bdun bar la skye mi 'khrungs// tshan dang sro lo gzhan rnams kyis// khru gang pa la nye mi nus// ston zla 'bring po'i smad na btsal// cung zhig me tog ma rnyed na// me dang chu yis gong bzhin btsal// gal te cis kyang ma rnyed na// rkyang bu sha ba'i gdos su gzhug/ glo la gri brgyab su bar btang// sems can de yis rnyed par 'gyur// yang na 'di yis btsal bar bya// rgod kyi bye phrug snyi la bzung// gtod de glo la thur ma brdeg/ pha dang ma yis btsal ba blta// de yis rnyed par gyur nas ni// rtsa ba brko ba ma yin te// lo ma dag gis lo brgya 'tsho// thigs gcig sa la yar ba las// srib ri'i logs dang brag la 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po bal bu bya// rtsa ba 'dril zhing ngar ba shar// 'dab ma cung zhig gzhung bu can// dri yang zhim zhing ro yang bskyur// 'dab ma 'dril zhing ngar ba bsnyoms// sdong po rab tu bsil ba de// tshan dang sbyar ba glo yi sman// 'di yang tshan zhes yongs su grags// thigs gcig sa la yar ba las// spang nags gnyis kyi bar du 'khrungs// rtsa ba 'dril zhing 'dab ma leb// bdud rtsi chen po si lu+u kha// kha mngar zas dang sbyar byas nas// de yang cung zhig glo la phan// thigs gcig sa la yar ba las// klung shod nye ba'i sa ru 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po 'bri mog yin// rtsa ba 'dril la 'dab ma khrad// dpyid zla tha chung smad la brko// mar dkar ka ra dag dang sbyar// de yang glo yi sman du bshad// thigs gcig sa la yar ba las// 'bru rnams skye ba'i sa ru 'khrungs// bdud rtsi ba thag ces kyang bya// de yang rigs gnyis dag tu 'khrungs// gsher sar 'khrungs dang skam sar 'khrungs// gsher sar 'khrungs dag ljibs rjib dag yin// skam sar 'khrungs dag skyabs dag yin// btsos te rtag tu zos gyur na// glo nad phyis kyang mi 'byung la// bad kan dag gi gnyen po yin// glo yis ol gong yar ba las// sra brtan brag gi sked dag dang// sa la yang ni de bzhin 'khrungs// ra sgog g.ya' sgog dag tu 'khrungs// g.ya' sgog ces su bstan pa la// shin tu ring la snum pa gcig/ ro yang shin tu mngar zhing zhim// glo nad tsha grang thams cad kyi// sngon du 'gro ba'i sman yin te// ston zla ra ba 'bring po gnyis// rtag tu lto ru zos byas na// lo bcu lon pa tshun chad du// glo nad bya ba 'byung mi srid// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyud las/ bdud rtsi glo ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas khrag 'thung rgyal po yis// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// snying lpags shun pa bshus yar bas// ming ni pa tsi shing du byung// brag ldebs 'dra ba'i sa la 'khrungs// rtsa ba khrad cig snying po ring// 'bras bu gong mo'i

snying 'dra 'khrungs// ro lce cung zhig yang ba las// tsit+ta zla khrom zhes su grags// rtsi mar dag dang sbyar gyur na// sems mi dga' ba'i sman du gsungs// rU tra'i mkhal ma yar ba las// ri min thang min 'dabs su 'khrungs// 'dzin med ye ni shing du skyes// rtsa ba bzang la ngar pa rags// lo ma rgyas shing me tog dmar// snying po dag kyang zlum zhing che// ma sha dmigs mi zhes su grags// khang gi nad rnams 'khrugs pa dang// mkhal ma'i rtsa rnams kun la phan// rU tra'i chu ni yar ba las// brag dang spang gi bar du 'khrungs// phal cher bye ma'i grog las skyes// shing dang kha ri dmar po 'khrungs// 'dab ma phra zhing ngar pa 'khyog/ kha ni sho sha zhes su grags// mchu nad phal pa dbal po kun la phan// rU'u tra'i rmen bu yar ba las// ri min thang min rtsub par 'khrungs// rtsa ba ngar pa shin tu rgyas// lo ma chu shing me tog smug/ gla gor zho sha zhes su grags// snod rnams 'gying zhing na pa'i sman// rU tra'i mcher pa yar ba las// thigs pa gsum du yar ba ni// rdo yi phyogs su 'khrungs pa las// gcig ni pha lam cho lo ris// bgegs chen gzir ba'i stobs dang ldan// rdo sman dag tu cung zhig khro 'gro yang// gcig ni khab len ljang gur 'khrungs// lcags 'du pa yis stobs dang ldan// mcher khrag 'khrugs pa'i bdud rtsi yin// gcig ni bal po'i yul du 'khrungs// mnyen la snum pa'i rdo ru 'khrungs// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku yi rgyu// kha ru tsha dang sbyar gyur na// sbo ba dag la cung zhig phan// btags nas dug tu byas gyur na// khrag ro rnying pa 'byin par byed// gsar pa dag la cung zhig gnod// bsregs te shing kun gtang gyur na// so yi srin bu 'don par nus// btags te phye mar byas gyur na// me cho dag gis cung dben nas// brngos te dugs su bdug gyur na// mkhal ma mkhres pa gtan nas 'don// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyud las/ snod phra lgang pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yis// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// de yis gsang mdzod yar ba las// thigs pa bcu gcig sa la lhung// thigs gcig sa la yar ba las// bdud rtsi kun tu rgyug tu gyur// 'ji chung gi ni mgul dag dang// mu zi nag po yod sar 'khrungs// kun rnams 'ju ba'i bdud rtsi ste// khyad par glo ba'i nad la bsngags// thigs pa sa la yar ba las// mtsho rjib ma yi mgul du 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po 'bri mi ta// nu zho skams pa kun gyi sman// thigs gsum sa la yar ba las// chu 'bab pa yi mgul du 'khrungs// shing chung ki na yod pa yis// bdud rtsi chen po thal tshas bya// mes tshig kun gyi sman du gsungs// thigs bzhi sa la yar ba

las// gangs dang mtsho yi mtshams su 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po rgyam tshas bya// chu nad gso ba'i bdud rtsi yin// thigs drug sa la yar ba las// rgya mtsho rus bus 'gram dag tu 'khrungs// sdig pa ka ka ri tu byung// de yang chu nad gso ba'i sman// gzugs ni sdig pa'i dbyibs 'dra la/ kha dog dkar zhing sha srul med// ro ni sgre zhing cung zhig 'dam// shin tu legs par skams gyur na// yan lag nad dang chu yi sman// thigs pa bdun pa yar ba las// dbyar chu dgun skams lteng kar 'khrungs// sa phyogs dro zhing sa dri can// dbyibs ni zhing mnga' 'dra mod kyang// kha dog gong ma de dang mtshungs// ro ni kha la ro gzhug mngar// srid gis stod pa 'dug pa dang// chu la bran pa gong bzhin no// thigs brgyad sa la yar ba las// bal bu ta la'i mgul du 'khrungs// ming yang ma gi ta zhes bya// spos kyi glang po zhes kyang bya// che chung tshad ni lug tsam la// ske ring rna ba shin tu srab// rmig pa rno zhing rkang lag bzhi// dus gcig mchong zhing 'gro bar byed// mo la mi gnas pho la 'khrungs// lte skor chu yi mtshams nas byung// phyi ni 'dril zhing nang na sob// che chung skyes pa dar ma'i lce// dri le 'di zhes bya ba ni// dpag gis mi lang yon tan 'byung// ro gyang pa yi thabs kyi med// shin tu 'khris nas mi zhim mo// rtsi zhes bya ba'i ming yang 'dogs// rU tra'i sbre ni mthar thug las// byang chub sems dpa'i sbre yin pas// dri yis 'phags pa mchod gyur na// yi dam lha yi lung ston 'gyur// man ngag can gyi bsgrub gyur na// lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par gyur// 'dzam gling dri yis 'gengs par ni// the tshom rdul tsam mi za'o// rU'u tra chen po'i sbre yin pas// dri chu rnams kyi mchog tu gsungs// lus la bcangs par gyur na ni// rU tra chen po'i dri snams nas// klu chen brgyad kyi sbyor ba yang// yud tsam gcig kyang rtsom mi nus// gdug pa can gyi mthu yin pas// sbrul dang sbrang bu tre ma dang// trai ma bu ga la sogs kyis// mi rnams za ru 'ong mod kyang// mnam pa tsam gyis mgo 'gas shing// tshor ba tsam gyis ldan par 'gyur// gzhan yang lus la bcangs gyur na// rU tra chen po'i dri mnam nas// ma mo mkha' 'gro rnams kyang ni// bsgrub pa bzhin du dri la 'khor// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad la yang// stobs kyi mthu rnams yod mod kyang// lhag par dri chu bsdams pa dang// lgang pa rdo yis 'gags pa rnams// chu sman bcu yis skyobs byas na// sol ba'i sdong po dri ba la// lcags kyi tho bas brgyab par bzhin// gzhan yang yon tan sna tshogs dang// 'di ru brjod par mi lang kyang// dri chen brgyad pa'i nang nas bshad// thigs pa dgu pa yar ba las// tsan+dan nags tshal dbyings su

'khrungs// shing ni pi la la zhes bya// tsan+dan 'od dang 'dzom pa 'byung// ming yang ma ta la bya'o// de yang dkar nag gnyis su byung// dkar po la yi thang chu 'dra// nag po rtsa rtse'i 'dab ma 'dra// mnam pa'i dri yang zhim pa la// bsreg pa'i dri yang shin tu gdang// de yi yon tan brgya dang ldan// ye shes lha yi thugs dam rgyud bskul zhing// sras mchog kI la ya ni brnag pa'i las la 'dzud// dam can mkha' 'gro ma ni mngag pa'i las la 'dzud// dgra bo sdang ba lha dang nye thag bcad// bgegs kyi grong khyer cho nges chen po 'debs// spos dang du ba kun gyi mchog chen byed// ma mo'i rims nad bal yams thams cad dang// bgegs las phyung ba'i nad dang 'byung pos rkyen pa la// du ba gtang ba tsam gyi 'jil bar byed// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi rnams kyi nad la rgyug mod kyang// lhag par chu ser nag po gtan nas 'don// lums su byas na spangs shing 'bur ba 'jil// thigs pa bcu pa yar ba las// sda sdo ko mo'i shing du 'khrungs// chu yi phur mo lta bur gnas// chu bur lta bur brtsegs pa ste// stan gyi ki zhe sa su grags// lum pa'i rtsa dang sbyar gyur na// mi'am dud gro gang rung gi/ chad nas has pa'i bdud rtsi yin// gal te mnam nas za ma nus// bu ram dkar po dag dang sbyar// 'phong nas bcug pa'i 'tsho bar 'gyur// chu nad can gyis rtag tu bza'// thigs pa bcu gcig yar ba las// rgya mtsho chab kyi nang du 'khrungs// chu yi nang nas skyes pa yi// tse na rtsa mo dag tu 'khrungs// rtag tu zas su zos gyur na// chu rdo bshig pa'i bdud rtsi yin// glang po'i rtsa las gyur pa yin// dbyibs kyang pho mtshan tshul du+u gnas// 'jam zhing snying yang mgo la yod// nyal rdo chu yi nang du sdod// de zos chu rdo 'jig par 'gyur// bdud rtsi'i rgyal por ngas bshad do// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyud las/ chu snod lgang ba'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu yis// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// de yi pho mtshan yar ba las// be ta gsang mtshan gsang mdzad de// be ta'i 'bras bu bzhi ru yar// gcig ni byi tshe shing gi mgul du 'khrungs// lo ma rtsub cing dar ba mkhrang// sha ba'i rlig pa 'dra mod kyang// spu can khong stong snying po med// bdud rtsi chen po a 'bras yin// chu dang mkhal ma rlig pa skrang// rtsa rnams cung zhig 'khrugs pa dang// 'gags pa gso ba'i bdud rtsi yin// thig pa gnyis pa yar ba las// 'jam byed byis pa'i shing du 'khrungs// pags pa rlon zhing 'dab ma rlog/ snying po spu gu can du 'khrungs// 'bras bu g.yu sgong lta bu la// nus pa gong dang 'dra bar bshad// bdud rtsi chen po 'jam 'bras yin// gsum pa sa la yar

ba las// nags tshal thag chen gling du 'khrungs// tsu ta'i shing las skyes pas na// bdud rtsi chen po sa 'bras yin// gnag la 'dril zhing ze mo kyong// nus pa gong dang de bzhin 'dra// bzhi pa sa la yar ba las// brag bar sa 'jam gling la 'khrungs// rtsa ba ldem la ngar ba ldem// spu bu can la 'dab ma srab// byin po mkhregs la kha tshe gsum// bdud rtsi po ni so 'cha' yin// skyug pa 'dren pa kun gyi sman// de yi gsang mtshan yar ba las// tshan pa lnga ru+u gyes te song// gnyis ni snang ldan shing la babs// gcig ni dog mo'i sa la babs// snang ldan shing la babs pa ni// mtshan ma'i pags pa yar ba yin// pags pa'i phyi shun yar ba las// lte ba rgyun gcad ces su byung// tshar chung yod pa'i sa ru 'khrungs// shing tshad gzhan gyi tho lus su// sngo dang bcas te skye mi nus// rtse mo khrad cing rtsa ba gyad// 'dab ma dag kyang cung zhig skyur// sems can bya ma byi yang za// gcig ni sngo med gram pa'i gling// sngo rnams skye ba'i mi 'gyur zhing// sa phyogs rtsub pa'i gnas su 'khrungs// de ni rabs chad nag po'i shing// nag la khrad cing 'bras bu nag/ shing ni de ltar gnyis dang ni// bya ma byi yi spu dang gsum// rin chen gser dang bzhi sbyar na// sems can mos pa mi mthun pas// skye ba mngal gyi sgo 'gegs yin// bdud rtsi chen po yin par bshad// pho mtshan phyi shun yar ba'i rtags// 'bras bu med pa de ltar 'byung// pho mtshan nang shun yar ba las// mchi la pang byid de la babs// nam mkha'i bdud rtsi za ba'i phyir// gangs kyi ltongs na de bzhin gnas// nam mkha'i bdud rtsi thigs gsum byung// da byid kyis ni 'thungs pa las// khar tshad 'thungs pa'i de ring sbyar// bcu drug nyin mo mi la bsnun// de nas rtsi thog ma rgyas par// mo yi lus la gnas par nges// bdud rtsi thigs gsum babs pa de// gzhan gyis tshor bar mi 'gyur te// mchil pa dag dad de bzhin 'thungs// da byid mchil pa de nyid sha/ sems can skyes rgyud 'phel ba yi// pho mtshan nang sha yin pa'i rtags// chu ba 'greng dang 'bras bu'i gsos// sems can 'khor bar chags pa la// skye rgyud 'phel ba'i bdud rtsi yin// dog mo sa la babs pa de// snyi sa klung shod dag tu 'khrungs// rtsa ba pho mtshan shi ba'i tshul// lo ma gcin gyi rjes 'dra ste// dri yang mje yi sbre ru mnam// ro yang mngar la sbre ru kha// bdud rtsi chen po lca ba bya// rlung dang chu ser 'dul ba'i sman// de yi gsang mdzod yar ba las// de yang thigs pa gsum du yar// thigs gcig sa la yar ba las// bsil lam gling gi steng du 'khrungs// mdog smug tshor ma phra ba las// me tog dkar dang ser pos brgyan// klu yi bdud rtsi gra ma bya// klu

rnams kun gyi sman gyi mchog/ 'dre nad kun gyi sman gyi mchog/ dbang bskur byed na so shing bya// sbyin sreg byed na shing bu bya// lums su byed na pags pa bzhar// sman du byed na me tog la// gsang mdzod rkub rlig bar gyi chu+u ba yar// bsod nams can gyi khang rtsar 'khrungs// rtsa ba snyi zhing ngar pa smug/ btab na skye zhing 'bras bu ngan// bdud rtsi chen po gur shing byung// de yang pho mo gnyis su srid// pho skyes ser la mo skyes smug/ dus su bzhu bar gyur na yang// pho skyes steng la mo skyes 'og/ pho ni lu gu'i tshan bu 'dra// mo ni grang chang skyo ma bzhin// sbyin sreg byed na mchod pa'i rdzas// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad la yang// pho skyes phyogs dag kun du rgyug/ mo skyes cung zhig tsha bar gnas// nad rnams kun la cung zhig 'gyengs// pho skyes 'ju ba'i bdud rtsi yin// gtso bo yin par ngas ma bshad// snam log g.yas g.yon yar ba las// rgyal po'i khang bzang lta bu 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po shing kun yin// shing yang tshan che lu+u ma bzhir// lte lta nu yi skyugs pa bzhag/ dri yang 'tshub cing dri gzhug kha// pho skyes dkar la mo skyes nag/ ri bong gla ba'i ril ma 'dra// ya ma dkar nag gnyis dang ni// tsha rlung grang rlung gnyis kyi bskal pa las// pho mtshan yar bas de ltar byung// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyud las/ gsang mdzod pho mtshan gyi le'u ste rtsa gnyis pa'o//// bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yis// rU tra chen po bsgral ba las// de yi lce chung yar ba las// 'dzam bu gling gi byang du 'khrungs// mu+u le drung shing zhes pa byung// yan lag nying lag shin tu rgyas// de la 'bras bu lnga byung ste// gcig ni mkha' lding bya rgod za// grang nad 'ju ba'i bdud rtsi yod// gcig ni gshog rgyas ne les za// slo yis dug rnams byas gyur na// shing gis phog pa'i rma rnams 'tsho// shing gi nyes pa 'tsho bar 'gyur// gcig ni mkha' lding bgegs la babs// spun rnams 'ju ba'i bdud rtsi yod// gcig ni rtsal chen glag la babs// khrag skran 'ju ba'i bdud rtsi yod// kun la 'ju sman yod mod kyang// klad pa gre ba glo ba dang// mkhal ma mchin pa dag la bshad// lag pa'i rtsa chen yar ba las// de yang g.yas g.yon gnyis su yar// bdud rtsi chen po seng lding shing// smug po rtsa smug phyi nas yar// de yang pho mo gnyis su gnas// pho skyes sro ma ka ru la// sro ma thur la bstan te byung// mdangs dang gting nas dum gcig nag/ mo skyes sro ma sbu gu la// kha dog mdangs kyang cung zhig gser// kha yang gyen la bstan nas byung// pho skyes snying lung snying po yin// mo skyes chu ser tshos mdze'i sman// bla rtsa g.yas g.yon yar ba las// stag pa dkar po'i slags su

'khrungs// stag pa shun lpags bsil ba'i sman// slag ni khrag zags pa la gtang// klad pa'i rtsa gnyis yar ba las// shug pa glang ma pho mor 'khrungs// shug pa dag gi 'dab ma yang// dug dang bdud rtsi kun la rgyug/ glang ma lcang ma ngar ba yang// skyobs dang byang bu 'jam pa'i rtsi// chag dang tshigs byung 'jam pa'i rtsi// bzo dbyibs legs par thon na ni// rkyen gyis chags pa'i bdud rtsi yin// mchan rtsa g.yas g.yon yar ba las// phu dang mda' yi phyogs su 'khrungs// phu skyes pho yi gya rta bya// mda' skyes mo yi 'om bu bya// yun gcig nus gcig ro yang gcig/ dmar shal 'brum pa can gyi shing// ro mgo kha la ro rtsa mngar// chu ser bad kan smug po'i sman// mkhal ma'i rtsa gnyis yar ba las// brag dang ri sul khyab par 'khrungs// bdud rtsi chen po smyug ma 'khrungs// de yang pho mo gnyis byung ste// pho ni sbom zhing tshigs thag ring// mo ni phral zeg tshigs thag nye// 'dab ma zo ba'i tshul du gnas// pho ni pho yi mkhal gyi sman// mo ni mo nad kun la gtang// ol gong rtsa chen yar ba las// byin gyi brlabs pa'i sa ru babs// rtsa ba cung zhig spog pa dang// 'dab ma'i spu yang cung zhig spun// mo yi ra gnyer 'dra mod kyang// bungs dang chas te skye mod kyang// sha rnams lci bar gyur pa la// yar bar gyur te gdon mi za// sman rnams nad la 'dred gyur kyang// 'di yis khrid na phigs par 'gyur// kha ru tshwa dang sbyar gyur na// rlung rnams ming yang med par 'gyur// 'o ma dag dang sbyar gyur na// rlung gis gtogs pa'i nad la phan// re tsha mur na gdang zhing tsha// zhu rjes skyobs pa'i phyogs su 'grab// rU tra ol gong pa yi shing// rlig rtsa g.yas g.yon yar ba las// rtsa gcig chu yis mgul du 'khrungs// bdud rtsi shing rtsa pho mor byung// chung zhing khrad de spa ma'i tshul// pho skyes sa kha mo skyes smug/ kun la 'jug pa'i bdud rtsi bshad// rna rtsa g.yas g.yon yar ba las// rna rtsa pho mo gnyis su skyes// rna ba lta bu'i ri la 'khrungs// sku ma pho yi shing du 'khrungs// lo ma ngar pa'i mtshams na ni// rnying pa'i ldum bu dmar rtsa gcig/ shin tu bsil bar gyur pa yin// smin ma'i rtsa gnyis yar ba las// rtsa med brag med bye sar 'khrungs// 'dab ma grog ma'i sked 'dra la/ me tog ser po bkrag med 'byung// snying po ug chos g.yag gi tshul// lug gi rwa bzhin skyes pa de// 'gyang na ro ni tsha ru bro// ra tsha zhes su grags pa yin// chu ba 'ju ba'i bdud rtsi yin// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba shing gi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yis// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// rU tra rus pa'i mchi ma dang/ kha chu sna chu pho mtshan chu// bzhi

char dus gcig brubs pa las// gcig ni bdud rtsi sman chur 'khrungs// sa rtsub brag gi mgul du 'khrungs// dri yang chung zhing 'dab pa las// mnyam gnyis gzhan las cung zhig lci// 'thungs na bad kan 'joms pa'i sman// pho mtshan chu chen yar ba las// gting 'khyil ma dros mtsho ru 'khyil// de yi dkyil du dug pa'i ri// pho mtshan lta bu'i dbyibs 'dra la// dzam bu br-i k+Sha'i shing du 'khrungs// rU tra dregs pas ngar chu lug/ bar du bya yi chu ru lug/ sgong nga dgu yi thang du lug/ kyi ni thang chung gsang ba dang// mo ni thang chung rno ba yis// gtan tshigs dang po de nas byung// rwa gnyis gyen du btegs pa ni// lha yi bdud rtsi chen po yin// sa la 'byung bas lug rur 'khrungs// lums su byas na lci ba'i nad// zhag gsum lon nas sel bar byed// mo ru byas na rmug pa babs// nad pa sman pa bzhi bdag la// lha yis 'go ba spyod mi spyod// rig pa de ru shar du byung// rwa de cung zhig bsregs byas nas// ha cang tshig min grang ba min// kha ru tsha dang sbyar gyur na// pho log na bar gyur na yang// skad cig ma yis 'tsho bar 'gyur// de yi bal dgun tha chung brnga// de yang gsum du gsungs pa las// gcig la ju thig thi gu'i mo// dgra dang grogs dang gnyen stobs rnams// rig pa de las 'byung zhing babs// gcig ni gos su byas gyur ram// stan du bting nas mal g.yogs na// bal spus chen po zhes bya ste// grang ba'i nad med nyams bder 'gyur// shing bal be'u 'phrug dar zab rnams// dro bar gyur yang nad skyed dug/ de yi skyobs su 'gro bar yang// 'dab chags sgro dang gcan gzan spu// stag spu dom spu ma gtogs pa// thams cad de yi skyobs su bshad// dom spu mig gi sman yin te// stag spu de bzhin chu ser sman// grang bas na ba ma gtogs ni// gzhan dag rnams la bkag pa med// gcig ni bar phying dkar por bsling// de yang gsum du gnas pa las// zhwa ru byas te gyon gyur na// tsha ba can rnams grang bar nus// grang ba can la phyi drod bskyed// de yang snyoms pa'i bdud rtsi yin// chu ser lug pa'i rna rnams la// chur bcug de yis dkri bar bya// chu ser nag po 'jil ba dang// dum bu phyed de snum du btso// rlung nad rnams kyi rtsa sgo bsrung// des na lus kyi bdud rtsi yin// dbyibs la nges pa med par gtub// sgo nga bag phye dag dang sprad// gong du skrangs la bcings gyur na// 'bur ba'i nad rnams 'phags mi nus// de yang bal gyi bdud rtsi yin// mgo yi lce dang klad pa dang// 'bri mar dag dang sbyar gyur na// brgyungs pa dag kyang de bzhin gtad// kha ru tshwa yis kha tshar gdab// klad pa legs par chos nas ni// chu skams 'o mas bslad cing

btso// srog pa rtsa la nad zhugs dang// mgo 'khor lus kyi cha 'khyom na// zhag bdun zos na 'tsho ba'i sman// chu 'thung ra sha zos gyur na// de la nus pa mi 'byung ngo// de yi glo dang rtsa yi khrag/ rma gsar dag pa glan 'gyur zhing// de yi pags rlon dag gis dkris// re 'jam bdud rtsi zhes kyang bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi skyobs btang na// reg pa kun kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur// de yi klad pa cung zad dang// rgya dar bsregs pa'i thal ba rnams// khrag med khrag tu 'gugs pa yin// de yi sogs pa g.yas g.yon ni// rU tra'i 'khor gyis byin gyis brlabs// nad pa'i khang sa dur sa dang// 'tsho dang mi 'tsho'i mngon shes 'byung// dung skyong ma yi byin rlabs kyis// me sman spra bas bsregs gyur na// nad pa bgegs kyis bskyod ma bskyod// nyi ma'i 'od bas gsal bar 'gyur// sog pa ltas kyis sha yin pas// sman pa bzang bar bshad pa las// de yi lag 'og rtsibs ma yang// nad pas zos na nad rnams kyang// gcan gzan zos pa'i sha byung na// rtsibs ma bdud kyi thag pa yin// gcig kyang za bar mi bya'o// mchin sog lha yi mchin pa yin// bzang ngan ltas kun de la blta// sha bcud snying dang rus bcud rkang// khrag bcud mchin dang rgyu bcud zhag/ lha mo'i 'phrin byed dbang thun bskyel// rig pa'i ltas kun babs pa las// bdud rtsi gcig kyang ma babs so// nad pa 'tsho dang snga phyi rnams// rig pa snod can de la dri// mkhas te shes par gyur na ni// rtsa chu gnyis kyi do yang min// nad pa klad pa chag gyur na// de bzhin lug gi mgo la yang// rus pa steng 'og de la brtag/ de bzhin snod la nyen langs na// snod kyi mtshan nyid phyes te brtags// rig pa'i gnas gzhi brtag gyur na// la phyi bzang ngan kun kyang mthong// phyi ma sha rnams kun kyang rgyu// glo long bdud rtsi yin mod kyi// ril ma phan chad sman yin no// sha yi sbyor ba gong dang mtshungs// gal te rlung nad che ba la// gsar du gtang dang rnying du gtang// sbyar la gtang dang gsum du 'dus// gsar du gtong bar gyur na yang// sha dang rus pa khrag dang gsum// tshil dang mar rnying dag gis bsres// mi tsha drod kyi de bzhin brgyan// nas rjen phye yis kha blangs nas// grod pa dag tu blugs gyur nas// g.yam sngon pa yi steng du gzhag/ rdza ma du ba med pa'i bar// 'od kyi kha ring tshos par btso// nar phyin char yang gtang gin bzang// shes pa rgyal po'i thugs ka nas// tshangs pa lha bya dkar po byung// gshin rje nag po'i thugs ka nas// sha zan mchu dmar nag po'i bya// khros nas sgo nga dgu ru+u byung// sgong gsum gnam la 'dril te song// gnam la bdud rtsi thigs gsum ni// pho rog bya rog khwa dang

gsum// snying rje ldan pa'i rtags yin te// bsad pa'i sha rnams mi za bar// ser bu shin tu rdzud par yod// de yi snying dang mdza' ba'i sman// bsil ba'i skyobs ni bdun yod na// shin tu brjod pa mi yong zhing// snying rlung dag gi gnyen po yin// tshe gsum dran byed the tshom med// pho rog srog gcod shin tu tsho// srog pa rtsa yi khrag dang ni// 'bru gsum a ru ra dang sbyar// rtsi mar dag gis sna khrid na// bar gcod cis kyang mi tshugs so// lo stong thub la the tshom med// khwa ta nag rung skad kyang che// sha dang rus pa a bar sbyar// mig 'bras klad pas tsho byas te// mar dkar dag gis sna khrid na// mig sman kun gyi gtso bo yin// sa yi 'og tu sbas pa yi// gter mthong ba la the tshom med// sgong gsum bar du yar ba las// khra dang 'ug pa hor pa gsum// 'ug pa'i sha yis kun kyang 'jigs// hor pa'i sha yis kun kyang 'ju/ khra yis drod rnams kun kyang snyoms// 'ug pa'i klad pa hor pa'i brang/ khra yi bshul sha dag la yod// sgong gsum sa la yar ba las// gcig ni kha ru ma rdol zhabs su lug/ lug pas shin tu sleb par lug/ lug ces bya ba'i sems can 'byung// sgo nga drod ni ma yal bar// dro la lug pas drod kyi sman// de yang phyi yi mngon pa drug/ sha yi gdeng yib shin tu dro// thong tsher grang ba'i sgo rnams sel// tshe sug kun kyang de dang mtshungs// khrag dang nang khrol dag la yang// 'tsho bar byed pa'i sman med do// cung zhig 'bras kyi phub ma ru// zla ba gnyis su bcud blangs na// kha gting med par drod tu 'gyur// rlung nad can gyi gnyen po ste// rma can dag gis cung mi thub// shing gi sgrom bur bzhag gyur na// dug ro can gyi de med pa// rma can rnams la sol bu+u brdzangs// de yang gang zhig rlon gyur na// chu ser skye ba'i rgyu yin no// ha cang tshos par mi bya zhing// zhag po bgrangs te btang bar 'byung// phyi skams nang ma g.yos la gtang// btsos bsgral gnyis po de bzhin no// bsgral ba'i dus dang dgun zla gsum// ston zla bsgral na khrag nad skyed// dpyid zla gsum la bad kan slong// dbyar zla mkhris pa de bzhin te// tshil bu rgyas pa'i dus su ni// nad rnams gzhan gyi ro mi ldang// de phyin tsho na nam yang bzang// sgo nga gcig ni zur la yar// ra zhes bya ba'i sems can byung// ngad pas spu yang cung zhig rtsub// khengs pas rwa yi gnyer ma mang// zur dang brag la 'dzegs pa dga'// rtsa rtse 'thog cing rtse yang g.yab// shin tu bsil ba'i bdud rtsi yang// glo ba klad pa mchin par yod// 'o ma ka ras mchin brgyangs na// me yi rtse yang 'chi bar bshad// chu grang dag la mchin bgrang na// mi tshangs mngal ba bkub nas

ni// gab pa la sogs tsha ba'i nad// dus der mod la 'jil bar nus// klad pa dag ni btsos gyur nas// mar dkar dag dang sbyar gyur na// tsha ba'i rlung rnams rab tu 'jil// mar rnying dag la rlung ldang na// dus der mig rtsa 'debs par byed// sgong gcig sa yi phag tu yib// zhag gcig lon nas gzod gcig rnyed// ming yang phag pa zhes su btags// sa dang 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// zhes kha gtsang sme rab tu chung// phag na 'dug pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// sa yi khron dag sna yis rog/ shin tu grang ba'i spu yang rtsub// mche ba can te rma yang 'jig/ sha rnams gzhun te rlung mi thub// mgo dang sna yang lhog pa'i sman// klad pa skrangs nad kun gyi lums// spu yi gzhob dang slo yi lums// nya dang sbrul dang sbal pa dang// sa bdag gzugs su ston pa yang// kho yi zas su byed pa'i phyir// sna yis skrangs nad kun kyang thub// mche bas lhog pa'i gnyen po 'ong// 'bu dang grogs ma sbur ba za// lhog pa de 'dra brdzus te 'byung// de phyir mgo bcu klad pa yang// sha rus tshil dang bcas te gtang// ru lu za za'i skad 'don nas// ma mo gnyen gyi lhog pa thub// kho rang sngags pa yin pa'i phyir// spu yi lcags kyi thur ma yis// bdud dang gshin rje'i lhog pa thub// mig ni dpral ba'i 'dzin sa lte// 'byung po bgegs kyi lhog pa thub// de phyir sha rgod sman gyi mchog/ shin tu skrangs nas byung ba'i 'jibs// phyi sha bad kan gtan nas 'don// nang khrol kun dang khrag tshil gyis// mkhris pa khrag gi ming yang med// rnam rtog 'joms pa'i bdud rtsi pa// gang gis skyobs pa ma yin te// gcig pus thub pa'i sman yin no// khrag zags pa dang rgas pa dang// rims nad drag la gtang mi bya// dar la babs pa'i mi rnams la// gang la gtang yang nyes pa med// lus zhes bya ba'i ming yang btags// de yang rnam pa gsum yin te// rlung nad kun la mchog tu bsngags// rnying par gtang ba'i mtshan nyid ni// sha dang rus pa mgo bo rnams// bcud blangs shing gi sgrom du gzhug/ lo gcig lon nas sha gtang na// sha rlug rlog pa'i rlung la phan// lo gnyis lon nas rus pa gtang// ltag mig lhog pa'i rlung la gtang// rlung dang srin bu bsdongs la phan// lo bzhi lon nas mgo gtang na// ya ma dkar nag 'joms par nus// lo lnga lon par gyur nas ni// smyo ba'i rlung nad kun la phan// lo drug lon nas 'thibs pa sel// lo bdun lon nas shed chung ba// che bar 'gyur te the tshom med// brgyad nas nus pa zad ces bya// sha yi sbyor bar 'gyur na ni// bud med sha dang bsres te btso// mdze nad dag la rab tu bsngags// lo brgyad 'das kyi mar ni rnying pa dang// ma phrad gzhon gyi sha

dang rus par bcas// lug gi mjug rus med pa de bzhin brdung// lug gi pags pas grol te zla gcig bsnyal du gzhug/ shin tu+u tshos par byas te khu ba de la bstim// chang gsar thigs gcig blugs te btsos gyur na// spod de kha ru tshwa yis rab brgyan na// snying rlung brjed byed smyo byed rtsa ba gting nas 'don// phag pa'i sha tshil dag dang sbyar gyur zhing// dong gra dag gi spod byas gsar par gyur na bad kan sman// rnga bran sha dang gnyis su med par brdung// ka ra dkar po'i spod kyis brgyan par gyur// shin tu btsos dang mdzo zho mngal dang sprad// rma rnams tshad skyes rnag rnams gcod pa'i sman// lo gsum lon pa'i lug ru dang// rgod g.yag sar gyi sha tshil shin tu tsho// lug gi khog par blugs te bkab byas te// tsha ba gsum gyi spod dang kha ru tshwa// 'bri mar cung zhig dag dang sbyar/ kha ches lums su byas te chang gis btso// nar phyin chang gis btung chu byas gyur na// lcags kyi rdo rnams khong na yod kyang 'ju// gal te sman mar dag gi gsos byed na// grang ba dag la sbyar na sha rnying gtang// dpyid dang dbyar ston sha de gtang ba min// snyoms par 'dod na 'phral sha gtang// dpyid dang dbyar gyi sha yang gsar mi gtang// dpyid dang dbyar ni rnga bran sha yis gso// lug gi sha ni zla drug yin te zla drug bzang po min// mig chu sna chu gnyis po yang// gong du 'khrungs pa de dang mtshungs// bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyud las/ rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i chu bzhi 'drub pa las/ pho mtshan dri chu'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu'i sa// rU tra chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// de yis dreg pa yar ba las// byang gi rtsa mar 'khrungs so// rwa la gzhu byung drang srong thogs// mi rnams 'jig rten mda' yis su// sha las drod byung grang ba 'joms// ston zla tha chung dpyid zla chung// dus ni pho la yod mod kyang// brgal nas mo la bdud rtsi 'byung// pho mo 'khor bar gnas mod kyang// ded sha dag la sman mi 'byung// 'dril na nams kyang legs par bshad// rU tra chen po'i dregs yin pas// de nas rdul gyis phyis gyur na// dreg pa zhu bzhin rtul bas yal// 'dril bas dreg pa zhu 'gyur te// rkang dpyi gnyis kyi bar nas ni// grang ba 'joms pa'i sman yod de// dpral ba'i ka ba dag la yang// me ro rnying dang 'da' sman dang// tshig pa byed pa'i sman yod do// rU tra'i ba spu yar ba las// rkyang dang rngas dang gtsos su 'khrungs// rkyang zhes bya ba'i sman rnams ni// zho la rtsal rdzogs sa la bro// bya yi zos pas dus tshod mkhas// gtsos zhes bya ba'i snying khrag la// srid tshol ba yi bdud rtsi babs// bu mor skye ba'i bud med

dang// sha ma ma byin pa la gtang// rngas zhes bya ba'i spun mo de// klad pa 'gyur ba'i tshil bu la// mgo srin sel pa'i sman yod do// rU tra'i rkang sor yar ba las// rta rkyang rnga mo ba men sha/ mdzo dang bong bu gnyan dang ni// gna' dgo gnyis te bcu byung ngo// rta ni chu ser tshabs re'i sman// mchin pa dag la yod pa yin// tsho na brang gi ldebs la gnas// rkyang ni chu ser skrangs pa'i sman// rnga mo dreg la sman pa'i sha/ ba men sha 'u gso ba'i sman// rme sha la dug gso ba'i sman// mdzo ni shin tu snyoms pa ste// bong bu tshabs ro dag la phan// rnga mo kun la snyoms pa'i sman// gnyan sha gna' dgo snyoms par gsungs// rU tra'i rkang sor yin pa'i phyir// rta mgyogs rkyang grims rnga mo ske// ba men rwa dang rme sha'i gzugs// mdzo yi rtsal dang bong bu'i skad// gnyan gyi bang dang gna' ba'i 'dzegs// khyad par spyod pa'i yon tan ri// rU tra'i rkang pa yin pas byung// rU tra'i lce las gyes pa ni// kom pa'i ko ba rgya yi sha/ shin tu 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i sman// rU tra de yi mthu las ni// lhag pa'i yon tan re re yod// rgya yi dar ni rin po che// dgo ba'i thul ba chu bas mnyen// kom pa'i gnya' bas sa gzhi rlog/ de ltar mi rnams don du byung// rU tra'i mche ba bcu bzhi la// mche ba re re bton pa las// smad dang ngan skyugs bcas nas byung// 'o ma bsil la tshil bu drod// sha rus sris rnams cha snyoms phan// de yi ngan skyug chu srin yin// mi dreg phyugs dreg dom dang gsum// sha tshil grang ba'i gnyen po la// skrangs dang rengs pa thams cad 'ju// mkhris pa de bzhin rma yi sman// dom gyi brang ze snying la yod// de rtags spu ni ka rur 'byung// mi dreg nu ma'i dkyil na yod// de rtags nu ma spus mi 'gegs// phyugs dreg brla yi sul na yod// de phyir brla la sro mi chags// spra dang spre dang byi la gsum// de ltar gsum ni ngan skyugs yin// stag dang gzig dang gung dang gsum// bad kan 'joms pa'i sman yin no// lhog rgal skran dang mes tshig dang// gzhan ma cis kyang mi 'tsho ba'i// ma rnying dag la mkhris pas phan// sram dang gyi sram chu byi gsum// de ltar gsum ni ngan skyugs yin// stag gi 'gram pa dag la yod// de rtags 'jum phran dag tu byung// gzig gi spu sul dag na yod// de rtags spu yang thig ler byung// gung gi bshul sha dag la yod// de rtags mjug ma'i spu yang 'tsher// spyang ki 'phar ba wa dang khyi// spyang ki bshul sha dro ba'i sman// 'phar ba snga dro gsod na rkang pa g.yas// dgongs mo gsod na dmigs la babs// nub mo snying la de bzhin te// bdud rtsi 'phar bas 'phar ma yin// rma rnams dros par gyur pa dang// mo tshad langs par gyur pa'i sman// khyi

yi lce yang rma yi sman// wa yang glo la phan pa'i sman// sa byas spo dkar bra ba byi// de ltar bzhi ni ngan skyugs yin// spra dang spre dang byi la gsum// grang ba 'joms pa'i bdud rtsi yin// g.yi yi rna ba gsa' yi mjug/ spre yi nu+u ma gsum la ni// ma dgug pa yi sman yang yod// chu lug chu rta ra rgod gsum// de ltar gsum ni ngan skyugs yin// ra rgod bsil te rma rnams 'joms// sog brag dag la ce spyang byung// khrag rengs kun kyang 'ju bar bshad// de yi ngan skyugs kha sha yin// rU tra'i lag sor gyes pa las// gcig ni mo rnams kun la babs// ma phrad zhon gyi sha rus rnams// rlung gi bdud rtsi yin par bshad// 'phyi ba'i tshil bu dgun zla gsum// rlung dang mig gi bdud rtsi yin// rtsangs pa'i sha yang dreg la phan// sbal pa de bzhin lkog ma'i sman// de rnams lag pa g.yon pa yin// g.yas pa 'jig rten mkha' la skyur// gcig la babs pa yod ma yin// gzhan yang sems can tha dad pa'i// mthun pa'i bdud rtsi yod mod kyang// rU tra'i bdud rtsi babs pa med// shar re sman re smos pa yang// rang re'i sha dang stobs kyi sha/ bsil ba'i skyabs kyang bsil bas bya// tsha ba'i skyabs kyang debazhin bya// snyoms pa ci rigs pa yis bya// gal te 'khrugs par gyur na ni// rU tra'i babs lugs nor ba yis// kho yi mthu dpal byin rlabs kyis// nad rnams rengs nas 'khrugs par 'gyur// dpon med tho cho sgra la brten// shes rgyud med pa'i khong dregs mkhan// nad rnams 'khrugs pa'i dka' ba med// gdams med dug tu sbyor ba de// rgyus med mthong ba'i skyon yin pas// rdo rje dmyal bar de 'gro ste// nad rnams 'khrugs pas mi chog ste// rU tra chen po'i bka' chad 'byung// sha sman de dag kun kyang ni// rU tra'i sprul pa ma yin te// kho yi bdud rtsi babs pa yin// nor bas log pa'i lam du 'gro// rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi ji ltar 'khrungs pa'i rgyud las/ rU tra'i lus bshig sha sman gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//// de nas rU tra'i dpag bsam shing// shing gi dkyil du srin gcig byung// srin bu de yi kha chu las// srin de zhag tu khyil gyis chags// de yang dngul sgor dkar po smin// de las dngul sha ru bcu byung// skyo nas shing gi kha la rtse// bdud kyi byol kha log pa yin// skyo nas bdud rtsi thigs pa 'thungs// mtho ris gnas bcu'i bdud rtsi'i rtags// rwa bcu gnam la 'gengs pa yang// mi yi tshe srog gcod pa 'dzin// ltogs na shing gi 'bras bu za// mi yi yul du 'khor ba'i rtags// rwa bcu dung gi ka ra yod// lha yi sprul pas don byed rtags// dbyar zla 'go pa rwa bcu skyur// lha yis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtags// pags pa gnyen la mtshon

rtse drug/ bdud kyis dbang bsgyur byas pa'i rtags// sa la rdung na phyi ba 'gum// sha la bdud rtsi babs pa'i rtags// rlubs su rul dang dug tu yod// mo la byin gyis ma brlabs pas// rwa med yul mo sman med do// srin gyi bu las skyes pa'i phyir// mjug ma'i steng na srin sman yod// ston zla tha chung nyi shu bdun// lhag pa'i bdud rtsi gsum yod do// dgun zla byung nas mo la 'jug/ mo yi mngal du zhag bdun gnas// dpyid zla tha chung nyi shu bdun// 'dzi klad gnyis kyi bar na gnas// de nas gzhung pa dag la zhen// zhag grangs rtsi yin nu bar zhes// dang po shing gi srin rgod yin// de ltar rang mig yin pa la// srin la ma phan ci yang med// byung ba'i dus na phyir la log/ rwa ni lha yi srin sman byed// lha yis gzung bas gzung rtags su// ru bcu yod de brdung mi shes// rwa gsum gdus pa'i khu ba de// rgyal ba dge 'dun dge bshes sman// rmig pa lce ni bdud kyi sman// bdud kyis khyer ba'i khyer rtags su// tshil bu rgyas pa'i dus na du// drag shul srin log kun la gtang// mkhris pa klu yi sman du khyer// klu yi khyer ba'i rtags su ni// mkhris pa gzugs med rgyu mar zug/ mkhris rten khrag gi mchin pa ni// ston zla tha chung dgun zla la// zas kyi srin log rnams la gtad// de nas lha mo phrin las mdzad// char ni zim zim dus su babs// gangs kyi ltongs su babs pa las// ltog pas g.ya' sman zla tsher zis// g.ya' sman skyugs sdang kha chu las// sro lo phung po bdun du byung// skyes pa'i 'dab ma la sogs pa// gangs sman de dang 'dra mod kyang// cung zhig klad pa me tog med// yon tan gangs sman sum gnyis dang// bsil ba'i sgo nas 'dra bar bshad/ bal bu sur bu'i tsha ru gshegs// kha chu bcad dang thigs pa yar// tsha bsil bdud rtsi'i sman byung ste// de yang yon tan bzhi ru shes// co do tsha la sdong po bsil// ru bas lha min phrin las skyong// ngar bas dgra lha'i bla shing byed// sur bu shin tu tsha gyur te// lha dang klu yi bdud rtsi yin// rtsa ba lo ma med par tsha// de nas brag gi sked la gshegs// brag sman mkhan bu ne le chu// de yang bsil te glo yi sman// de nas lung gi mdo ru gshegs// chu ngan thigs gcig yar ba las// sru sru sru 'dra mkhan dmar gsum// grang ba tsha ba skyed pa'i sman// de yang mi yul skyi ting byon// kha chu gnam la yar ba las// lums kyi bdud rtsi chen por babs// she'u pho la sman mi 'khrungs// sge'u'i dus na bad kan skye// skom bu snga res snyoms pa'i sman/ kha ru gnyis la sman yod de// phongs nas sha brun bdun du yar// gnyis ni a ba du ru ka/ gnyis ni spang spos g.ya' spos gnyis// gnyis ni brag spos rgod spos gnyis// blug la

rgya spos bre gang byung// de dang lta mi phrin lam 'byor// de yi rjes ni bdun du bor// mi yul rjes las sa gro byung// nags kyi rjes las spa ma byung// na yi rjes las thul pa byung// g.ya' yis rjes las ro thang byung// brag gi rjes las glang po byung// spang gi rjes las byang ba byung// chu ru nyal bas sha bal byung// shing srin sha ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//// de ltar rU tra chen po de'i lus sman du bshigs nas 'jig rten gyi khams su khengs pa de nyid/ sems rdo rje sems dpar gnas thob cing sangs rgyas/ 'khor rnams phyi rabs kyi tshogs kyang ngo// yang 'khor rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams na sman min pa'i ming yang mi grag go/ de nas 'jam dpal rnon pos rang gi stan las langs te/ bskor ba lan stong byas nas kyang/ phyag lan stong 'tshal nas mchod pa du+u mas mchod nas 'di skad ces bstod do// e ma bde gshegs kun gyi sku// grags tshad rmad byung ngo mtshar che// e ma bde gshegs kun gyi gsung// sman gyi sbyor ba ngo mtshar che// e ma bde gshegs kun gyi thugs// sgrub pa'i lta spyod ngo mtshar che// e ma bde gshegs yon tan che// drang srong rig pa bco brgyad mkhyen// e ma bde gshegs phrin las che// rU tra'i mthu+u dpal sman du che// rU tra sman du gyur pa bzhin// bdag cag rnams kyang sman du gyur// rU tra sangs rgyas sa thob bzhin// bdag cag rnams kyang sa la zhog/ ces 'khor na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ drang srong rnams kyis gsol ba btab pas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyi gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ 'jam dpal gyi phyag g.yas su log rtog thams cad 'joms pa'i ral gri gcig gtad de/ sems spar te bdud rtsi sman du gyur par dbang bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang thob nas 'jam dpal gyis rang lus bshigs nas bdud rtsi sman du sprul/ de nas lha'i gnas thams cad bdud rtsi sman gyi gang ngo// de nas brgya byin la babs/ de nas ded dpon la babs/ de nas gzhon nu sred la babs/ de nas li tsA bi dri ma med pa la babs so// de nas 'jam dpal kyi ral gri phyag na rdo rje la gtad do// yang lus gong bzhin bsgral te/ gnod sbyin gyi yul thams cad bdud rtsis bkang ngo// de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la babs so// de nas nab so skyes la babs so// de la sogs pa drang srong bco lnga la babs so// mi'i gnas su pha khol la babs so// de nas 'jam dpal gyi ral gri de/ spyan ras gzigs la gtad nas las bshigs nas/ klu'i yul du sman dang bdud rtsis bkang ngo// de nas dga' bo la sogs pa// drang srong bcu gsum la babs

so// mi'i gnas su klu sgrub snying po la babs so// de bzhin du lha dang klu dang/ tshangs pa dang/ gza' dang/ skar ma dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma srin sde brgyad dang/ nam gru dang/ mkha' 'gro dang/ ro langs dang/ mi dang dud 'gro dang/ dmyal ba dang/ yi dwags la sogs pa kun la ral gri de gtad de/ lus bshigs nas/ 'tsho ba rnams mchod par phul te sman du mdzad de 'di skad ces dmod bor ro// bdag cag rnams ni bdud rtsi'i mchog ma nor pa yis bsgrubs lags na/ gal te dam log blta nor na/ rU tra gcig tu skyes bar shog/ dpal gyi thugs rje 'byung bar shog/ bdag cag rnams ni bsgral bar shog/ bsgral nas dpal chen gsol bar shog/ yan lag sman du 'khrungs bar shog khog pa gdan du 'ding bar shog/ sems ni rdo rje sems dpar shog ces dmod bor zhing lhan ne lhang nger kun kyang bsgrub cing gnas so// drang srong rnams kyi yul na/ tsa ra ka bam po 'bum sde gcig bzhugs pa las/ rU tra sman gyi le'u brtul zhugs drag po'i bam po drug pa las/ drang srong phyis 'byung gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//// de ltar 'og min chos dbyings kyi pho brang nas/ don phyin ci ma log par grags so// mdzad spyod spa bkod pa'i bam po dang/ khyad par srog rtsa'i bam po dang/ snang bcud brgyad kyi bam po dang/ dngas pa rtsa'i bam po dang/ dngas ma snod kyi bam po dang/ yan lag sha'i bam po dang/ lam ring drang srong gi bam po dang bdun no// 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du/ dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nus mdzad spyod brgyad las/ zhi ba'i mdzad spyod sems can 'dul// khro bo'i mdzad spyod rU tra 'dul// ta na skye shi med pas gnas lung ston// ga Na bcing grol med pas mo rnams sbyor// mthun 'jug chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong ston// mi 'gyur chos nyid rol pa'i lta ba ston// thugs rje'i gsos kyi thams cad sman du 'khrungs pa las// 'og min thugs rje'i gsos kyis mdzad pa las/ bdud rtsi rin po che 'khrungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba 'og min du grags pa rdzogs so//// lha yul du grags par yang 'gro'o// mi yul du+u grags par yang rgyud kha cig bzhugs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang/ gnyags dz+nyA nas bsgyur ba'o////

rgya gar skad du a mr-i ta karma sa mu dra tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ gnas mchog chos nyid ma skyes pa'i klong nas/ 'khor chos nyid la chos nyid bdud rtsi chen po 'di bshad de/ dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa'i dus na/ dpal kun tu bzang po'i thugs las rdo rje sems dpa' phyung nas/ thal mo sbyar nas lan gsum bskor nas/ bdud rtsi chen po las rgya mtsho'i rgyud 'di zhus so// lta ba rgya mtsho ji ltar blta// spyod pa rgya mtsho ji ltar spyad// bsgrub pa rgya mtsho ji ltar bsgrub// sbyor ba rgya mtsho ji ltar sbyar// bsgral ba'i phrin las ji ltar bsgral// bdud rtsi sman chen gang du bsgrub// dam tshig bsrung ba ji ltar bsrung// phrin las rgya mtsho'i las rnams kun// lung dang man ngag rnam pa du// kun tu bzang pos bshad du gsol/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod nyon cig/ gnas mchog yum gyi dkyil 'khor na// gnyis med lhun gyis gnas pa'i tshe// de tshe nyan thos dge 'dun dang// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang// dgra bcom ming yang med nang du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor na// srid gsum sems can dug chen lnga// sku lnga ye shes lnga dang ldan// rang bzhin med par spyad byas pas// stong gsum b+han+b+ha bzang 'khor du// zhe sdang lta bu'i dug chen la// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// rang bzhin med par sbyar byas pas// bdud rtsi zhes nas de la bya// shar phyogs sku gsum gzhal yas su// bde bar gshegs pa'i pho brang du// gti mug lta bu'i dug chen la// stong pa nyid kyi rtsis sbyongs pas// bdud rtsi zhes nas de la bya// lho phyogs thub med gzhal yas su// rin chen rigs kyi pho brang du// nga rgyal lta bu'i dug chen la// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// gnyis su med par rab sbyongs pas// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// nub phyogs dpag med gzhal yas su// pad+ma rigs kyi pho brang du// 'dod chags lta bu'i dug chen la// so sor rtogs pa'i rtsis sbyangs pas// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// byang phyogs mtha' med gzhal yas su// las kyi rigs kyi pho brang du// phrag dog lta bu'i dug chen la// bya ba nan tan rtsis sbyangs pas// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// don gyi bdud rtsi ma bcos so// rtog pa'i bdud rtsi sangs rgyas pa'o// rdzas kyi bdud rtsi lhun gyis grub// kun tu bzang po'i thugs dkyil nas// dus gsum srid gsum sku gsung thugs// ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir// nges pa'i lung nas bka' stsal te// zab mo'i klong nas phyung ste

bstan// de nas bde gshegs thams cad dang// thabs gcig bzhugs pa'i dgongs pa ni// bla na med pa'i byang chub tu// ye shes mnyam pa'i nyams rnyed nas// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral thob ste// kun gyi dam pa 'di gsungs so// sgrub dang bsgrub par bya ba dang// 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir// gsang sngags gsang ba'i man ngag ni// bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung// snying por bsdus pa'i nges pa yi// byang chub 'byung ba'i snying po mchog/ lta ba dang ni nges tshig la// bsam gyi mi khyab bstan pa dang// brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam grangs kyang// theg pa'i sgo ni gsum du 'dus// gsang nyid yi ger bsdu dang bzhi// ldem por dgongs dang don dam yang// dkri pa'i don te sangs rgyas yin// rna brgyud bstan par thugs brtol te// thig le chos skus khyab pa'i phyir// nges pa'i lung yang sangs rgyas so// sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su grol// gsang sngags gsang bas sangs rgyas te// byang chub sems 'di kun tu dag/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen nyid// ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rgya// ye nas bya med bya mi dgos// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul ba'i sgra// mi rtog sbyang ba'i yul ma yin// de lta bu yi rtag 'dzin gyis// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gyur ba yin// nges par 'byung ba chen po la// bdag 'dzin med bzhin bzhag pas na// byang chub sems nyid ltung gnas med// bu gcig ma btsal bde bar gnas so// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag gsum// dmangs dang rje dang rgyal po'i tshul// khyad par rtsal 'phags thag ring yang// gcig la gcig gi ngang nyid du// dbyer med tshul gyi rang bzhin pas// gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyis med// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// de bas sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// sku dang rgyan dang 'khor lo yang// lung chen zab mo'i nang na gsal// lnga bzhi'i nang du 'khor ba yang// ye shes sangs rgyas de las med// dbyings su gyur nas mnyam gnas pas// ye nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la brjod// skyi mchi med par dbyings su gyur// dbyings gyur dag mnyam lhun grub pas// lta ba 'di la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor 'di ni skal pa bzang// ci spyad ci bsgom ci bsgrubs kyang// bdud rtsi yin te sman gyi mchog/ bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam nyid// byin brlabs ngo mtshar rgya chen 'byung// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos// sangs rgyas bde chen nyid las 'byung// thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi 'di// spros med thig ler gnas pa la// mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir// rang la mchod cing rang gis bza'// sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ ye shes chen po'i thugs yang dag pa

nas dgongs te/ bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho 'di gsungs so// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las lta ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang bde bar gshegs pa kun tu bzang po la/ rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa/ kun tu bzang po bdud rtsi'i spyod pa ji ltar spyod// bdud rtsi gnas ni gang nas skye// bdud rtsi'i rgyu ni ci la bgyi// bdud rtsi'i snod ni ji lta bu// bdud rtsi'i yum ni gang la bya// rgyal thebs karma ji lta bu// bdud rtsi'i yo byad du zhig 'tshal// kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// spyod pa'i yo byad rnam pa gsum// kun tu bzang po'i gnas mchog ni// sems nyid dag pa kun tu bzang// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag tu med// phrag dog dag pa dam tshig sgrol// yaM las rdo rje rlung nag 'tshubs// 'dod chags dag pas mA ma kI// khaM las bdud rtsi'i chu bo'i rgyun// gti mug dag pas sangs rgyas spyan// pha las gser gyi sa gzhi mdzes// nga rgyal dag pas ri rab la// laM las gser gyi ri rab 'bar// gling dang gling phran ri bo dang// thang dang mtsho dang chu bo dang// chu mig 'bab chu lteng ka dang// g.ya' dang gangs dang nags dang spang// na dang thang dang 'dam las skyes// 'byung ba lnga yi gzhal yas su// ri bo dpag bsam shing bu la// bdud rtsi sman gyi shing skyes pa// rtsa ba sdong po shun lpags dang// thang chu snying po yal ga dang// lo ma me tog 'bras bu dgu// yal ga brgyad po phyogs mtshams brgyad// dbus kyi shing bu rdo rje'i rigs// sdong po tsher ma can gyi rigs// rdo rje rigs kyi sman yin no// shar gyi shing bu bde gshegs rigs// lo shun ring la 'jam pa'i shing// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sman yin no// lho yi phyogs su shing skyes pa// kho lag rgyas pa 'bras bu'i shing// rin chen rigs kyi sman yin no// nub kyi phyogs su shing skyes pa// me tog rgyas pa sdong po sbom// pad+ma rigs kyi sman yin no// byang gi phyogs su shing skyes pa// thung la sbom zhing spra sprod ma// las kyi rigs kyi sman yin no// rtswa dang me tog 'bras bu rnams// kun la dgu dgu yod par bshad// rtsa ba sdong po shun pa dang// snying po yal ga thang chu dang// 'dab ma me tog 'bras bu bcas// mi dang byol song rtsi shing dang// 'byung ba lnga yi bsdus pa'i sman// kha dog dkar po rdo rje rigs// ser po bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs// sngon po rin po che yi rigs// dmar po pad+ma'i rigs yin no// kha dog sna tshogs las kyi rigs// sman du ma gyur gang yang med// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ bdud rtsi gnas nas skye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog rnam pa lnga// mAM sa rin chen rak+ta dang// dri chu bdud rtsi byang chub sems// 'bras bu lnga dang

b+han+d+ha lnga// snying po lnga dang dam rdzas lnga// oM ser po/ hUM dkar po/ AHdmar po/ swA mthing ga/ hA ljang gu/ sku lnga ye shes lnga dang ldan// 'phro dus lnga yi sbyor ba yis// dug lnga stongs shing rab gsal bas// ye shes lnga yi dbyings su 'gyur// bdud rtsi'i rgyu ni byang chub sems// bdud rtsi'i snod ni yum gyi mkha'// bdud rtsi'i rgyu ni yab kyi klong// stong gsum b+han+d+ha 'khor yug tu// b+h+rUM gyi 'phro du chen po las// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang// ye shes lnga ldan rdo rje ka pA la// sku gsum lhun grub rdo rje ka pA la// yid bzhin re bskor rdo rje ka pA la// yon tan tshogs chen rdo rje ka pA la// bkra shis mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA la// mi 'gyur mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA la// mi shigs mdzod ldan rdo rje ka pA la// cho 'phrul rgyud 'byung rdo rje ka pA la// srid pa yongs sgrol rdo rje ka pA la// khams gsum dbang sdud rdo rje ka pA la// dug gsum gtan sprugs rdo rje ka pA la// mtshan ma'i skyon bral rdo rje ka pA la// zhal bu ka pA la yi mtshan gsol pa// 'phrul bzhad yid bzhin phra men rgyan gyis brgyan// rkang med mkha' la 'gro ba'i rdo rje thog thog rkan sgra can// nga ni sngon gyi sgrub pa po yi rdzas yin te// su zhig dngos grub 'dod pa de las long// gang gi bka' ltar mi byed dam la mi gnas pa// nga yi gzugs tsam mthong bas mod la tshig pa dang// sgra skad thos pa mod la brlag par 'gyur// dkar po zangs yag 'tsher ba ni// snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi sku dang rab ldan zhing// 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// rlon pa lcang lor 'khyil ba ni// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang rab ldan zhing// 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// dmar po ra ri 'tsho ba ni// slad kyis 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// sprul pa'i sku dang rab ldanazhing// 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// thabs kyi snying po rin chen dpal gyi mgur// pho brang rtags dang ldan pas snod bcud rgyan du che// sprul pa'i lcang lo kha bad can// dbang po sna lnga snod bcud rgyan du che// mi gnas bdud rtsi bzhugs pa'i rgyan du che// bdud rtsi sman chen khrol bu bzhag/ de ni bdud rtsi rnam lnga so// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ snod bcud yongs rdzogs kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// bdud rtsi de yi slob dpon ni// kun gyis bya ba ma yin te// lta ba gnyis su med par blta// byang chub sems kyi don rtogs pas// gsang ba'i don dang mi 'gal zhing// thabs la mkhas pa'i snod yin pas// dbang rim par brtsegs te rdo rje rgyal po bka' rab 'byams kyi dbang thob nas dam la gnas shing dam tshig bsrung ba

dang/ theg pa chen po'i don la mkhas pa dang/ phrin las kyi go rim la mkhas pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin ma nor ba'i tshul dgu ste/ dgongs pa blta ba'i tshul/ gar ye shes kyi tshul/ phyag rgya sku'i tshul/ sngags gsung gi tshul/ snying po thugs kyi tshul/ mchod pa yon tan gyi tshul/ glu phrin las kyi tshul/ dkyil 'khor zhi ba'i tshul/ stangs thabs khro bo'i tshul/ tshig dang 'brel pa dang/ gong 'og ma 'chol bde la me tog gtor la/ rdo rje slob dpon dpal dang ldan/ 'phags pa rnams dang bde gshegs rnams kyi sku gsung lung// rna bar rgyud pa'i man ngag 'chad// sku gsung thugs kyang rdo rjer 'gyur// bdud rtsi'i rgyal por mnga' gsol lo// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ slob dpon kyi yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// bdud rtsi'i yum ni ji lta bu/ gtso bo'i dgongs pa bzhin byed nus pa dang/ gzhung dgu dang ldan te/ tshul shes pa/ shong che ba/ nog thub pa/ gsang sgo thub pa/ dam la gnas pa/ dad pas mos pa dang gdams pa spyad pa dang/ rtog pa chung ba mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ sems bzung pa/ dgu dang ldan pa las ma gtogs pa/ dad med dang/ rnyed dang/ btsan dang/ sngon 'dris pa dang/ mtshan ngan dang/ gsang 'dzag ma yin no// bkra shis mtshan ldan rdo rje'i yum// mig dkyus ring la lag sor phra// tshigs mig zlum la phra zhing bshad/ kha nas ut+pal ngad ldan zhing// lus la ga pur tsan+dan dri// dri zhim ngad ldan sked skabs phyed// skra 'jam nag la mthon mthing g.yas su 'khyil// so dkar thags dam rnyil ni dkar dmar phyed// mig gi dkyus ring zar ma'i me tog 'dra// dpral ba'i dbyes che skra mtshams zla gam bzhin// sna yi thur mdog me tog pad+ma 'dra// lus drang sked ring byang chub sems ma'i tshul// nu ma skyed sra sha dkar tshags su dam// khong dal 'gro na gom pa 'jab pa bzhin// grags pa'i skad kyang ngang pa gzhon nu ltar// snyan par smra zhing mdzes tshul stabs dang ldan// bdud rtsi'i yum du mnga' gsol lo// bdud rtsi'i karma rgyal thebs ji lta bu// dper na rgyal po'i bka' blon pos bsrungs ba dang 'dra bar// dgongs spyod kyi don la tha mi dad par de nyid dang mtshungs pa la/ gzhan 'dren pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang/ slob dpon gyi sku bsnyel ba'i thun spo ba dang/ snyoms pa la sogs pa la bar ma chad par bsgrub par bya ba dang// slob dpon gyi zhal tshab tu gzhan la chos ston pa la mkhas pa'o// dgongs pa'i don ldan phrin las thabs lam las// lta ba'i don ldan man ngag gting nas 'char// sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las rdzogs par mdzad// gsang sngags bdud rtsi'i don mchog ljags la bkram// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen

por bka' gsol dang// rgyal thebs karma'i don rnams bstan pa'o// bdud rtsi'i yo byad rnam pa lnga// yo byad rnam pa lnga po la// thams cad ma rdzogs gang yang med// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ spyod pa rgyas pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// bsgrub pa rgya mtsho ji ltar bsgrub pa ni// bsgrub pa rnam pa lnga la/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rnam pa lnga las/ dkyil 'khor dang/ sman dgod pa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ byin gyis brlab pa dang/ gzhung bsrang ba dang/ lnga ni yon tan no// dam pa rigs brgya ni sku'i bsnyen pa'o// de nyid rigs lnga ni gsung gi bsnyen pa'o// btag btsag ni phrin las kyi bsnyen pa'o// sman dgod pa ni yon tan gyi bsnyen pa'o// gsang chen rigs gcig ni thugs kyi bsnyen pa'o// bsgrub pa rnam pa lnga la phun sum tshogs pa ni bdun/ lung chen po gsum/ ting nge 'dzin bcu tham pa/ skabs sbyor chen po bdun/ drod tshad gsum gsal bka'i dkyil 'khor dang bdun no// phun sum tshogs pa bdun la/ dang po gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni/ ting 'dzin mdangs bzang nyams dga' ba// me tog 'bras bur ldan pa'i ri// dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i gnas// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas su// byin brlab mtshams gcad brtan byas nas// sa ni gzung zhing byin gyis brlab// de dang der ni sa sbyang ste// chos nyid gdal ba'i nam mkha' la// ye shes lnga yi 'byung chen brtseg/ kun gzhi gdal ba'i nam mkha' la// bskyed pa'i 'byung chen rnam lnga brtseg/ b+h+rUM las rin chen gzhal yas khang// mtha' dang dbus med kun tu khyab// tA la'i skye shing tsong tsong dril// zla gam dmar po dbang gi rgya// b+h+rUM kha ta li byi b+h+rUM/ gzhal yas phun sum tshogs pa'o// thig yul gcad ska bas dag tu// rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i pho brang der// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi bya// dri sna lnga yi man+d+hal bya// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// dbus su dpag bsam shing bu+u la// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi ka ba brgyad// shar phyogs maN+Dal brgyad pa ste// zhi ba chen po rdo rje'i rigs// lho ru rin chen zur brgyad bris// rgyas pa chen po rin chen rigs// nub tu pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// dbang mchog chen po pad+ma'i rigs// byang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// phrin las chen po las kyi rigs// mtshams su rin chen 'bar ba'i rigs// grwa bzhi'i bar du bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor dgu po gzhung bzhin bri// de yi dbus su bsam pa yang// srid gsum b+han d+ha bzang rkong yug/ ye nas ma bcos rang byung snod// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod gzhag la// de yi nang du blug pa'i sman// ye shes rang byung bdud rtsi lnga// de yan chad ni gnas gnas phun sum tshogs pa'o// yo

byad phun sum tshogs pa ni// gsang ba'i don la 'jug bya'i phyir// gsang ba'i las kyi sngon rol du// sdig spyad byang chub sems bskyed de// spang skong bklag cing cha gsum btang// bstan pa srung ba'i mgon po la// sbyin mchod bsrung ba'i las chen bcol// gzhan yang las kyi phyi rol du// mgon po gnas pa'i rten bzhir mnga' gsol lo// ri rab gling gzhi'i phyogs phyogs nas// rdo rje gsang bdag dbang gi mthus// 'jig rten skyong ba'i tha tshig can// mthu chen rgyal po sde bzhi rnams// so so'i bgegs rigs 'dul la mkhas// chos skyong longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// phrin las rnam bzhi mthar phyin pas// rigs bzhi'i kha dog so sor gsal// rang rtags lha yi phyag mtshan thogs// dkyil 'khor skyong ba'i rdzu 'phrul can// bdag cag rnal 'byor rtsal 'byor bas// rang rang 'khor rnams thub par mdzod// bsgrub pa'i rtsal ni mthar phyung zhig/ rkyen kyi bar gcod bsal ba dang// gsang ba'i man ngag spyad pa'i phyir// ya ma dam sri gnan par bya// lho nub tu ya ma dam sri'i gzugs bris la mnan no// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i mig gcor zhing// dngos grub chu la rdul 'jug bzhin// khro mo mi g.yo kun 'dus nas// gsad cing mnan pa'i las byas te// ri rab chen po'i rmang du mnan// ya ma rA dza'i zas su sbyin// chu srin 'bar ba'i kha ru btsang// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas mnan// bdun rgyud rigs kyang brlag 'gyur nas// nam yang gtang bar mi bya ste// byang chub sems ni skyes na btang// Ar+ya a tsa la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M/ de nas sgo byang gdags te/ gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i 'bur ram 'dra 'bag gam/ ri mo ma he la bcibs par byas la 'di skad brjod do// gsang chen lhun grub pho brang nas// las kyi gshin rje'i bdag po la// bcom ldan chos rjes bka' stsal ltar// de bzhin rig 'dzin sgrub pa pos// bka' gsang gzhung chen 'di bsgrub cing// yang dag don la nges 'jug na// 'di dag nor bu rin chen te// 'di la stod cing bar gcod pa// lha srin sde brgyad 'byung po kun// khyod kyi 'khor dang g.yog yin pas// rnam par smin pas chos shod la// gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pas// bla med 'bras bu ma thob par// sa 'di tshun chad ma btang zhig/ dpal chen mi pham bka' ma 'da'// bdag cag ye nas gnyis med do// de tsam don gyi dbyings su gcig/ phyi 'khor skyong ba'i mu ran la// rdo rje yal gam thob par mdzod// badzra ya ma rA dza sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas 'bar ba'i blta bas dkyil 'khor bskor zhing 'di skad do// hU~M stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// skye 'gro rtsi shing nags tshal dang// yod

mthong snang grag ji snyed pa// khro mig 'bar bas phyir bltas te// 'gying bag tshul du brjid pa yis// 'bar ba'i rdo rje sbar nas ni// kun kyang 'bar ba khrag 'thung ste// rngams pa gtum chen gshe rtag 'bar// dur khrod chen por lhun gyis grub// rak+sha yak+sha he ru ka/ rak+sha kro d+hi dz+wa la kha/ ha la ha la tiSh+Tha phaT/ khro bo rol pa'i stangs stabs dang// ma mo'i rngams tshul gyis phra men lhag ma'i dkyil 'khor bskor la/ hU~M 'bar ba'i phyag rgya chen po las/ mig las 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'dis// dmigs pa dngos su sbyang nas ni// 'bar ba drag po'i yi ge las// sreg pa'i dpal chen dgu ru gtams// rdo rje me yi ri bo la// lhun po 'bar ba'i rtse brgyad las// 'bar ba'i rtse brgyad bskyil nas kyang// dpal chen rdo rje'i 'aka' sdod nas// shin tu mi bzad 'bar ba yi// gtum chen ha la rngams pa'i gzugs// lha chen khyab 'jug pags bshus nas// zhing chen g.yang gzhin bzar man pas// gshin rje ma trang 'bar ba'i me// ro dbyug chen po lag na 'phyar// phra men dgu khri mang po dag/ 'bar ba'i tshog ni 'thibs thag chad// gang la ci 'dul der ston pa// tsit+ta 'bar ba'i me phreng gis// do shal mgur chu phreng bas sbrengs// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong// srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar zhing 'phro// nam mkha'i khams kun me dpung gtibs// rdo rje 'khor lo me lce 'thor/ dur khrod dgon pa sa phyogs dag/ me yi ri bo 'bar ba la// me yi yi dwags ma gtogs pas// gang yang gnas par mi phod do// steng gi me lce 'bar ba ni// 'og gi phyogs su 'phro zhing 'khrugs// 'og gi me lce 'bar ba yang// gyen du 'khyil zhing steng du thul// 'ur chem 'ur chem 'thab cing 'khrug/ dur khrod me ni smug nag 'bar// zhe sdang 'joms pas 'thing nag 'tshubs// nga rgyal dregs pas ser nag 'bar// 'dod chags skem pas dmar nag 'phro// phrag dog skem pas ljang nag 'khrugs// gti mug sel bas smug nag 'khyil// 'bar chen rlung gi 'khor los gtams// dz+wa la dz+wa la ma d+ha la ha la ha la raM/ de nas yo byad tsho gsum du phyed// gcig ni dkon mchog phud du spyad/ gnyis pa rnal 'byor tshogs su bsngo// gsum pa 'gro ba yongs la bsngo// dkon mchog rnal 'byor gnyis po la// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab// dbus kyi bdud rtsi dri chen la// oM gyi 'phro 'du chen po las// zhu nas phyag mtshan 'khor lo 'bar// dag pas bdud rtsi chen por zhu// shar gyi byang chub sems chen las// yi ge hU~M gi 'phro 'du las// zhu nas phyag mtshan rdo rje 'bar// byang chub sems ni bdud rtsir zhu// lho yi bdud rtsi sha chen las// yi ge swA yi 'phro 'du las// zhu nas phyag mtshan rin chen

'bar// mAM sa sha chen bdud rtsir zhu// nub kyi pad+ma rak+ta las// yi ge AM gyi 'phro 'du las// zhu nas phyag mtshan pad+ma 'bar// pad+ma rak+ta thig ler zhu// byang gi bdud rtsi dri chu las// yi ge hA yi 'phro 'du las// zhu nas phyag mtshan rgya gram 'bar// dag pas bdud rtsi chen por zhu// badzra lA s+ye hU~M/ badzra mA le trAM/ badzra girti hrIH/ badzra nIrti AM// rdo rje bkra shis gzungs mchog 'dren pa'i dpal// rdo rje can gyi byin stobs kyis// skal ldan can gyi zas su bya// skal med rnams kyi dug tu 'gyur// dper na sbrul la 'o ma bzhin// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ smug zil lha mo gnyen gsal ma// rlan rnams bdud rtsi bsgyur mdzad ma// bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal chu rgyun 'bebs// shing gi lha mo gdong bzhi ma// shing lo 'dab las bdud rtsi bsgyur// 'bru tog sna tshogs dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal 'bras bu bskyed// lha mo sra brtan dbang bsgyur ma// khu ba bcud las bdud rtsir bsgyur// bdud rtsi zhu chen dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal brtan par byed// rdo rje lha mo shel mdog ma// nyi zer bdud rtsi bsgyur byed ma// gsal ba mdangs kyi dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal gzi byin bskyed// lha mo khro gnyer sngo sangs ma// dur khrod rdzas la bdud rtsir bsgyur// sha chen sna tshogs dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal byin 'bebs ma// rtswi yi lha mo tshims byed ma// rtswi tog bdud rtsir bsgyur byed ma// rtswi mchog kun gyi dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal tshims byed ma// sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun// dug rnams bdud rtsir bsgyur mdzad ma// bdud rtsi sman gyi dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal nad rnams 'joms// rigs kyi lha mo 'di kun gyis// longs spyod bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs// rat+na saM b+ha wa ga ga na khaM swA hA/ yo byad byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ dge slong pha dang dge slong ma ye nas lha dang lha mor byin gyis brlabs te/ spyi bor oM ser po/ mgrin par AM dmar po/ snying gar hU~M dkar po/ lte bar swA mthing ga/ rkang mthil du hA ljang gu/ spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// oM ldan 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// rnam par snang mdzad sku mchog bsgom// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// hU~M ldan 'bar ba'i tshogs su bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku mchog bsgom// lte bar rin chen dkyil 'khor la// swA ldan 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas bsgom// rgas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// rin chen 'byung ldan sku mchog bsgom// lce dbus pad+ma'i dkyil

'khor du// aM ldan 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// snang ba mtha' yas sku mchog bsgom// gsang gnas rgya gram dkyil 'khor du// hA ldan 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas bsgom// rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// las kyi sems dpa'i sku mchog bsgom// 'khor lo byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de nas dur khrod kyi chag chag gdab pa 'di skad do// bdud rtsi dri chen ye shes lngar ldan pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir// bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi dri chen chag chag 'debs// ma hA ba su ta ma d+ha la hU~M/ bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dam rdzas bdud rtsi dri chu 'dis// ye shes rang byung bsgrub pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chags chags 'debs// ma hA sa ma ya mA ma kI ku ru+u ma d+ha la hU~M/ bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod byang chub sems kyi ngang// mkha' dbyings rnam dag yum gyi gzhal yas su// rak+ta gsang ba'i chag chag 'debs// ma hA rak+ta dz+wa la hU~M/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// thugs rje rmad byung bsgrub pa'i phyir// dur khrod bsgral ba'i rdzas mchog sha chen gyis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la chag chag 'debs// ma hA mAM sa ma d+ha la hU~M/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi chen po ye shes dri chab 'dis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la chag chag 'debs// dz+nyA na maN+Da la hU~M/ dur khrod chen po bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor du// chags pa rak+ta'i chus byugs pas// 'khor ba dbang bsdud khrag gi go ma ye// tsakra d+ha ra hrIH/ de nas thig gdab pa ni/ rang bzhin gyi thig dang rgyu phreng gi thig go/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na// rin chen rdo rje bla na med// rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pas// las kyi rdo rje byed 'gyur gyi// lag pa'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsang ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hU~M gi phyag rgya'i tshogs bcas la// las kyi rdo rje gsal 'phro thim// khyed ni rdo rje las yin gyis// las rnams ma lus kun byos shig/ yum gyis thig snyod la/ bka' dang mthun pa'i dge gnas su// gsang ba'i bdag chen pad+ma gar gyi yum// dur khrod bdag po rU tra'i tshogs bsgral te// rgyu phreng chag dang bcas pa'i thig 'debs kyis// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bras med pa yis// chags pas dbang sdud 'khor ba zil gyi gnon// kun bzang yum gyi mkha' la thig 'debs so// e ka dza ti ral gcig ma// gsang ba mkha' dbyings dag pa ru// gar gyi dbang phyug bde chen po// byang chub sems kyi thig gdab pas// ma hA kro tI shwa

rI dur khrod gnas nyul ma// b+ha ga hri ti mkha' la char 'babs ma// sa nu ba ga lo tog 'bras bur smin// me za brag gyon rgya mtsho'i gting nas rol// ye shes chu rgyun bdud rtsi chen po 'dis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la thig thob dang// stong gsum khrag gi rgya mtsho las// rak+ta dmar gyi thig le dang// rak+ta dmar gyi thig gdab pas// khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// stong gsum keng rus ri rab las// byang chub sems kyi thig le'i ngang// byang chub sems kyi thig gdab pas// mi 'gyur ye nas rdo rje'i rigs// khams gsum dug lnga'i dkyil 'khor la// bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i thig le gcig/ bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i thig gdab pas// dug lnga ye nas ye shes lnga// shar gyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi byang sems thig gdab pas// rdo rje'i rigs su lhun gyis grub// lho yi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi mAM sa'i thig gdab pas// rin chen rigs su lhun gyis grub// nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// pad+ma rak+ta'i thig gdab pas// pad+ma'i rigs su lhun gyis grub// byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi dri chu'i thig gdab pas// las kyi rigs su lhun gyis grub// dbus kyi pho brang zlum po la// bdud rtsi dri chen thig gdab pas// pho brang gzhal yas lhun gyis grub// rgyal ba rnams kyi bzhugs gnas rten// ma ti tsa kra na hU~M/ sta shi kra ma hU~M/ gnam thig rin po che'i ka gdung du gyur la/ sa thig rin po che'i brtsigs par bsgom mo// sa tshon dgye ste dkar ser dmar ljang mthing la sogs/ so so'i mdog 'dra'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ bder gshegs gdan gyi sa bon dgod ces bya'o// de nas b+han+d+ha lnga dgod de/ dbus su b+han+d+ha sul med ces bya dum bu gcig pa dgod/ rus sbal gyi thod pa yod na bzang// de la oM na mas+sarba ta thA ga ta sarba pany+tsa a mr-i tha/ shrI ma hA su kha hrIH// sngags de bris la gzhag go/ shar du b+han+d+ha sul 'grengs zhes bya ste/ tshangs pa'i skud pa can dgod/ lhor b+han+d+ha sul mang zhes bya ste/ dpag bsam shing lo can dgod/ nub tu sul mang zla gam can zhes bya ste/ gshong bu tre la dgod// byang du b+han+d+ha sul rgya gram can zhes bya ste/ gshong bu bzhi pa dgod/ de nas b+han+d+ha'i nang du gtso bo lnga dgod de dbus su byang chub sems/ shar du dri chen/ lhor sha chen/ nub tu rak+ta/ byang du dri chu/ 'bras bu lnga dgod pa ni/ dbus su a ru zhes pa/ a ho su kha zhes bya ba/ glang po che la sogs pa rmig pa kha brag gi sha gzhag/ shar du pa na zhes bya ba ste/ stag dang seng ge la sogs pa sder chags thams cad kyi sha gzhag/ lhor rgun 'brum zhes bya ba ste rta la sogs pa'i rmig zlum thams cad kyi sha gzhag/ nub tu na

li ke ra zhes bya ba ste/ rma bya dang/ rgod dang/ khyung dang/ re dang/ glag la sogs pa gshog can thams cad kyi sha gzhag/ byang du sman pa'i a 'bras zhes bya ste/ mi dang/ shang shang te'u la sogs pa gdong pa can thams cad kyi sha gzhag/ de nas snying po lnga la byang chub sems sbyong ba hU~M dkar po/ shar gyi bdud rtsi sbyong ba oM ser po/ lho'i bdud rtsi sbyong ba swA mthing ga/ nub kyi bdud rtsi sbyong ba AM dmar po/ byang gi bdud rtsi sbyong ba hA ljang gu/ de rnams sman lnga dbus su/ ka ko la/ shar du du ru ka/ lhor dzA ti pha la/ nub tu khar dri zhim/ byang du lce pog dkar po/ sman nye ba lnga la/ dbus su a ru ra/ shar du ga pur/ lhor gur gum/ nub tu rtsi bo che/ byang du pho lugs/ sman gtso lnga la/ a 'bras/ rgun 'brum/ pa na se/ ge rgyas/ a ga ru dang lnga'o/ 'bras bu'i gtso bo lnga la/ mi sngom pa dang/ rta dkar po dang/ glang po che dang/ khyi dkar po dang/ shang shang te'u dang/ dbang po lnga la/ mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ snying dang lnga'o// phrad lnga la/ trag rak+sha/ rgun 'brum/ ka ko la/ sug smel/ ba le ka dang lnga'o/ dri'i rgyal po lnga la/ nA ga ge sar/ shing tshwa/ sug smel/ gan+d+ha pa tra/ tsan+dan dkar po'o/ dri'i blon po lnga la/ rgya spos/ dzA ti pha la/ ga pur/ tsan+dan/ li shi dang lnga'o// spos lnga la/ a ga ru/ du ru ka pog/ sbrang rtsi/ lce pog dang lnga'o// nad lnga la phan pa ni/ tsha ba thams cad bad kan/ kha ba thams cad mkhris pa la/ skyur ba thams cad 'dus pa la/ lan tshwa ba thams cad rlung la/ tha dad pa thams cad 'dus pa chen po la/ skyob lnga la byang chub sems kyi skyob la/ ga pur/ g+hi hang/ tsi hang/ gdung sha ri raM/ thal kar rdo rje/ nyung dkar/ tsa na ka/ shug ku be ra pra ma lany+tsha/ go ro tsa na/ bud med kyi 'o ma/ rkang tshil bu la gzhungs pa/ khyi'i 'o ma/ 'bri'i 'o ma/ ba'i 'o ma/ rta'i 'o ma/ thar nu'i 'o ma/ khur mangs kyi 'o ma/ sha ru'i sbyin/ kun la srang re yod par stsal/ mig gi mngon shes 'thob pa'o// dri chen gyi skyob la/ dzA ti pha la/ ka ko la/ a ru ra/ a 'bras shing tshwa/ rgya spos/ sbrang rtsi/ mkhal ma zho sha/ snying zho sha/ mchin pa zho sha/ gla gor zho sha/ bu shing zho sha/ 'bras bu lnga/ bsgral ba'i snying dang kun la cha mnyam srang re'o// mngon par shes pa lnga yang 'grub po// mAM sa sha chen skyob la/ sug smel/ gan+d+ha pa tra/ 'bu sha/ li shi/ sna ma'i 'bras bu/ 'bras bu lnga/ bsgral ba'i rna ba dang sbyar te/ kun la cha mnyam srang re'o// rna ba'i mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur// rak+ta'i skyob la/ tsan+dan dmar po smug po// nA ga ge sar/ nA ga bus pa/ leng leng ha/ khrag gi nyung ma/ yab kyi khrag/ 'bras bu lnga bsgral ba'i snying gi rak+ta/ rtsa ba'i rak+ta

mu la rak+ta/ tsan+dan dmar po/ 'bras bu lnga bsgral ba'i sna kun la cha mnyam srang re'o// sna'i mngon shes 'thob par 'gyur// dri chu'i skyob lnga la/ a ru ra/ li ga dur med du mi rung/ du ru ka/ ka sho ka/ shing tog rgun 'bru/ thang bal/ shu mo za/ a lce ka la/ khyi lce/ bya rog gi lce/ 'ug pa'i lce/ ngang pa'i lce/ 'bras bu lnga bsgral ba'i lce/ kun la cha mnyam srang re'o// lce'i mngon par shes pa'o// gzhan yang kha dog lnga/ dkar ba rdo rje'i rigs/ ser po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ sngon po rin po che'i rigs/ dmar po pad+ma'i rigs/ kha dog sna tshogs pa las kyi rigs/ ro lnga la kha ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ mngar ba rdo rje'i rigs/ tsha ba pad+ma'i rigs/ ro tha dad pa las kyi rigs/ gnod sbyin lag byi tshe lag/ dbang po lag ra sA ya na'i lag/ sor mo lnga tshang ba ni sgrub pa po'i lag pa gdab bo// a ru ra/ ba ru ra/ skyu ru+u ra/ nya'i mig/ sbrul gyi mkhris pa/ gu gul thal chen/ spos lnga/ pog lnga/ snying po lnga/ rin po che lnga/ sman lnga/ phab lnga la/ rgya phab/ mon phab/ byang phab/ bod phab/ sngon sgrub pa'i phab/ chang lnga la/ 'bras chang/ rgun chang/ sbrang chang/ nas chang/ til chang/ chu brgyad la/ rgya mtsho'i chu/ gtsang po'i chu/ gangs kyi chu/ klu yod pa'i chu/ chu mig gi chu/ khron pa'i chu/ ston zla ra ba'i nya char gyi chu/ gnam dang lcags chu til sna gsum/ bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga bsag pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// 'dis dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba rnam pa gnyis su shes par byas te/ khrol bu dang phyi ma gnyis/ khrol bu bsgrub pa la rnam pa bzhi/ yon tan brjod nas sman dgod pa dang/ rtsa ba'i lha dam pa rigs brgya dgod pa'o// dbus kyi ka ba brgyad steng na// b+han+d+ha me long blangs nas ni// shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas la// byang chub sems ni ye shes rang bzhin te// dri med rang bzhin char bzhin 'bebs pa las// 'gro ba kun bskyed yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// gdod nas dag pa bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la// gnyis med sbyor bas bdud rtsi'i rigs mchog 'grub// me long lta bu'i ye shes de nyid yin// dbus kyi b+han+d+ha'i nang du shel phor bzhag la/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ gdung go ro tsa na la sogs te/ dbus kyi snod du blugs la/ gu ya lag gi phyag rgya bcas la/ de'i steng du bzhag la sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM AHhU~M badzra sa twa hU~M/ sarba e shud+d+he a mr-i ta su kha ma hA yo ga hU~M/ tsit+ta hUM oM AHhU~M ak+Sho sho b+h+ya dwe Sha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wam/ zhes brjod dbus su gzhag go/ byang chub sems kyi b+ha d+d+ha'i nang du hU~M bsams te/ phyogs bcur 'phros te babs pas/ srid pa gsum gyi byang chub sems

dang/ srog gi zungs kyi bcud dang/ rtsi shing nags tshal gyi dngas ma la phog pas dbang bskur/ slar yang de bzhin du bsdus pa ni/ dper na bung bas me tog gzhib pa bzhin// b+han+d+ha'i nang du byang chub sems su bsdus shing/ yang byang chub sems yum gyi mkha' nang nas slar blangs te// dbus kyi b+han+d+ha'i nang du bstim mo// snod kyi nang nas 'od 'phros pas/ 'gro ba'i don mdzad sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis mdzad nas/ slar rdo rje sems dpa'i sku tshon gang bar gyur nas dbus su bzhugs so// de nas dri chen kyi snod kyi steng du oM ser po bsams te/ phyogs bcur 'od du 'phros pas stong khams thams cad kha dog ser por gyur/ tshe dang lus kyi dngos grub la dbang bsgyur zhing 'dus pa dang/ gser gyi 'khor lo til 'bru tsam gyis dbus kyi snod la til gyi gong bu bzhin du gang bar bsam/ de ltar gsal ba las gser gyi 'khor lo las 'od 'phros pa las/ 'jig rten na yod pa'i dri chen dang bdud rtsi'i bcud bsdus nas rnams par snang mdzad sku tshon gang bar gyur te bzhugs so// maN+Dal brgyad pa'i thog nas dri chen gyi snod blangs la/ sgrub pa po kun kha shar du bltas la dri chen gyis g.yab cing 'di skad do// smad pa mi gtsang snyigs ma 'di// rtogs pa de nyid snyegs ma yin// tshe mchog 'dzin pa'i bdud rtsi 'di// gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin pas// bde gshegs rigs kyi thugs dam nyid// gnyis med sku ru sbyor bas na// chos dbyings ye shes dam tshig 'grub// longs spyod rdzogs sku rnam snang mdzad// thams cad de bzhin gshegs par gyur// oM bai ro tsa na mo ha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wam/ ma hA yo ga a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sa ra ba la ni te oM a mr-i ta tsit+ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha oM/ zhes brjod do// shar gyi b+han+d+ha sul 'grengs la bla ma grub pa can gyi dri chen dang/ drang srong chen po la sogs pa'i dri chen brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar dgod do// de nas lho'i b+han+d+ha'i nang du swA sngon po bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas stong khams khyab par don mdzad nas/ slar 'dus te mAM sar gyur pa dang/ mAM sa las 'od 'phros pas/ phyogs bcur khyab nas 'gro ba'i don byas/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis rdzogs nas/ slar rin po che zur brgyad pa tshon gang bas til gyi gang bu bzhin gang nas bzhugs pa la 'od du 'phros pa las 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul dang phung po dang/ gnas dang gzi brjid dang/ reg bya bsdus nas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sku mtshon gang bar gyur nas lhor bzhugs so// de nas mAM sa'i snod blangs la sgrub pa po kun kha lhor bltas la sha chen gyis g.yab cing 'di skad do// sems can rnams ni gnas la chags// nor bas bdag nyid btsang bar 'dzin// don gyi sun ni ma byung na// bsod
