nams thams cad dang bral ba'i// yi dwags skam thag chad pa yang// bdag lus gtong ni mi phod na// lha la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyis// lus can rnams lta ci zhig smos// de bas 'di kun sun dbyung phyir// rang byung bdud rtsi bstan pa yin// lhas kyang lha yi bdud rtsi bza'// mi la sogs pas de bzhin du// rnal 'byor pas kyang spyad cing bza'// 'di ltar bdag gzhan mi 'byed pas// blang dor med par grol bar gyis// mnyam pa nyid kyi don mthong na// thams cad mnyam nyid ye shes sku// bde gshegs rin chen rigs mchog 'grub// mnyam nyid ye shes yin par bshad// oM AHhU~M ma hA mAM sa ma ya ra ho haM/ rat+na ra ti sa ma yA s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas/ lho phyogs rin chen zur brgyad kyi thog nas/ b+han+d+ha sul mong du 'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral ba'i sha chen brgya rtsa brgyad dgod do// de nas nub phyogs kyi pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi thog nas rak+ta'i b+han+d+ha'i nang du AHdmar po gcig bsams la// AHlas 'od 'phros slar 'dus pa las pad+ma rak+tar gyur/ rak+ta las 'od du 'phros te stong khams khyab pas 'jig rten srid pa'i ngar 'dzin pa rak+tar chags pa ril dbang bskur te slar 'dus pa las/ pad+ma rak+tas bsdus pa'i snang srid kyi bkrag dang gzi mdangs kun bsdus nas/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis byas nas slar 'dus pa dang/ snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku tshon gang ba 'od dmar po 'bar zhing nub tu bzhugs par bsam mo// rak+ta'i snod blangs la sgrub pa po kun kha nub tu bltas la rak+tas g.yab cing 'di skad do// rA ga rak+ta pad+ma 'byung// smad pa mi gtsang rdzas 'di dag/ chags yul bde ba'i gnas yin no// pad+ma rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin// zhes brjod cing nub kyi phyogs kyi snod bzhag la/ oM AHhU~M ma hA pad+ma rak+ta mU la a mr-i de ba ra ga rA ti sa ma ya hU~M/ sa ma ya s+t+wam/ su+u la ho zhes brjod do// nub kyi b+han+d+ha su+u la zla kham du ma hA rak+ta dang/ mU la rak+ta dang/ pad+ma rak+ta dang/ rak+ta brgya rtsa brgyad dgod do// de nas byang phyogs kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad steng nas/ dri chu'i b+han+d+ha la hA ljang gu bsam zhing/ hA las 'od 'phros slar 'dus pa las dri chur gyur/ dri chu las 'od 'phros pas stong khams khyab par dri chus bkrus te/ dbang bskur nas slar 'dus pa dang/ rdo rje rgya gram ljang gu tshon gang bas til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ngo// de las 'od 'phros pas snang srid kyi chu dang/ 'gro ba rigs drug ril gyi chu bsdus nas mdzad pa bcu gnyis mdzad do// slar 'dus pa dang don yod grub pa'i sku tshon gang ba gcig tu gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi snod du bzhugs par bsams la/ de nas dri chu'i snod blangs la sgrub pa po kun kha byang phyogs su bltas la 'di skad do// kun

'byung zag pa kung ku ma// rdo rje dri yi chu yin te// chu las ma byung gang yang med// las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang// nan tan ye shes mchog kyang 'grub// oM AHhU~M sarba khaM hU~M a mo g+ha sid+d+hi badzra ra ti badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod de byang phyogs su gzhag go/ de nas gra bzhir nor bu'i rin po che bzhi'i thog tu gser phor dngul phor zangs phor lcags phor dung phor bkod la/ sgrub pa po kun thal mo sbyar la/ dbus kyi snod yab yum gyis blangs la 'di skad do// hU~M ye shes snying po can rnams kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi chos nyid 'di// snying po chos kyi don las byung// byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// smad par bya ba'i rdzas lnga po// kun la yon tan lnga lngar bshad// gcig la'ang yon tan gsum du dbye// dam tshig rtsa ba bco lnga yin// yang na nyi shu rtsa brgyad do// snod bcud dbus su bsdus nas ni// bcu drug por yang bstan par bya// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa lnga// sems dpa' sems ma'i tshogs su blta// 'dus byas pa yi rdo rje ste// dgongs pa 'dus pa sems dpar bshad// rdo rje sems dpar rab sbyangs nas// rdau rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// oM sarba a mr-i ta sarba e ho shud+d+he/ sarba satwa sa man+ta sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li tha/ gtso lnga'i skul tshig go/ da ni yan lag dgod par bya ste/ b+han+d+ha lnga bkod pa'i phyi rol du/ rin chen 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor la// gser phor dngul phor dung phor shel phor du// 'o ma blugs la 'di skad do// ji ltar 'o mar gyur pa la// mkhas ldan chen pos rab sbyangs nas// yon tan zho dang mar ltar snang// de ni rdzas kyi rnam pa kun// mnyam nyid zho dang mar ltar 'grub// shar lho mtshams su dgod/ de nas sman sna tshogs shar lho mtshams su dgod de 'di skad do// sman gyi rnam pa tha dad pas// so so'i yon tan cher snang de// rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag stong// sdug bsngal nad kyi gsos su che// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel ni// lhun gyis grub pas bdud rtsir 'gyur// shar lho rin po che 'bar ba'i steng du dgod do// de nas lho nub mtshams su rin po che sna tshogs dgod/ dper na gser dang rin chen ltar// so sor gnas kyang rang rang gi kha dog mtshan nyid so sor gsal// rin chen yon tan de 'dra yang// bsdus na yon tan rmad du 'gyur// de bas gnyis spras mdzes par snang// de bzhin rdzas kyi rnam pa kun// rang rang yon tan cir snang yang// gnyis med mnyam par sbyar bas na// bla med yon tan rmad du 'gyur// lho nub rin chen 'bar ba'i steng du dgod do// de nas nub byang mtshams su 'bru sna tshogs dgod pa 'di skad do// sa gzhi rin chen gter ldan pas// skyes pa'i 'bru mchog dam pa las// bsgrubs na bdudartsi sman

du 'gyur// zhes nub byang gi rin po che 'bar ba la dgod de/ byang shar mtshams su chu sna tshogs dgod pa 'di skad do// 'byung ba lnga yi byin rlabs las// chu rnams sna tshogs tha dad kyang// rgya mtshor phyin nas lan tshwa'i ro// 'byung ba'i khams rnams tha dad la// thams cad dag pas chos kyi dbyings// de bas thams cad bsdus pa'i dpal// rgya mtsho tsam du rlabs che la// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig go/ zhes byang shar gyi rin po che la dgod/ rgya mtsho chu dang gangs kyi chu dang cong zi'i chu dang brag zhun rdo'i chu la sogs pa brgya rtsa brgyad dgod do// mkhris pa mtha' dag kyang dgod do// de ni sman yon tan dang bcas pa'o// 'di nas mar la dkyil 'khor gyi lha brgyad dgod do// shar gyi maN+Dal brgyad la/ a k+Sho b+h+ya/ bai ro tsa na/ rat+na sam+b+ha wa/ a mi d+he ba/ a mo g+ha sid+d+hi/ d+hA twI shwa ra/ du d+d+ha le tsa ni/ mA ma kI/ pAN+Da ra ba sa na/ sa ma ya tA rA/ badzra satwa hU~M/ badzra rA dza/ badzra rA ga/ badzra sA d+hu/ badzra rat+na/ badzra sUr+ya/ badzra ke tu/ badzra ha sa/ badzra d+harma/ badzra tIk+Sh+Na/ badzra tsakra/ badzra b+hA Sha/ badzra karma/ badzra rak+Sha/ badzra yak+Sha/ badzra muSh+ti/ shar phyogs kyi lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ nyi shu rtsa drug re 'dug pa dpyad swA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ hU~M badzra d+h+r-ika/ muM d+hA twI shwa rI/ oM dzi na dzika/ laM dwe Sha ra ti/ AM A ro lika/ pAM rA ga ra ti/ hA pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ tAM badzra ra ti/ rat+na sa twa/ rat+na rA dza/ rat+na rA ga/ rat+na sA d+hu/ rat+na rat+na/ rat+na sUr+ya/ rat+na ke tu/ rat+na ha sa/ rat+na d+harma/ rat+na tIk+Sh+Na/ rat+na tsakra/ rat+na b+hA Sha/ rat+na karma/ rat+na rak+Sha/ rat+na yak+Sha/ rat+na muSh+ti/ lho'i lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// AM A ro lika/ pAM rA ga ra ti/ hU~M badzra d+h+r-ika/ muM d+hA twI shwa rI/ swA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ oM dzi na dzika/ laM dwe Sha ra ti/ hA pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ tAM badzra ra ti/ pad+ma sa twa/ pad+ma rA dza/ pad+ma rA ga/ pad+ma sA d+hu/ pad+ma rat+na/ pad+ma sur+ya/ pad+ma ke tu/ pad+ma ha sa/ pad+ma d+harma/ pad+ma tIk+Sh+Na/ pad+ma tsakra/ pad+ma b+hA Sha/ pad+ma karma/ pad+ma rak+Sha/ pad+ma yak+Sha/ pad+ma muSh+ti/ nub kyi lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// ha pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ tAM badzra ra ti/ hU~M badzra d+h+r-ika/ mU d+hA twI shwa rI/ swA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ A+oM A ro lika/ pAM rA ga ra ti/ oM dzi na dzika/ la dwe Sha ra ti/ karma sa twa/ karma rA dza/ karma rA ga/ karma sA d+hu/ karma rat+na/ karma sUr+ya/ karma ke tu/ karma ha sa/ karma d+harmA/ karma tIk+Sh+Na/ karma tsakra/ karma b+hA Sha/ karma karmA/ karma rak+Sha/ karma yak+Sha/ karma muSh+ti/ byang gi lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// shar du nyi shu rtsa lnga hU~M las skyed// lho yi nyi shu rtsa lnga trAM las bskyed// nub kyi nyi shu rtsa lnga AM las bskyed// byang du nyi shu rtsa lnga hA las bskyed// spyir dam pa rigs brgya sku'i bsnyen pa'o// de ltar lha brgya bkod nas tshig tu+u 'di skad do// rnam par mi rtog chos kyi sku// zhe sdang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul skus cir yang don mdzad pa// rdo rje

sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas// dbus su b+han+d+ha zlum po ru// byang chub sems las sbyar ba'i sman// rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam bskong// sems dpa' 'khor bcas gshegs nas kyang// bdud rtsi 'di la byin gyis rlobs// oM AHhU~M ak+Sho b+h+ya d+hA twI shwa rI sa ma ya s+t+wam/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la g.yab/ de nas lho yi b+han+d+ha blangs la/ lhor kha bltas la 'di skad do// rnam par mi rtog chos kyi sku// nga rgyal longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul skus cir yang don mdzad pa// rin chen sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas// lho phyogs b+han+d+ha sul mar du// mAM sa las ni sbyar ba'i sman// rin chen rigs kyi thugs dam bskong// 'byung ldan 'khor bcas gshegs nas kyang// bdud rtsi 'di la byib gyis rlobs// oM AHhU~M swA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ mAM mo ha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wam/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// nub kyi b+han+d+ha blangs nas 'di skad do// rnam par mi rtog chos kyi sku// 'dod chags longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul skus cir yang don mdzad pa// snang ba mtha' yas 'khor dang bcas// nub phyogs b+han+d+ha zla gam du// rak+ta las ni sbyar ba'i sman// pad+ma rigs kyi thugs dam bskang// mtha' yas 'khor bcas gshegs nas kyang// bdud rtsi 'di la byin gyis rlobs// oM AHhU~M AM a ro lika/ pyAM rA ga ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wam/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// byang gi b+han+d+ha blangs la 'di skad do// rnam par mi rtog chos kyi sku// phrag dog longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul skus cir yang don mdzad pa// don yod grub pa 'khor dang bcas// byang phyogs b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// dri chu las ni sbyar ba'i sman// las kyi rigs kyi thugs dam bskang// don grub 'khor bcas gshegs nas kyang// bdud rtsi 'di la byin gyis rlobs// oM AHhU~M hA pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ badzra karma ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wam/ de nas shar gyi snod blangs la 'di skad do// rnam par mi rtog chos kyi sku// gti mug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul skur cir yang don mdzad pa// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas// shar phyogs b+han+d+ha sul med du// dri chen las ni sbyar ba'i sman// bde gshegs rigs kyi thugs dam bskang// snang mdzad 'khor bcas gshegs nas kyang// bdud rtsi 'di la byin gyis rlobs// oM AHhU~M dzi na dzika/ lAM dwe Sha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wam/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// dang por bzhugs gral dgod gral du// dur khrod pho brang lhun gyis grub// gsang ba'i bzhugs gnas dam pa 'dir// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng du// rnal 'byor dgos shing bzhugs du gsol// gsang ba'i las rnams bya ba'i phyir// phrin las brgyad kyis mtshams bcad do// slob dpon mnga' gsol las ka bsgo// gsar du 'jug pa mchis na

yang// brin g.yog mna' dbang bshags pa bgyi// de ni bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ yon tan sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// yan lag stong gi sman dgod pa// 'byung ba lnga yi thugs rje las// sman lnga bdud rtsir rnam par dag/ 'gro ba yongs kyi gsos mdzad par// thugs rje chen por byin gyis brlabs// dngos med dngos grub blang phyir du// ye shes lnga yi rjes su dgram// sman gyi srung mas rtog bsal te// srid gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga// byang chub sems ni kun tu dag/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen nyid// ma lus mtha' dag grub pa'i rgya// ye nas bya med bya mi dgos// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i sgra// ra sA ya na'i srung ma rnams// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas mchog nas// tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can// spyan gsum srid pa gsum la gzigs// phyag bzhi phreng ba gun+d+he sbyin// bdud rtsi sman las dngos grub thob// bdud rtsi 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshangs pa kun grol chen po ni// dkar po dung mdog sgra yang sgrogs// bdud rtsi'i 'di la byin gyis brlobs// drang srong ljang sngon rA hu la/ tsa ra ka dang nab so skyes// gza' dang skar ma'i rig 'dzin yin// tha skar bu dang lha skyabs ni// dri za lha yi rig 'dzin yin// rgyun shes dang ni g.yon phyogs lha// chu yi lha yi rig 'dzin yin// thang la skyes dang me bzhin 'jug/ me yi lha yi rig 'dzin yin// rkang gnyis spyod dang ka ya na// dka' thub spyod pa'i rigs 'dzin yin// shing khyer dang ni rig 'dzin rnams// bdud rtsi sman la byin gyis rlobs// dge bsnyen li tsA dri ma med// mi yi rig 'dzin chen po yin// klu yi rgyal po 'jog po ni// byol song rnams kyi rig 'dzin yin// shing gi lha mo 'do 'chang ma// sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun// grub pa'i lha mo blau gros ma// rtsi yi lha mo nad sel ma// rig 'dzin lha mo mched bzhi yang// bdud rtsi sman la byin gyis rlobs// phyag rgya bzhi'i bdud rtsi la dgug cing spyan drang ngo// dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ a mr-i ta A be sha ho/ byas la spyan drang ngo// de nas byin dbab pa'i sngags la// oM ma hA sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta su kha hriM pheM pheM/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// bya ba yang brjod/ de nas dam pa rigs brgya'i bsnyen pas sbyang bar bya ste/ bde bar gshegs pa re re la bsnyen pa brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad phul nas/ de'i 'od zer 'phro 'dus sman thams cad sman gyi dngos po dang bral nas sbyang ba ni/ dam pa'i rigs brgya'i bsnyen pa zhes bya'o// de ni sku'i bsnyen pa'o// de nas gsung gi bsnyen pa de nyid rigs lnga'i bsnyen pas sbyangs te/ shar gyi lha nyi shu rtsa lnga yang mi bskyod pa la 'dus/ lho'i nyi shu rtsa lnga rin chen 'byung ldan la 'dus/ nub

kyi nyi shu rtsa lnga 'od dpag med la 'dus/ byang gi nyi shu rtsa lnga don yod grub pa la 'dus/ spyir lha brgya tham pa lngar 'dus pas/ de nyid rigs lnga'i bsnyen pas sbyang bar bya ste/ de yang dbus kyi rdo rje rigs kyi bdud rtsi sbyang bar bya ste/ 'di skad do// dbus kyi b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// byang chub sems kyi sman sbyar bas// hU~M gi 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba las// lhag mthong chen po'i ye shes kyis// zhe sdang chen po'i bdud bcom nas// slar 'dus b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// mi bskyod rdo rje yab yum bsgom// hU~M dz+nyA na badzra swA ra Na dzaH// zhes 'bum bzlas pa'i dus su/ dbus kyi b+han+d+ha nas byang chub sems la sogs te rdo rje rigs kyi bdud rtsi thams cad sman gyi dngos po dang bral nas/ hU~M gi tshogs su 'phro zhing nam mkha' gang ba'i dus na 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na ma rtogs pa'i sems can nyon mong zhe sdang gi dbang gis/ 'khor ba'i mtha' la zhen pa thams cad stongs shing zad par bsgral nas/ slar dbus kyi b+han+d+ha la chi li li 'dus pa la/ rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gyi phyag rgyar srog zin par gyur to// des ni nyon mongs pa zhe sdang bdud bcom nas/ thugs rdo rje lta bu byang chub sems kyi rtsi/ me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rtsis sleb pas/ 'bras bu rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum kyi sku phyag rgya chen por srog zin par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bdud rtsi sbyang bar bya ste/ 'di skad do// shar gyi b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// dri chen bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar te// oM gyi 'phro 'du gsal ba las// chos nyid dag pa'i ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// gti mug chen po'i lam gnas pa// stongs shing zad par rab bsgral te// slar 'dus b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// rnam par snang mdzad yab yum bsgom// oM dz+nyA na badzra s+pha ra Na dzaH// zhes khri dang 'bum bzlas pa'i dus na/ shar gyi b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su/ bdud rtsi dri chen la sogs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bdud rtsi thams cad kyi dngos po dang/ mtshan ma de dag dang bral nas/ yi ge oM gyi tshogs su 'phro zhing nam mkha' gang ba'i dus na/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu+u na ma rtogs pa'i sems can nyon mongs pa gti mug gi dbang gis 'khor ba'i mtha' la zhen pa thams cad stongs shing zad par bsgral nas/ slar b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas khang du 'dus nas/ thams cad oM gyi rang bzhin du gyur nas/ slar chi li li b+han+d+ha'i nang du 'dus pa las/ rnam par snang mdzad yab yum gyi phyag rgyar srog zin par gyur to// de nas lho'i b+han+d+ha nas rin po che'i rigs kyi sman sbyang bar bya ste/ 'di skad do// lho yi b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// sha chen bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar bas// swA yi 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba

las// mnyam nyid chen po'i ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu+u na// nga rgyal chen po'i lam gnas pa// stongs shing zad par rab bsgral nas// slar 'dus b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum bsgom// swA dz+nyA na s+pha ra Na dzaH// zhes khri dang 'bum bzlas pa'i dus na/ lho'i b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas khang na/ sha chen la sogs te rin po che'i bdud rtsi thams cad sman gyi dngos po dang bral nas/ yi ge swA'i tshogs su 'phro zhing nam mkha' gang ba'i dus na/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na ma rtogs pa'i sems can nga rgyal gyi dbang gis 'khor ba'i mtha' la zhen pa thams cad zad cing stongs par bsgral nas/ slar lho'i b+han+d+har chi li li 'dus pas/ rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum gyi phyag rgya srog zin par gyur to// da ni pad+ma rigs kyi bdud rtsi sbyang bar bya ste// 'di skad do// nub phyogs b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// rak+ta'i bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar bas// AM gyi 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba las// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// 'dod chags chen po'i lam gnas pa// stongs shing zad par rab bsgral nas// slar 'dus b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// snang ba mtha' yas yab yum bsgom// zhes dbyangs dang skul tshig brjod// AM dz+nyA na badzra s+phar Na dzaH/ zhes bzlas pa'i dus na nub phyogs kyi b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas khang na/ pad+ma rak+ta la sogs te pad+ma rigs kyi bdud rtsi thams cad sman gyi dngos po dang bral nas/ AM gyi tshogs su 'phro zhing nam mkha' gang ba'i dus na/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na ma rtogs pa'i sems can nyon mongs pa 'dod chags gyi dbang gis 'khor ba'i mtha' la zhen pa thams cad stongs shing zad par bsgral nas/ slar nub kyi b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su 'dus pa las/ snang ba mtha' yas yab yum gyi phyag rgyar srog zin par gyur to// de nas las kyi rigs kyi bdud rtsi sbyang bar bya ste/ 'di skad do// byang phyogs b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// dri chu'i bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar bas// hA yi 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba las// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// phrag dog chen po'i lam gnas pa// stongs shing zad par rab bsgral nas// slar 'dus b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas su// don yod grub pa yab yum bsgom// hA dz+nyA na badzra s+pha ra Na dzaH/ zhes khri 'bum bzlas pa'i dus na/ byang gi b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas khang na rdo rje dri chu la sogs pa las kyi rigs kyi bdud rtsi thams cad sman gyi dngos po dang bral nas/ yi ge hA'i tshogs su 'phro zhing nam mkha' gang ba'i dus na/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na ma rtogs pa'i sems can nyon mongs pa phrag dog gis dbang gis 'khor ba'i mtha' la zhen pa thams cad zad cing stongs

par bsgral nas/ slar chi li li byang gi b+han+d+har 'dus pa las/ don yod grub pa yab yum gyi phyag rgyar srog zin par gyur to// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na yang ma rtogs pa'i sems can 'khor ba rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa nyon mongs pa lnga'i bdud kyis zin pa/ dug gsum gyi nad kyis gdungs pa/ 'khor ba ngan song gi gnas su gtan shi ba thams cad la ye shes chen po lngas ni sbyangs la/ thugs rje byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsis slebs/ 'bras bu sku gsung thugs kyi srog 'dzin mdzad pa'i phyir na bdud rtsi ste/ bdud bcom rtsir gyur 'bras bu sku gsung thugs zhes bya ba'o// oM AHhU~M swA hA/ dz+nyA na badzra s+phar Na dzaH/ oM AHhU~M swA hA/ badzra a mr-i ta hU~M hrIHthaH/ de nyid rigs lnga'i spyi sngags so// gsang ba mchog gi las gzhung bsrang la/ las rnams rgyas 'bring gang mdzad pa'i snying po gdon te/ lha bdud rtsir bsgyur ba'i sngags la/ oM AHhU~M badzra sa twa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hrIHtha/ shar phyogs nas/ oM AHhU~M bai ro tsa na ya a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hrI:tha/ lho phyogs nas/ oM A:hU~M rat+na sa twa a mr-i ta kuN+Dal hrIHtha/ nub phyogs nas/ oM A:hU~M pad+ma sa twa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hrI:tha/ byang phyogs nas/ oM A:hU~M karma sa twa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hrI:tha/ yum rnams kyi g.yon phyogs nas/ oM AHhU~M d+hA twI shwa rI a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hrIHtha/ zhes pa la sogs pa stong stong thon pa dang/ srid gsum b+han+d+ha bzang 'khor yug/ 'bru lnga ye shes 'phro 'du las// stong khams khyab par don byas nas// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// gnyis med ye shes lngar sbyor zhing// dkyil 'khor dam pa rigs brgya yang// de nyid rigs lnga'i sku ru 'dus// de nyid rig pa lha'i dkyil 'khor yang// gsang chen rigs gcig sku+u la bsdu// b+han+d+ha lnga ni yum lngar 'dus// yum lnga chos kyi dbyings su 'dus// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sA ya na ta na g+ha Na gu h+ya sid+d+hi hU~M hrIHtha/ rdzogs nas dngos grub rim gyis blang// b+han+d+ha ni spros pa med pa yum gyi b+ha ga pad+ma'i gzhas yas khang na/ bdud rtsi'i bye brag dngos po dang bral nas/ byang chub kyi sems ye shes dpa' bo 'bru lngar gyur nas/ phar 'phros pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/ nyon mongs pa lnga la zhen pa thams cad stongs shing zad par bsgral nas/ slar 'dus pa las ye shes lnga rang bzhin lhun gyis grub par bsgom/ de nyid rigs lnga'i bsnyen pa gsung gi bsnyen pa'o// kun tu bzang po thugs zhi ba'i bsnyen pa'o// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ bdud rtsi khrol bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas khrol bu'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas/ tsan+dan dmar po'i dri chab la khro mo dbyings phyug ma'i sngags kyis gdab/ oM ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI sarba dra byaM hUM tha/ mtshan ma'i

rnam rtog bag chags sbyang// btag dang btsag dang gzhal ba las// shun chen gzhi ni bting ba la// rak+ta'i thig le bcu bris la// dar dang za 'og lhod du gding// nyi zla 'bar ba'i gtan pa bcu// khro mo bcu yi gtun khung du// khro bo bcu yi rdo rjes brdung// sgra 'byin ma yi gtun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chen la// steng phyogs srung ba'i hUM kA ras// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung// stong khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hU~M dz+nyA na badzra bin+du dzaH/ gardza gardzahU~M/ rdo rje snyems ma'i gtun khung du// nyon mong lnga yi dug chen la// shar phyogs srung ba'i rnam rgyal gyis// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung// stong khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hU~M dz+nyA na badzra bin+du dzaH/ ha na ha na hU~M/ dur khrod bdag mo'i gtun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chenal// lho phyogs srung ba'i gshed po yis// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung// stong khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hU~M dz+nyA na bin+du dzaH/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M/ rdo rje gtum mo'i gtun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chen la// nub phyogs srung ba'i rta mgrin gyis// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung// stong khams khyab par don byas nas// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus te// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hU~M dz+nyA nabin+b+hu+i dzaH/ hu lu hu hU~M/ rlung 'byin ma yi gtun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chen la// byang srung bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yis// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung// stong khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hU~M dz+nyA na bin+du dzaH/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje sder mo'i gtun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yis dug chen la// shar lho srung ba'i dbyug sngon gyis// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung// stong khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen po gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hU~M dz+nyA na bin+du dzaH// ha na ha na hU~M/ gtun khung ma yi mkha' dbyings su// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chen la// lho nub bsrung ba'i ma g.yo bas// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung// stong khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por 'gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hU~M dz+nyA na bin+du dzaH// ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M/

gsod byed ma yi gtun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chen la// nub byang gzhan gyis mi thub pas// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung// stong khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hU~M dz+nyA na bin+du dzaH/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M/ mda' bsnyems ma yi gtun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chen la// byang shar srung ba'i khams gsum rgyal// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung// stong khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hU~M dz+nyA bin+du dzaH// b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ skul byed ma yi gtun khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi dug chen la// 'og phyogs srung ba'i stobs po ches// ye shes lnga yi tho bas brdung// stong khams khyab par don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi chen por sbyor// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshos gsol// hU~M dz+nyA na bin+du dzaH// s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M/ khro bo chen po bcus khro mo bcu'i b+ha gar/ bdud rtsi 'chi ba med pa'i byang chub sems su lhun gyis grub par brdung par bsam mo// chos kyi dbyings kyi gtun khung chen po ru// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje tho bas brdung// snod bcud bdud rtsi'i bye brag sna tshogs kun// 'bras bu byang chub sems su rab tu sbyar// hU~M dz+nyA na bin+du zhes rtog pa bsal lo// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ bdud rtsi phrin las kyi bsgrub pa btags pa'i las kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas btsag ste dar tshags dang la tshags kyis btsag ste/ bse gzhong ngam zangs gzhong ngam/ 'khar gzhong du yum dang the tshom med pa'i bya rog mas btsag dang zab kyis brgyan la yab yum thabs dang shes rab kyis sbrel zhing btsag go/ 'di skad do// e ma ho kun tu bzang mo yi// thugs las byung ba'i gsang chen 'di// sngon byung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bur byin gyis brlabs de// 'bras bu bde chen byang chub sems// ye nas grub pa'i bdud rtsi ra sA yan// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin te// rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// ra sA ya na la sogs rdzas// rtsa ba 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud// gnyis med bde chen las byung ba// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sha chen mchod pa rin po che// pad+ma me tog yang dag ldan// zas mchog tshe yi dri chen po// rdo rje'i chu ste bdud rtsi'i mchog/ ga pur shel gyi pog phor dri// rin chen me ltar 'bar ba'i tshogs// yon tan 'bum phrag yangs pa'i gter// rig 'dzin dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud drug sems can kun sgrol

phyir// dug lnga sel ba'i thabs mchog ste// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor gyis// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le 'di// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor phyir// gcig tu dpa' bo'i ro rnams dang// gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad dang// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la mchod// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// 'khrul pa'i bag chags dag bya'i phyir// thabs dang shes rab 'brel bas gcig/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta dz+nyA na badzra saM sho d+ha ya hU~M hrIHtha/ btsag pa'i sngags so// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta mu sa la mu+u sa la/ ha na ha na hUM hriHtha/ bsre zhing sbal ba'i sngags so// de nas btsal te/ mi bskyod byang chub sems nyid btsal// lhag mthong chen po'i breyis btsal// yo gal med pa'i srang la btsal// 'gyur ba med pa'i khal du blang// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsol// dz+nyA na badzra ho sa ma ya hU~M/ rnam par snang mdzad dri chen 'jal// me long ye shes bre yis mjal// yo gal med pa'i srang la 'jal// 'gyur ba med pa'i khal du blang// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsol// dz+nyA na badzra ho sa ma ya hU~M/ rin chen 'byung ldan sha chen 'jal// mnyam nyid ye shes bre yis 'jal// yo gal med pa'i srang la 'jal// 'gyur ba med pa'i khal du blang// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsol// dz+nyA badzra ho sa ma ya hU~M/ mtha' yas pad+ma rak+ta 'jal// so sor rtogs pa'i bre yis 'jal// yo gal med pa'i sang la 'jal// 'gyur ba med pa'i khal du blang// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsol// dz+nyA na badzra ho sa ma ya hU~M/ don yod grub pa dri chu gur gum 'jal// bya ba nan tan bre yis 'jal// yo gal med pa'i srang la 'jal// 'gyur ba med pa'i khal du blang// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsol// dz+nyA na badzra ho sa ma ya hU~M// sku gsung thugs kyi rgya yis gdab// gcig pa dpal chen he ru'i rgya// gnyis pa yab yum gnyis med rgya// gsum pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// bzhi pa ye shes bzhi yi rgya// lnga pa rigs lnga lha yi rgya// drug pa thub pa drug gi rgya// bdun pa ma mo bdun gyi rgya// brgyad pa gau rI brgyad kyi rgya// dgu pa he ru klong dgu'i rgya// bcu pa khro bo bcu yi rgya// gu h+ya lag gi phyag rgya gdab// ras bal ba su ta yi gzungs thag gis// b+han+d+ha yas phub pa ni gnam yin te// mas bkab pa ni sa yin la// kha khyer du snang ba ni rab yin la// dum bu bzhir snang ba ni 'dzam bu gling bzhi yin la/ dum bu gsum du snang ba ni srid pa gsum yin/ gzhal yas khang nang na bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas khengs pa ni/ mu tig dkar po dri ma med pa la lhas gnad du med pa/ mnan pa thams cad bdud rtsis khengs pa/ 'dres brkur med pa/ brkus

pa thams cad bdud rtsis khengs pa/ dper na mtsho'i nang na nya sbal bzhin no// gzungs thag gi phyogs bzhi nas bskor ba ni/ dbus rgya mtsho chen po las chu bo chen po bzhi 'bab pa/ shar seng ge'i kha nas 'bab pa/ lho rta sngon gyi kha nas 'bab pa/ nub rma bya'i kha nas 'bab pa/ byang shang shang gi kha nas 'bab pa/ chu bo bzhi 'dom nas dbus kyi pho brang rgya mtsho chen po las 'bab pa ni/ glang po che'i kha nas 'bab pa dang/ glang po che'i ya rkan rta mgrin/ ma rkan gsang ba'i yum bzhi/ de yab yum thabs dang shes rab las/ lhag pa'i byang sems dkar lhung lhung byung bar bsgom mo// de yan chad phrin las kyi sgrub pa'o// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ khro bo stobs po che btag btsag btsal ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas gnas mchog gsang ba ru// dkyil 'khor lnga po rim par bri// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// de'i phyir rim rin po che zur brgyad// de'i phyi rim ka ba mchog brgyad// de yi phyi rim maN+Dal bri// gru chad sgo khyams rdzogs par bri// dar gyi khang bu klubs pas brgyan// me tog phreng bas phyogs bzhir bskor// bdud rtsi'i pho brang bzhengs su gsol// phrin las dbab rnams rim par bskur// byin chen dbang cing yon tan brjod// dgu pa'i sngags kyis gdab pa ni// phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi sngags// sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li tha// sa ra ni sa yi snying po'i don// wa ni nam mkha'i snying po'i don// panya ni sgrib pa rnam par sel// tsa ni byams pa mai tri yin// a ni kun tu bzang po'o// mr-i ni 'jam dpal gzhon nu'o// ta ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ngo// kuN+Da sangs rgyas kun tu bzang// li ni phyag na rdo rje ste// tha ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ngo// gtso bo kun bzang rab tu gsungs// phyi yi dgu pa'i sngags zhes bya// nang du 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// spyan ras gzigs dang rta mgrin rgyal// phyag na rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil// kun tu bzang po dbyug pa sngon// sa yi snying po rnam par rgyal// sgrib pa rnam sel stobs po che// byams pa mai tri mi g.yo mgon// nam mkha'i snying po Ta ki rA dza// che mchog he ru ka dang dgu'o// nang gi dgu pa zhes de la bya'o// gsang ba'i dgu pa ni/ sar ni sa yi rang bzhin no// wa ni chu yi rang bzhin no// panya ni rlung gi rang bzhin no// tsa ni me yi rang bzhin no// a ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// mr-i bdud rtsi chen po// ta dam tshig chen po// kuN+Da li ni 'khyil pa/ tha ni sreg dang 'joms pa'o// gsang ba'i sngags ni rnam pa dgu// dgu pa zhes ni de la bya// le lo med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bar chad med pa'i 'phro 'du bzlas// de yang 'phro 'du bya ba'i thabs ni/ ting 'dzin

rnam gsum rim bzhin bsgom// rgyu yi ting 'dzin 'bras bu las// de nyid byang chub sems su gyur// 'byung ba lnga yum dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems las rim bzhin bskyed// e yaM khaM suM b+hUM raM/ de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ chos nyid stong pa'i nam mkha' las// brag cha'i tshul du sgra 'di 'byung ngo// mi gnas mi rtog bsam dang bral// ma chags bral bas yul las 'das// cir yang mi 'byung cir ma yin// rang bzhin brjod dang bral ba'i sgra// zhes byung bas chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du gsal lo// de nas kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad do// yongs la khyab pa nyi ma'i 'od// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// rnam rtog mun pa sel bar snang// yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i 'od// ces sgra byung bas chos thams cad byang chub kyi 'od zer du gsal bar gyur to// de nas rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad do// a ni ma chags yi ge'i mdzod// cho 'phrul rtog pa 'byung ba'i sgra// nyon mongs skyon bral zla ba'i mdog/ cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu// zhes sgra byung bas chos thams cad cho 'phrul gyi rang bzhin du gnas par gyur to// de nas yum chen mo nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad do// a ni e yi rang bzhin te// a las e byung mkha' khyab la// mi 'gyur thogs med nam mkha'i dbyings// mtha' dbus med par kun tu gdal// zhes byung bas nam mkha' kun tu bzang mo'i rang bzhin du gsal lo// de nas rlung dam tshig sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad do// a yi ye shes byin brlabs las// rlung gi snying po yaM du shar// thams cad bde ba'i stobs dang ldan// rang bzhin g.yo zhing thogs med 'phyo// zhes byung bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor du gsal bar gyur to// de nas yum mA ma kI'i byin brlabs las sgra 'di 'byung ngo// rgyu yi snying po'i 'od zer las// chu yi snying po 'od zer shar// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mnyam pa'o// chu yi rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par gyur// zhes sgra byung bas thams cad mA ma kI'i byin brlabs las sgra 'di 'byung ngo// de nas yang rdo rje 'bar ba ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgra 'di 'byung ngo// mi dmigs pa las sna tshogs par// snang ba'i cho 'phrul 'di byung bas// rnal 'byor sa bcu rdzogs pa'i don// lhun gyis grub pas bde ba che// zhes sgra byung bas sa bcu rim gyis 'dul ba'i bye brag thugs su chud par gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'bar ba ri bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad do// rnam rtog shes rab mkha' klong nas// rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bo shar// rgya che

gting zab gnam 'phang gcod// rtog pa'i ri bo 'joms par byed// ces sgra byung bas rdo rje'i ri bos nyon mongs thams cad 'joms par byed do// de nas gzhal yas khang yum gyi mkhar byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// b+ha ga gsang ba'i 'od zer las// bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag tu med// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings// zhes brjod pas gzhal yas khang dpag tu med par bsam mo// de nas me 'bar bas bsreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// a yi byin brlabs ye shes las// cho 'phrul me yi snying po shar// 'bar ba gsal byed ye shes 'phro// dngos po kun zad me klong tshul// zhes brjod pas/ gzhal yas khang phyi nang gi mtshan ma'i rtog pa thams cad me ri 'bar bas bsreg par bsam mo// de'i nang du che mchog gi sku bskyed pa 'di skad do// e ma ho// chos kun thams cad sku la rdzogs pas chos kyi sku// rdo rje che mchog phyag 'tshal he ru ka/ chos nyid mkha' la skar tshogs rgyas pa'i sku// dbyar gyi char sprin lta bur gtibs pa'i sku// chu brlabs lta bur brjid pa'i zhal gdangs shing// nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer brdal ba bzhin// theg chen 'khor ba'i chos rnams kun// phyag rgya gcig tu rdzogs pa'i sku// chos sku lhun grub chos sku rang rtogs 'bar// dbu skra kham nag ral pa'i cod pan can// klu rgyal 'bum gyi bklubs shing mchod pa 'bul// rdo rje gsung gi sngags sgra brdab pas kyang// hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra skad 'jigs par ston// theg chen don dang gsang sngags sgrogs pa'i tshig/ 'bar ba'i smin ma mun rum glog ltar 'gyu// spyan dmar bzlog pa'i sdang mig nyi ltar 'bar// 'bar ba'i klong nas bskal pa'i 'tshubs nag 'khyil// hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra skad 'jigs par sgrogs// rdo rje thog dang gnam lcags ser ba 'bebs// rno dbal mche ba zang yag gtsigs pa yis// nyon mongs log par blta ba'i tshogs la rngams shing 'khrugs// thod rus sha khrag rkang rus brul dang rnag/ za byed rngams pa'i zhal du chem chem gsol// sbrul gdug ko rlon la sogs 'jigs pa'i rgyan// rngams pa'i sku la shin tu brjid par brgyan// za byed rngams dang 'jigs byed mang po'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan sprul pa'i pho nya mdzad// 'khor ba kun dang thar pa'i chos rnams ni// dpa' bo chen po'i gdan du brjid cing rol// phyi nang snod bcud sku la rdzogs pas na// 'gran gyi zla med che btsan gcig pu nyid// gsang mchog 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sa sid+d+hi ma hA su kha hr-i da ya pa ra bi d+hA na A kra ma Na

hri thA/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa mr-i ta ra sA ya na ta na dz+nyA hUM hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta badzra sa twa hUM hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ta ya prI wa hrIH/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hU~M hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ka ma la kuN+Da li sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hU~M hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta many+dzu shrIHbya ba lo ki te hU~M hrAr+Shi \u0f7ftha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta shrI b+ha ga wAn hU~M ha ho/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sa sid+d+hi ma hA su kha hr-i da yaM pha ra bi d+hAn A kra ma Na hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ni thams cad bdud rtsi ma gyur ba med pa'o// ra sA ya na ni phyir sA ya na rigs lnga yab yum sangs rgyas/ nang ra sA ya na ni phung po lnga rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas/ de gnyis kyis bskyed pa'i khams dang/ skye mched sems dpa' dang/ sems ma rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas/ de lta bu'i de na rig cing rtogs dka' bas na/ ra sA ya na ta na dza ya/ hU~M ni bdud rtsir ma gyur pa med pa'o// hrIHni rta mgrin/ tha ni 'di ltar snang ba thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin du ma gyur pa med pa'o// yang na 'khor ba stongs pa'o// oM ni sku/ AH ni gsung/ hU~M ni thugs/ hU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li na thams cad bdag la 'khyil pa'o// bdag thams cad la 'khyil pa ni/ spros pa med pa'i chos nyid byang chub sems/ rang rig pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang 'dra ba'am/ rang byung gi ye shes nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ste// lhangs kyis rtogs pa de thams cad la 'khyil pa'o// thams cad bdag la 'khyil pa'o// phyi 'byung ba lngar sangs rgyas// nang lha dang lha mo sems dpa' dang sems mar sangs rgyas so// de kho na thams cad bdag la 'khyil pa'o// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ha ya grI wa hrIH/ pad+ma pad+ma hrIH/ hu lu hu lu hrIH/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hrIH/ hUM hrIHtha/ hrIHni 'di ltar snang ba thams cad/ rta mgrin du ma gyur pa gang yang med pa'o// hu lu ni bdud dang srin po dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa ma btang zhig pa'o// b+han+d+ha ni mgo nas choms shig pa'o// hU~M rang byung gi byang chub sems de kho na lhangs kyis rtogs pa'o// tha ni thams cad bdud rtsir ma gyur ba med pa'o// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta badzra satwa hU~M hrIHtha ni 'di ltar snang ba thams cad rdo rje sems dpar ma gyur pa gang yang med pa'o// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ka ma la kuN+Da li sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hU~M hrIHtha ni dkyil 'khor yang yin la yul yang yin pa'i dngos grub pa'o// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta many+dzu shI byA ba lo ki te hU~M hrIHtha ni 'jam dpal te 'di ltar snang ba thams cad bdud rtsi rnam pa lngar ma gyur pa gang yang med pa'o// las de khyod la gtad kyis 'gro ba sems can gyi don mdzod cig pa'o// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta shrI b+ha ga wAn hU~M a ho ni chos nyid byang chub sems a'i rang bzhin du ma gyur pa med

pa'o// zhes 'das pa'i sangs rgyas zhal bdun nas kyang sngags bdun bzlas so// slad kyis 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas zhal bdun nas kyang sngags gong ma bdun bzlas so// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal bdun nas kyang sngags gong ma bdun bzlas so// che mchog he ru ka ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas yin no// 'das pa bdun/ da ltar bdun/ slad kyis 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas bdun no// dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig gi zhal nas sngags bdun bzlas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i sras brgyad/ khro bo bcu/ gau rI ma brgyad/ phra men ma brgyad kyi gsang sngags mang po'i skyon rnams ni 'bras bu bsgrub thag ring bar 'gyur bas/ 'bru dgu pa'i gsang sngags zhig zhu zhes chos 'khor lan bcu gsum du bskor te zhus pa 'di skad do// nam mkha'i don gyi glegs bam la// skar tshogs rig pa'i yi ge bris// 'byung chen zhi yi sgra bsgrags nas// gsangs sngags mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// gsang sngags chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// stong gsum b+han+d+ha bzang kong du// srid gsum sems can dug chen la// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rtsi sbyar bas// bdud rtsi'i mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// bdud rtsi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i spyod pa la// mchod pa rgya mtsho'i gter yin te// srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun// kun kyang mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// bzlas brjod chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'khor ba shes rab yum nyid la// snying rje thabs kyi rgyal po yis// 'du 'bral med par rab sbyar na// thams cad rgyal ba'i rdzas su bskyed// rnal 'byor pa yis mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// rnal 'byor pa yis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'khor ba bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag/ ye shes 'bar ba'i mtshon chen gyis// rang bzhin med par bsgral byas nas// mnyam nyid chos sku chen por ston// sgrol ba'i mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// sgrol ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la// gzugs khams bang rim khri 'phang brtan// gzugs med bum rten bum par bcas// sku gdung mchod rten rgyun mi 'chad// sku gdung chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'jug pa'i yan lag rmang gzhi'i rten// 'khor lo tshogs chen khri 'bang rten// yan lag dang po bum rten bcas// lcang lo cod pan phreng bas brgyan// sku gdung chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// gtsang ma'i rgyu+u las byas pa yis// yid 'ong rnam pa mchod pa la// rkyen gyi rnal 'byor sna tshogs kyis// brgyan te bsgrub pa'i sprin phung rnams// mnyes pa bskang phyir sku la 'bul// sri zhu'i mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// sri zhu'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// phyi 'khor skyong ba'i mgon po la// 'dod yon lnga la sogs pa yi// yid bzhin yo byad rkyen dag bcas// yon

tan cha la smon lam mchod// mnyes nas skong ba'i stabs su 'gyur// yon tan mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// yon tan chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// khams gsum snying rje'i gnas dag na// yo byad sbyin sogs chen po las// 'dod pa'i bsam pa rab sbyar na// dgu pa bstan pas stobs su 'gyur// snying rje'i mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// rnying rje chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// gegs su gyur pa'i bgegs rigs la// mnyam pa'i don gyis sun mi dbyung// dmigs kyi kha zas sna tshogs pas// bgegs rnams mgu nas thams cad kyang// lan chags thal ba'i 'khor lo bskor// des 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang sems ma dang/ khro bo dang khro mos gsang sngags zab mo thams cad kyi bdud rtsi lnga'i yang snying/ lung bdag la bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas lung bdag la bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang// che mchog he rus bka' stsal pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang/ nga'i 'khor sems dpa' dang/ sems ma dang/ khro bo dang khro mo dang/ dri za dang/ drang srong dang/ gshin rje dang/ srin po dang/ klu dang/ rlung lha dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ 'byung po dang/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams nyon cig/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hrIHtha/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang snying yin/ sman thams cad rtsa ba dang/ sdong po dang/ yal ga dang/ snying po dang/ shun lpags dang/ thang chu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ dgu po 'di la yi ge 'bru dgus sbyang ngo// de la yang sbyang lugs rnam pa gsum ste/ rgyu nas sbyang ba dang/ rkyen gyis sbyang ba dang/ 'bras bu nas sbyang ba'o// de la rgyu nas sbyang ba ni bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad nas dbu'i gtsug tor man chad du rdzogs par mthong ngo// nam mkha' stong pa ni dbu'i gtsug gtor dge ba bcu/ de yang 'khor ba 'dod pa'i khams na chags pa khrag gi rgya mtshor rdzogs/ 'khor ba gzugs khams zhing chen sa gzhi brtan par rdzogs par mthong ngo// keng rus la gzugs med pa'i khams rdzogs par mthong ngo// ri rab kyi kha mu tig gi bcal dang// asma gar+b+ha dang/ nor bu rin po che 'bar ba ni/ nyan thos rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sku+u la rdzogs par mthong ngo// nor bu rin po che'i steng na rdo rje rtse gsum dang/ rtse lnga dang/ rdo rje'i brag gtams pa ni/ kri ya dang/ u pa ya dang/ yo ga rnams rdzogs par mthong ngo// rdo rje brag chen gyi steng na pad+ma kha dog dmar por gnas pa ni/ ma hA yo ga rdzogs par mthong ngo// pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang/ zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi kha sbyar du bkod pa la/ dbang phyug pho nyi

shu rtsa bzhi dang/ mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rdzogs par mthong ngo// dbang phyug pho mo'i steng na byol song gi gtso chen po brgyad la/ dpa' brtul stag dang mi 'jigs seng ge dang gdug pa gzig dang/ gtum pa dom dang/ stobs glang po che dang/ brjid pa'i ma he dang/ 'dzin pa'i chu srin dang/ zhe sdang sbrul rnams ni rig 'dzin rnams nyon mongs dang// zhes bya'i sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ rig 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo// gzhal yas khang chen po nam mkha'i rig 'dzin du phyogs chad par gyur pa ni// yum kun tu bzang mor rdzogs par mthong ngo// me dpung chen po dgu yongs su 'bar ba/ ye shes dgu yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo// zhabs brgyad la gsang ba'i yum bzhi dang/ sgo ma bzhi yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo// dur khrod bco brgyad ni ma mo bco brgyad rdzogs par mthong ngo// phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni phra men ma bcu dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na/ khyung bcu 'bar ba'i kha nas mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phro ba phra thabs bcu dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na/ seng ge kha glal ba'i kha nas ral gri brgyad 'phro ba/ sgrol byed chen po'i lag nas stag mche ba gtsigs pa'i kha nas rdo rje sna tshogs 'phro ba/ sgrol ging mo dgu'i kha nas mi mgo brgyad rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis btags nas glad la bskor ba/ khro bo bzhi'i lag nas med dpung chen pos thu lum du bsregs pa/ phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal lo// zhal nyi shu rtsa gcig ni sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gcig tu gsal lo// dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig g.yas kyi dbu bdun gyi spyi gtsug ni sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba'i dbu+u la 'khor lo re re 'od zer dang bcas par 'bar ba/ dbus kyi dbu bdun la dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba la/ rin po che'i mchod rten re re gsal lo// g.yon pa'i dbu bdun las sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba la/ nor bu rin po che bdun gsal ba/ 'khor lo dang mchod rten dang/ rin po che de dag gi lte ba dang/ rtse mo las rgyal mtshan chen po bcu 'bar ba ni/ rgyal byed lcags kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ gdul bya sha ba'i rgyal mtshan dang/ gcan gzan gzig gi rgyal mtshan dang// sprul pa rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rin po che sbrul nag gi rgyal mtshan dang/ dpa' bo stag gi rgyal mtshan dang/ gzi mdangs mi'i rgyal mtshan dang/ dmar gsal khrag gi rgyal mtshan dang/ rtsal chen seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang/ gtum pa dom gyi rgyal mtshan te de rnams kyi rtse mo gcig tu 'dus te/ gser gyi tog stong gcig tu 'bar ba'o// dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/ rgyal mtshan chen po bcu dang/ dbu yi gtsug tor rgyal mtshan gyi tog stong ni/ rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor nyid du gsal bar mthong ngo// spyan

'bar ba drug cu rtsa bzhi ni/ khrag 'thung drug cur gsal lo// ljags kyi dbang po la sa nu he ru ka yab yum bsgom// che mchog thugs nas b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang/ nang b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ gnam sa gnyis kyi gzhal yas su bdud rtsis khengs pa/ bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen po chu bran bzhi 'bab pa/ bdud rtsi'i chu bran bzhi ni gzungs thag bzhi yin/ bzhi gcig tu 'dus pa glang po che'i kha nas 'bab pa/ glang po che'i ya rkan la rta mgrin/ ma rkan gsang ba'i yum bzhi/ yab yum thabs dang shes rab las byang chub sems dkar me re 'bab pa las/ bdud rtsi shar seng ge'i kha nas 'bab pa/ lho rta sngon gyi kha nas 'bab pa/ nub rma bya'i kha nas 'bab pa/ byang shang shang te'u'i kha nas 'bab pa/ sems can de lnga'i kha nas rigs kyi yum lnga/ de la dbus kyi gnam zhal dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad zhabs bzhi dang ldan par bsgom mo// che mchog gi zhabs brgyad kyis khro mo'i dbu brgyad mnan pa/ dbus kyi gnam gzhal gyen du bltas pa'i zhal na/ che mchog gsang ba'i rdo rje phyed nub par bsgom mo// khro mo gnam zhal gyi zhabs bzhis rigs bzhi he ru ka bzhi'i phrag dog nas mnan pa/ gnam zhal gyi gsang ba'i b+ha gar dbus badzra he ru ka yi smin mtshams yan chad nub par bsgom mo// che mchog gi lhag pa'i byang chub sems ni khro mo gnam zhal ma la thim/ gnam zhal gyi byang chub sems badzra he ru ka'i dbu la thim/ de'i byang sems rigs bzhi he ru ka la thim/ rigs bzhi'i byang sems ni yum la thim/ yum bzhi'i byang sems ni sems can bzhi'i kha nas chu 'bab pa la thim/ chu bo chen po byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsir gyur to// de ni rgyu nas sbyang ba'o// rkyen gyis sbyar ba ni sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang ste/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hrIHtha/ oM ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas te// oM las ye shes 'od byung zhing// oM gyi mes bsreg thal bar brlag/ da ltar bzhugs pa rnams kyis gsung// hU~M ni bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ slad kyi 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas yin// sar ni sa yi snying po yin// zad pa med pa bdud rtsi'i mchog/ pa ni nam mkha'i snying po yin// thams cad bdudartsi chen por bstan// panya ni sgrib pa rnam pa sel// bdud rtsi rnam lnga mngon sangs rgyas// tsa ni byams pa mai tri yin// bdud rtsi'i las ni bag chags sreg/ a ni kun tu bzang po ste// bdud rtsi'i don ni skye shi med// mr-i ni 'jam dpal gzhon nu ste// bdud rtsi'i las ni rnam rtog sbyong// ta ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bdud rtsi'i don ni byang chub sems// kuN+Da che mchog he ru ka/ bdud rtsi'i ngang ni mnyam pa nyid// li ni phyag na rdo rje ste// bdud rtsi

nyid ni bag chags sbyong// hrIHni rta mchog chen po ste// bdud rtsi'i dngos grub chen po 'thob// dgu pa'i steng du oM AHhU~M/ hrIHmnan pas ni bcu gsum mo// sngags bcu gsum po 'di 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs/ da ltar dang ma byon pas kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// sems dpa' dang sems ma dang khro bo khro mo rnams kyis kyang gsungs so// gnas yul gyi ma mo rnams kyis kyang gsungs so// lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis kyang yang snying yig 'bru bcu gsum pa 'di gsungs so// dgu pa la yig 'bru bcu gsum pa dang/ bcu gnyis hrIHrta mgrin las mkhan pa dang bcu gsum mo// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ thugs kyi bsnyen pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// gsang chen rigs gcig pa'i bsnyen pa'o// 'bras bu sbyang ba ni/ 'dzab dbul ba dang/ thugs dbang bskur ba dang/ dngos grub blang ba dang/ bshags pa bya ba dang/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ bar gcod kyi bgegs bskrad pa dang/ smon lam gdab pa ni/ phyi ma'i 'bras bu thob phyir 'di gsungs so// bsnyen bsgrub kyi 'dzab grangs pa ni/ dang po ci mdzad ci spyodakyang// sku gsung thugs kyi dgongs pa mdzad// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sa sid+d+hi ma hA su kha hr-I da yan/ pa ra bid+ha na/ A kra ma Na hri tha/ oM ni sangs rgyas sku'i mchog thob pa'o// AH ni sangs rgyas gsung gi lam du gyur pa'o// hU~M ni sangs rgyas thugs kyi ye shes so// gnyis pa ra sA ya na khrol bu'i bsnyen pa la/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sA ya na ta na dza ya hU~M hrIHtha/ oM gyis ye shes 'od 'byung zhing// AH yis mes bsregs thal bar brlag/ hU~M gi bdud rtsi nyid du zhu zhes bya'o// gsum pa rtsa ba dgu'i sngags 'byung ste/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta badzra sa twa hU~M hrIHtha/ oM ni sku ma skyes pa'o// AH ni gsung smon pa med pa'o// hU~M ni thugs mtshan ma med pa'o// bzhi pa rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ha ya grI wa hrIH/ hu lu hu lu hrIH/ pad+ma pad+ma hrIH/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hrIHtha/ oM gyis sku mchog yon tan du 'gyur ba'o// AH yis gsung mchog yongs su gyur pa'o// hU~M gis thugs mchog ye shes su gyur pa'o// lnga pa la bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'byung ste/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ka ma la kuN+Da li sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hU~M hrIHtha/ oM ni bdud rtsi chos kyi sku las bdud rtsi'i yon tan du 'bul ba'o// AHni bdud rtsi chos kyi gsung las bdud rtsi yon tan du 'dzag pa'o// hU~M ni bdud rtsi thugs las bdud rtsi ye shes su 'char ba'o// drug pa las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta many+dzu shrI byA ba lo ki te hU~M tha hrIHtha/ 'jam dpal gyi

bdud rtsi'i gong bu las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha ru bzhengs gsol bya ste/ bya ba lo ki zhes pa ni lha dang sgrub pa po kun so sor zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pa la bya'o// oM ni sku'i kun tu bzang po blta bas mchog mi shes pa'o// AHni gsung kun tu bzang po dad pas 'dun pa bskyed pa'o// hU~M ni thugs kun tu bzang po bdud rtsi'i don thugs su chud pas 'chi 'pho dang 'gyur ba'i dus med pa'o// bdun pa la gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor la/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta shrI b+ha ga wAn hU~M a ho// oM ni sangs rgyas sku'i mchog tu gyur pa'o// AHni sangs rgyas gsung gi lam du gyur pa'o// hU~M ni sangs rgyas thugs kyi ye shes su gyur pa'o// 'das pa'i sku mchog 'thob pa yang bdud rtsi 'di yin no// da ltar gyi gsung lam du gyur pa yang 'di yin no// ma byon pa'i thugs rig pa ye shes mdzad pa yang bdud rtsi 'di yin no// hrIHni thams cad kyi sgor zhugs pa'o// che mchog he ru ka'i dbu+u la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhugs pa'i sngags so// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ 'bras bu'i sbyang ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// thugs dam bskul ba 'di skad do// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hrIHtha/ zhes 'dzab bar ma chad par drang ngo// oM las ye shes 'od byung zhing// AHyis mes bsregs thal bar brlag/ hU~M gis bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ sarba thams cad bdud rtsir bstan// pany+tsas rnam lngar mngon sangs rgyas// a ni skye med chos kyi sku// mr-i yis dug gsum rtsa ba gcod// tas ni 'khor ba stongs par byed// oM ldan dkar la 'tsher ba'i 'phro 'du dang// AHldan dmar la dang ba'i byin brlabs kyis// hU~M ldan snum la 'dril ba'i bdud rtsi pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ ma skyes kun tu bzang po yab kyi mkha'// mi dmigs kun tu bzang mo yum gyi dbyings// yab yum dbyer med pas ni byang chub sems// byang chub sems kyang rin chen gzhal yas khang// skye shi med par skyon yon rtog pa bsgral zhes bya// 'du 'bral med par rtogs na gnyis med sbyor zhes bya// bstod pa ni/ e ma ho sangs rgyas kun tu bzang// gsang chen thig le nyid la rdzogs// ma rig mun sel ye shes sgron// dpa' bo khyod la skyabs su mchi// rang byung bdud rtsi dri med 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi bsngags pa'i mchog/ mi shes dri ma kun bcom nas// nges pa'i dbyings la 'god mdzad pa// gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// snang mdzad rdo rje rgyal spyan dang// mi bskyod nyi ma snang mtha' yas// don yod bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la// dgyes shing gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad kun la snyoms zhugs pa// dbyings phyug yum gyi tshogs rnams la// dga' ba'i yid kyis gus phyag

'tshal// lag na rdo rje rgyal po dang// kun bzang blo gros chen po dang// don rabs sa snying la sogs pa// rab tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i 'jig rten dbang phyug dang// 'gro ba'i 'dzin mchog dam pa la// gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// ngag la rang bzhin dri ma med// khu tshur 'dzin phreng dbyangs dang gar// spyod mchog dga' sdug phyag 'tshal lo// bdug pa me tog mar me dri// gzugs mchog mnyes mdzad lha mo la// mos pas btud cing phyag 'tshal lo// rig byed tshogs kyi bdag po mchog/ rdo rje srid pa 'dul mdzad pa// khro rgyal yab yum 'khor bcas la// gus pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ thugs dam bskul ba dang bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas dngos grub blang ngo// hU~M mnyam nyid gdod nas ma skyes gnyis med phyir// rtsal dang stsol bar mi dmigs kyang// rig dang ma rig sgyu ma'i khyad par la// rtogs pa'i khyad par mnyam par ma gyur te// rgyal ba'i dgongs spyod dbang du ma 'dus pas// mkhyen rab ting 'dzin dngos grub stsal du gsol// chags pa'i nad kyis gdungs pa'i gcong rnying la// bdud dang srin po zhe sdang glo bur gyis// tshe srog rgyu ba'i lus la bar gcod pa// che mchog mnga' chen tsham rngams gzi byin gyis// bdud dang mu stegs zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul mthu yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// bag chags rkyen gyis bsgribs pa'i rmongs pa la// gdung ba'i bdud rtsi mnyam pa'i char phab kyang// brlan pa'i shes rab blo dang ma ldan par// mngon shes drug gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rgyud drug rim gyis drang ba'i don slad du// khams gsum srid gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi dngos grub bdag gi lus 'dzin na// yon tan mchog gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// hU~M dregs pas myos pa'i bar snang lha bran dang// che bas 'gyengs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma mo'i tshogs// rdo rje gshog pas zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir// thogs med mkha' la 'phur ba'i dngos grub stsol// blang dor med pa'i don la thugs brtse'i phyir// so so'i blo dang ji ltar 'thad pa bzhin// mthun 'jug rtags kyis 'gro ba 'dul lags na// pra se na yi yo ga'i dngos grub stsol// dug gsum nad kyi gdungs pa'i gcong rnying la// 'tsho byed thabs kyi rgyal po'i rtsi btang nas// skye shi med pa'i dngos grub chen po de// bdud rtsi'i rdzas la brten te stsal du gsol// bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i zhag grangs da nang tshang// bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i 'dzab kyang da nang rdzogs// bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i yo byad da nang bas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// hU~M nam mkha'i mtha' dang

mnyam pa'i sku mnga' bas// yon tan lhun grub dngos grub stsal du gsol// cho 'phrul mthar phyin 'dren pa'i sku mnga' bas// phrin las mthar phyin thugs rje'i dngos grub stsol// ye shes thugs rje khyab pa'i sku mnga' bas// 'chi med thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ dngos grub blang ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bshags pa bya ba dang// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang// bar gcod kyi bgegs bskrad pa dang/ smon lam gdab pa dang/ de yan chad sgrub pa rgya mtsho'i le'u'o// de nas sman gyi bum pa blang la 'di skad do// gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// dag dag ma dag mi rtog rtog las 'das// dus gsum gcig la skur bstan phyi shol med// dngos grub sna tshogs rlabs chen 'bar ba can// su 'dod sbyin gyis da lta nga las long// bskal par sgrib dang mun nag mun sel de// sprin mthongs nyi shar khud par dro ba bzhin// bdud rtsi rgyal po'i dbang chen 'di phyin pas// rig 'dzin gtso bo'i go 'phang thob par shog/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta bai ro tsa na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a k+Sho b+h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta rat+na saM b+ha wa a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a mi de ba a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIHtha/ AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta bud+d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta badzra shrI he ru ka badzra kro d+d+hi shwa rI a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta rat+na shrI he ru ka rat+na kro d+hi shwa rI a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta pad+ma shrI he ru ka pad+ma kro d+hi shwa rI a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta karma shrI he ru ka karma kro d+hi shwa rI a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIHtha// zhes dbang bskur ro// tshe dang skong dang yid du 'ong// bgegs rnams zhi ba la sogs te// nad med dpal dang ci 'dod pa'i// yon tan rtsa brgyad 'dis 'thob bo// oM AHhU~M swA hA/ A yuHpha la gu h+ya sid+d+hi swA hA/ tshe yi snying po rgyud gsum po// srog gi snying po gzhal yas khang// sku gsum sku ste sku la thim// gsung gsum gsung ste gsung la thim// thugs gsum thugs te thugs la thim// byang chub sems la rab tu thim// zhes brjod pas dbang bskur ro// sgrol ba rgya mtsho ji ltar bya la yang don rnam pa lnga ste/ dang po bsgral ba'i rgyu dang/ bsgral ba'i dgongs pa dang/ bsgral ba'i phrin las dang/ thugs dam skul ba dang/ zhal du bstab pa dang lnga'o// de la bsgral ba'i rgyu la rnam pa lnga ste/ gang bsgral ba dang/ gang gis bsgral ba dang/ gang du bsgral ba dang/ don ci'i phyir bsgral ba dang/ ma bsgral ba'i skyon dang

lnga'o// gang bsgral ba la'ang glang po che dang/ seng ge dang/ rta dang/ mi dang/ rma bya dang lnga bsgral ba/ gang gi bsgral na/ thabs la mkhas pa'i skyes bu chen pos lha'i dkyil 'khor dang gnyis su med par bsgral lo// gang du bsgral na/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang yum gyi mkha' ru bsgral lo// don ched ci'i phyir na/ mnar med par ltung bar nges pas/ de mtho ris su gdon pa'i ched du thugs rjes gzung la bsgral lo// ma bsgral ba'i skyon ni rdo rje theg pa'i bka' bcag cing/ rnal 'byor gyi chos spyod nus pas/ rgyal khams phung ba'i skyon yod do// de la bsgral ba'i dgongs pa ni/ bdud rtsi phung po khams dang skye mched lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du gsal bar byas la/ dkyil 'khor chen por bkug la/ 'khor ba zhe bcad rgya gad byas la/ zhe sdang dbang gis dmyal bar skyes// gtso bsreg sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// dpal chen he ru'i bka' la nyon// me chen 'bar ba'i 'obs las brgol la shog/ mtshon cha spu gri'i so la 'dzeg la shog/ phrag dog dbang gis yi dgas skyes// bkres skom sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// dpal chen he ru'i bka' nyon la// yi dwags gnas nas bros la shog/ bkres skom gnas nas mchongs nas shog/ gti mug dbang gis byol song gnas su skyes// dpal chen he ru'i bka' nyon la// byol song gnas nas bros la shog/ 'on glen gti mug gnas nas mchongs la shog/ mtho ris thar pa'i gnas yod kyis// skye shi med pa'i sa yod kyis// 'khor ba 'di la ma chags shig/ skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal gtan bor la// skye ba rnam bzhi'i lus la ma chags shig/ mtho ris thar pa'i gnas su da 'deng gyis// ngan song gsum gyi gnas la ma chags shig/ ye shes lnga yi gnas su da gdeng gyis// nyon mongs dug lnga 'di la ma chags shig/ sku gsung thugs kyi sa la da gdeng gyis// lus ngag yid gsum sa la ma chags shig/ mig dbye ba dang mtshams gcad pa bya'o// raM yaM khaM/ bsreg gtor bkrus pas tshul bzhin byas la/ phung po spyod pa la yang gsum ste/ rgyu las sbyang ba dang/ rkyen gyis sbyang ba dang/ 'bras bur sbyang ba'o// dang por pho nyas dgug pa dang/ ngan song gsum nas drang pa dang/ mig dbye ba dang/ bar gcod bsal ba'i phyir/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ bsreg sbyang raM yaM khaM gis rgyu'i gnas sbyang ba'o// rkyen gyi sbyang ba sku gsung thugs gsum gyi gnas sbyang ba ni 'di skad do// e ma cho 'phrul 'od 'phros pas// yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs byung de// yi ge yan lag ye shes las// sangs rgyas sku yi sa bon 'byung// dpag tu med pa'i rgyal po rnams// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i tshogs// phyag rgya sna

tshogs mdzes par snang// de nas yi ge'i rang bzhin ni// rgyal ba'i sku nyid yin par bshad// a ni thugs kyi sa bon te// ka la sogs pa dang po lnga// mgur gyi gsang ba'i rang bzhin yin// ka kha ga g+ha nga/ gnyis pa tsa la sogs pa lnga// zla gam ljags kyi rang bzhin yin// tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ gsum pa ta la sogs pa bcu// ljags kyi rtse mo'i rang bzhin yin// ta tha da d+ha na/ bzhi pa pa la sogs pa lnga// zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar bshad// pa pha ba b+ha ma// lnga pa ya la sogs pa yi// bcu tshan gnyis kyi yi ge dag/ sku las 'phros par rab tu bshad// ya ra la wa sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM A:yod pa yin nam/ zhal gyi 'khor lo'i 'od zer las// sgrib pa sel ba'i yig 'bru ha// gsang ba mkha' yi 'od zer las// cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i yig 'bru k+Sha// sku yi khru tshad lte ba las// 'dod pa 'byung ba'i yig 'bru sa// thugs kyi dpal be'u chen po las// mtshan ma dag pa'i yig 'bru Sha// phyag gi 'khor lo'i 'od zer las// cho 'phrul ston pa'i yig 'bru sha/ skyes bu chen po'i dpung pa las// rtog pa 'joms pa'i yig 'bru la// skyes bu chen po'i lta zur las// 'dod chags sreg pa'i yig 'bru ra// skyes bu chen po'i dku skabs las// gti mug sreg pa'i yig 'bru wa// skyes bu chen po'i byin pa las// 'khor ba gnon pa'i yig 'bru ya// skyes bu chen po'i spyan gnyis las// rang bzhin yi ge e gnyis shar// skyes bu chen po'i snyen gnyis las// rang bzhin yi ge u gnyis shar// skyes bu chen po'i shangs gnyis las// rang bzhin yi ge o gnyis shar// skyes bu chen po'i tshems gnyis las// rang bzhin yi ge i gnyis shar// skyes bu chen po'i snyan gnyis las// rgyal ba'i sa bon oM gnyis shar// skyes bu chen po'i yig 'bru rnams// gsung yig 'bru/ thugs phyag mtshan/ sku phyag rgya de rnams kyis gnas sbyang ngo// 'do zer chen po'i 'phro 'du yis// so sor rang re'i sgrib pa bsreg/ sgrib pa bsregs pas 'od du gyur// 'od kyang mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings// dbyings las yi ge a byung ba// a ni skyes med de bzhin nyid// Tha ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// Ta las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// phung po rnam par snang mdzad sku// ra las rin chen zur brgyad pa// tshor ba yon tan rin chen 'byung ldan// D+ha las pad+ma 'dab brgyad de// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas gsung// Na las ral gri 'bar ba ste// phrin las don yod grub pa'i sku// tha las kun tu bzang mo ste// 'byung ba nam mkha' sems nyid yin// ta ni sangs rgyas spyan yin te// 'byung ba dag pas sa yang yin// da ni rin chen sems ma ste// 'byung ba dag pas drod kyang

yin// d+ha ni chos kyi sems ma yin// 'byung ba dag pas mA ma kI// na ni las kyi sems ma ste// 'byung ba dag pa dam tshig sgrol// ka ni spyan gyi myu gu ste// rnam par shes pa'i snying po yin// kha ni snyan gyi ral gri yin// rnam shes nam mkha'i snying po yin// ga ni shangs kyi pad+ma ste// rnam shes spyan ras gzigs dbang yin// g+ha ni ljags kyi rdo rje ste// rnam shes phyag na rdo rje yin// nga ni lus kyi 'du shes te// be con 'bar ba gshin rje gshed// tsa ni spyan ma yum 'gyings te// yul rnams dag pa lA s+ye ma// tsha ni snyan gyi phreng ba ste// yul rnams dag pas mar me ste// dz+nya ni shangs kyi pi wang ste// yul rnams dag pas girti ma// dza ni ljags kyi gar bsgyur te// yul rnams dag pas nIrti ma// nya ni yid kyi tri shUl te// yan lag g.yo ba stobs po che// pa ni ngag gi 'gugs 'dren te// rnam shes byams pa me tri yin// pha ni yid kyi snyigs ma ste// rnam shes dag pas kun tu bzang// pa ni lus kyi ral gri ste// rnam shes dag pas sgrib pa sel// b+ha ni ngag gi ut+pal te// rnam shes dag pas 'jam dpal yin// ma ni yid kyi thod dbyug ste// khros pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin dpal// ya ni d+hU pe gdug spos ma// wa ni puSh+pe me tog ma// ra ni A lo ke mar me ma// la ni gan+b+he dri chab ma// yul dus 'dus pa lha mo brgyad// oM ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// yan lag bzhi la khro mo bzhi// Sha ni rta pa med pa ste// sha ni chad pa med pa yin// sa ni bdag tu med pa yin// ha ni mtshan ma med pa ste// a ni kun tu bzang mo la// k+Sha ni kun tu bzang po yin// i gnyis lha dang lha min te// u gnyis mi dang byol song yin// e gnyis yi dwags dmyal ba yin// mthong yod snang grag thams cad kyang// yi ge'i tshogs su mngon sangs rgyas// yi ger ma gyur gang yang med// chos nyid snying po nyi ma la// 'od zer yig 'bru'i tshogs su 'bar// chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu la// yig 'brus lha tshogs skar bkra ltar// dus gsum rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// nyi ma 'bar ba'i 'od zer la// 'od zer 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan 'bar// rdo rje'i snying po sa bon zhes// rdo rje rigs kyi zhing du grags// nyi ma'i 'od zer 'phros pa las// yig 'bru 'od kyi oM 'phros pas// de bzhin rigs kyi zhing du grags// nyi ma'i 'od zer 'bar ba las// yig 'bru 'od kyi swA 'phros pas// rin chen snying po sa bon te// rin chen rigs kyi zhing du grags// nyi ma'i 'od zer 'phros pa las// 'od zer yi ge AM du 'bar// pad+ma rigs kyi zhing du grags// sna tshogs yi ge'i 'od 'phros pas// cho 'phrul yi ge hA gsal te// sna tshogs snying po sa bon yin// las kyi rigs kyi zhing du grags// nyon mongs sems can sa bon

te// rgyal ba'i zhing la btab byas pas// 'bras bu smin pa'i sras su 'khrungs// yi dam lha yi dpal brjid che// kun tu bzang po'i so nam byed// rdo rje sems dpa' rtse zla byed// lA s+ye dkar mos phyag tshangs byed// zhing khams kun tu ston par shog/ de nas yi ge'i tshogs a la thim/ hU~M la thim yang hU~M zhes brjod/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis btegs nas 'og min rgyal ba yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams su 'phang pa 'di skad do// rigs drug bskyed pa'i phung po la// dpa' bo'i yi ge phra bkod pas// rnam shes hU~M du bsdus nas kyang// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng bzhag nas// 'og min gnas mchog dam pa na// gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga// phaT kyi phrin las chen po yis// sbyar ba'i hU~M du 'phangs byas pas// rgyal ba'i sras por de 'gyur ro// thugs kar thims pas sku yi dbyig/ rdo rje'i lam byung yum gyi mkha'// rgyal ba'i sras por de 'gyur ro// yongs la dbang bskur rgyal ba'i mchog/ gang la ma chags spros dang bral// spang len med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'du 'bral med pa'i dbang bskur ro// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi// ston par ye shes lngas dbang bskur ro// de nas thugs dam bskang ba dang/ rtog pa sbyang ba dang/ phrin las rnams bya ba ni rkyen gyis sbyang pa'o// phung po de sman sgrub chen pos lus dbul te/ 'bras bu lnga la dbus su a ko su go zhes bya ba/ glang po che'i sha la sogs pa rmig pa kha brag gi sha bzhag la 'di skad do// glang po rin chen 'degs pa'i stobs dang ldan// bsgom pa'i sran chen yon tan brgya dang ldan// rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sha 'di shes par gyis// oM AHko su kha swA hA/ a las 'od 'phros steng khams bsreg sbyang nas/ slar sha la 'dus pas sha 'od du gyur nas med cing mi dmigs par bsam pa ni/ rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam bskang ba'o// shar du stag dang seng ge la sogs pa sder chags thams cad kyi sha bzhag pa 'di skad do// rtsal chen gzugs bzang dgos pa lus la tshang// grags pa'i skad kyis srid gsum zil gyis gnon// yon tan brgyad ldan mthu stobs phun sum tshogs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sha 'di shes par gyis// oM pa na se a mr-i ta hU~M tha/ bsgom pa gong bzhin no// mi dang shang shang te'u sogs gdong pa can gyi sha shar lhor dgod pa/ skyes bu shes rig dgos pa lus la tshang// thugs rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig chen po 'di// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel mdze rnams thub// rin chen rigs kyi thugs dam skang ba'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sha 'di shes par gyis// aM smin pa a hU~M/ bsgom pa gong bzhin dang/ nub

tu rta la sogs pa rmig zlum thams cad kyi sha dgod pa ni 'di skad do// dgos pa'idon ldan brtson 'grus shugs 'chang ba// pha rol phyin pa rta mchog rmig zlum ni// yon tan brgyad ldan blo rno shes rab gsal// pad+ma rigs kyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sha 'di shes par gyis// oM ma hA mAM sa hU~M a mr-i ta hU~M tha/ byang du rgod dang khyung dang re dang glag la sogs pa gshog pa can gyi sha dgod pa 'di skad do// thogs med nam 'phang gcod cing srid pa zil gyis gnon// gshog pa rlung du bsdus pas 'dzam bu gling bzhi bskor// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel byings rmugs bsal// las kyi rigs kyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sha 'di shes par gyis// oM na le ge a mr-i ta hU~M// dbang po gsal byed spyan lnga rnam par dag/ stong khams gsal byed rnam shes bsgral ba'i mig/ sa yi snying por thugs dam bskang ba dang// lA s+ye dkar mo dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sha 'di shes par gyis// oM badzra tsak+Shu hU~M zhes brjod pas/ mig las hU~M 'phro zhing 'dus pas/ stong khams thams cad kyi spyan 'ub kyas 'dus pas/ mig gi dbang po la thim pas/ mig nyid sa'i snying po dang/ lA s+ye dkar mor gyur to// k+ShiMhi rA dza mA le hU~M/ zhes de bzhin du brgyad ka la sbyor/ gnas pa'i sgra thos dgos pa'i tshig gnas pa// me sgra chu sgra rlung sgra gang yin pa// rna ba'i dbang pos rnam par shes rig skye// yon tan brgyad ldan thos pa rgya mtsho sogs// phyag na rdo rje'i thugs dam bskang ba dang// nIrti sngon mo dgyes par bskyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma de bIs sgra 'di shes par gyis// dziM ku ru pa NA nirti hU~M/ sna yi dbang pos snom pa'i dri shes nas// bsreg pa btsos dang rlangs dang du ba dang// sngos dang sman dang zhal zas rlangs pa'i sna// yon tan brgyad ldan sna yi rnam shes 'di// nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs dam bskang ba dang// mA lai sngon mo dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sna 'di shes par gyis// trAM A gar+b+ha mA le hU~M/ 'di skor zlos dang 'khrugs nyams shig 'dug kyang bsdur gzhi ma rnyed/ lce yi rnam shes ro mchog brgya dang ldan// kha dang mngar dang ro mchog skyur dang rtsub// yon tan brgya ldan lce yi rnam shes 'di// spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs dam bskang ba dang// gIrti dmar po dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi lce ni shes par gyis// hri pad+ma ban+d+ha ma gIrti ra go\u0f85 haM/ lce brgyad pas stong gsum tsam bsdus pas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bsam mo// lus kyi rnam shes dro 'jam reg bsil 'di// sdug dang mdzes dang yid 'ong gzugs// yon tan brgyad ldan gzugs phung 'di// sgrib pa rnam sel thugs dam bskang ba dang// d+hU pe

dkar mo dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi lus 'di shes par gyis// ol gong blang la/ ol gong thal byed ngag gi rnam shes 'di// cig bar 'gyur zhing sgra sgrogs tshangs pa'i gsung// yon tan brgya ldan ngag gi rnam shes 'di// byams pa mai tri'i thugs dam bskang ba dang// puSh+pe sngon mo dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi ol gong shes par gyis// mai d+ha ra Ni a mr-i ta hU~M/ snying blang la 'di skad do// yid kyi rnam shes byang chub 'di// yod med rtag chad mtshan mar yongs mi 'dzin// yon tan brgyad ldan tsit+ta dam rdzas 'di// kun tu bzang po'i thugs dam bskang ba dang// A lo ke mar mo dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi sman 'di shes par gyis// sa rA dza a mr-i ta hU~M/ srog pa rtsa blang la/ shes pa'i don 'dzin log pa'i lam yang 'gog/ nga rgyal de'u gcod don dam dbyings su sdud// yon tan brgyad ldan rin chen srog pa rtsa// 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i thugs dam bskang ba dang// gan+d+he ljang gu dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi srog rtsa shes par gyis// many+dzu shrI a mr-i ta hU~M/ nya bzhi rtsol bzhi sgo ba yab yum du bkod de/ bsgral ba'i nya sha bcud kyi nying khu 'di// yon tan brgyad ldan spel ba'i dam rdzas 'di// sgo ba bzhi yi thugs dam bskang ba dang// gzung ma yum bzhis sman 'di shes par gyis// ma hA sa ma a mr-i ta hU~M/ mAM sa las 'od 'phros stong khams bsreg sbyang nas/ slar 'dus nas nya bzhi la thim pas/ nya bzhi yang mi dmigs pa 'od kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa ni/ sgo ba bzhi'i thugs dam bskang pa'o// de nas rtsos bzhi blangs la 'di skad do// rgyu mchog bsgral ba'i rdzas mchog rtsos bzhi 'di// sha yi snying po rus pa'i bcud chen 'di// yon tan brgyad ldan sgrub rdzas chen po 'di// sgo ma yum bzhi'i thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gzungs ma yum gyi tsos bzhi shes par gyis// dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ a mr-i ta hU~M/ de nas rus pa'i mdud drug blang la// 'khrul mig mdog 'dzin yan lag 'bur chen drug/ gzungs kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ste// thub pa drug gi thugs dam bskang ba dang// gzungs ma yum gyi rus pa shes par gyis// i u e las 'od 'phros pas stong khams bsreg sbyang nas/ slar 'dus pas 'phags mchog 'gro drug gi sgrib pa sbyangs/ 'od du zhu nas mi dmigs pa ni thub pa drug gi thugs dam bskang ba'o// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ sgrol ba rgya mtsho le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas ga Na sbyar ba'i yum// rgyal rigs ma dang rjai'u rigs ma// pad+ma can dang dung can ma// mi rtog can dang rnam lnga'o// de la sbyor ba don bya ba// gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba dang// slob

mar dbang ni bskur ba dang// bde bas sangs rgyas sgrub pa dang// 'di rnams rigs ma dag la brten// sbyong bas dag par bya ba yang// dbang bskur chos bshad min pa yin// dam tshig ma nyams bsrung bar bya// theg chen chos la gzung bar bya// yab dang yum gnyis mnyam par yang// lus kyi bskyed rim zung 'jug bsgom// ngag gis rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid// yab ni yum la rab brten pas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab sgrub byed// yum yang yab la brten byas nas// yang dag sangs rgyas thob par 'dod// bsnyen pa rig ma'i gzugs dang sgra// dri sogs las ni rab brtags nas// bde ba sbar zhing sbyang par bya// sbyor ba la ni bsnyen pa de// chos gos rgyan dang rab ldan zhing/ kha yi dri yang rab tu bskyed// nye ba'i bsnyen pas rab sbyor ba// dung gi phur pas gdab pa dang// zangs kyi mdog gis gzung bar bya// ljags kyang rab tu brkyang byas nas// 'dod pa'i bstan bcos mtha' dag gis// bde bar rab tu bskyod byas nas// nye ba dag tu bsnyen par bya// de ni bde ba bskyed pa'o// bsgrub pa bya ba'i rim pa ni// dbyings kyi pad+ma gzhal yas khang// dbyibs ni yi ge a dang mtshungs// gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi la// gzugs khams bsam gtan oM dang bcas// 'dod khams rigs drug sa bon dang// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs gnas pa// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyid// yab kyi ye shes rdo rje ni// dgos 'dod byung ba'i nor bu ste// yid bzhin rin chen bzhin du 'bar// rdo rje pad+mar rab bsrubs pas// bde ba sgrub par byed pa nyid// bsgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba// thig le byang chub sems chen no// bde dang stong pa dbyer med cing// yab yum gnyis med zung du 'jug/ dper na glang gnyis gshib pa yis// zhing gi bya ba byed pa rmod// de bzhin mthun 'gyur ye shes ni// rab dga'i tshul du skye bar 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig dang// rnam par smin dang rnam pa nyid// mtshan nyid dang ni bral ba'o// skad cig bzhi dang bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// dang po reg pa sra bas sa// sangs rgyas spyan gyi rtags su 'gyur// gsher ba chu ni mA ma kI// dro bas me ni gos dkar mo// yang ba rlung nyid dam tshig sgrol// nam mkha'i khams ni kun bzang ma// yum bzhi bde bas bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// spos kyi lha mo 'gugs pa dang// me tog mas ni sdom pa de// mar me gsal bar gyur nas ni// dri chab bdud rtsi rab 'thor ba// phyi yi lha mo'i bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// bde bas sgeg pas bde ba dang// mi brjed gzungs 'dzin 'de bral ma// glu len dbyangs ni mchog bde ma// gar ma lhan cig skyes pa

nyid// nang gi lha mo'i bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// thig le g.yo dang 'byung ba dang// 'bebs dang brtan por drod 'byung bas// rus sbal 'gros dang rnam par grol// mkhas pa'i man ngag bla mas ster// mi mkhas chu dang bsdong sogs pas// dbab dang gzung dang zlog pa dang// lus la khyab par dgram pa rnams// rnal 'byor sbyor ma goms pa yis// 'og klu dag la brten nas ni// gsang ba'i sems lnga skye bar 'gyur// g.yo ldang gnas 'jug rdzogs par byed// sems lnga brten pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sbyor ba 'di ni brtsam par bya// gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul 'dod na// b+ha ga la ni ling+ga gzhag/ mchod pa'i lha mo spro ba'am// thig le khu bas mkha' bkang nas// rgyal srid rin chen sna bdun sogs// yang na bkra shis rdzas brgyad sogs// bde gshegs mchod pa mang po rnams// nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar mchod// las kyi sbyin sreg bya ba yang// gsang ba'i sems dang rab ldan pas// b+ha ga zlum po sna tshogs mdud// byang sems zhi ba gti mug rgyun// gru bzhi phyi yi khyams nang du// dga' ba'i sems kyi thig le 'bar// thig le'i mdog kyang gser du snang// skye gnas zla gam chen po ru// chags pa'i sems kyi rab sbyar nas// thig le pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs// khA kha mu kha bya rog gdong// khros pa'i sems kyi rab sbyar na// thig le mthing nag khro bo'i tshogs// drag pos thas cad bsgral bar bya// 'dis ni las bzhi yum gyi mkha'// lhun gyi grub par rab tu gnas// mnan dad zlog pa yum gyis bsgrub// phrin las bzhi dang mnan zlog nyid// dug gi las rnams lhun gyis grub// slob ma rnams la dbang bskur na// rtsa gnas dkyil 'khor chen po ru// thig le khams kyi bdud rtsi nyid// yi ge sngags kyi snying po bzlas// snying po rlung gis rab bskul nas// mtshungs rgyu slob ma nyid la gnas// mtshungs rgyu+u rang la mi gnas na// bra sran 'bras su yongs mi 'gyur// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo ni// lte lkog yi ge k+Sha gnas pa// srin po rU tra'i sa bon gyis/ khams kyi bdud rtsi zhu byas nas// 'bar zhing rab tu 'dzag pa ni// dper na mar gyi thigs pa yis// mar me gso ba lta bur 'gyur// bla ma yab yum rol pa yi// thig le khu ba chen po ni// slob ma'i lce la rab gzhag nas// gsang ba'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya// 'di yang skabs kyi nyan dang 'chad// bsgom bsgrub phrin las bya ba dang// rdo rje rgyal por dbang bskur na// gsang dbang 'di la rab brten nas// nus pa'i dbang lnga thob par 'gyur// de nas shes rab ye shes dbang// yab yum bde ba'i rol pa bzhi// spyi bo bde chen 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor sum bcu rtsa gnyis nas// 'bab pa'i thig le bde

ba yin// mgrin pa longs spyod dkyil 'khor nas// bcu drug bdud rtsi'i rgyun yang 'dzag/ snying ga chos kyi dkyil 'khor nas// brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// lte ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i thig le 'dzag par gyur// bde ba dang ni mchog tu bde// bral ba'i bde ba lhan cig skyes// bde ba bzhi yi gdams ngag ni// yab yum slob ma gnyis la gtad// yid ni nang du brtan par gzung// rang rdzas thig le phyir thon nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mchod// rang yang dngos grub rab blang bya// de ni bde ba chen po yi// dbang yang rab tu bskur bya na// g.yas kyi ro ma nyi ma me// g.yon gyi rkyang ma zla ba chu// dbus kyi kun 'dar gzung 'dzin spang// srog shing rnam pa 'di gsum yang// rdo rje rba brlabs lam bzhis bya// gzung ba 'dzin pa'i rba brlabs dang// gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i rba brlabs gsum// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub byed bas// gnas nas spro zhing gnas su bstim// sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par 'gyur// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ sbyor ba rgya mtsho ji ltar sbyar ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas kun tu bzang po la rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa/ lta ba rgya mtsho ji ltar blta// 'bras bu sangs rgyas ji ltar rgya// kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// lta ba rgya mtsho 'di ltar ltos// 'bras bu sangs rgyas 'di ltar rgyas// bdud rtsi'i las ni khyod la gtad// lta ba man ngag gi le'u 'di bshad// phung po khams dang skye mched dag/ ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir// kun rdzob tsam gyis mtshan ma ru// chos sku mtshan mar rgya ba de// ye shes rang gnas rol pa yin// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kyang// kun tu bzang po dbyings kyi rgyan// kun bzang yab yum rol pa las// phyi nang ma lus sangs rgyas so// mtha' la thug pa med pas dbyings la bri ba med// dbyings la 'gyur ba med pas chos skur 'gyur ba med// don dam dbyings su rtogs pas bltas dgu de ltar gsal// thams cad sems su rtogs pas gang bsgrub lhun gyis 'grub// rnam rtog ming yang med pas gang bsgral gcig mi blta// thabs mkhas rol pa yin pas 'khor ba'i skyon ma gos// thugs rje byang chub yin pas thar pa bde chen thob// kun gyi bdud rtsi yin pas lha rnams rang bzhin 'khol// bde chen rgyal po yin pas 'khor ba'i rje bo yin// thabs mkhas bdag las byung ba kun gyi bdag po yin// nga rgyal gdeng
