du che bas 'gro drug thabs kyi 'dul// thug chom 'brug sgras khams gsum yongs su ldir// thugs rje byams ldan nyi ma'i 'od bzhin 'char// mi rtog gnyen pos thabs kyi rgyal po byung// 'khor ba'i gnyen por rang byung sangs

rgyas te// bdag dang sems can thams cad chos skur gcig/ rnam rtog thams cad gnyen por don rtogs na// lha dang 'du 'bral bya ba gzhan na med// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i don rtogs na// dgra bgegs bsgral zhing tshar gcad bya mi dgos// ye 'byams ya mtshan klong gi dbang rdzogs na// nga rgyal rtags kyi phyag rgyas bsgrub mi dgos// phrin las bya btsal spyod pa ye 'das na// bsgom bsgrub dkyil 'khor bya ba'i ming yang med// 'di ltar man ngag rtogs pa'i gdeng gyur na// bsgrub na'ang skyon med ma bsgrubs btsal ba med// bsam du med pa chos sku nam mkha' 'dra// bsgom du med de rang byung klong nas shar// bde 'byams dbyings phyug yum gyi rgyal mo yin// ma 'gags ci bder yan bkyes yab kyi mkha'// sems la gang yang mi rtog rang byung sku// thabs nyid ma 'gags rang byung ma bcos sku// don la gang yang mi rtog chos kyi sku// chos kyi sku la skye 'chi g.yos pa med// 'pho 'gyur med pa'i klong la btsal zhing bsgrub pa med// ye shes byang chub sems su bdag rtog na// 'du 'dzi byis pa'i rtse mo ci zhig bya// mi 'da' klong gi dam tshig bsrung med na// bde sdug 'khor ba mya ngan ci la spyad// thabs mkhas rol pa'i ting 'dzin shar ba la// phung po tshi chad bsgom bsgrub ci la spyad// phyi nang snod bcud thig ler sangs rgyas na// gzhan nas sgrol zhing smon pa gcig kyang med// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ lta ba rgya mtsho'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// 'bras bu ji ltar sangs rgyas pa 'di skad do// snod kyi 'jig rten mas bkab yum gyi dbyings// bcud kyi 'jig rten yas bkab yab kyi mkha'// yab yum mkha' dbyings ye shes rol pa las// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// phung po khams dang skye mched ma lus pa// lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor ye nas yin// yin pa'i don la rig pa gsal bkod nas// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// sems dang ye shes dbyer med don gcig pas// sems kyi ye shes sems kyis kun rtogs na// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// 'khor ba'i rgyu nyid thar pa'i lam gyi skas// sdug bsngal rgyu gnyis chos nyid byang chub sems// ma spang lhun gyis grub par don rtogs na// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// chos nyid kun tu bzang mo'i rig pa la// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das par mnyam// sangs rgyas sems can sems nyid gcig tu mnyam// rtogs dang ma rtogs sgyu ma'i ngang du mnyam// rig dang ma rig chos kyi sku ru mnyam// mnyam pa'i rgyal po'i don la ma yengs na// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// nyon mongs sdug bsngal ye shes lnga ru

snang// 'byung ba lnga po chos kyi dbyings su mnyam// dbyings dang ye shes 'brel pa'i don rig na// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// ye shes lha dang ma mo mkha' 'gro dang// pho nya la sogs mang po'i don brjod kyang// bdag gi byin brlabs mang por snang ba las// gzhan nas grub cing 'byung ba ci yang med// bdag snang bdag 'khor kun tu bdag yin te// bdag nyid g.yos na phyi nang snod bcud g.yos// kun gyi che btsan 'gran gyi do med pas// yongs kyi thog med bde 'byam rgyal po la// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ ye nas 'bras bu sangs rgyas yin pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas kun tu bzang pos rdo rje sems dpa' la rgyud yongs su gzung bar gtad pa 'di skad do// gsang thub bka' rten nges pa dang// bden par smra zhing yid mi 'gyur// des ni rgyud ni yongs su gzung bar bya'o// brtan zhing shugs 'chang brtson 'grus che// drang zhing sems 'jam g.yo sgyu med// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya'o// mdzangs shing shes pa gsal ba dang// brtags shing bya ba ma nor ba// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya// zungs thub rtag thub khong yongs shing// le lo bar chad skyon bsal ba// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya'o// spyod pa thogs chags med pa dang// dam tshig spang len med par bsrung// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya// nyan cing sgrub la brtson pa dang// 'du 'dzi dbang du mi gtang ba// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya'o// rang shing nor thub zo thub pas// yongs la mi gnod tshul bsrung bas// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya// lung med rkyang bar mi gtong zhing// slob dpon rig pa'i gting bru ba// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya'o// rang shes mu cor mi byed cing// brtags shing las rnams brtson byed pa// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya// rtag par sman dang mi 'bral zhing// rdzas dang lag cha gsang thogs pas// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya'o// dad pas skyo ngal mi byed cing// skyo rkyen tshor bas mi byed pas// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya'o// dbang bskur gnang ba lnga thob cing// go rtogs shes pa phyogs 'byams pas// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya'o// brtag na bla ma'i lung yod la// bsnyen na nus pa'i mthu yod pas// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya'o// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ rgyud yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// ston pa kun tu bzang po la gsol pa/ snod dang mi ldan pas gzung du mi rung lags sam zhes gsol pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ snod dang mi ldan pas man ngag snang 'tshong byed

pa dang/ chos dpe 'tshong bar byed pa dang/ man ngag zang thal du smra ba dang/ lta ba la gdeng med pa dang/ spyod pas ma zin pa dang/ sgrub pa'i gzhung ma tshugs pa dang/ tho co dang/ ra bo sha byed pa dang/ rang chen dang/ nga bo dang/ ngoms skyen byed pas rgyun 'di bcangs kyang seng ge'i 'o ma dang 'dra ste/ bdag phung gzhan brlag/ snying 'gas/ mdze dang nad kyi bskal pa 'byung/ 'bras bu mnar med par skye ba'o// de bas gsang ste/ sems kyi gter du sbas te/ dkyil 'khor gsum gyi thig ler gcig tu la bzla'o// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho las/ snod min la gsang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyipaN+Di ta bi ma la mi tra dang bod kyi lots+tsha ba gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur ba'o// rgyud 'di yang dpe gcig pa las bsdus gzhi ma rnyed// rgya gar skad du sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta b+hA ba ma hA sid+d+hi u pa hr-i da yot+ta ma// bod skad du/ thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i mchog/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po/ kun rig chos kyi rje dpal chen po shrI he ru ka s+thi ra ma ti de gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor na/ rigs lnga'i 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang/ lha dang klu dang mi'i rig 'dzin rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ nyan thos dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ming yang mi grag pa'i nang du/ gsang sngags kyi snying po// bdud rtsi'i mchog bcud du bya ba'i lta ba dang/ man ngag bsgom pa dang/ bsgrub pa dam tshig rnams bsdus te gsungs so// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal nas/ gsang sngags snying po lta ba'i don// bla na med pa bstan du gsol// de skad ces ni gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das ni kun bzang gis// lta ba rgya mtsho'i nang nas kyang// gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po gcig/ lta ba bla na med pa

bstan// brgyad khri bzhi stong bsam yas kyang// sde snod gsum dang theg pa dgu// rdzogs chen a ti yo gar 'dus// a ti yo ga'i lta ba ni// lta ba kun dang bral ba yi// yang dag don la lta ba de// kun bral ci yang ma spangs pa// rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba yin// snang dang srid pas bsdus pa dang// 'byung ba lnga la sogs pa kun// nam mkha' bzhin te kun la khyab// nam mkha' ye nas 'gyur ba med// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang// mtha' yas sems can ma lus kun// sems su 'dus shing sems su khyab// sems la ye nas skye shi med// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus dang// mtshan mar snang ba thams cad kun// chos kyi dbyings su 'dus shing khyab// dbyings las 'gyur ba ye nas med// dbang po spyod yul gyur pa dang// gzugs su snang ba thams cad kun// ye shes sku yi phyag rgyar snang// sku ni ye nas skye 'jig med// sems can skad dang sgra la sogs// bde gshegs ma lus gsung dag kyang// bya bas ma bsgrubs rang byung gsung// gsung la mtshan ma ye nas med// sems can 'khrul pa'i blo dag kyang// rig pa rnyed pa'i bde gshegs kun// byang chub sems su ro gcig pas// sems la ye nas smod du med// sku dang rgyan dang 'khor lo yang// lung chen zab mo'i nang na gsal// rigs bzhi'i nang du 'khor ba yang// ye nas sangs rgyas de las med// med ces bya ba stong pa las// stong pa nyid du rnam dag pa// chos kyi sku zhes de la bya// de la gzung zhig gdags su med// byang chub sems 'di kun tu dag/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen nyid// ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rgya// ye nas byar med bya mi dgos// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po rgyud las/ lta ba rgya mtsho'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang 'jam dpal gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das kun rig chos kyi rje la phyag btsal nas/ gsang sngags snying po man ngag don// bla na med pa bstan du gsol// de skad ces ni gsol pa dang// bcom ldan kun rig chos kyi rje// man ngag rgya mtsho'i nang nas kyang// gsang sngags gsang ba'i man ngag gcig/ man ngag bla na med pa bstan// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa la// sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal du med// sangs rgyas ye nas ma byung bas// dus gsum rtag tu 'gyur ba med// sems nyid gdod nas ma byung bas// dus gsum rtag tu 'gyur ba med// sems nyid rgyu las ma skyes pas// 'byung ba lnga la rag ma lus// sems nyid mngon du mi snang bas// dngos po kun gyi don dang bral// sems la mtha' dbus med pa yis// phyogs dang ris su gdags pa med// sems la kha dog ma gyur

pas// tshig tu gdags pa'i rten dang bral// sems la mun pas mi bsgrib pas// ye nas snang ba rang la gnas// sems kyi rig pa'i spyan yin pas// thams cad ma gzigs gcig kyang med// sems nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// phyi nang snod bcud kun la khyab// sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas pas// thams cad kun gyi ston pa yin// snying po rig pa'i snying po bas// 'khor ba'i nad kyi sman du che// sems nyid b+ha ga'i klong yangs pas// thams cad 'byung ba'i skyed mos tshal// sems la skyon gyis ma gos pas// rig pa kun gzhi'i gnas su dag/ sems la skye shi med pa yi// chos sku mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku// de phyir nor bu rin po che// bcang bar bde la 'khur bar yang// sba bar sla la dkor du che// sems las man ngag rgya mtsho 'byung// thams cad ma lus sems yin te// sems la snang zhing sems kyis byas// sems la dngos po med pa las// sems su gsal zhing sems su shes// de phyir gnyis med shes pa gces// gnyis med shes pa klong gyur na// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ man ngag rgya mtsho'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag btsal nas/ gsang sngags snying po bde ba'i don// bla na med pa bstan du gsol// de skad ces ni gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das ni bde chen pos// bsgom pa rgya mtsho'i nang nas kyang// gsang sngags gsang ba'i bsgom pa gcig/ bsgom pa bla na med pa bstan// bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab grangs las 'das// bsam gtan byang chub don la gang 'jug pa// bsgom mo snyam pa'i nad kyis zin ta re// ston pas bstan pa'i lung la mtha' dpyod pa// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog dran du gyur ta re// bde gshegs yul ni tshig gi mtshon du med// sangs rgyas yul du bltas pa 'khrul pa'i lam// bsgom du med pa'i lta ba la// yengs pa med pa'i blo gcig gzhag/ snang ba med pa'i chos nyid la// ma btsal bzhag na bsgom pa yin// de dang der ni rnam btsal na// de las de bzhin mi 'byung ste// skye ba med pa'i dbyings nyid la// 'chi ba med pa'i blo gzhag pa// 'du 'bral med pa'i rang bzhin la// btang snyoms chen po'i blo gzhag ste// chags sdang med pa'i bde byams pa// spang len med pa'i shes rab gzhag/ gzhi rtsa med pa'i blo yangs su// khyab brdal chen po'i ye shes gzhag/ ye nas rang byung chen po la// brjed pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gzhag/ thogs pa med pa'i dbyings nyid la// dmigs pa med pa'i don gcig gzhag/ yul du snang ba yum gyi klong// rig

par snang ba yab kyi mkha'// mkha' klong gnyis su thams cad chub// de la dpe yis mtshon du med// de la tshig gis mtshon du med// de phyir dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// btsal yang rgyal bas mi rnyed de// bde gshegs kun gyis gzigs pa dkon// dngos grub nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ bsgom pa rgya mtsho'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang 'jam dpal gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag btsal nas/ gsang sngags snying po bsgrub pa'i don// dngos grub shin tu nye ba'i thabs// tshig don gsal bar bya ba dang// ma nor rim pa bstan du gsol// de skad ces ni gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kas// bsgrub pa rgya mtsho'i nang nas kyang// dngos grub shin tu nye ba'i thabs// rim par sbyar te bshad par bya'o// snang srid thams cad chos sku thig le'i ngang// snod bcud ma lus bdud rtsir gnas bzhin du// 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyis// bskal pa rgya mtshor 'khor zhing 'khyams pa rnams// yang dag nges pa'i don la gzud pa dang// theg chen byang chub don la dgod pa'i phyir// dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba rgya mtsho las// ra sA ya na'i rig 'dzin srung ma rnams// gnyis med byang chub sems la gcig pa'i phyir// gsang mchog bdud rtsi chen po'i sgrub thabs bshad// dang po dngos grub bsgrub pa'i gzhi// bla ma dbang thob gdeng ldan la// dbang dang dam tshig tshul bzhin blang// tshul rig goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas// phun sum tshogs pa lnga ldan pas// bsod nams tshogs ni ci nus bsags// mgron rnams rim par mchod pa dang// mgon po gnas pa'i rten gzhi la// mchod de phyi mtshams bsrung bar bcol// de nas phyi rol 'dom gang du// ya ma dam sri bkug la mnan// sgo la chos kyi rgyal po bri// mchod de bar mtshams bsrung bar bcol// dur khrod bdag po ma traM ni// thal ba dag las gzugs byas la// bdag nyid che mchog smug nag 'bar// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag mtshan nas// phra men 'bar ba gsal ba yi// dur khrod bdag po bkug nas bsad// spar dang gzhal yas khang sgo bsrung// ci rigs pa yi phrin las bya// yid 'ong gnas su de dmigs la// byin brlab mtshams gcad bsre bsnan bya/ dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ste// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// bdud rtsi lnga yi skyang nul bya// bdag dang gsang yum shes rab mas// thig gi cho ga brtsam pa ni// maN+Dal brgyad pa'i thig tu gdab/ ye shes lnga yi tshon gyis dgab// rang byung gdod

nas dag pa yi// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// ra sA ya na la sogs rdzas// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// snod dang bcud du bcas pa rnams// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas su dgod// snang ba chen po shar bar dgram// dkyil 'khor rgyan rdzas khrims pa dang// rnal 'byor pho mor rtags btab ste// so so'i gral la 'khod nas ni// bsgrub pa tshul bzhin bya ba la// khrol bu btag btsag phye ma dang// gong bu lde gu skyo ma dang// ril bu byas te mtha' ru dbyung// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa tshul bzhin du bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ra sA ya na ta na dza ya la// drang srong tshe yi sgrub lugs 'di// mkhas pas rig pa rdzogs pa dang// phyag rgya bzhi ldan bdud bzhi bcom// dug gsum gsad de g.yang sa bcad// tshe la dbang ba'i rnal 'byor de// lam lnga sa bcu mthar dbyung phyir// phyi nang sman rdzas bsags shing dbye// dngos grub rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// dam pa de nyid gsang chen gyi// rigs brgya rigs lnga rigs gcig gis// rgyud drug sems can kun sgrol phyir// sbyang ba dam pa mchog tu bya// sbyor sgrol don rtogs mchod pa yis// rgyal ba mnyes pa mchog tu bya// kun gyis mthun par bsgom bya ba// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang// rgyu yi ting 'dzin 'bras bu las// 'byung lnga gzhal yas gdan steng du// zhi ba'i dus su rdo rje sems// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor bskyed// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// tshangs dang drang srong la sogs rnams// spyan drang rtog pa bzlog byas te// rol mo glu dbyangs mang pos bstim// sman rnams lha ru mos bskyed nas// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba dang// ra sA ya na'i sngags kyi sbyangs// rim gyis dkyil 'khor bsdus nas ni// de nyid rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i sngags kyis sbyangs// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbab bya ste// rta mgrin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsdu// rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags kyis sbyangs// sbyor ba'i cho ga brtsam par bya// lha mo bcu drug bsnyen pas sbyar// de ltar khrol bu 'byongs pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub bsdu bar bya'o// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ sman khrol bu bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su// rnal 'byor pho mo mtshan mas gdab// mtshams ni drag tu gcad par bya// thabs dang shes rab zung ya bzhi// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bya ba// che mchog phyag mang bsnams pa

ni// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lha rnams gsal// khro bo yab yum 'khor dang bcas// gtan gtun thabs dang shes rab gnas// sman rnams ha na'i sngags kyis btab// lho yi phyogs su btsag bya ste// phye ma dar tshags nang nas dbyung// ho sa ma ya'i sngags kyis btsag/ phye ma'i mchog tu gyur pa dang// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor bri// khro bdag badzrA he ru ka/ lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor gsal// yi ge dgu yi sngags kyis sbyang// 'bras bu lnga bsgral bdud rtsi dang// nub kyi phyogs su sbal bya ste// bkra shis yum gyis dbyangs blangs nas// mu sa la yi sngags kyis sbal// las bzhi'i hom bya med par sbyar/ ye shes bdud rtsi dbab bya zhing// 'jig rten bdud rtsi bsdu byas la// b+han+d+ha kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ rta mgrin rgyas gdab dar gyis gril// bdud rtsi gong bur byas nas ni// maN+Dal bdun par mnga' gsol te// byin brlabs dbang bskur brtan byas la// rdo rje'i gzungs thag skyed la gdags// glu dang gar gyis dga' ba bskyed// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ sman btag btsag phye ma gong bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ste// bsgrub mchog shar du kha bltas la// zla gam dmar po rtsibs brgyad la// bdud rtsi'i gong bu la dmigs nas// de bzhin kun snang rgyu las ni// sems kyi dkyil 'khor chags gyur te// lha brgyad gdan la he ru ka/ khro bdag chen po'i lus gzugs te// dgu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad la// gsang ba'i yum yang yab dang mthun// gnyis su med pa'i byang sems la// sprul pa khro bo'i tshogs byung ste// 'jig rten dregs pa btul nas ni// slar 'dus phyogs bcu khro bor gyur// de steng rigs lnga he ru ka/ de steng khro mo gnam zhal ma// gsang ba'i mkha' la dngos grub rdzas// rta mchog gsang ba'i yum dang bcas// khro mo'i steng du he ru ka/ dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad de// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bgrad// dbu ma'i ljags steng ye shes sems// dang po rdo rje dung chen dkrug/ g.yas 'og sems dpa' brgyad gsal te// g.yon 'og na yang sems ma brgyad// ting 'dzin de ltar gsal ba dang// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// mchod pa la sogs ci rigs bya// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi chom pa dang// gsang ba'i dgra gsum gsod pa yi// dkyil 'khor bdun dang sbyor ba brgyad// rdo rje pad+ma ga pur ldan// mkha' la sems phebs 'phros pa'i tshe// byang chub 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// dzi b+hu na dA'i gser ltar bstim// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU~M hrIHtha/ gu h+ya lag gi phyag rgya yis// gzhung bzhin brtan nas 'phro 'du bya// ga bu dgu ru 'phro

'du yis// 'gro drug g.yang sa gcod pa dang// mdzad pa bcu gnyis mtha' ru dbyung// stong tshigs mchod bstod bskul dbyangs dang// bskang bshags mtshams las drag po yis// bar chad byed pa'i mnyam len zlog/ sbyor sgrol mchod par bar mi gcad// bying rgod g.yeng ba'i dbang mi gtang// nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus bya// rol mo glu bro mang po yis// sman gyi rig 'dzin srung ma bskul// phrin las bcol zhing byin brlab bya// rtags chen bdun po byung ba na// bdud rtsi dbab cing bskyil bar bya// ha ya grI bas rtag tu bsrung// dngos grub chen po thob bya'i phyir// 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor ma lus kyis// dad pa'i sems kyis yon phul nas// dngos grub thob phyir gsol ba gdab// bdud rtsi'i pho brang chen po ni// bla ma'i phyag tu bzhes nas ni// skul tshig dbyangs dang ldan pa yis// phyi nang gsang dbang rim par bskur// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ bdud rtsi gong bu gcig pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ste// bdud rtsi rgya dgrol phye mar gzhib// bkra shis mtshan ldan ka pA la// gcig tu dpa' bo'i ro rnams dang// gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas// mtshams gcad dkyil 'khor rdzogs bskyed de// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// dngos grub 'dod par gsol ba gdab// stong tshigs dbul bcas 'dzab bzlas te// mchod de mtshams gcad dngos grub blang// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ bdud rtsi skyo ma sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ste// bdag dang shes rab gsang yum las// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byang sems las// bdud rtsi phye mar sbyar byas la// bkra shis mtshan ldan ka pA lar// lde gu byas te maN+Dal steng// yab yum mkha' la bzhag nas ni// rigs lnga'i phyag rgyas sbyang bcas pas// ye shes bdud rtsi dbab byas te// gu h+ya lag gi pyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pho mo ma lus pa'i// spyi bo lde steng snying ga dag/ yan lag kun tu thig le bya// rigs lnga'i tshom bu'i dbang bskur ro// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ bdud rtsi lde gu+u sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ste// me long g.ya' dag gnyis bsags te// mtshan dgu ldan pa'i shes rab mas// me long g.ya' dag gong ma de// rnal 'byor pho mo kun la bstan// me long gcig tu sbrang rtsi dang// bdud rtsi phye mar sbyar byas la// ril bu sran ma ma Sha tsam// rnal 'byor ril bu gsum gsum ste// lus ngag yid la re re gzhag/ a zhes bya ba'i man ngag gis// thig le byang chub sems lung bstan// lam lnga mthar phyin

sems don te// thig le byang chub sems su brten// pha rol phyin drug sogs pa ste// rdzogs pa a ti'i dgongs par bstan// 'da' kha ma yi man ngag ste// mnyam pa chen po thig le ni// srog nyid rlung gi rang bzhin te// phyi nang 'gro ba'i rlung dang ni// yid kyi rnam shes bsres byas nas// phyi nang gnyis las gzhan du ni// mi 'gro ba yi thig le nyid// rdzogs pa chen po'i man ngag yin// dngos grub chen po de la bya'o// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ bdud rtsi ril bu bya ba'i byang chub sems thig le sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ste// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba// dug lnga sman du bsgyur ba ste// sman lnga ye shes sgrub thabs 'di// rnal 'byor dngos grub dbang thob phyir// nges par nan tur bskyed de gnang// drug pa'i rtags mthong dbang bskur te// dngos grub thabs dang 'dzab bzlas dang// mkha' 'gro bskyang dag sbyin sreg dang// gter sba dge bsngo dkyil 'khor bsdu// yon dbul gtang rag mtshams glod nas// thig le'i don dang ldan pa yis// lta ba'i man ngag bsgom pa yis// gdeng ldan zhag gsum gnas bsrungs te// de las spyod lam shes par bya// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ las kyi lhag ma bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das s+thi ra ma ti la phyag 'tshal nas/ gsag sngags snying po dam tshig don// bla na med pa bstan du gsol// de skad ces ni gsol pa dang// bcom ldan s+thi ra ma ti yi// dam tshig rgya mtsho'i nang nas kyang// 'bum sder bstan pa lnga ru bstan// bde gshegs rigs kyi dam tshig ni// 'khor lo bskor zhing dug lnga rtsad gcod pa'o// rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig ni// phur bus gdab cing bsgral ba'i phrin las kyis// dug lnga dbang du sdud pa'o// rin chen rigs kyi dam tshig ni// gtor mas dug lnga 'joms byed pa'o// pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig ni// sbyor bas dug lnga dag byed pa'o// las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ni// hom gyis dug lnga sreg byas pa'o// rigs lnga dril te dug lnga sman du bsgyur ba'o// yang na 'di ltar shes par bya// gzugs dang nam mkhar sku la sogs// rnam snang yab yum bde gshegs lha'o// tshor ba chu dang yon tan sogs// 'byung ldan yab yum rin chen lha'o// 'du shes me dang gsung la sogs// snang ba mtha' yas yab yum lha'o// 'du byed rlung dang phrin las sogs// don yod yab yum 'khor gyi lha'o// rnam shes sa dang thugs la sogs// mi 'khrugs yab yum 'khor gyi lha'o// gzhan yang bsrung bar bya ba ni// rtsa

ba sku gsung thugs dang ni// mi spang ba dang dang du blang// spyad pa'i dam tshig bco lnga bsrung// de yang ma hA sa ma ya// bzhi pa rdzogs pa kun tu bzang// kun bzang man ngag shes gyur na// dam tshig thams cad de ru rdzogs// ma bsrungs pa ni gcig kyang med// ces gsungs so// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang/ lha dang klu dang/ mi'i rig 'dzin 'bum phrag gis/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po/ kun rig chos kyi rje dpal bde ba chen po shrI he ru ka s+thi ra ma ti ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la bstod pa/ e ma sangs rgyas kun tu bzang// gsang chen thig le nyid la rdzogs// ma rig mun sel ye shes sgron// dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod do// mngon par bstod do// de nas kun yi rang ste/ gsang sngags bla na med pa'i don thugs su chud nas/ zhabs spyi bos blangs shing rang rang gi sa la gshegs so// lha dang mi rnams kyis bka' rgyud dam pa spyi bos blangs shing tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor dam par/ dngos grub nye bar bsgrub pa las 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi sa la gshegs so// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud las/ gzhug bstod pa dang/ gtad pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// dngos grub nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud rdzogs so//// dngos grub mchog mnyes ya mtshan chen po'i bka'// thabs chen bla na med pa gsang sngags 'bras bu'i chos// kun gyi thun mong ma yin man ngag rgyud// tshig de rim pa sla yang don nyid rtogs par dka'// bka' rgyud dam pa'i man ngag bla med 'di lta bu// bdag 'dra bi ma la yi man ngag dam pa 'di yin te// dri med zla shar yi dam chos su gtad kyis thub par chongs// dri med zla shar yi dam man ngag dam pa 'di// yang dbang gter la gtad kyis bdud rtsi ste// legs pa'i sgron me'i yi dam nar mar gtad// sa ma ya kha tham/ rgyud dum bu gsum pa/ lung bam po brgyad pa/ man ngag dngos grub nye ba'i snying po'i rgyud gsum ni sru legs pa'i sgron ma la gtad do////

rgya gar skad du/ ma hA a mr-i ta d+harma tA gu h+ya tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las ma lus pa'i bdag po de ni/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams dang/ rdo rje yid bzhin nor bu'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khams gsum pa'i sems can ma lus pa'i phung khams bdud rtsi chen por rang byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje chos rang gi gdan las bzhengs nas/ 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab bo// gtsang ma'i zas la spyod pa yi// lha dang bram ze klu dang bcas// rang skal 'bru sogs za ba yi// gling bzhi sems can mi dang bcas// las ngan skyugs pa spyod pa yi// dud 'gro yi dwags dmyal bar bcas// rang byung bdud rtsi ma rtogs pa'i// mtshan nyid sde gsum kri yog gsum// las ngan 'gro ba 'dul ba dang// skal ngan theg pa drang ba'i phyir// rang byung bdud rtsi chen po'i don// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol// zhes zhus pas rang gi gdan la bzhugs so// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor dkyil 'khor la spyan gyi lta stangs kyis gzigs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// sems can nyon mongs snang ba la// rtsa ba dug gsum las byung ba'i// nyon mongs rnam par shar ba lnga// brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam grangs snang// rnal 'byor nyams kyi snang ba la// mtshan nyid phyi pas ma rtogs kyang// bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga po las// khams kyi 'du lugs gsum du snang// bde bar gshegs pa dus gsum gyi// sangs rgyas rnams la sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor snang// snang ba gsum las byung ba yi// rang byung bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i thabs// khyed la bshad kyi legs par nyon// sems can nyon mongs snang ba la// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor chen po ru// rig 'dzin sman bsgrub bshad par bya// rnal 'byor nyams kyi snang ba la// phung po dag la brten byas pa'i// rang byung 'dud rtsi bsgrub par bshad// bde bar gshegs pa'i snang ba la// rigs brgya rigs lnga rigs gcig dang// bdud rtsi gong bu che mchog gi/ ye shes lha yi dkyil 'khor bshad// lta ba thams cad gdeng du bya// spyod pa'i la yang rab dor nas// bsgrub pas nyams su blangs nas ni// dam tshig zhing sa gshin po la// bsnyen bsgrub sa bon rab btab nas// rim pa dbang gis bgrod byas pas// 'bras bu lo thog smin par

byas// rab 'bring tha ma'i rnal 'byor pa// las dang skal par rab ldan pas// bsgrubs na kun gyis 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi yon tan bsgrub pa 'di// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor grol phyir bshad// ces gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgrub pa thams cad kyi gzhi phun sum tshogs pa 'di gsungs so// ston pa blo yangs khu 'phrig chung// phyi nang rgyud la mkhas par sbyangs// bde gshegs thugs kyi nying khu rtogs// mi 'gyur spyod lam mkha' ltar yangs// dgyes pa skong pa yum gyi rigs// mchod stobs gsang ba'i phyag tshangs pa// bla ma'i thugs dang 'thad pa dang// rdul phyag phyi nang mtshams mkhan dang// nyung yang lnga la sogs pa yi// yab yum thabs dang shes rab ldan// mched lcam rdo rje lu gu rgyud// gdung bzhi rang gi mig ltar 'phangs// skye bo ya ga can dag dang// mi nag nyan thos skal med spang// dben zhing nyams dga' spags pa'i gnas// rtsi sman shing dang nags tshal dag/ btsal nas bsgrub pa rtsam par bya// sa bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la// rgyan dang bcas pa'i gtor ma gtang// bslang dang sbyang dang byin gyis brlab// zla ba ston zla 'bring po dang// dpyid zla 'bring po dag la bya// tshes grangs yar gyi brgyad la brtsam// bsod nams tshogs kyang rdzogs par 'gyur// bco lnga'i dus la dngos grub blang// zla rgyas ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs// 'tsho ba zas dang dug 'joms sman// mchod pa'i rdzas dang sgrub pa'i rdzas// 'phags pa mchod cing gtor ma gtang// mgron bzhi mnyes par bya phyir ro// sbyin sreg tsha tshas sgrib pa sbyong// bsod nams bskyed cing bsrung ba'i phyir// bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu la// gtor ma gser skyems gtang bar bya// phyogs bzhir tho bzhi btsugs nas kyang// rgyal po chen po sde bzhi la// phyi mtshams bcad pa'i phrin las bcol// spyan drang phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul// phrin las bcol la gsol byang gdags// phur pa dar kyi cod pan can// khro bo bcu ru byin brlabs nas// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng 'og bcur// rim pa bzhin du gnas par bya// dur khrod gnas rnams rang bsrung bar// dam sri mi g.yo mgon pos mnan// bar chad dngos grub bsrung don du// sgo byang bdud rtsi gshin rje'i gshed// ma traM lta dpyod gnan pa'i phyir// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'bar bas bsgral// lha dang dkyil 'khor slob ma rnams// sta gon la ni gnas pa'i phyir// ma 'dres pa yi mchod phye la// zhi khro dkyil 'khor mchod byas nas// mnyen nas mkha' 'gro dpang por gzhag/ de nas sman

gyi rdzas mchog gis// dam tshig bsnan zhing bskyar bar bya// de nas sngags pas thod pa'i nang// dam chu byin gyis brlab par bya// ra ba dra ba gur bcas pas// de lus bar chad bskrad par byed// yol nang rdo rje zam pa la// slob ma dag kyang drang bar bya// mtha' yas sems ni rab rmongs pas// theg pa chen por des sems bskyed// rdo rje slob dpon bla ma la// byin gyis rlob par zhus nas ni// bla mas bu rnams lus ngag yid// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// yi dam lha mchog mi spang phyir// lus ngag dang bas phyag 'tshal nas// tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas// bsags pa'i nyes pa bshags par bya// ma rig mun pa mdongs pa yi// spyan yang dbye bar zhu ba zhus// slob dpon gyis ni gnang nas ni// de nas spyan drang dbye bar bya// mthong ba'i yi dam pra brtag pa// lha la me tog rab gtor 'bul// bla mas me tog lhar bcas pa// slob ma dag la bstim par bya// lha la bdud rtsi la sogs pa// mchod pas kyang ni rab tu mchod// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi// dam tshig sdom pa dpog par bya// 'dres pa'i chos dang ma 'dres pa// dam tshig gnyis su med par bsre// bskal par srog la bab gyur kyang// mi gtong bsrung bar dam yang bdar// rang gi yi dam gang yin lha// bla ma la yang 'bog par zhus// gnang byas sku mdog phyag mtshan bcas// phyag rgya chen por 'bog par bya// slob ma las dang skal ldan rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub sbyin// de la phreng ba rab gtad nas// 'dzab kyi snying po 'dren du gzhug/ sngags kyi rdo rje'i gral chen las// rim pa yang dag gnas par bya// slob ma dam par gyur pa rnams// bla ma rin chen lta bu la// dza gad gtang rag rab tu gtang// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa// 'phang du chag gang yod par bya// dang po dag par bya ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi lnga yi chag chag gdab// oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ma d+ha la hU~M/ de nas byin dang ldan pa'i phyir// nang gi dam rdzas chag chag gdab// oM gu h+ya a kra ma ma d+ha la hU~M/ mkhas pa rdo rje slob dpon gyis// ba su ta yi rgyu zhags la// gzung ma'i lag tu byin brlabs nas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// lhag pa byang chub sems kyi thig/ yum gyi mkha' la bde stong 'khyil// rig pa ye shes lnga yi thig/ srad bu ye shes lnga dang ldan// mtshon pa gzugs brnyan rdul tshon thig/ cha chen cha phran rnam par dbye// oM ma hA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gu h+ya a kra ma ma d+ha la hU~M/ mtha' gnyis ma spros kun nas zlum// chos dbyings skye med gru bzhir rgyas// tshad med sgo dang rab ldan pa'o// ling tshe dgu yi dkyil 'khor der// snod ni bzhi 'am brgyad gzhag la// cha yi grangs

dang mnyam ste bgo/ zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sta gon du bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sman ra sA ya na'i sgrub thabs 'di gsungs so// shu ti ya bak+Sha ra dang// ru ta shing mngar pi pi ling// kyi lce ba dang cha bsnyams ste// phye ma ga'u kha sbyar nang// bcug nas gzungs thag btag byas nas// sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM ka li ka li ma hA ka li/ man pa sho ni d+ha b+ho dza ni/ ha na shu la tri shu le na/ bdag gi nad zhi nas tshe ring bar gyur cig swA hA/ phye ma chu drod sbyar 'thungs na// rlung las gyur pa'i zug gzer dang// skran dang khrag 'khru na ba dang// dbugs mi bde dang snying na dang// myos dang dron chung lto sbos pa/ kha zas mi 'ju khong mi bde// srin bu'i nad dang cham pa dang// shu ba thor bu g.yen pa dang// dregs nad mi ser khrag rgyas dang// lkog ma skrangs dang chu so'i nad// mchin pa dang ni mtsher pa dang// klad pa gzhogs phyed na ba dang// mig gi nad do cog rnams sel// skabs su bstan pas de ltar 'grub// rtag tu gtang bar gyur pa na// spyi ther skra yang skye bar byed// skra nag gyur cing bzhin yang mdzes// skra dkar gnyer ma med pa ste// rgas sra tshe yang ring bar 'gyur// bcud len ra sA ya nar 'gyur// bcom ldan bdud rtsi rgyal po yis// phye ma sman gyi rgyal po 'di// bram ze gzhon nu'i sprin la gsungs// de nas srin bu'i snang ba de// ba sbru ba yi rtsa ba dang// a ru ra dang sle tres dang// skyer pa'i rtsa ba cha bsnyams bskol// bzhi cha lus pa'i nang du ni// gu gul mnyes te bsags pa yi/ khu ba sngags kyis btab 'thung na// 'or dang skya sbab dmu rdzings nad// bad kan las gyur pa yi nad// skrangs pa'i nad rnams sel ba ste// nam tshong yan lag nad la phan// oM hU~M phri hU~M shu k+She phu swA hA/ sngags de btab nas chu sbyar blud// sdud cing ma zhu'i nad zhi byed// bcom ldan 'das kyi khu ba'i sman// bsgrub pa'i man ngag cho ga 'di// drang srong rin po che la bshad/ kha ru tsha dang go snyod dang// na le sham dang sha kha ra// sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin// skyugs pa'i nad rnams zhi bar byed// shing tsha sug smel skyu ru dang// bca' sga tsan+dan ma nu dang// dzi tsan ti dang gla sgang dang// ba la dang ni ha sti rnams// cha bsnyam ka ra brgyad 'gyur gyi// lde gu byin na skyigs bu'i nad// dbugs mi bde ba zhi bar byed// sngags 'di btabs nas sman la bsgrub// gro ba la bris mgul du btags// skyugs pa'i nad rnams zhi bar byed// oM he ru ka dza li ti ta dze he hU~M phaT swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ni// go'u+u ta ma la bshad pa yin// lde gu bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// byi tang ka yi sa bon

dang// skyu ru ra dang a ru ra// 'bras bu gsum la srang re ste// dur byid srang gsum phye ma ni// bur srang bcu gnyis bskol nang du// ril bu grangs ni sum cu bya// sum cu zla ba re re bza'// mdze nad sha bkra dbugs mi bde// lud pa dmu rdzings gzhong 'brum dang// gcin nad mtsher nad 'thor bu'i nad// skran nad rnams la bshal gyis 'joms// a ru ra dang bu ram dang// cha bsnyam sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yis// 'khru bar byed de bcud len bsngags// oM mo tsa ni bi ma k+Sha ni sid+d+hi ka ra ka ra/ phu ru phu ru phu+u ru+u swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkru ba'i sman// drang srong gzhon nu sred la bshad// ri lu sman gyi sgrub pa'o// tshwa ba gsum dang ser po gnyis// nas tshig sprus pa'i thal pa dang// ba ru ra yi shing rtsa dang// byi sha la dang tsi tra ka/ ka ra bI ra rgyam tshwa dang// khyim gyi dud pa yungs kar dang// arga'i lo ma bca' sga dang// pha la ta ka mu zi dang// ldong ros dang ni shrI khaN+Da// ba la so ma ra dza rnams// cha bsnyam phye ma zhib bar btags// ba yi gcin dang sbyar bskus nas// srog chags lu gur rag ri'i dug/ srin bu'i dug dag ma rungs rma// za khu'i nad dang me dbal dang// mtshan par rdol dang 'bras kyi nad// mdzed nad bco brgyad dag la yang// bskus pa tsam gyis nus pa ni// shing la thog gis brgyab pa 'dra// oM a mr-i ta ro ga pra shA ma na ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong mchog/ 'gro skyabs la ni byug pa bshad// ba glang rwa dang shing kun dang// sbrul gyi pags pa po so cha// ras bal sa bon mi yi skra// nas kyi phub ma br-i ha ti// ser po rnam gnyis na le sham// rma bya'i sgro dang shun pa dang// lha la phul ba'i me tog dang// ba la ser mo lhan cig sbyar// yan lag drug cu dud pa 'di// gang la bdud par gyur pa la// rims nad thams cad med pa dang// yi dwags grul bum lus srul po// sha za gnod sbyin srin po rnams// gdon gyis zin pa grol bar byed// oM na maHtsan+d+ha krod+ha ya kun d+ha kun d+ha/ mu kun d+ha kun d+ha/ tsan+d+ha bu ta sa ma ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ni// rtsibs kyi mu+u khyud 'dzin pa la// dud pas srung ba'i cho ga'o// dngul rdo lcags rdo brags zhun rnams// mar dang sbyar nas byin gyur na// bud med pad+ma rak+ta ni// dus min 'byung ba sel bar byed// oM na mo lo hi ha ra sing ga la ya/ ma ti ga ra dzaH/ ya ri ya ri naM/ ru ti bi/ praM baM/ pra ba ga k+Sha mi/ tu ru tu ru/ la g+hu la g+hu/ ti li ti li/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li swA hA/ sngags 'di skud pa dmar po la// bzlas te mdud pa gsum bor la// rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong bcing// zla mtshan dus min 'byung la phan// shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang mas// sems can rnam pa'i don du gsungs// bcom

ldan 'das la rig pa phul// rgya skyegs shing gi sa bon dang// shal ma li yi me tog gnyis// lhan cig 'thung na bu 'gags sel// ri bong khrag dang rta khrag blud// bu yang bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur// oM na mo ru tra a pa na na ma tri na to pa ti rngam pa rngam pa ba ni mu tsa/ in tri ya ga tra ni/ bi sha ba lha b+ha pa ru/ gar po ni 'di zhes bya ba la swA hA/ sngags 'di skud pa dkar po la// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas byas nas// mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor// bud med bu 'gags mgul du gdags// bu yang bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur// sman gyi lha mo nor rgyun mas// rang gi rig pa bcom ldan la// sems can don du phul ba ni// sbrul gyi pags pa rgya ru+u dang// khyi yi mtshan ma khong du gtang// skyes pa'i ling+ga'i tshod ma gtang// sngags 'di gro ga dag la bri// gang gi spyi bor btags pa yis// bu yang myur du 'byung bar 'gyur// bu rog kyang ni de bzhin 'byung// oM ka sa bi ka sa ma hA ka sa swA hA/ rtsi yi lha mo grub pa yi/ blo gros mas ni bcom ldan la// rang gi rig pa 'gro don phul// bud med zla mtshan dang ldan zhing// khrus byed pa yi dus su ni// glang gcin srang ni sum cu gnyis// til mar srang brgyad bskol byas pa'i// mar lus pa de byin pa na// mo gsham bu yang btsa' bar 'gyur// ma he'i mar gsar srang gsum dang// ra chu sbyar nas bud med blud// bu med pa yang skye bar 'gyur// a shwa kan+d+ha bskol ba yi// khu ba dar ba mar yang bskol// ma lus pa de bud med ni// zla mtshan ldan pa'i dus 'thung nas// de yi 'og tu sbyor ba bya// de kyang bu yang 'dzin par 'gyur// rgya skyegs lo ma bsdus pa dang// rta khrag sbyar te blud pa na// len stong bar du mngal 'dzin 'gyur// oM shaM khaM ni shud+d+he phu swA hA/ nags kyi lha mo rma bya'i mgrin// rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di// bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'o// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sems can nyon mongs pa'i snang ba la/ sman ra sA ya na brgyud pa'i bsgrub pa ste le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang byung bdud rtsi chen po sgrub pa las/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po rnams la/ rnal 'byor pa nyams kyi snang ba ston pa zhes bya ba 'di dag ched du brjod de gsungs so// dkyil 'khor le'u tshe dgu pa la// rtsibs ni bcu drug bkod byas nas// bar khyams sgo bzhi bcas pa la// rta babs rdo rje me ri bcas// rtsa ba 'bras bu sdong po dang// yu+u ba shun lpags lo ma dang// me tog snying por bcas pa ni// phyi yi rtsa ba brgyad du skyes// lus por pags pa yan lag dang// rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu dang// snying po lo ma rnam pa brgyad// mchog chen mi lus gcig la tshang// 'bras

bu rnam lnga bsgral ba yi// dbang po rnam lnga'i bcud lnga dang// sems bcud go ro tsa na lnga// mAM sa'i bcud ni tshil bu lnga// chu bcud dri chu rnam pa lnga// rus pa'i bcud kyang rkang mar lnga// lus po snying dang khrag gi khrag/ gsang ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa brgyad// yab kyi rgyu bzhi gnas pa dag/ yum gyi gnas bzhi gsang ba'o// kun gzhi byang chub sems las ni// ma g.yos bzhin du 'bras bu ni// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad gsal// de ni don dam rtsa ba yin// dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag pa'i rdzas// ye shes lnga ldan ka pA lar// yab yum drang srong rgyu bsgral zhing// rang shi phag nya phug ron brgyad// a bar dzi ta du ru ka/ dkar nag dbus su gzhag pa'i rdzas// de yi shar du gzhag pa yang// sku gsung thugs ldan ka pA lar// klad gzhung be ra sha rta ril// mchin snod b+ha ga rgyud kyi lam// ga pur cu gang thal kar gdung// dkyil 'khor de yi lho phyogs su// yid bzhin gter ldan ka pA lar// lce snying mkha' ma gzhang dang bzhi// ka bzhi phyi nang gsang ba brgyad// tsa tri ka ko gla gong snying// rtsa ba skyobs dang bcas par gnas// nub du dam rdzas dgod pa ni/ khams gsum yongs sgrol ka pA lar// rgyu lnga yab yum bya bar rigs// tsan+Dan li shi rgun 'brum lngar// byang gi phyogs su dgod pa ni// cho 'phrul rtags 'byin ka pA lar// rgyud lnga'i mkhris pa yab yum chu// 'o ga brag cong gur gum lce// rgyu ni rang las byung ba lnga// rnam grangs cha yang mthun pa lnga// rigs ni rnam par nges pa lnga// 'bras bu gzhan du mi 'gyur lnga// gzhi las rtsa ba lnga gyur pas// b+han+d+ha lnga yi nang du stsal// 'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral ba// a ka ru ni dbus su ste// pa na se ni shar nyid la// lho ru a 'bras zhes bya ste// nub tu rgun 'bru gzhag par bya// byang du na le dge rgyas so// de la sogs pa tshogs tshad de// yan lag stong du bsag par bya// dbus su mi 'gyur g.yung drung lha// shar lho mi shigs mdzod ldan te// lho nub srid pa yongs sgrol la// nub byang dug gsum gtan sprug ste// byang shar mtshan ma spros bral ma// de lnga'i nang du blugs pa'i sman// rgyu lnga bya ka bam dang bcas// cu gang 'dam bu gi hang dbus// lug min le'u mig gdung bzhi shar// rna lce sha sna lho ru bsog/ sa rtsi shing dang me tog nub// de bzhin srog dang gnam chu sogs// byang du chu rnams thams cad do// shar lho mtshams kyi gru chad la// yon tan tshogs rdzogs ka pA lar// dza gad gar chad sna tshogs nyid// lho nub mtshams kyi gru chad la// 'o ma sna tshogs sbyar ba yang// bkra shis mtshan ldan ka pA lar// nub byang mtshams kyi gru chad la// mi 'gyur sra mkhregs ka pA lar// rin chen sna tshogs bdar ba dang// byang shar

mtshams kyi gru chad la// A yu dpal ldan ka pA lar// sna tshogs chu rnams gzhag par bya// sgo bzhir yum chen dung chen ni// shar du dung can rdo rje'i rigs// lho ru ban glang rin po che// nub tu pad can pad+ma'i rigs// las rigs byang du ri mo can// brag zhun bdun dag lug mig gsum// a ru ra ni rigs kyang bdun// dbang po lag pa rnam pa gsum// shing thog thams cad tshang bar bya// sman gyi rig 'dzin tshangs pa sogs// drang srong rnams ni spyan drangs la// gtsang ma za ba'i sems can rnams// rtog bzlog yang dag lta la gzung// rigs rnams so sor bkod byas nas// lha mo bzhi yi byin gyis brlab// rigs lnga'i sngags kyis brtan par byas// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar gzhag go/ sman rnams ma lus thams cad kyang// rang bzhin gnyis su med pas na// rigs rnams tha dad ma yin pas// dbye ba med par dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor rgyan rnams dgod pa ni// dar gyi yol ba rigs lnga'i rgyan// tshon skud rigs ky-i yum lnga la// nang gi sems dpa' mda' dang ni// me long nang gi sems ma ste// ral gri phyi yi sems dpa' la// dar sna phyi yi sems ma nyid// phur pa bsgo ba yab yum brgyad// bzed phor la sogs b+han+d+ha dang// mchod rdzas rnams kyis rab mdzes shing// brda sgo dbye la brda phyag 'tshal// mchod pa byin dbab gu gul bdug/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dza gad b+han+d+ha 'bar ba de// dpa' bo 'bru lnga lus khams kyi// bdud rtsi lnga ru byin gyis brlab// las rnams bskos la gdab pa yang// slob dpon ston pa'i sgron mar gdab// yum ni kun tu bzang mo la// rgyal po rdo rje rin chen dang// pad+ma las kyi rigs su bya// yum bzhi yangs pa'i spyan chen dang// rin chen pad+ma las su bya// rgyal thebs bzhi yang rigs bzhir gnas// ye shes spyan dang dus tshod dro// phyi dang nang gi mtshams mkhan dang// 'dzin ging stob ging sgrol ging dang// gsang ba'i phyag tshangs phud zas rgyan// mched lcam bya rog mnga' gsol bya// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po la// dpal gyi chas brgyad mnga' gsol nas// 'khor gyi mched dang lcam dral la// khrag zhag thal ba'i rtags btab pas// dpa' bo dpa' mor 'gyur ba yin// chas dang mi ldan rtags med na// ma mo mkha' 'gro dam can gyis// bsgrub mchog yin par ngo mi shes// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bdud rtsi phye ma bsgrub pa yi// rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum// khrol bu'i bsnyen pas dag par spyad// btag btsag gzhal ba lugs bzhin byed// gong bur byas te dbus su gzhag/ dkyil 'khor chen por mnga'

gsol lo// dam pa rig brgyas sbyangs byas nas// rnam snang mi bskyod mtha' yas dang// rin 'byung las dang yum du bcas// sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa legs// rin brjid rgyal mtshan bzhad pa dang// chos dang rnon po 'khor lo spra// las srung gnod sbyin khu tshur dang// dbyangs can mA ma gos dkar sgrol// sgeg mo spos dang lcags kyu thub// phreng ba me tog zhags pa khro// glu dang mar me lcags sgrog ro// gar dang dri chab dril bu za// stobs dang gshin rje rta mgrin bdud// 'gugs 'ching sdom dang dgyes pa bskyed// spyan drangs mchod bstod bdud rtsir bzhu// lha tshogs mang pos byin gyis brlabs// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sA ya na ta na dza ya gu h+ya sid+d+hi hU~M hrIHtha/ ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// thams cad bdud rtsi chen por gnas// de nyid rigs ni rnam pa lnga// bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga yi nang// dpa' bo 'bru lnga bsam par bya// tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor snod du gsal// khams kyi bdud rtsi lha yi sku// oM hU~M AM swA hA rnams sngags/ rlung gis spro zhing bsdu ba dang// lus khams bdud rtsi srog rtsol bskyon/ oM A:hU~M swA hA/ dkar dmar ser dang mthing ga ljang// bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga po las// gsung gi yig 'bru sbyangs nas ni// phyag mtshan sku dang ye shes lnga// spros pas sgrib sbyangs thugs dam bskul// 'dud pas dug bcom bdud rtsir gsal// rigs lnga sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas// bstod nas mnyes par rab sbyang ngo// oM AH hU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta badzra a k+Sho b+h+yaH/ muM d+hA hwI shA rI tiSh+Tha sa ma ya hU~M hrIHtha/ zhes byang chub sems su sbyang ngo// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta b+hUd+d+ha bai ro tsa na oM laM dwe Sha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM hU~M hrIHtha/ zhes bdud rtsi dri chen sbyang ba'o// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta rat+na saM b+ha ba trAM// maM mo ha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hU~M hrIHtha zhes ma hA mAM sa sbyang ngo// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a mi d+he wa hrIH/ pyaM rA ga ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hU~M hrIHtha zhes pad+ma rak+ta sbyang ngo// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a/ tAM badzra ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM hU~M hrIHtha/ zhes dri chu sbyang bar bya'o// rnam snang chos kyi dbyings nyid de// rdo rje ye shes me long las// rin chen mnyam pa nyid yin te// pad+ma so sor kun tu rtogs// las rab bya ba grub pa nyid// ye shes lnga yi 'dzab dbyangs bstod// de nas gsang chen rigs gcig ni// chos rnams thugs su 'dus pas nas// snang srid 'khor 'das byang chub sems// lha rnams thugs su 'dus pas nas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du brtags// rigs rnams thams cad dbyer med pas// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsang sngags dgu pa 'dzab tu+u bzlas// nyams ni sems la 'char ba yin// gar ni lus la 'char ba ste// sngags kyang ngag tu 'char

ba la// mthong snang yul la rab tu 'char// bag chags dag ni rmi lam rmi// oM badzra tsit+ta sa ma ya hU~M hrIHtha// snying po 'bum du bzlas par bya// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// de nas sman rnams ma lus pa// rtags ldan che ba'i yon tan yang// rnal 'byor kun gyis ngos ngos nas// dbyangs dang bcas par brjod par bya// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// ma lus dbus su rab bsdus nas// g.yang gzhi che chung bsnol ma'i khar// rtsibs brgyad zla gam dmar po la// gtan gtun thabs dang shes rab kyi// rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kun// sman dang rdzas su 'thag par bya'o// nyon mongs pa yi rtog pa dang// sdang dgra gnod bgegs btag par bya// dar 'dzin rnam par rtog pa rnams// mtshan ma med pa'i ngang du btags// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ta na ha na hU~M/ da ha da ha hU~M/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M/ hu lu hu lu hU~M/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hU~M hrIHtha/ 'khar gzhong rin chen gzhong pa ru// thabs kyis snying rje chen po blugs// shes rab stong pa'i tshags ma la// thabs shes spyod pa zhing mos btsag/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ka ma la kun+d+ha li/ b+han+d+ha sid+d+hi hU~M hrIHtha/ bsgom pa'i don ldan bsre ba yang// chang dang 'o ma rin chen chu// sprengs nas sha rta ril gyis dkrug/ yab kyis blugs la yum gyis bsres// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta krod+hI shwa rI saM shod+ha ya hU~M hrIH/ zhes chang sna tshogs pas sbyang ngo// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta baM daM saM shod+ha yahU~M hrIHtha/ zhes 'o ma sna tshogs sprengs shing gon ban du bsre ba'o// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta rat+na tsite hU~M hrIHtha/ zhes rin po che sna tshogs bdar la blug go/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta bi shud+d+ha kun+d+ha li hU~M hrIHtha/ zhes chu sna tshogs pas spreng ngo// 'bras bu sku dang ye shes su// thams cad ro gcig gyur pas nas// yab yum pad+ma rdo rje'i mkhar// gnyis med gcig tu sbrel bar bya// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta mu sa la mu sa la oM hUM tha/ zhes gnyis su med par sbyang bar bya'o// de nas gong bur rab byas nas// dar ras gtsang ma'i nad du dril// phyogs bzhi mtshams ni brgyad du yang// rta mgrin phyag rgya rgya gram gdab// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ha ya grI wa lu hu lu hU~M hrIHtha/ de ltar rgyas btab tshad gzhag phyir// legs par srang la gzhal bar bya// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ho pa ya bi shud+d+he hU~MhrIHtha/ thabs dang shes rab pho mo yi// thod pa kha sbyar bar du stsal// rigs lnga rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// spos kyi rgyal po'i dud pa bdug/ zhi ba las ni khro bor gyur// dur khrod chen po'i gnas su bya// longs spyod sha khrag tshogs su rol// khro bo dur khrod gnas la dgyes// dur khrod tshon gyis rab bris pa// dbus nas le'u tshe dgu pa

la// gdan la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rtsi mo la// nor bu rin chen zur brgyad bri// mu khyud bar khyams sgo bzhi pa// rta babs mchod rten brgyad dang ldan// 'degs pa'i stongs ldan ka ba brgyad// yul la ma rmongs rtsibs brgyad dang// gdan la skyon med pad+ma brgyad// yon tan mi zad rin chen brgyad// mtha' gnyis ma spros mu khyud zlum// ye shes gru chad brdal khyab khyams// mchod rnams rten gyur mchod rten brgyad// dur khrod brgyad kyis mtha' bskor bas// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor yin// bdud rtsi bum pa yum dang ni// bla mas phyag tu bzhes nas ni// mtshams bcad khro bor ba gu+u ra// srung ba'i 'khor lo rab tu bsgom// dbus kyi gtso bo mnga' gsol te// dur khrod gnas na bzhugs nas ni// 'gro ba'i don yang rab mdzad par// dgyes par bzhugs su gsol bya'o// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ma hA shI he ru ka/ ma hA krod+d+hi shwa rI s+t+waM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ skor ba lan gsum bskor byas nas// rdo rje'i bro ni shar du brdung// rin chen lho la pad+ma nub// las kyi bro ni byang nyid do// de nas mtshams bcad bsrung ba dang// mchod pa byin gyis brlab par bya// lus ngag yid kyi nyes byas sbyangs// brda sgo brda phyag byin chen dbab// gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag chos nyid ni// cir yang mi dmigs stong pa'i rang bzhin te// blang dor med pa'i don la ma g.yos par// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du bsgom par bya// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ chos rnams thams cad gdod nas dag pa la// sems kyi rang bzhin kun la khyab par brdal// thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes chen po ste// sems dang ye shes kun la cir yang snang// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// byang chub sems ni hU~M gi rang bzhin te// hU~M nyid gdod nas dag pa'i sku ru gsal// mngon gsum gyur pa thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu// gsang chen yum lnga gsang mchog dkyil 'khor gsal// e yaM raM ra baM keM b+hUM/ e las ye shes nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ni// dngos dang mtshan nyid thams cad mi dmigs pa// chos kun ye nas dag pa'i ngang nyid ni// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// e A ka sha maN+Dal hU~M/ yaM las ye shes 'thor rlung chen po ni// bag chags sdug bsngal ye shes rlung gis bskyod// de las dbyings phyug dbyings su mnyam sbyar nas// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// yaM karma rak+sha hU~M/ raM las me yi dkyil 'khor chen po ni// dngos po snang ba'i bag chags sdug bsngal bsreg/ rin chen dbyings phyug mkha' dang mnyam sbyar nas// raM las me yi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// raM dz+wa la maN+Dal hU~M/ ra las ye

shes khrag gi dkyil 'khor ni// 'dod chags 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gtan sbyangs te// pad+ma dbyings phyug mkha' dag mnyam sbyar nas// ra las rak+ta'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// ra rak+ta maN+Dal hU~M/ baM las zhing chen gtams pa'i sa gzhi ni// zad med gter chen rdo rje rgya gram gtams// sangs rgyas dbyings phyug mkha' dang mnyam sbyar nas// baM las zhing chen sa gzhi bskyed par bya// baM ti ra maN+Dal hU~M/ kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha' klong nas// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje brtan pa'i sku// srid gsum 'degs byed bya ra nan tan te// ye shes bzhir gyur rang bzhin kun la khyab// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho yum gyi mkha' klong nas// thams cad skyed byed yum gyi byang chub sems// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par chags pa'i klong// rang bzhin rnam dag pad+ma rA ga'i klong// keM rus ri rab rdo rje brag stengs na// dregs pa bsgral nas zhe sdang phung po bshig/ chags med rak+ta'i dkyil 'khor rang byung ba// bcom ldan dpal chen yab yum bzhugs pa'i gnas// b+h+rUM las bskyed pa 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// phyogs bcu kun tu rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// phyi dang nang med ye shes gsal ba'i ngang// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i bzhugs gnas so// oM gu ya a kra ma d+ha la hU~M/ gu ya gsang chen byang chub sems kyi thig/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi thig btab pas// maN+Dal brgyad pa mtha' dbus med par gsal// mtha' gnyis ma spros lte ba zlum po la// lte dbus thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// dbus su dbang chen zla gam dmar po la// 'jigs byed mthing nag gru gsum 'bar bas brgyan// chags med pad+ma 'dab brgyad brdal ba la// ye shes brgyad spros 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// rin chen zur brgyad yon tan sna tshogs 'phro// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// 'bar 'phro thugs rje'i 'od zer mang po 'khrugs// yeshes bzhi ldan gru chad bzhi yis brgyan// 'bar ba chen po'i bar khyams rab tu mdzes// ye shes sgo bzhi rta babs brgyad dang ldan// b+han+d+ha skam rlon mang po'i rtsigs pa la// gnam lcags ngur mo 'bar ba'i gzer gyis btab// zhing chen pho mo bsnol ba'i ka gdung la// zhing phran mang po gtams pa'i gral phyam btang// zhing chen g.yang gzhi bla re 'phan gdug dang// b+han+d+ha'i pho long sbrul nag chun po dang// nyi zla gza' skar mang po'i tshogs kyis brgyan// khams gsum kun tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor khyab// b+h+rUM gu ya maN+Da la b+h+rUM/ nor bu mu tig gcal du legs par bkram// asma gar b+ha'i 'od kyis phyogs bcur 'phrigs// nor bu rin po che yi brag tu gtams// rdo rje rtse gcig rtse gsum rtse lnga

dang// ma ni shes rab 'du bral med pa'i ngang// dbyings kyi thugs rjes mtha' dbus med par khyab// nyi ma'i maN+Dal gdan gyi khyad par ni// snang ba ma 'gags yongs la khyab par bsgom// ma sUr+ya maN+Da la hU~M/ a ni ma skyes thabs kyi rangabazhin te// rig pa byang chub sems kyi thig le che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam par rab snang ba// mtha' dbus med par gdod nas dag par bsgom// a tsan+Da maN+Da la hU~M/ baM ni chags med pad+ma dmar po'i mdog/ 'dod chags thams cad dbang bsdus yum gyi mkha'// pad+ma'i ge sar chos kyi dbu 'phang nas// ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i maN+Dal bsgom// paM pad+ma maN+Da la hU~M/ hU~M s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hU~M/ badzra shrI he ru ka badzra kA ya/ badzra krod+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ bcom ldan dpal chen che mchog he ru ka/ sku mdog mthing ga 'jigs byed rgyan gyis brgyan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje b+han d+har dkrug/ zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs// oM AHhU~M sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sarba ta thA ga ta wAka badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sarba ta thA ga tA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sarba ta tha ga rat+na gu ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sarba ta tha ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma konyahaM/ byol song gtso bo brgyad kyi gdan steng na// 'jigs byed chen po khro bo chen po bcu// hU~M chen sngau skya rdo rje nyi zla bsnams// rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje sti ra dkar// dbyug pa ljang sngon dbyug to me lha 'dzin// gshin rje mthing nag rin chen grul bum bsnams// mi g.yo smug nag ral gri srin po thogs// rta mgrin dmar po sbrul zhags khyung chen gshog/ mi thub dmar skya ba dan rlung lha 'dzin// bdud rtsi ljang nag rgya gram gnod sbyin bsnams// khams gsum ser ljang ne'u le bgegs chen bzung// stobs chen dud ka thong gshol gtun shing bsnams// badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M kA ra hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M/ badzra krod+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha a pa rA dzi ta hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M/ oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka/ badzra shrI he ru ka/ rat+na shrI he ru ka/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ karma shrI he ru ka/ bi shwa sa nu shrIhe ru ka/ gu h+ya sa ma ya shrI he ru ka/ yak+sha shrI he ru ka rak+shashrI he ru ka/ rang byung khro rgyal bcu yi dbu stengs su// khrag 'thung chen po klong dgu he ru ka/ ye shes chen po dgu rnams lhun grub pa// bcom ldan khrag 'thung bud+d+ha chen po ni// dbu gsum g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus ma smug/ phyag drug 'khor lo dgra s+t+wa zhags pa g.yas// b+han+d+ha rnge'u chung kha TAM g.yon na bsnams// bcom ldan khrag 'thung

rdo rje chen po ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar mthing nag sku// phyag drug rdo rje kha TAM sti ra g.yas// dung dmar rgyu zhags zhing chen khyung gi khra// bcom ldan khrag 'thung rin chen chen po ni// dbu gsum sngo nag ser dang dmar ba'i zhal// rin chen gshol dang gtun shing dbyug thog g.yas// b+han+d+ha dgra s+t+wa gtun shing rnge'u chung g.yon// bcom ldan pad+ma khraga'athung chen po ni// dbu gsum dmar nag sngo dang ljang dkar zhal// g.yas pa pad+ma rnge'u chung spu gri bsnams// b+han+d+ha kha TAM thod phreng g.yon pa na// bcom ldan las rab khrag 'thung chen po ni// dbu gsum ljang nag dmar ser dkar ba'i zhal// rgya gram ral gri zhags pa rnge'u chung g.yas// b+han+d+ha rnge'u chung dril bu kha TAM dbyug/ bcom ldan khrag 'thung sna tshogs chen po ni// zhal gsum dkar po g.yas mthing g.yon pa dkar// phyag drug gri gug rdo rje kha TAM g.yas// thod pa dril bu rnge'u chung g.yon na bsnams// bcom ldan khrag 'thung gsang ba chen po ni// zhal gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ma ser// gri gug rin chen be con g.yas pa na// thod pa dril bu cang te'u g.yon na bsnams// bcom ldan khrag 'thung gnod sbyin chen po ni// zhal gsum dmar po g.yas mthing g.yon pa sngo// gri gug pad+ma dgra s+t+wa g.yas pa na// thod pa dril bu DA ma ru ni g.yon// bcom ldan khrag 'thung srin po chen po ni// zhal gsum ljang gu g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba// gri gug rgya gram ral gri g.yas pa na// thod pa dril bu rnge'u chung g.yon pa na// mi gnas ye shes chen po'i klong dkyil du// sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// muM phaT krod+d+hi shwa rI sa ma ya staM// ye shes khrag 'thung dgu yi dbu steng du// mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor gnam zhal ma// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad zhabs kyang brgyad// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rje dung dmar dgug cing gsol// g.yas brgyad kau ri chos nyid bdud rtsir sbyor// g.yon brgyad phra men 'khor ba bdud rtsir sbyor// b+ha ga'i klong du rdo rje'i smin mtshams nub// ye shes dgu rnams dbyings kyi b+ha gar thim// hU~M badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka hU~M ma hA dz+wa la raM// gsang ba yum gyi dbu steng gnas bzhugs pa// 'chi med rdo rje che mchog he ru ka/ dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig 'bar// mar me'i rgyal po rin chen gtsug phud dang// tshe dpag med dang rnam par gzigs pa dang// rin chen mang dang gtsug tor shAkya thub// gser phye dri bral snang ba dpag med dang// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor spobs pa brtsegs pa dang// seng ge 'bum gzigs seng ge rnam par rol// yon tan kun 'od ri yi rgyal po dang// byams pa kun gzigs kun nas 'od zer dang// dpal brtsegs rgyal po rdo rje rnam

par gnon// rnam dag sku dang sA la'i rgyal po bzhugs// 'khor la mchod rten rin chen rgyal mtshan bcu// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bdud rtsi mchod// zhabs brgyad rdo rje yum gyi b+ha gar 'jib// gnam zhal bdud rtsi 'o ma bcud kyis 'bebs// dkyil 'khor bar khyams drang srong nyi shu gcig/ sgo bzhi lha mo sman gyi srung ma bzhi// klu bdag rta mgrin me rlung thod pa ste// mi thub ro langs za byed rgyas 'debs ma// steng 'og hU~M dang stobs chen khro bo bsrungs// bdud rtsi sman gyi pho brang srung mar bzhugs// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol// phyag mtshan bdud rtsi rak+ta gtor ma 'bul// thugs dam bskul bstod gsang ba'i glu dbyangs blangs// rol mo'i sgra dang dri stabs gar gyis brjid// 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// chos sku skye ba med pa'i dbyings nyid las// longs sku ye shes sgyu ma'i skur snang ba// bdud rtsi yon tan lha tshogs spyan 'dren pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku yi rgyan du bzhugs// ma mo mkha' 'gro phyag mtshan sprul pa 'gyed// 'bar ba'i gar dgus gdul bya so sor 'dul// che mchog he ru spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// spyan gyi lta stangs mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud// gnas yul ma mo phyag mtshan pho nya mdzad// b+ha ga bde stong klong nas khrag 'thung 'chang// khro mo dbyings phyug spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// sku+u ni klong dgu khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sku// gsung gi sgra dbyangs rmad byung gsang sngags 'chang// thugs ni ye shes chen po gsal ba'i ngang// dgu klong he ru ka rnams gshegs su gsol// bdud rtsi sman gyi pho brang rta mgrin sku// gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i mkha' la sbyor ba mdzad// hU~M mdzad stobs chen me rlung las kyis sbyor// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol// mi dge bcu smin phyogs skyong rnam par 'dul// dge bcu mtho ris thar pa'i lam yang ston// rang byung dkyil 'khor ma lus srung mdzad pa'i// mthar phyin khro rgyal rnams kyang gshegs su gsol// oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA ka ru ka Ni kA dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ byaul song gtso bo brgyad kyi khri steng du// stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs su gsol// ta kr-ita khro bo brgyad kyi dbu steng du// sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs su gsol// klong dgu he ru ka yi dbu steng du// mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor bzhugs su gsol// khro mo dbyings phyug ma yi dbu steng du// 'chi med rdo rje dkyil 'khor bzhugs su gsol// oM ma hA maN+Da la kA ya bA' ka tsit+ta tiSh+Tha lhan/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi sman gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lha// khro rgyal bgegs dpung

'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// khrag 'thung ye shes klong dgu phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' spyod dbang sdud yum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'chi med rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho// pra tIts+tsha ho// a la la ho/ khrag 'thung rgyal po gar la dgyes// g.yas su thabs gsum bskyod byas pas// zhe sdang rtsad bcad thugs mchog sgrol// g.yon du thabs gsum bskyod byas pas// 'dod chags rtsa bcad gsung mchog sgrol// dbus su thabs gsum bskyod byas pas// gti mug rtsad bcad sku mchog sgrol// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab ste// sbyar bas phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// khro bdag chen po'i phyag rgya ni// smug nag cir yang 'gyur ba'i sku// nyi shu rtsa gcig dbu dang ldan// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag mtshan ni// g.yas g.yon dang po'i phyag gnyis ni// kun bzang thabs dang shes rab bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon bcu po ni// rigs lnga thabs dang shes rab bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon bcu po ni// nang gi sems dpa' yab yum bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon brgyad po ni// nang gi sems dpa' yab yum bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon brgyad po ni// phyi yi sems dpa' yab yum bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon brgyad po na// rnam thar sgo ba yab yum bsnams// de 'og g.yas g.yon drug po na// rigs drug 'dul byed thub drug bsnams// zhabs brgyad khro mo'i dbu brgyad mnan// gsang yum thabs dang shes rab sbyor// gnam zhal khro mo'i phyag rgya ni// sku mdog smug nag dbu dgu la// bco brgyad phyag ni dang po na// rdo rje dung dmar dkrug cing gsol// g.yas brgyad kau rI ma brgyad bsnams// g.yon brgyad phra men ma brgyad bsnams// zhabs brgyad khrag 'thung dpung steng brdzis// phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// badzra he ru ka yi phyag rgya ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje zhing dbyug kha T+wAMM g.yas// b+han+d+ha zhing chen rgyu zhags khra// b+hud+d+ha he ru ka yi phyag rgya ni// dkar ser dmar sngo dbus smug zhal// 'khor lo dgra s+t+wa zhags pa g.yas// b+han+d+ha rnge'u chung kha T+wAM g.yon// rat+na he ru ka yi phyag rgya ni// g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus ma ser// rin chen gshol dbyug gtun shing g.yas// b+han+d+ha dgra s+t+wa gtun shing g.yon// pad+ma he ru'i phyag rgya ni// dkar sngo sngo ljang dbus ma dmar// pad+ma rnge'u chung ral gri g.yas// b+han+d+ha kha T+wAM gser thod phreng// karma he ru ka yi phyag rgya ni// dkar dmar ser dkar ljang nag dbus// rgya gram ral gri zhags pa rnga// b+han+d+ha thod rnga kha T+wAM dril// bi shwa sa nu he ru ka/ g.yas mthing dbus dkar g.yon pa dmar// gri khug rdo rje kha T+wAM g.yas// thod pa dril bu rnge'u chung g.yon// dam tshig bsrung ba'i he ru ka/ g.yas dkar

g.yon dmar dbus ma ser// gri gug rin chen be con g.yas// thod pa dril bu cang te'u g.yon// gnod sbyin khrag 'thung phyag rgya ni// g.yas mthing g.yon sngo dbus ma dmar// gri gug pad+ma dgra s+t+wa g.yas// thod pa 'dril bu DA ma ru// srin po khrag 'thung phyag rgya ni// g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus ma ljang// gri gug rgya gram ral gri g.yas// thod pa dril bu rnge'u chung g.yon// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhengs nas kyang// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa bzhes// hU~M mdzad sngo skya 'bar ba la// rdo rje rtse mo 'khor lo'i mtshon// g.yon pa nyi zla'i rkang pa gzung// rnam par rgyal ba sku mdog dkar// rdo rje g.yas la ti ra g.yon// dbyug pa sngon po ljang sngon sku// g.yas kyi dbyug to me dpung 'bar// g.yon pa me lha'i rkang pa bzung// gshin rje mthing nag rin chen dbyug/ g.yon pa grul bum rkang pa bzung// mi g.yo smug nag ral gri g.yas// g.yon pa srin po dbyug pa 'chang// rta mgrin dmar po byi ru'i mdangs// g.yas pa ri rab ti ra sbrul gyis dkris// g.yon pa khyung chen gshog pa rdeb// gzhan gyis mi thub dmar skya'i mdog/ g.yas pa rlung g.yab mi mgos brgyan// g.yon pa rlung lha'i zhabs nas bzung// bdud rtsi ljang nag rgya gram g.yas// g.yon pa gnod sbyin dbyug to 'phyar// khams gsum rnam rgyal ser ljang gu// ne'u le g.yas pa bgegs chen g.yon// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhengs nas kyang// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa bzhes// rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ dam rdzas bdud rtsi chen po ni// 'chi med dkyil 'khor che mchog dang// mkha' mnyam dkyil 'khor gnam zhal ma// sku gdung dkyil 'khor dgu klong nas// mthar byed dkyil 'khor khro rgyal bcu// bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rta mgrin dbang// mchod par 'bul lo kha raM khA hi/ dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga sbyar ba'i// yid bzhin rin chen ka pA la// 'bru gsum 'thung bas sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi dngos grub thob// oM AHhU~M kA ya bA ka tsit+ta sid+d+hi hU~M/ a ho su kha d+harma kA ya sid+d+hi hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka la/ rigs 'dzin rnams kyis bstod pa/ dur khrod 'bar ba klong gi dkyil 'khor nas// shin tu mi bzad 'bar ba'i skur ston cing// yang sangs rgyas pa'i che mchog he ru ka/ sku mdog mthing nag chos nyid mi 'gyur rtags// nyi shu rtsa gcig sa rnams lhun gyis grub// khro rgyal ye shes dbu ni stobs po che// dang po rab tu dga' ba'i sa dang sbyor// bdud 'dul ye shes dbu ni khams gsum rgyal// gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa dang sbyor// rtog 'joms ye shes dbu ni bdud rtsi 'khyil// gsum pa 'od du 'phro ba'i sa dang sbyor// sprul sku ye shes dbu ni gzhan mi thub// bzhi pa 'od

byed pa yi sa dang sbyor// zil gnon ye shes dbu ni rta mgrin dpal// lnga pa sbyang bar dka' ba'i sa dang sbyor// rnam dag ye shes dbu ni mi g.yo mgon// drug pa klong du gyur pa'i sa dang sbyor// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i dbu ni gshin rje'i gshed// bdun pa ring du song ba'i sa dang sbyor// rtogs ldan ye shes dbu ni dbyug sngon can// brgyad pa mi g.yo ba yi sa dang sbyor// mkhyen gsal ye shes dbu ni rnam par rgyal// dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros sa dang sbyor// brjid gnon ye shes dbu ni hU~M ka ra// bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyi sa dang sbyor// mngon sangs ye shes yak+sha he ru ka/ bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa dang sbyor// kun mkhyen ye shes bi shwa he ru ka/ ma chags pad+ma can gyi sa dang sbyor// byams mgon ye shes sa nu he ru ka/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa dang sbyor// rngam brjid ye shes rak+sha he ru ka/ skye med rdo rje 'dzin gyi sa dang sbyor// dpa' brjid ye shes karma he ru ka/ rnam dag stug po bkod pa'i sa dang sbyor// skyon sel ye shes pad+ma he ru ka/ chags med 'thug po bkod pa'i sa dang sbyong// sgrib sel ye shes rat+na he ru ka/ mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang gi sa dang sbyor// 'bar 'phro ye shes b+hud+d+ha he ru ka/ chos nyid bde ba chen po'i sa dang sbyor// rtogs ldan ye shes badzra he ru ka/ ma spangs ye shes bla ma'i sa dang sbyor// lhun rdzogs ye shes dpal chen he ru ka/ kun bzang dbye ba med pa'i sa dang sbyor// za byed chos ni chos mchog he ru ka/ lhun grub yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa dang sbyor// ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// yang gsang rgyas pa'i che mchog he ru ka/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag mtshan mngon sangs rgyas// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dang po na// byed pa yid bzhin kun bzang rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi dang po ni// kun bzang bya ba mnyam gzhag pad+ma 'phro// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dang 'og na// rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi 'og ma na// skyed mdzad sangs rgyas spyan ni thor tshugs bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi gsum pa na// rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi gsum pa na// kun tu bzang po mthar stong dril bu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bzhi pa na// rin chen 'byung ldan mchod sbyin re skong bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bzhi pa na// mA ma kI ni sdud byed rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi lnga pa na// snang ba mtha' yas dbang sdus pad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi lnga pa na// gos dkar mo ni sreg byed zhun mar bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi drug pa na// don

yod grub pa rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi drug pa na// dam tshig sgrol ma skyong mdzad ut+pal bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bdun pa na// sa yi snying po rin chen myu gu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bdun pa na// lA s+ya dkar mo me long rgya gram bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi brgyad pa na// nam mkha'i snying po gcod byed ral gri bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi brgyad pa na// mA le sngon mo rin chen phreng ba bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dgu pa na// spyan ras gzigs dbang ma chags pad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi dgu pa na// gIrti dmar po pi wang rgyud mangs bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu pa na// phyag na rdo rje 'joms byed rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu pa na// nIrti ljang gu gar gyi cod pan bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gcig na// byams pa chen po bdud rtsi gun+d+he bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gcig na// bdug pa'i sprin 'phro mas ni spos me bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gnyis na// sgrib pa rnam sel klu shing lo ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gnyis na// dga' ba'i mdangs ldan mas ni me tog bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gsum na// kun tu bzang po rin chen snye ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gsum na// gsal ba'i 'od ldan mas ni zhu mar bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu bzhi na// 'jam dpal gzhon nu ut+pal mthing ga bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu bzhi na// rtog bral dgyes mdzad mas ni dri chab bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bco lnga na// bgegs chen mthar byed rdung byed tho ba bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bco lnga na// thugs dam skul byed ma ni lcags kyu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu drug na// gshin rje mthar byed tshogs kyi dbyug to bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon kyi bcu drug na// gnas nas skyod mdzad ma ni zhags pa bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu bdun na// pad+ma mthar byed dgug pa'i sbrul zhags bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu bdun na// rtog bral zhugs mdzad ma ni lcags sgrog bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bco brgyad na// shes rab mthar byed gcod mdzad ral gri bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bco brgyad na// tshangs pa'i gsung sgrog ma ni dril bu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu dgu na// lha yi thub pa pi wang rgyud 'dren bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu dgu

na// byol song thub pa 'chad pa'i po ti bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi nyi shu na// lha min thub pa thags bzang go cha bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi nyi shu na// yi dwags thub pa rin chen sgrom bu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi tha ma na// mi yi thub pa gsel byed par bu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi tha ma na// dmyal ba'i thub pa me chu bsil drod bsnams// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las// dbyings la ye shes tshe la mnga' brnyes pa'i// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal stod// hU~M/ yang sangs rgyas pa'i che mchog he ru ka/ ting 'dzin zhabs brgyad khro mo'i dbu brgyad mnan// rig pa yum la sbyar ba'i dbyings la sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi dang po bgrad pa ni// thig le chen po'i ting 'dzin chen po dang// chags pa med pas mchog gi dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi gnyis pa bgrad pas ni// bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin chen po dang// klong du gyur pa chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi gsum pa bgrad pas ni// rdo rje lta ba'i ting 'dzin chen po dang// 'gyur ba med pa chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi tha ma bgrad pas ni// thams cad 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin chen po dang// zag pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi dang po bgrad pas ni// chags pa med pa'i ting 'dzin chen po dang// ye nas dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi gnyis pa bgrad pas ni// 'da' bar dka' ba'i ting 'dzin chen po ni// gtong ba med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi gsum pa bgrad pas ni// dmigs pa med pa'i ting 'dzin chen po ni// rang bzhin med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi tha mas bgrad pas ni// skye shi med pa'i ting 'dzin chen po dang// 'du 'bral med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// gsang ba'i zhal du rdo rje phyed nub pas// kun tu bzang mo'i ting 'dzin chen po dang// khyab gdal chen po'i chos kyi dbyings dang sbyor// kun tu bzang mo'i byang sems thig ler zhu// 'chi med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor de min nam// che mchog he ru ka la phyag 'tshal stod// 'jigs byed chen po'i 'bar ba'i zhabs 'og nas// shin tu rngam pa'i khro mo gnam zhal ma// sku mdog dud kha sna tshogs cir yang bston// dbu dgu chos dbyings ye shes dgu dang sbyor// stong pa bco brgyad phyag ni rtag chad sgrol// klong dgu'i zhabs ni khrag 'thung dgu dang rol// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi dang po gdengs pa ni// spang ba med pa'i b+ha ga chen po dang// thig le chen po byang chub sems dang

sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi gnyis pa gdengs pa ni// klong chen dgu pa'i gsang ba'i b+ha ga dang// bde ba chen po byang chub sems dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi gsum pa gdengs pa ni// 'gyur ba med pa'i gsang ba'i b+ha ga dang// rdo rje lta bu'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi tha ma gdengs pa ni// zad pa med pa'i gsang ba'i b+ha ga dang// thams cad 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi dang po gdengs pa ni// gdod nas dag pa'i gsang ba'i b+ha ga la// chags pa med pa'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi gnyis pa gdengs pa ni// stong pa chen po gsang ba'i b+ha ga dang// 'da' bar dka' ba'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi gsum pa gdengs pa ni// rang bzhin med pa'i gsang ba'i b+ha ga dang// dmigs pa med pa'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// zhabs brgyad g.yon gyi tha ma gdengs pa ni// 'du 'bral med pa gsang ba'i b+ha ga dang// skye shi med pa'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// gsang ba b+ha ga pad+ma'i klong dkyil na// gsang ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dbyings su nub// brdal khyab chen po gsang ba'i yum/ lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems dang sbyor// bde ba byang chub sems ni thig ler zhu// mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor de min nam// sa nu kro ti rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// shin tu 'bar ba'i khro mo'i zhabs 'og nas// khrag 'thung chen po klong dgu he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum mnan// 'jig rten dregs pa'i khyo shug dbang phyug dang// mya ngan 'das pa'i khro bcu zhabs kyis gnon// thugs kyi gdung 'tshob badzra he ru ka/ rdo rje dbying phyug mkha' klong dag pa na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// byang chub sems ni dngul zhun rin po che// me long lta bu'i ye shes de min nam// rdo rje lta bu'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// sku yi gdung 'tshob bud+d+ha he ru ka/ mkha' la dbyings phyug mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// byang chub sems ni gser mdog rin po che// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes de min nam// 'byung gnas chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// yon tan gdung 'tshob rat+na he ru ka/ rin chen dbyings phyug mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// byang chub sems ni bai DUrla yi mdog/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes de min nam// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// gsung gi gdung 'tshob pad+ma he ru ka/ pad+ma dbyings phyug mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyi med// byang chub sems ni

pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes de min nam// mngon par byang chub sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// phrin las gdung 'tshob karma he ru ka/ las kyi dbyings phyug mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'dul 'bral yongs kyis med// byang chub sems ni in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ bya ba nan tan ye shes de min nam// sprul pa mthar phyin sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam shes mthar phyin bi shwa he ru ka/ bde ba zag byed mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// 'da' dka' thugs kyi ye shes de min nam// dmigs med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// gnod sel mthar phyin dam tshig he ru ka/ bde ba tshe 'phel mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// dbyings su 'gro ba'i ye shes de min nam// ngo bo nyid kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// sbyor ba mthar phyin yak+sha he ru ka/ bde ba rgyas 'debs mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// klong du gyur pa'i ye shes de min nam// bde ba chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ sgrol ba mthar phyin rak+sha he ru ka/ bde ba rmongs byed mkha' klong dag pas na// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral yongs kyis med// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes de min nam// lhun gyis grub pa'i sku+u la phyag 'tshal bstod// sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor de min nam// klong dgu he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod// sku gdung 'bar ba'i khro bo'i zhabs 'og nas// hU~M mdzad 'dod chags rgyal po nyi zla 'dul// rnam rgyal ma byin len pa'i dri za 'dul// dbyug sngon me lha log par lta ba 'dul// gshin rje srog gcod grul bum 'chi bdag 'dul// mi g.yo ngag 'chal smra ba'i srin po 'dul// rta mgrin phra ma skyel ba'i klu rnams 'dul// mi thub rdzun du smra ba'i rlung lha 'dul// bdud rtsi tshig rtsub smra ba'i gnod sbyin 'dul// khams gsum gnod sems can gyi bgegs rnams 'dul// stobs chen brnab
