sems can gyi sa bdag 'dul// mthar byed khro rgyal bcu po de min nam// stong gsum khro bo'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// yang sangs rgyas pa'i che mchog he ru ka/ mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i klong na bzhugs// 'jigs byed chen po 'bar ba'i cha lugs ni// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil pa ni// srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal bas na// 'bras bu sku gsung thugs ni lhun gyis grub// smin mtshams khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba ni// ma rig rmongs pa'i 'khor ba'i mun khung du// thugs rje chen po ye shes glog 'gyu ba'o// 'bar ba'i spyan bgrad byams mgon ye re gzigs// g.yas kyi rtsa gcig sdang mig zhe la gnan// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zhe la

mnan te gzigs// g.yon gyi rtsa gcig zung mig bzlog ste gzigs// ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal phyags mas 'debs// dbus kyi rtsa gcig dbus su ye re gzigs// 'gyur med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pa'o// shangs nas bskal pa'i rlung dmar ldang bas ni// 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal te mya ngan 'das// gsal la ma chags ye shes nyi zla'i snyan// nyon mongs tsha bas gdung ba'i sdug bsngal bsal// sgra nyid rang bzhin med de sgra mthar stong// rngam pa'i zhal gdangs dbyings kyi zhal hom du// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ril mid mdzad// ting 'dzin rno dbal mche ba zang yag gtsigs// skye shi rtsad gcod mya ngan 'das par sbyor// le brgan ljags kyis thog dag bu yug 'bebs// rgyu drug 'khor ba'i skam glog thugs rje'i sbubs// ba spu thu lum rtse la me 'bar te// rtsa nas khrag 'bab khol mar 'khrugs pa la// ma tshogs 'bum gyi rgyal mo gnas pa'o// rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu 'dzings pa yis// skye dgu rtsad gcod theg dgu'i sa la bkod// rin chen gshog pa 'jig rten yogs par bkab// rigs 'dzin mang po sku yi dpung gnyen mdzad/ hU~M/ yang sangs rgyas pa'i che mchog he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// sku stod tshangs pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol ba ni// 'khor ba zhing gi log rtog tshar bcad nas// 'bras bu longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni brnyes pa'o// sku smad stag gi sham thabs gsol ba ni// dpa' bo chen po chas su zhugs pa'i rtags// phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don mthar phyin pa'i// 'bras bu sprul pa chen po'i sku brnyes pa'o// glang chen ko rlon na bza' gsol ba ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang las ma g.yos par// 'bar ba'i gar dgus cir yang thogs med pas// 'bras bu chos kyi sku nyid brnyes pa'o// thod pa mang pos sku la brgyan pa ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur 'bul ba'i phyir// gti mug rmongs pa'i mun pa kun bsal nas// 'bras bu ngo bo nyid kyi sku brnyes pa'o// sbrul nag stong gi chun pos brgyan pa ni// gdug pa'i klu rigs dbang du kun bsdus nas// zhe sdang 'khor ba rtsad nas bcad nas kyang// 'bras bu+u rdo rje lta bu'i sku brnyes pa'o/ bro d+ha yang/ kro tha an dza thal chen tshom bus brgyan// don dam gnyis med nges pa'i don rtogs pas// phrag dog sa yi drungs nas phyung nas ni// 'bras bu bde ba chen po'i sku brnyes pa'o// khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan pa ni// ma mo mkha' 'gro 'bangs su 'khol byas nas// 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho skems nas kyang// 'dod chags 'khrugs pa drungs nas phyung nas ni// 'bras bu mngon par byang chub sku brnyes pa'o// bskal pa'i me

dpung klong na bzhugs pa ni// don dam gnyis med dbyings su rtogs pa'i phyir// ye shes lnga ldan sku gsum lhun gyis grub// nga rgyal drag po'i phung po bcom nas ni// 'bras bu ye shes chen po'i sku brnyes pa'o// mdzad pa sangs rgyas sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud rtsi nyid ni rigs yum gyis// legs par phyogs nas 'dud byas nas// gtso bo la ni mnga' gsol bya// rigs lnga rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bdag nyid che mchog thugs ka nas// rin chen smug po'i gzhal yas khang// thugs kyi bsnyen pa rdo rje sems// gsung gi bsnyen pa snang mtha' yas// thugs bsnyen b+hud+ha he ru ka/ sku dang gsung dang thugs bsgom pa// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bsnyen pa che// phyogs bzhi gzungs thag bla mas gzung// g.yon kyang mtheb srin rdo rje gzungs// g.yas pa'i phreng ba rgya la gtad// g.yo 'gul med par bgrang par bya// 'dzab ni dbyangs kyis bstod byas nas// dgu pa'i dbyangs la bzlas pa bya// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU~M hrIHtha// sku gsung thugs kyis 'phro 'du yis// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib dag nas// yum gyi mkha' la bsgrub pa bya// yul gyi mkha' nas phyir spros pas// snod bcud bdud rtsi slar 'dus nas// nye ba'i bsnyen pa byas nas ni// bdag rdzas dag pa sgrub chen thim// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las/ che mchog rtsa ba sbyang ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba'i don du 'di gsungs so// sbyor sgrol gnyis kyis mchod pa yis// rgyal ba mnyes shing thugs dam bskang// bar gcod byed pa'i nyams len la// dus tshod shes shing bzlog par bya// rak+sha rU tra yak+sha tshal pa ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ bsgrub kyang rtags med stor ba na// a nr-i su tri pre du dza// rigs drug srog drang bo brdung bskor// dus tshod gang la stor ba dgug/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ha ya grI wa hu lu hu lu b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha A' yuHShe hU~M hrIHtha// srod gung 'jing dang tho rangs dros// dus der stor na btsal byas la// dgug 'dren drag tu byas nas ni// 'dzab bgrang che ba'i yon tan brjod// slob dpon dgug pa'i 'dzab bgrang zhing// rgyal po bzhi yis khro bo bzhi// dkyil 'khor lnga la 'dzab bskul bya// bar bar dag tu bshags pa bya// dgu pa'i 'dzab ni bgrang nas ni// che ba'i yon tan brjod par bya// oM las ye shes 'od byung zhing// AHyis mes bsegs thal bar rlog/ hU~M gis bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ sarbas thams cad dbang du sdud// pany+tsas rnam lnga mngon sangs rgyas// a ni skye med chos kyi dbyings// mr-i ni bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ tas ni 'khor ba stongs par byed// hU~M ni thugs kyi sa bon te// hriHni bag chags dbang du

sdud// tha ni skye shi med pa'o// rtags kyang 'od dud 'phel sgra dri// ya mtshan byung yang bskyod mi bya// de nas bdud rtsi bskyil bar bya// so so'i mkha' la bskyil ba'i sngags// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M hrIHtha/ shing dang sman dang rtsi dang nags// sman gyi srung ma bskul bar bya// de nas bdud rtsi dbab pa yang// lha mo brgyad kyi dur khrod sbyang// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta me pra be sha ya pheM pheM hU~M hrIHtha/ de nas bdud rtsi dbang du bya// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ha ya grI wa hrIH/ ru lu ru lu hrIH/ pad+ma pad+ma hrIH/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hU~M hrIHtha/ rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang// pad+ma las kyi dbang du bya// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// dkyil 'khor zhugs pa'i lha rnams la// 'dzab dang snying po rkang thon dbul// stong tshigs mchod pa 'bul nas ni// de tshe myur du dngos grub blang// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta many+dzu shrI byA ba lo ki te/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hU~M hrIHtha/ rig 'dzin rta mgrin che mchog dang// mkha' mnyam sku gdung 'byung lnga yum// bdud rtsi dbang chen kun 'dus nas// che mchog sku gsung thugs yon las// dngos grub dkyil 'khor zhal bsgyur nas// mtshan ma rdzas la blang bar bya'o// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta A yuHpha la gu h+ye sid+d+hi hU~M hrIHtha// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ slob dpon rig pa'i me tog dor// sman gyi dkyil 'khor bdag la bstim// rgyal po bla ma mnga' gsol la// mched kyis phreng ba dbul ba dang// slob ma 'jug cing zhu dbang nod// pho brang spyir bzhag dbang bskur la// tshe yi dbang yang bskur bar bya// thob dang mi thob rnam par brtag/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIHtha/ oM AHhU~M swA hA/ A yuHtha la gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ phung po khams dang skye mched kyang// ye nas sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// rang rig sems su rtogs gyur na// spyod yul gang bltas rang sems gsal// rtog pa lha ru shes gyur na// lha dang 'du 'bral ye nas med// rnam rtog chos nyid gsal gyur na// dgra bgegs tshar bcad bya mi dgos// ye 'byams klong gi dbang rdzogs na// rtags kyi phyag rgya bsgrub mi dgos// phrin las bya btsal ye 'das na// bsgom bsgrub 'bad rtsol ming yang med// 'di ltar rtogs pa'i gdeng gyur na// bsgrubs kyang skyon med 'gal ba med// ma bsgrubs skyon med lhun gyis grub// bsam med chos sku nam mkha' 'dra// bsgom med rang byung klong nas shar// ye nas byang chub sems rtogs na// 'du 'dzi byis rtsed ci zhig bya// thabs mkhas rol pa'i ting 'dzin la// tshi chad sgom sgrub ci zhig bya// snod bcud thig ler sangs rgyas na// gzhan nas btsal zhing smon pa med// rtogs pa klong du sus 'dril ba// mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin//

bcom ldan 'das kyang gud na med// brtan g.yo'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya rdzogs// rtog 'dzin sgra mtha' ting 'dzin sngags// 'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni// 'khor 'das yongs rdzogs brdal ba'i sa// sku lnga dbyer med dgongs pa yin// kun bzang thugs kyi nying khu yin// rgyun du bsgoms shing bsgrub byas nas// si h+la 'byongs na sems dag yus// mthong snang rmi lam gang du yang// stong gsum nyi mas gang bar mthong// ga pur zla bas gang ba ste// mAM sa dur khrod gnas chen na// khrag 'thung bzhugs par gsal ba dang// rak+ta khrag dang dri chur bcas// bde gshegs rigs lngar mthong bar 'gyur// sa ni dri chen chu la thim// chu ni dri chu me la thim// me ni rak+ta rlung la thim// rlung ni sha chen nam mkhar thim// nam mkha' byang sems chos kyi sku// bdud rtsi sna lngar sangs rgyas so// sku ni yi dam bla ma mched// gsung ni snying po phyag rgya bzhi// thugs ni gsang ba'i man ngag yin// brdzun smra ngag brlang sbyor dang sgrol// bdud rtsi lnga ni dang du blang// nyon mongs mi spang ye shes yin// rigs lngar shes na kun bsgrub pas// rdo rje rgyal pos rgya bcag la// slob dpon 'dzab bzlas kha phye nas// yum gyi ya mtshan che bar brjod// bdud rtsi pho brang nas dbyung ngo// lhag ma bskyang nas gtor ma gtang// gter du sba dang sbyin bsreg bya// mkha' 'gro skyong la las zla bzlas// gtor ma mthar du+u dbyung bar bya// lhag chad bshags te dag par bya// tshig gis mched zla ngan pa bshags// gcig la gcig ni tshang bar bya// dkyil 'khor bsdus la ye shes gshegs// rang yul zhig dag bcas pa dang// bu dang chung ma la sogs te// rang lus phul la yon gyis bslu// ci 'byor bla ma mnyes par bya// de ltar bsgoms shing bsgrub pa yis// sku yi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// chos sku dri ma med pa thob// sku ni thams cad de las 'byung// gzugs sku gnyis su snang ba'o// gsung gi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// brjod med don gyi gsung dang ldan// gsung ni thams cad de las byung// gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cur sgrogs// thugs kyi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// skye med dgongs pa dbyings na gsal// thugs ni thams cad de las byung// ye shes rnam grangs bsam las 'das// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang gsum// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo gsal// rtags su dbu yi gtsug tor brtan// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bdud rtsi nyid// rang zhal rang gi lus la mthong// rtsa dbyings dung chen g.yas su 'khyil// lus khams bdud rtsi spyi gtsug 'thon// gsang ba'i ring bsrel chen por gnas// rlung gi 'od zer tshangs bug 'phro// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi

chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas 'khor rnams kyis ston pa la mchod pa mang pos mchod nas 'di skad brjod cing bstod do// phun sum tshogs pas gzhi bcas nas// cho ga lnga yi las gzhung bsrang// dkyil 'khor gsum gyis rtog pa sbyangs// gces pa bzhi yis mtha' bsdus nas// 'khor 'das bdud rtsir sbyor mdzad pa// ston pa khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// phyi yi sman bsgrub chen po yis// sems can nyon mongs snang ba sbyang// nang gi bdud rtsi bsgrub pa yis// rnal 'byor nyams kyi snang ba shar// 'bras bu+u bde gshegs snang ba la// mi zad rgyun gyi 'khor lor grub// snang ba gsum gyi rgyun chad pa// ston pa bde gshegs khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes bstod nas 'khor rnams ston pas gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs par gyur to// de nas ston 'khor rnams chos kyi dbyings su thim nas/ gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di u rgyan gyi yul du dpal du ba lta bu'i mchod rten gyi nang du bzhugs so/ de nas gsang ba'i bdag po 'gro ba la spros te/ bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud las rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// bdud rtsi chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba gnyags dz+nyA na ku ma ras bsgyur ba'o//// rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li a ma ra A yuHtan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa sku dang bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad la longs spyod pa'i bdag po chen po de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i pad+ma la bzhugs so// de nyid la sogs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams dang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sogs pa rnams dang/ thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos rang gi stan las bzhengs nas khams gsum gyi sems can ma lus pa rnams la thugs rje chen pos gzigs te/ 'di skad ces gsol ba 'debs so// bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams// tshe ni nyams byed rgyu dang rkyen// tshe nyams gyur pa'i rtags

dang ni// tshe chog mkhan po'i mtshan nyid dang// tshe yi cho ga bya thabs rnams// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dam can yi chad sngags pas sems dkrugs pa dang// zhe sdang drag po'i rbod stong babs pa dang// rtsa ba sku gsung thugs kyi dam nyams dang// gnas med gnas bcas gyur pa 'di rnams ni// tshe srog nyams par byed pa'i rgyu yin no// tshe yar dbugs sngangs bgegs kyi dbang du gyur// tshe srog nyams par byed pa'i rkyen yin no// 'khar la khro zhing ngu skad 'byin pa dang// bzhin 'gyur spyod lam 'chal bar gyur par spyod// slob dpon 'tsho byed dus las g.yel ba dang// kha zas dag kyang yi gar mi 'ong rnams// 'gro ba gang la 'di dang ldan gyur na// de ni tshe nyams pa yi rtags yin no// tshe chog byed pa'i slob dpon mtshan nyid gsum// ting 'dzin phra mo las su rung ba dang// rgyud kyi don la mkhas shing dbang thob pa// mthu byin che zhing dam can nye ba gsum// 'di gsum gang gis bkug kyang khug par 'gyur// mi mchog bla ma de la tshe bsrung zhu// tshe mchog bya ba'i thabs kyi rim pa ni// bcud len sman gyis tshe rnams bsring ba dang// yi dam sngags kyis tshe sogs 'gugs pa dang// bza' btung longs spyod tshe yi cho ga dang// longs spyod tshogs kyi tshe bsgrub chen po dang// gsang ba dag pa'i rdzas la tshe bsgrub cing// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i yum la tshe bsgrub bya// 'di rnams gang gis tshe srog nyams pa 'tsho// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe nyams par byed pa'i rgyu rkyen 'di gsungs so// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i dam can rnams// lo dang zla bar mchod pa'i dam bca' rnams// pra ti ha na dus kyi mchod pa chag/ chos skyong srung ma ma lus yi chad nas// cho 'phrul mi sdug ston pas yid kyang dngangs// dkon mchog sri zhu 'khor dang bcas pa dang// yon tan mgron gyi dpal ldan mgon po dang// lan chags snyogs pa'i bgegs rigs sde brgyad dang// snying rje'i mgron gyur rigs drug sems can la// mchod sbyin ma btang bsrung ma ma dgyes pas// rang sems 'khrul pas lus ngag sems nad ldang// dge 'dun rnam gnyis longs spyod srog la rgol// dam can srung ma lha srin ma lus rnams// bsgral ba'i zhing min de la rbad byas pas// dus min 'chi bar byed pa'i bar chad yin// yi dam rang gi srog ltar khur ba dang// lus ngag yid kyis bla ma mchod zhabs 'degs// sngags dang phyag rgya bar du mi gcod cing// gsang

ba'i man ngag snod ngan mi spel la// sbyor sgrol la sogs spyad par bya ba dang// bdud rtsi rnam lnga dang du len byed cing// nyon mongs ye shes ye nas mi spangs te// rigs lnga bsgrub par dam bcas de rnams dor// de dag tshe srog nyams par byed pas na// 'di bzhin skyes bus ma byed rnal 'byor tshogs// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ tshe nyams par byed pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe nyams pa'i rtags 'di gsungs so// gang zhig bgegs kyi dbang du gyur pas ni// pha mas bsdus pa'i spun zla sring mo dang// lus las chad pa'i bu dang bu mo dang// srid pas 'brel ba'i bud med gzungs ma dang// dus kyis bsdus pa'i pha tshan mes po sogs// lus ngag yid kyi khro bar byed pa dang// sngon las mi shes sngon las rjod byed cing// de lta'i spyod pa cung zad dka' bar blta// phyi ma gar skye 'bras bu mi shes par// da lta'i lus 'di 'dor bar sdug skad 'byin// lus kyi mdog nyams dngas ma bros pa dang// byad kyi bzhin 'gyur bkrag mdangs shor nas ni// ngag gis tshig ngan smra la dga' bar byed// lus kyi spyod lam dran pa mi gsal te// 'du ba'i nad kyis lus la zin pa na// 'tsho byed sman pa dus su mi khugs shing// bla ma bsod nams che ba gzhan du shor// lus kyi stobs med kha zas yid mi 'ong// pho ba'i me drod nyams pas 'ju stobs zhan// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ tshe nyams pa'i rtags bstan pa'ile'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe mchog byed pa'i slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa 'di gsungs so// yi dam gsal zhing bsnyen pa thengs pa yis// drod rtags phra mo'i nus pa ston pa dang// dmigs med de bzhin nyid la blo gtad pas// stong nyid phra mo rgyud la shar ba dang// rgyud don thugs la gsal bar mkhyen pa yis// cho ga'i yan lag kun la mkhas pa dang// bum dbang lus la thob pas byin dang ldan// lus kyi rtsa rnams bskyed rim lha skur shes// gsang dbang ngag la bskur bas sngags dang ldan// bzlas pa'i thabs la shin tu gus pa dang// shes rab yo byad yid la gnas pa yis// khams kyi bdud rtsi lhan skyes ye shes myong// bde chen dbang gi snying po rlung la goms// gzungs ma'i mkha' nas byang sems rang la sdud// lus ngag yid rnams dag phyir dbang rnams thob// dbang rdzogs rgyud mkhyen yan lag ldan pa yis// mthu dang byin brlabs ngang gis che ba yin// nyi ma gang du shar bar mun pa sel// yon tan de ldan dam can srung ma nye// 'di ldan bla ma'i mtshan nyid yod pa de// phyi

yi bla mas sgro 'dogs yongs su gcod// nang gi bla mas rang byung ye shes shar// gsang ba'i bla mas lhan cig skyes pa ston// de nyid bla ma'i chos rnams shin tu dag/ 'di yis tshe rnams khug par the tshom bral// gang nyams skyes bus brtson 'grus rab bskyed nas// bla ma 'di la tshe chog myur du zhus// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ tshe chog byed pa'i mkhan po bla ma bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcud len sman gyis tshe bsring ba gsungs so// gang zhig bcud len sman gyis tshe rnams bsring// shing gi 'bras bu dag la bstan pa dang// rdo yi bcud la bsten nas blang bya dang// rtsi yi rtsa ba rnams su sbyar ba dang// sha yi rigs kyis ro rnams sra bya zhing// sa yi zhags rnams zas su za byed cing// chu yi rigs rnams skom du+u btung bar bya// 'byung ba'i ro rnams ldan pa a ru ra// nus pa'i bcud ldan sman mchog ba ru ra// tsha ba'i nad sel grang 'joms skyu ru ra// rgya ma lnga bcu chu yi nang du spang// khu ba btsag nas 'bri mar bzang po dang// 'o ma chu dang bcas nas bsdus pa yi// sman mar bsten pas skra dkar gnyer ma med pa dang// tshe ring lus ni shin tu bde bar byed// 'du ba'i nad kyis mi 'jig tshe yang brtan// 'bras bu gsum gyi bcud len mi rnams spyod// cong zhi me yis bzhus pa'i phye ma dang// brag zhun chu yis bzhur ba'i khu ba dang// bu ram sbyar la rtag tu zas su bza'// nad rnams 'joms shing rgas kha shin tu sra// ram nye nye shing ra shag rtsa ba dang// ka shwa kan d+hI rtsa ba gze ma dang// lca ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni cha bsnyams te// mar dang 'o ma chur sbyar tshogs par bya// mar gyis bcud 'phel 'o mas sna ring ngo// chu yis sna mi tshig ste khong tshos so// dkrugs pas 'ju sla mkhas pas sbyar bar bya// rtsa ba lnga yi sman mar nad rnams sel// rgas sra lus kyi nyams stobs bcud mdangs 'phel// tshe srog brtan par byed de nyams su blang// da bying rtsangs pa sbal pa mchil pa'i sha/ sbrul gyi sha dang dbang po lag pa dang// bu ram sbrang rtsi cong zhi rab sbyar zos// rgas pa ro sra lus kyi zungs rnams rgyas// mig rno gzhon pa'i lus dang 'dra bar byed// tshe chog yin phyir dang du blang bar bya// sa yi zhag rnams zas su za byed na// dang po sa bdag klu gnyan med sa nas// sbyin la bzang zhing snum pa'i sa rigs nas// gtor ma byin la yi dwags sogs la bslang// bdag por snang ba rnams la zhu bar bya// chang ngam chu la sbyar te btung ba yang// khro bo dkar po ral gri thod pa 'dzin// bsgaum nas bdud rtsir byin brlab bza' bar bya// log na bul tog sa zhag bsres la bza'// chang zhim

lto ru btung bar bya ba yin// sa yi lha mo tshe yi bdag mo yi// bsgrub pa'i man ngag tshe yi cho gar bsrung// chu yi rigs rnams skom du btung ba yin// dang po nas gdus tsha ba btung bar bya// kham log byung na bu ram mur bar bya// de nas tsha med pa yi chu bzang la// bskol grang byas te mang du 'thung ba yis// srin gyi rigs rnams phyi ru 'thon pa dang// kham log byung na rus khu bzang po gtang// 'byongs par gyur nas rtag tu chu grang btung// 'dis ni sa bdag klu gnyan ma lus pa'i// tshe yi bar chad sel bar byed pa yin// chu goms bzang po rnal 'byor pa yis bya// de la bcud len rigs kyi sngags 'di gsungs// oM AHmi de wa hrIH/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU~M hrIH/ A yudz+nyA na puN+ye swA hA/ bdud rtsir 'khyil ba 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ bcud len sman gyis tshe bsring ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi dam sngags kyis tshe srog 'gugs pa 'di gsungs so// tshe srog brtan pa'i yi dam sngags bsgrub 'di// tshe bsring nad sel rgyal po yin par gsungs// dang po tshe srog rten byed stong nyid las// tshe dpag med pa mdog dkar rang nyid bsam// g.yas pa sa gnon g.yon pa mnyam bzhag steng// tshe yi bum pa rab tu bzhag pa la// yi ge nr-i ni tshe yi rang bzhin can// 'od 'phros bkug nas rang la bstim par bya// na mo b+ha ga wA te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi niSh+tsit+ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar ha ti samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ A+oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te/ swa b+ha wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ zhag re la ni brgya rtsa bzlas// tshe srog bar chad med par 'gyur// tshe ring nad sel thugs dam ni// nangs par nyi ma shar ba'i dus// shar gyi phyogs su bltas la// nam mkha' zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// tshe dpag med pa mdog dkar zhing// phyag gi bdud rtsi lhung bzed nas// 'chi med bdud rtsi 'gro sbyin btang// gsil byed kha bcad skyil krung bzhugs// bdag gis mchod de gsol ba gdab// hU~M shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba na// tshe dang ye shes bdag po khyed// bdud rtsi'i lhung bzed kha phyed nas// gsil byed 'bar ba rin chen nas// bden pa bzhi rtogs chu bo phob// bdag la tshe dbang bskur du gsol// tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par mdzod// dus 'dir bdag la bdud rtsi phob// ces pa sna yi rlung gis ni// bdud rtsi gsil byed las drangs nas// bdag la 'bebs pa'i gsang sngags 'di// brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o// hU~M su so sa ra ha ka rir sha re hU~M phaT/ 'du ba bzhi yi nad rnams dang// bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'i gdon// thams cad ma lus sel bar byed// de phyir

rang gi dri chu ni// khyor bar blugs la sngags btab btung// oM a ma ra Na dzI wan ti swA hA/ zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ yi dam sngags kyis tshe brtan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bza' btung longs spyod tshe'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// nyin gcig pa dang gzhan gyis kha skongs la// bza' btung longs spyod tshe chog yin// nyin gcig pa yi tshe yi cho ga'i gzhung// pad+ma 'dab brgyad dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol// tshe bum byin brlabs mtshams bcad cing// tshe skyems bltam zhing tshe 'bras bstsal// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol// b+h+rUM las bum pa gzhal yas khang// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// a yig 'phro 'dus snga brjod la// bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar ba// pad+ma rdo rje rin chen g.yas// dril bu 'khor lo ral gri g.yon// thugs kar hrIHdmar rta mgrin sku// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog dmar// g.yas g.yon rdo rje pad+ma bsnams// mtha' gnyis mda' gzhu rnam par 'dzin// dkar la dmar dang sngo ba'i zhal// khams gsum dbang du bsdus pa'o// b+h+rUM badzra pad+ma bi shwa b+h+rUM/ ma sUr+ya maN+Da la b+h+rUM/ a tsan+d+ra maN+Dal a/ paM pad+ma maN+Dal paM/ s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hU~M/ tiSh+Tha badzra/ oM AHhU~M/ yum chen gos dkar sku la 'khril// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang// las mchog yum chen pad+ma la// pho nya bzhi dang sgo ma bzhi// zhing khams sgo la bsgom par bya// tshe bskyed pa la rnam pa gnyis// zhi ba ye shes tshe dang ni// rol pa khro bo'i tshe bskyed do// tshe 'gugs pa la rnam pa gnyis// 'byung ba chen po lnga yi tshe// 'bras bu byang chub sems kyi tshe// bstim pa lus kyi gnas lnga ru// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las lnga yis tshe bstim mo// hU~M nub phyogs pad+ma dbang gi zhing khams na// bcom ldan mgon po gsung mchog tshe dpag med// thugs kyi zla gam shel gyi ga'u nas// byang chub sems kyi tshe mchog A yu dmar po ni// rtse gcig bdag gis bsgrub pa'i tshe lags na// byin gyis brlobs shing tshe yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// oM b+h+rUM b+hud+d+ha A yu She hU~M a/ hU~M b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hU~M a/ swA b+h+rUM rat+na A yu She hU~M a/ AM b+h+rUM pad+ma A yu She hU~M a/ hA b+h+rUM karma A yu She hU~M A/ hU~M pad+ma ge sar stong ldan pa'i// dbus kyi rA ga dmar po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan sku mchog mgon po rnam snang mdzad// thugs ka'i dpal be'u zla gsang ga'u nas// oM dkar gsal ba'i 'phro 'du las// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs

bcu nas// gti mug chen po'i dug bcom ste// gu h+ya gsang ba'i byang chub sems// rdo rje'i tshe ru rab tu bsgom// hU~M b+h+rUM bud+d+ha A yu She hU~M AH/ hU~M pad+ma ge sar stong ldan pa'i// shar phyogs ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan thugs mchog mgon po rdo rje sems// thugs ka'-i dpal be'u zla gsang ga'u nas/ hU~M sngon gsal ba'i 'phro 'du las// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// zhe sdang chen po'i dug bcom ste// gu h+ya gsang ba'i byang chub sems// rdo rje'i tshe ru rab tu bsgom// hU~M b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hU~M A:// hU~M pad+ma ge sar stong ldan pa'i// lho phyogs ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan yon tan mgon po rin chen 'byung// thugs ka'i dpal be'u zla gsang ga'u nas// swA ser gsal ba'i 'phro 'dul las// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// nga rgyal chen po dug bcom ste// gu h+ya gsang ba'i byang chub sems// rdo rje'i tshe ru rab tu bsgom// swA b+h+rUM rat+na A yu She hU~M a/ hU~M pad+ma ge sar stong ldan pa'i// nub phyogs ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan gsung mchog mgon po tshe dpag med// thugs ka'i dpal be'u zla gsang ga'u nas// AM dmar gsal ba'i 'phro 'du las// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'dod chags chen po'i dug bcom ste// gu h+ya gsang ba'i byang chub sems// rdo rje'i tshe ru rab tu bsgom// AM b+h+rUM pad+ma A yu She hU~M a/ hU~M pad+ma ge sar stong ldan pa'i// byang phyogs ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan phrin las mgon po don yod grub// thugs ka'i dpal be'u zla gsang ga'u nas// hA ljang gsal ba'i 'phro 'du las// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// 'j-ig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// phrag dog chen po'i dug bcom ste// gu h+ya gsang ba'i byang chub sems// rdo rje'i tshe ru rab tu bsgom// hA b+h+rUM karma A yu She hU~M A/ hU~M 'byung ba sha yi khams nas tshe nyams na// sa yi khams nas dgug par bya// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum mchog sangs rgyas spyan// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba sa yi khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs nas// sha yi khams su bstim par bya// lAM b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hU~M A/ hU~M 'byung ba khrag gi khams nas tshe nyams na// chu yi khams nas dgug par bya// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum mchog mA ma kI// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba chu yi khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs nas// khrag gi khams su bstim par bya// mAM b+h+rUM rat+na A yu She hU~M a/ hU~M 'byung ba drod kyi khams nas tshe nyams na// me yi khams nas dgug par bya// dus

gsum rgyal ba'i yum mchog na bza' dkar// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba me yi khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs nas// drod kyi khams su bstims par bya// pAM b+h+rUM pad+ma A yu She hU~M a/ hU~M 'byung ba dbugs kyi khams nas tshe nyams na// rlung gi khams nas dgug par bya// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum mchog dam tshig sgrol// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba rlung gi khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs nas// dbugs kyi khams su bstim par bya// tAM b+h+rUM karma A yu She hU~M a/ hU~M rnams shes yid kyi khams nas tshe nyams na// nam mkha'i khams nas dgug par bya// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum mchog kun tu bzang// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// 'byung ba nam mkha'i khams rnams kun// gsang ba'i tshe ru byin brlabs te// sems kyi khams su bstim par bya// mUM b+h+rUM b+hud+d+ha A yu She hU~M a/ hU~M shar phyogs dkar mo shel gyi zhing khams nas// dkar mo mgyogs ma zhi byed 'od 'phro'i tshogs// phyag na tshe yi g.yab dar dkar po bsnams// tshe dang ye shes 'gugs pa'i las mdzad ma// dpal dang gzi brjid 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ shar phyogs dri za'i lag nas tshe drongs la// rdo rje'i tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ badzra A yu She aM ku sha dza/ hU~M lho phyogs bai DUr+ya yi zhing khams nas// sngon mo mgyogs ma zhi byed 'od 'phro'i tshogs// phyag na tshe yi g.yab dar sngon po bsnams// tshe dang ye shes 'gugs pa'i las mdzad ma// dpal dang gzi brjid 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ lho phyogs gshin rje'i lag nas tshe drongs la// rin chen tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ rat+na A yu She pA sha hU~M/ hU~M nub phyogs pad+ma rA ga'i zhing khams nas// dmar mo mgyogs ma dbang byed 'od 'phro'i tshogs// phyag na tshe yi g.yab dar dmar po bsnams// tshe dang ye shes 'gugs pa'i las mdzad ma// dpal dang gzi brjid 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ nub phyogs klu dbang lag nas tshe drongs la// pad+ma'i tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ pad+ma A yu She s+pho Ta baM/ hU~M byang phyogs in+d+ra nI la'i zhing khams nas// ljang gu mgyogs ma drag byed 'od 'phro'i tshogs// phyag na tshe yi g.yab dar ljang gu bsnams// tshe dang ye shes 'gugs pa'i las mdzad ma// dpal dang gzi brjid 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin lag nas tshe drongs la// las kyi tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ karma A yu She g+haN+De hoH/ hU~M khams gsum gnas na tshe 'gugs ma// rdo rje lha mo lcags kyu ma// ga pur shel gyi mdog 'dra ba// phyag na tshe yi bum pa bsnams// gcig las bye ba 'bum du sprul// yang

sprul lha mo mang po yis// drongs shig rdo rje'i tshe drongs shig/ khaN+Da ro hI dza dzaH/ hU~M srid gsum gnas nas tshe 'gugs ma// rin chen lha mo zhags pa ma// baiDUr+ya yi mdog 'dra ma// phyag na rin chen bum pa bsnams// gcig las bye ba 'bum du sprul// yang sprul lha mo mang po yis// drongs shig rin chen tshe drongs shig/ du si ni hU~M hU~M/ hU~M stong gsum gnas nas tshe 'gugs ma// pad+ma'i lha mo lcags sgrog ma// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ma/ phyag na pad+ma'i bum pa bsnams// gcig las bye ba 'bum du sprul// yang sprul lha mo mang po yis// drongs shig pad+ma'i tshe drongs shig/ d+hAk+ki ni baM baM/ hU~M 'jig rten gsum na tshe 'gugags ma// las kyi lha mo dril bu ma// in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ma// phyag na zla ba'i dril bu bsnams// gcig las bye ba 'bum du sprul// yang sbrul lha mo mang po yis// drongs shig las kyi tshe drongs shig/ sa ma ya ho hoH/ oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ badzra pA sha hU~M/ badzra s+pho Ta baM/ badzra g+haN+De hoH/ hU~M chos las mnga' mdzad pad+ma'i rgyal// gcig nas dbang bskur bcom ldan 'das// phung po lnga yi tshe nyams na// phyag rgya chen po yab kyi khug/ 'byung ba lnga yi tshe nyams na// shes rab lha mo yum gyi khug/ khams dang skye mched tshe nyams na// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis khug/ hU~M rdo rje khyung gi gshog rlabs la// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting nas dkrugs// gnam lcags thog gi char phob la// srid pa'i ri bo rmang nas shig/ rdo rje mtshon cha'i char phob la// bar chod 'byung po rdul du rlog/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ tIk+Sh+Na muk+ta badzra A yu She A/ de nas tshe bum lag tu gtad// hU~M nam mkha'i khams nas ma gcig tshe 'dzin ma// de bzhin rigs kyi yum ste tshe 'dzin ma// sku mdog btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra ma// phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams// yon bdag tshe dang bdud rtsis bltams nas kyang// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba'i rgyas 'debs shing// tshe 'di bcol lo tshe dang srog gnyis brtan// tshe zungs srog skyobs dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// d+hA twI shwa rI tshe b+h+rUM/ hU~M shar gyi phyogs nas ma gcig tshe 'dzin ma// rdo rje rigs kyi yum ste sangs rgyas spyan// sku mdog ga pur shel gyi mdog 'dra ma// phyag na rin chen shel dkar bum pa bsnams// yon bdag tshe dang bdud rtsis bltams nas kyang// rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar ba'i rgyas 'debs shing// tshe 'di bcol lo tshe dang srog gnyis brtan// tshe zungs srog skyobs dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// dri Shar ti tshe b+h+rUM/ hU~M lho yi phyogs nas ma gcig tshe 'dzin ma// rin chen rigs kyi yum ste mA ma kI// sku mdog baiDUr+ya yi mdog 'dra ma// phyag na baiDUr+ya yi bum pa bsnams// yon bdag tshe dang bdud rtsi bltams nas kyang// rin chen zur

brgyad 'bar ba'i rgyas 'debs shing// tshe 'di bcol lo tshe dang srog gnyis brtan// tshe zungs srog skyobs dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// mo ha ra ti tshe b+h+rUM/ hU~M nub kyi phyogs nas ma gcig tshe 'dzin ma// pad+ma rigs kyi yum ste na bza' dkar// sku mdog pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ma// phyag na pad+ma rA ga'i bum pa bsnams// yon bdag tshe dang bdud rtsis bltams nas kyang// pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'bar ba'i rgyas 'debs shing// tshe 'di bcol lo tshe dang srog 'di brtan// tshe zungs srog skyobs dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// rA ga ra ti tshe b+h+rUM/ hU~M byang gi phyogs nas ma gcig tshe 'dzin ma// las kyi rigs kyi yum ste dam tshig sgrol// sku mdog in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ma// phyag na in+d+ra nI la'i bum pa bsnams// yon bdag tshe dang bdud rtsis bltams nas kyang// rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i rgyas 'debs shing// tshe 'di bcol lo tshe dang srog 'di brtan// tshe zungs srog skyobs dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// tAM badzra rA ti tshe b+h+rUM/ hU~M spyi gtsug zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// kun bzang mo dang gnyis med pa'i// de yi mthu dang byin rlabs kyis// tshe 'di rab tu brtan gyur cig/ dbang yang rab tu thob gyur cig/ srog kyang rab tu brtan 'gyur cig/ tshe dbang phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ A~M pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa AM/ hU~M thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs// sangs rgyas spyan dang gnyis su med// de yi mthu dang byin rlabs kyis// tshe 'di rab tu brtan gyur cig/ dbang yang rab tu thob gyur cig/ srog kyang rab tu brtan gyur cig/ tshe dbang phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ hU~M badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ hU~M lte ba rin chen zur brgyad la// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan bzhugs// mA ma kI dang gnyis su med// de yi mthu dang byin rlabs kyis// tshe 'di rab tu brtan gyur cig/ dbang yang rab tu thob gyur cig/ srog kyang rab tu brtan gyur cig/ tshe dbang phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ swA rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ gsang ba rdo rje ral gri la// bcom ldan don yod grub pa bzhugs// dam tshig sgrol dang gnyis su med// de yi mthu dang byin rlabs kyis// tshe 'di rab tu brtan gyur cig/ dbang yang rab tu thob gyur cig/ srog kyang rab tu brtan 'gyur cig/ tshe dbang phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ hA karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa A/ hU~M bskyed pas mi nub rgyal mtshan te// bcings pas 'bral med lu gu rgyud// brtan pas mi g.yo ri rab lhun po ste// spros pa med pas khams gsum bkrag dang ldan// skal ldan tshe yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// mi nub rgyal mtshan tshe ni spyi bo'i gtsug tu bstim// ljags steng pad+ma'i tshe ni zhal gyi nang du bstim// skye

shi med pa'i tshe ni thugs kyi dkyil du bstim// 'chi med rdo rje'i tshe ni khog pa'i dbugs la bstim// 'du 'bral med pa'i tshe ni lte ba'i dkyil du bstim// mi 'gyur g.yung drung tshe ni dpral ba'i dbyings su bstim// mi ldog rdo rje tshe ni rkang pa'i mthil du bstim// tshe 'di sa la nyams na zan la bstim// chu la nyams na chang la bstim// rdo la nyams na snod la bstim// me la nyams na drod la bstim// shing la nyams na mda' la bstim// rus la nyams na mde'u la bstim// rlung la nyams na sgro la bstim// mdangs la nyams na dar la bstim// skyug ma sku yi phyag rgya ngang sring la// mda' ltong gsung gi phyag rgyar dpang stod cig/ mde'u tshe thugs kyi phyag rgyar ngar thob cig/ 'chi med tshe yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa nA sarba ar+tha sA' d+ha na badzra A yu She hU~M A// hU~M gcig pa rtse gcig thugs kyi rgya// gnyis pa thabs dang shes rab rgya// gsum pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// bzhi pa gar mkhan mchog gi rgya// lnga pa ye shes lnga yi rgya// drug pa rta mchog dbang gi rgya// bdun pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rgya// chos kyi dbyings su tshe sbas pas// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang// de la gzung zhing brtag tu med// de la gsad cing gzung du med// de la dbri zhing bskol du med// gzugs med lha mo bzhi yi rgyas 'debs so// 'di la tshe yi dpal bskyed do// 'di la srog gi mdangs gsol lo// tshe dbang gsol cig srog kyang thob// dbang chen skur la byin phob cig/ A yur+dz+nyA na b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ de nas smon lam gdab pa ni// na mo/ dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi dbang bskur ba'i// bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs bum pa 'di// rin chen gzhal yas khang la grub par shog/ rgyal ba yab yum rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi// ye shes lnga yi byin brlabs tshe bum 'di// skye med sku gsung thugs su grub par shog/ bkra shis lha mo rnams kyis byin brlabs pas// bkra shis rdzas brgyad dngos su tshang bar shog/ thugs kyi dpal be'u lta bur byin brlabs pas// skye med ye shes lta bur grub par shog/ phyag mtshan rdo rje lta bur byin brlabs pas// 'chi med rdo rje lta bur grub par shog/ bla med sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs pas// mi 'gyur g.yung drung lta bur thob par shog/ skye med byang chub sems su byin brlabs pas// mi nub rgyal mtshan lta bur 'grub par shog/ tshe bum gzhal yas khang du byin brlabs pas// bde chen gzhal yas khang du grub par shog/ phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis byin brlabs pas// ye shes lha tshogs phyag rgyar gsal bar shog/ tshe 'bras rdo rje'i snying por byin brlabs pas// 'gyur ba med

par lhun gyis grub par shog/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis byin brlabs pas// ye shes lha rnams mthu dang ldan par shog/ khams gsum 'gro ba'i phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa'i// 'bras bu sku gsung thugs su grub par shog/ 'byung ba ye shes lnga ru byin brlabs pas// 'du 'bral med par lhun gyis grub par shog/ tshe bum gang zhig rgyas pa bzhin// bdag cag rgyu sbyor yon bdag gi/ tshe dang bsod nams dbang thang dang// longs spyod rgyas shing gang gyur cig/ tshe bum dbang bskur byin brlabs pas// bdag cag rgyu 'byor lus ngag yid// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs su grub par shog/ 'bras bu gnyen dang bran 'khor rnams// pho mo tshe ring nad med shog/ bum pa 'di yi longs spyod rnams// spyad nas zad cing stongs pa bzhin// rgyu 'byor yon gyi bdag po yi// tshe dang bsod nams dbang thang la// gnod byed bar du gcod pa yi// bgegs dang log 'dren zad stongs shog/ oM A yur+dz+nyA na bin+du b+h+rUM ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lo tsa nA/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni tshe b+h+rUM g.yu b+h+rUM g.yu tshe b+h+rU/\u0f7e badzra A yu+u She hU~M a/ zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ tshe'i cho ga nyin gcig pa'i bya thabs kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kha skong tshe'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// snod bzang nang du tshe 'bras bzang po dang// tshe chang bltam nas tshe yi bar chod bsrung// lus sems mnyam bzhag rig pa'i rnal 'byor la// de bzhin kun tu snang dang rgyu yi gsum// 'phro 'dus b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang// pad+ma 'dab bzhi sgo dang bcas// rin chen khri dang rma bya nyi zla pad// sngags las bskyed pa'i snang mtha' mdog dmar ba// g.yas pa pad+ma'i sdong po thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa pad+ma'i sdong po sku+u la brten// thugs kyi dpal be'u sngags dang bcas// ma chags mkha' dbyings dag pa'i yum dang 'khril// thugs kar rgya gram nyi zla'i ga'u nang// nr-i dang A yuHgsang ba'i sngags dang ldan// oM shUn+yA tAdz+nyA na A/ oM d+harma ni a/ oM tsit+ta hrIHb+h+rUMrat+na b+h+rUM/ oM badzra d+harma hrIH/ Ad+ya nud pan na/ mAM mo ha ra ti dza/ badzra d+harma hrI/ nr-i A yur+dz+nyA na bi na du b+h+rUM/ hU~M bcom ldan mgon po byams ldan tshe dpag med// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba// mnyam nyid sku mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo// gsung rab dam pa spros dang bral// yi ge med cing sgra spangs pa// mnyam nyid gsung mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag rdo rje'i thugs 'chang ba// tshe dpag med kyi dngos grub stsol mdzad pa// mnyam nyid thugs mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bdag gzhan tshe nyams kyis// yi ge'i sprul pa btang byas nas// ri rab rtse na gnas pa yi// lha yi bu yi tshe tshad ni// brgya khri bzhi stong thub

pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pa'i tshe// dmyal ba'i klad rgyas sbas pa'i tshe// gling bzhi mi yi tshe rnams kun// a nr-i su tri pre dus tshe phrogs nas// mug ta ho yis dral byas nas// dz+nyA na tsakras kha phyes nas// A kar+Sha ya bzlas brjod pas// lcags kyu ma yis drangs nas ni// a bi sha saM ha ra Na hU~M/ zhes brjod cing gtso bo byang chub sems// badzra spoT baM gyis bcings// oM b+ha ga wA ti ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lo tsa nA/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha na swA hA/ bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba// mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i tshe gsol cig/ bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// sgrib pa'i dri ma phyir bsal te// rdo rje gsung ba gsang ba'i tshe// rdzogs pa'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i tshe gsol cig/ bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// sgrib pa'i dri ma phyir bsal te// rdo rje thugs te thugs 'chang ba// rdzogs pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i tshe gsol cig/ oM A yur+dz+nyA na tshe b+h+rUM/ rdo rje chos ni gtsor gzung ba'i// hrIHlas 'od 'phros 'og min gnas// yum ni a ra mA ma kI// mgon po dmar ser zhal gcig pa// phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang po na// a k+Sho man d+ha ri bsnams te// g.yon pa'i phyag ni skyabs sbyin te// mtha' gnyis bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// mthe bong phrag nas bdud rtsi 'dzag/ yum ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas kyi lcags kyus tshe drongs te// g.yon gyi bum pa'i nang du bsags// shar phyogs zla 'od zhing khams nas// dkar mo spyan phrag rigs kyi yum// phyag na tshe dar dkar po bsnams// 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe la mnga' mdzad ma// rdo rje tshe mchog dgugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ lho phyogs rin chen zhing khams nas// ser mo spyan phrag rigs kyi yum// phyag na tshe dar ser po bsnams// 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe la mnga' mdzad ma// rdo rje tshe mchog 'gugs pas las mdzod cig/ nub phyogs pad+ma'i zhing khams nas// dmar mo spyan phrag rigs kyi yum// phyag na tshe dar dmar po bsnams// 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe la mnga' mdzad ma// rdo rje tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ byang phyogs las kyi zhing khams nas// ljang gu spyan phrag rigs kyi yum// phyag na tshe dar ljang gu+u bsnams// 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe yi las mdzad ma// rdo rje tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ pho nyas tshe rnams drongs nas ni// yab yum thugs la bstim par bya// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rA go\u0f85haM/ rA ga yA mi/ mkha' nas 'od zer 'phros pa yis// ri rab rtse nas gling gzhi'i gnas// rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pa sogs// slar 'dus yum

gyi b+ha gar thim// gyen du drangs la bdag lus rgyas// oM puN+ye puN+ye/ ma hA puN+ye/ A yuHpuN+ye/ a pa ra mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te swA hA// oM b+h+rUM/ hU~M b+h+rUM/ traM b+h+rUM/ hrI b+h+rUM/ hA b+h+rUM/ badzra A yu She hU~M A/ hU~M ri rab rtse nas mthu bstan zhing// lha klu gnod sbyin rdul phab ste// 'byung ba rnams la mnga' mdzad ma// sgeg mo de ni yid 'phrog ma// thang gcig yud tsam dgongs pa ni// pad+ma'i gdan la gzhal yas khang// gtso bo rnams la mchod pa'i phyir// dga' ba'i mdangs kyis gshegs su gsol// nyi 'od dkar po'i gzhal yas nas// mthing ga spyan phrag rigs kyi yum// rdo rje chen mo yid 'phrog ma// gtso bo rnams la mchod pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'khor dang gshegs su gsol// baiDUr sngon po'i zhing khams nas// mthing ga spyan phrag rigs kyi yum// rin chen gtso mo yid 'phrog ma// gtso bo rnams la mchod pa'i phyir// rin chen 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// pad+ma dmar po'i dkyil 'khor nas// dmar mo spyan phrag rigs kyi yum// thang gcig yud tsam mngags nas kyang// pad+ma'i gdan la gzhal yas khang// mun dza ling ga ral ga can// gtso bo rnams la mchod pa'i phyir// 'dul skal bzhin du gshegs su gsol// zla 'od ljang gu'i dkyil 'khor nas// ljang gu spyan phrag rigs kyi yum// thang gcig yud tsam mngags nas kyang// pad+ma'i gdan la gzhal yas khang// mun dza ling gi ral ga can// gtso bo rnams la mchod pa'i phyir// tshe yi lha mo gshegs su gsol// oM b+h+rUM A yur+dz+nyA na a bin+d+hu b+h+rUM dz+nyA na a ba lo ki te/ sa man+ta s+pha ra Na/ rasmi b+ha wa ti/ A yur+dz+nyA na/ du ru du ru hr-i da ya hU~M b+h+rUM/ oM b+h+rUM/ hU~M b+h+rUM/ trAM b+h+rUM/ hrI b+h+rUM/ hA' b+h+rUM/ nr-i b+h+rUM/ rdo rje tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i pho nya ni// ye shes skar ltar 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// thugs rje lcags kyu'i 'od zer 'phros pa yis// shar phyogs dri za'i 'jig rten mgon mdzod cig/ sku lus dmar po brgya byin bzhugs pa la// lag pa lcags kyu dmar po thogs pa ni// brgya byin 'khor bcas lag nas tshe khu gcig/ in+d+ra ya tshe b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ drang srong me lha'i lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// rdo rje shang lang lag na 'phyar ba'i mchog kha dog dmar ser las ni tshe khug cig/ hriHag+na ye b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ grul bum 'jig rten gshin rje'i bdud sprul nas// dpa' mgyogs shugs kyis rgyugs pa'i pho nya ni// sngon mo mgyogs ldan rin chen zhags pa ma// gdug pa gshin rje'i lag nas tshe drongs shig/ ya ma ye tshe b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ srin po gdan 'bral lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// sku mdog ser skya nyi ma bu don rigs// rdo rje cod pan mang po gshibs nas ni// srin po khang bu rdul du 'joms pa'i tshe// dbyar gyi sprin phung 'khrigs pa'i khro gnyer 'dra// zhes sdang srin

po'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ ni ri ti ye tshe b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ nub phyogs klu yi 'jig rten rab 'byams nas// 'gro ba'i tshe srog sdud ma klu yi rigs// kha dog me ltar 'bar ba'i mdog can ni// thugs rjes klog byed mkhor lo bsnams pa ni// klu yi gnas nas tshe drongs pho nya tshe mchog ma// nA ga ba ru Na ye tshe b+h+rUM b+h+rUM// rlung lha phyogs skyong la gnas tshe 'gugs ma// khro mo sku mdog sngo skya thal ba'i mdog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan lag na 'phyar ba'i mchog/ rlung lha'i khyim ni rdul du brlag nas kyang// rlung lha 'khor bcas lag nas tshe drongs shig/ bA ya be tshe b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// kha dog ljang gu 'bar ba'i sku mdog la// ral gri ut+pal 'dra drangs nas kyang// gnod sbyin 'khor bcas lag nas tshe drongs shig/ ku+u be rA ba tshe b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ bgegs kyi rgyal po'i lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// mdog ldan sna tshogs kha dog ljang gu'i rigs// dbu mang spyan can rdzu 'phrul gdug pa'i phyag/ rin chen mtshon cha sna tshogs dril nas ni// bgegs kyi khyim rnams thal bar brlag nas kyang// bi nA ya ga'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ bi nA ya kA nAn tshe b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ nyi zla gza' skar lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// kha dog dmar ljang nyi zla'i 'khor lo 'phen// nyi ma'i khyim dang zla ba'i gnas rnams dang// nyi zla gza' skar lag nas tshe khug cig/ sUr+ya tsan+d+ra ya tshe b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ sa 'og sa 'dzin lag nas tshe 'gugs ma// ye shes ting 'dzin lhag pa'i spu gri yis// phyag mtshan spu gri bsnams pas tshe khug cig/ nA ga pra we shA ya tshe b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ muk+ta ho yis bshig pas rdo rje gyur// rdo rje nyi zla rgya gram gyis// nr-i la bstim nas sba bar bya'o// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta h+ya grI wa e ka dza ti hu lu hu lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ ta kr-ita dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// karma rgya gram bsnams nas yum dang 'khril// a ka tsa ti kha T+wAM thod pa bsnams// thugs kar tshe dbang bsdus nas bsrung ba yis// stong pa'i dbyings su tshe sbas nas// chos kyi dbyings nas ye shes gsal// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ tshe gzhan gyi kha skong gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe'i cho ga kun la 'gro ba 'di gsungs so// tshe bsgrub kha bskang nyin cig pa'am// gang yang rung ba'i bya ba ni// bum pa chang bkang tshe zan bca'// mda' dar dmar po me long thogs// rigs lnga so so'i snying po'am// spyi bsdus bgrangs la tshe bum bstim// de nas tshe ni dgug par bya// oM puN+ye puN+ye/ ma hA puN+ye/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyAn/ sam+b+ha ro pa tsi ta swA hA/ hU~M bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// sgrib pa'i dri ma ma lus sel// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba// mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan

mgon po tshe dpag med// gsung mchog rnam par dag pa'i gsung// mnyam nyid gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// thugs mchog rnam par mi rtog thugs// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba// mnyam nyid thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// oM b+hu d+d+ha lo tsa nA A yu She oM/ badzra lo tsa nA yu She hU~M/ rat+na lo tsa nA A yu She swa/ pad+ma lo tsa nA A yu She hrIH/ karma lo tsa nA A yu She A/ hU~M nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma ni ye nas rnam par dag/ rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ni ye nas skye shi med// rin chen dbyings phyug ma ni dgos 'dod re ba skongs// pad+ma dbyings phyug ma ni 'dzin med chags dang bral// las kyi dbyings phyug ma ni mngon spyod phrin las mdzod// dbyings phyug chen mo lnga rnams kyis// rdo rje tshe yi dngos grub stsol// oM badzra A yu She a/ hU~M shar gyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// gsang ba'i lha mo rgyas 'debs ma// rigs kyi lha mo sangs rgyas spyan// phyag rgya'i lha mo lA s+ya ma// mchod pa'i lha mo d+hU pe ma// 'gugs pa'i lha mo lcags kyu ma// tshe bdag chen mo khyed rnams kyis// shar phyogs dri za'i lag nas tshe drongs la// shar lho me lha'i lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ lho yi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// gsang ba'i lha mo za byed ma// rigs kyi lha mo mA ma kI/ phyag rgya'i lha mo mA le ma// mchod pa'i lha mo puSh+pe ma// 'ching ba'i lha mo zhags pa ma// tshe bdag chen mo khyed rnams kyis// lho phyogs gshin rje'i lag na tshe drongs shig/ lho nub srin po'i lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ rat+na pA sha hU~M/ nub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// gsang ba'i lha mo tshe 'phel ma// rigs kyi lha mo gos dkar mo// phyag rgya'i lha mo gIrti ma// mchod pa'i lha mo A lo ke// sdom pa'i lha mo lcags sgrog ma// tshe bdag chen mo khyed rnams kyis// nub phyogs klu dbang lag nas tshe drongs la// nub byang rlung lha'i lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ pad+ma s+phoT baM/ byang gi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// gsang ba'i lha mo rmongs byed ma// rigs kyi lha mo dam tshig sgrol// phyag rgya'i lha mo nIrti ma// mchod pa'i lha mo g+han+d+he ma// 'bebs pa'i lha mo dril bu ma// tshe bdag chen mo khyed rnams kyis// byang phyogs gnod sbyin lag nas tshe drongs la// byang shar dbang ldan lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ karma g+haN+De ho/ de nas tshe gzhan du yar ba dang/ 'thor ba dang/ ldeg pa rnams bkug nas bum par bstim pa ni/ hU~M A yur+dz+nyA na tshe yi mchog/ sa la nyams na gser la bsdu// chu la nyams na chang la bsdu// shing la nyams na mar la bsdu// rtsi la nyams na sbrang la bsdu// 'bru la nyams na til la bsdu// 'bru sna snying po sna lnga yis// sna lnga dag tu byin gyis rlobs// rnal 'byor tshe la bar chad

med// rdo rje tshe yi dbang bskur te// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// nam mkha' gsang ba gsum las byung// nam mkha'i rigs kyi dbang bskur bas// dbang bskur chen po dam pa sbyin// oM b+hud+d+ha kA la sha oM/ bud+d+ha lo can a b+hi Shiny+tsa A+oM/ ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung// rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur bas// dbang bskur chen po dam pa sbyin// hU~M badzra kA la sha hU~M/ badzra lo tsa na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rin chen gsang ba gsum las byung// rin chen rigs kyi dbang bskur bas// dbang bskur chen po dam pa sbyin// swA rat+na kA la sha swa/ rat+na lo tsa na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// pad+ma gsang ba gsum las byung// pad+ma rigs kyi dbang bskur bas// dbang mchog chen po dam pa sbyin// aM pad+ma kA la sha hri/ pad+ma lo tsa na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hri/ ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las rab gsang ba gsum las byung// las kyi rigs kyi dbang bskur bas// dbang mchog chen po dam pa sbyin// ha karma ka la sha/ ha karma lo tsa na a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ tshe bsgrub chen po byed rung/ kha skong byed rung/ tshe chog nyin gcig pa byed rung/ gang dgos su bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis longs spyod tshogs kyi sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// longs spyod bsgrub pa'i gzhi chen ni// gsang ba dag pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// longs spyod rgyu rtags phun sum tshogs// dkyil 'khor tshe bcas bkod pa dang// gzhal yas khang dang tshe bskyed dang// spyan drang dang ni bstim pa dang// tshe yi rang bzhin 'gugs pa'i thabs// tshe bcings bzlas brjod tshe brlan dang// dbang bskur sdom dang sba bar bya// dam bca' dor na bgegs dbang 'gyur// dgra dbang 'gyur dang mkha' 'gros gtses// rbod gtong khar bab dus min 'gro// tshe nyams pa yi rgyu ru bshad// gzi brjid me dang lus nyams bral// mdog skya bya ba dor ba dang// yid mi bde dang brjid stobs med// tshe nyams pa yi rtags su bshad// ston pa rgyu dang man ngag mkhas// gnas ni bkra shis nyams kyang dga'// yum dang karma ging gi 'khor// yo byad rdzas rnams tshogs pa dang// bkra shis dus la 'jug par bya// phyi mtshams dang ni phyi bshags dang// nang mtshams dang ni kha skong bya// dam sri mnan dang sgo byang gdags// ma traM mnan cing rdo rje'i 'gros// mtshon cha khro bo khrag 'thung rol// bdag gi tshe yi sngon 'gror bshad// dkyil 'khor thig bzhi ling tshe dgu// pad+ma 'dab brgyad gru chad bzhi// sgo dang bcas pa bri bar bya// dbus su shel gyi bum par ni// dmar ser

ba yi 'o ma dang// cong zhi dkar po rnam gsum dang// dkar dang mngar gsum 'chi med sman// byang chub sems sogs gzhag par bya// mu ge sel ba'i 'bru lnga dang// 'du ba sel ba'i sman lnga dang// nor gyi dbyig ldan rin chen lnga// snying po lnga dang dri lnga bshams// tshe 'bras rgya gram rgyas btab nas// mda' dang bcas pa bzhag pa ni// lha yi grangs dang mnyam par bya// mchod pa mang pos yongs su bskor// rtags gdab las ni bskos la gdab// rtags dang byin dbab bskang ba la// ting 'dzin gsum las byung ba yi// 'byung ba rim brtsegs gzhal yas gdan// dbus su tshe dpag med pa yab yum gnyis// phyogs bzhir rigs kyi yum bzhi la// mtshams su gsang ba'i yum bzhi nyid// pad+ma brgyad la lha mo brgyad// sgo bzhi sgo ma bkod nas ni// spyan drangs pa yi rim pa bya// tshe yi rang bzhin yum gyi mkha'// rdo rje rgya gram nyi zla'i steng// rgya gram lte ba nr-i bcas pa// A yur+dz+nyA na bin du b+h+rUM// shin tu gsal bar shes par bya'o// hU~M pad+ma stong ldan dbus kyi pho brang nas// bcom ldan gsung mchog mgon po tshe dpag med// thugs ka'i dpal be'u zla gsang ga'u nas// rnal 'byor byang chub sems kyi A yuHdmar po 'di// rtse gcig bdag gis bsgrubs pa'i tshe lags kyi// bdag la byin gyis rlobs shing gshegs su gsol// shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams nas// rdo rje rigs kyi yum chen dbyings phyug ma// lho phyogs dpal dang ldan pa'i zhing khams nas// rin chen rigs kyi yum chen mA ma kI// nub phyogs bde ba can gyi zhing khams nas// pad+ma rigs kyi yum chen na bza' dkar// byang phyogs rnam dag bkod pa'i zhing khams nas// las kyi rigs kyi yum chen dam tshig sgrol// dbus phyogs byang chub snying po'i zhing khams nas// de bzhin rigs kyi yum chen sangs rgyas spyan// bde ba rgyas 'debs reg pa sra ba'i sa// bde ba tshe 'phel de ni gsher ba'i chu// bde ba za byed de ni dro ba'i me// bde ba rmongs byed de ni g.yo ba'i rlung// thig le nam mkha' bde stong 'bebs mdzad ma// rdo rje tshe yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rdo rje sgeg mo dga' ba'i ye shes rol// rin chen phreng ba ma ni mchog dga' nyid// pad+ma klu len dga' bral ye shes sbyong// las kyi karma lhan skyes ye shes spyod// rdo rje bdug pa ma ni thig le g.yo// rin chen me tog ma ni thig le 'bar// pad+ma mar me ma ni thig le'i 'bebs// las kyi dri chab ma ni thig le brten// byams pa'i lcags kyu mas ni zhi bas 'gugs// snying rje zhags pa mas ni rgyas pas 'ching// dga' ba'i lcags sgrog mas ni dbang du sdud// btang snyoms dril bu mas ni drag pos 'bebs// lha mo nyi shu'i thugs kyi

dpal be'u nas// rnal 'byor byang chub sems kyi A yuHdmar po 'di// rtse gcig bdag gi bsgrubs pa'i tshe lags kyi// bdag la byin gyis rlobs shing gshegs su gsol// A yur+dz+nyA na sa ma ya dza/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ bcom ldan mgon po snang mtha' tshe dpag med// sku mdog dmar po gzi brjid 'bar// phyag mtshan pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsnams// phyag mtshan pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha' gang ba'i bgegs bcom nas// bcom ldan deng 'dir tshe yi dngos grub stsol// 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe la mnga' mdzad kyang// 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe ni mi 'gugs kyis// bdag cag rnal 'byor mched lcam 'khor bcas kyi// tshe la nyams pa mchis na gso ru gsol// tshe la yo ba mchis na bsrang du gsol// tshe la ya rab mchis na dgug tu gsol// tshe la chad pa mchis na rdo rje'i mdud pa mdzad du gsol// shar phyogs dri za'i lag nas tshe khug la// shar lho'i me lha'i lag nas drod phyung zhig/ lho phyogs gshin rje'i lag nas srog skyobs la// lho nub srin po'i lag nas sha rnams khug/ nub phyogs klu yi lag nas dpal phrog la// nub byang rlung lha'i lag nas dbugs phrog cig/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin lag nas longs spyod khug/ byang shar dbang ldan lag nas zungs khrag drongs// steng phyogs nyi zla'i lag nas mdangs phrog la// 'og phyogs sa bdag lag nas gzi brjid khug/ lha dbang brgya byin lag nas srog khug la// ma yams dmu srin lag nas tshe drongs shig/ btsan 'dre btsun 'dre'i lag nas longs spyod khug/ the'u rang 'gong po'i lag nas srog skyobs shig/ yul bdag ma srin la gnas dpal khug cig/ tshe khug srog skyobs bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod// oM A yur+dz+nyA na tshe b+h+rUM/ sra byed sa la dbang byed sangs rgyas spyan// mnyen sdud chu la dbang byed mA ma kI// sreg byed me yi kun spyod gos dkar mo// g.yo byed rlung gi 'gugs byed dam tshig sgrol// kun shongs go 'byed nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma// rdo rje sgeg mo bde ba'i nyams la spyod// rin chen phreng ba bde ba mi brjed 'dzin// pad+ma dbyangs mkhan bde ba'i nyams la rol// las kyi gar mkhan bde ba'i 'bebs pa'o// bde ba rgyas 'debs zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan// bde ba tshe 'phel rgyas las brjid par ldan// bde ba za byed rang gi lus la 'bar// bde ba rmongs byed rnam par rtog pa 'joms// byang chub sesam kyi dud pa'i sprin du 'khrigs// rin chen 'dzes pa'i me tog yab la 'bul// mar me 'od gsal yab yum 'du 'bral med// thig le bdud rtsi yum gyi b+ha gar 'bebs// lcags kyus drang pas nyams ni sems la 'char// zhags pas bcings pas bde ba lus la

'bar// lcags sgrog sdom pas mthong snang lus la skyes// dril bus sgeg pas gsung ni sngags su 'char// las bzhi'i phrin las bag chags sems la smin// tshe la dbang mdzad lha mo nyi shu yis// tshe khug tshe drongs gsang ba'i phrin las mdzod// oM badzra mug ta ho/ shar gyi phyogs nas tshe 'dren srog 'gugs ma// byams pa'i rang bzhin lcags kyu ma// phyag g.yas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams// sku mdog dkar po 'od dang ldan// phyag g.yon nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams// puSh+pa rA ga'i 'od zer 'phro// phyag g.yas zla ba'i dkyil steng na// thabs kyi tshe 'dzin bum pa bsnams// phyag g.yon nyi ma'i dkyil steng na// shes rab 'gugs pa'i lcags kyus 'dren// 'gro kun tshe la mnga' brnyes ma// tshe khug srog skyobs gsang ba'i phrin las mdzod// badzra ang+ku sha dza/ lho yi phyogs nas srog skyobs tshe 'gugs ma// snying rje'i rang bzhin lha mo zhags pa ma// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od zer 'phro// phyag g.yas zla ba'i gzhal yas nas// shes rab tshe yi bum pa bsnams// phyag g.yon nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nas// thabs kyi tshe 'ching zhags pa bsnams// 'gro kun tshe srog sdud mdzad ma// rnal 'byor tshe yi las mdzod cig/ pA sha hU~M/ nub kyi phyogs nas srog skyobs tshe 'gugs ma// dga' bas dbang mdzad lha mo lcags sgrog ma// sku mdog dmar po 'bar ba la// pad+ma 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro// phyag g.yas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// shes rab stong pa'i tshe 'dzin ma// phyag g.yon nyi ma'i dkyil steng na// thabs kyi lcags sgrog snying rje can// khams gsum tshe srog mnga' mdzad ma// rnal 'byor tshe la longs spyod kun// khug cig drongs shig brtan par mdzod// s+pho Ta baM/ byang gi phyogs nas srog skyobs tshe 'gugs ma// btang snyoms rang bzhin lha mo dril bu ma// sku mdog ljang gu 'bar ba la// ma ra ka ta'i 'od 'phro ma// phyag g.yas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor na// kun gyi tshe 'dzin bum pa bsnams// phyag g.yon nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor na// kun gyi tshe dgyes dril bu 'khrol// 'gro kun tshe la mnga' mdzad kyang// 'gro kun tshe ni mi 'gugs kyang// rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor bcas kyi// tshe khug srog skyob phrin las mdzod// g+haN+De hoH// 'phro 'du 'od kyis bkug byas nas// ma lus bum pa'i bcud la bsdu// de nas rdo rje'i tshe bcings pa// badzra s+pho Ta baM zhes pas// nyi zla ga'u rdo rje'i 'dzin// lcags sgro dag gis bcing bar bya// rang nyid lhar gsal sna bug nas// rlung gi 'od kyi 'phro 'du bya// oM badzra A yu She hUM A/ de bas 'gro drug thams cad kyi// tshe dang gzi brjid kun phrogs nas// za ma tog tu bsdus nas ni// tshe yi rigs 'dzin rnams la

bstim// dpa' bo 'bru lnga gsal ba yis// tshe yi dbang ni bskur bar gyur// oM phung po lha yi dkyil 'khor du// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i rang bzhin las// 'byung lnga yum gyi gzugs su bcas// khyod la bskur bas tshe yi dbang// rdo rje tshe dbang thob gyur cig/ kA la sha bak+Sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oMHhU~MHtraMHhrIHaHnr-iH/ de nas slob ma'i snying ga'i nr-i la tshe bstim ste// rang lus gzi brjid 'bar te 'od dang ldan// khams kyi bdud rtsi rgyas par gyur// tshe yi rang bzhin yi ge nr-i// skye mched a ru rab tu gnas// cis kyang mi tshugs mi shigs pa'i// stong pa'i go cha bla na med// chos kyi dbyings su sbas nas ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs so// de nas gtor ma gtang bar bya// lhag chad kha bskangs nas/ spyod lam legs par gnas par bya'o// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ tshe bsgrubs pa chen po'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba dag pa'i dkyil 'khor du tshe bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// bde ba'i gnas su dkyil 'khor ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gru chad sgo// dbus na mgon po tshe dpag med// shar na mi bskyod lhor rin 'byung// nub na snang mtha' byang don grub// sa yi snying po rdo rje sems// nam mkha'i snying po rin chen sems// spyan ras gzigs ni pad+ma sems// las kyi sems dpa' phyag rdor yin// sgo bzhi gshin rje stobs chen dang// rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gnas// tshe bum chang dang tshe 'bras bca'// mda' dang dar bcas mchod rdzas rnams// dkyil 'khor du ni mdzes par bsham// bde gshegs bskyed cig spyan drangs bstim// mchod nas tshe yi dngos grub bsgrub// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+wa sid+d+hi lo tsa ni sarba sA ar+tha d+ha na A yur+dz+nyA na bin du b+h+rUM/ a pa ri mi ta tshe b+h+rUM/ hU~M dbus kyi mgon po tshe dpag med// yab yum thugs kyi ga'u nas// A yuHdmar po rang byung nas// don grub thugs rgyud rang bzhin bkug/ rdzas la bstim zhing bsgrub par bya// byang phyogs nub phyogs pad+ma dbang gi dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan byams mgon tshe dpag med// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zla gsang ga'u nas// byang chub sems kyi A yuHdmar po 'di// rtse gcig dbang gis bsgrubs pa'i tshe lags na// byin gyis brlabs shing bdag la dngos grub stsol// rigs kyi rgyal ba yab yum rnams// tshul mchog 'di yis shes par bya// tshe yi pho nya btang nas kyang// srid gsum gnas nas tshe srog ni// yi ge nr-i ru bsdus byas nas// byang sems bde ba chen po yi/ kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa nyid// A yuHdmar po shes par bya// skye ba med pa'i sems nyid 'di// 'chi med rdo rje zhes bya ste// mi 'gyur g.yung drung ye brdal che// mi

nub ye shes rgyal mtshan yin// de lta bu yi dngos grub ni// rnal 'byor bdag gis blang bar bya// mched dang lcam dral slob ma rnams// tshe yi bum pas dbang bskur nas// tshe yi rang bzhin gnas shes pa// dpa' bo 'bru lngas dbang bstim bya// mkha' 'gro chos skyong gtor ma gtang// gter sba dge sngo dkyil 'khor bsdu// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ gsang ba dag pa'i dkyil 'khor du tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba dag pa'i rdzas la tshe bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// bkra shis dag pa'i rdzas btsal te// mdo sde zangs gzhong 'khar sder du// kr-i ya nya phyis dung chos la// ma hA skye ba bdun pa'i ro// bya rgod rkang gi sbubs bltas te// zhun chen mar mer gzugs bdun pa// skra kham shel mig dpral dbyibs che// sme bdun ba spu zang thal byung// dung so 'khor bar yod pa yis// tshe skyems tshe 'bras gzungs thag bzung// snod ni gzhal yas khang gyur nas// tshe skyems sid+d+ha lo tsa nI// ljang ser gzhal gcig phyag bzhi ma// tshe dar gri gug g.yas pa na// bdud rtsi bum pa rgya gram g.yon// de yi mkha' dbyings tshe dpag med// dmar po gzhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// rin chen phreng ba za ma tog/ shel phreng ne'u le'i rkyal pa g.yon// de 'khor rigs kyi yum chen lnga// rigs mdog yum chen lnga ni phyag mtshan rigs// mig la rgyas 'debs lcags kyu dkar// rna bar rmongs byed zhags pa sngo// sna la tshe 'phel lcags sgrog dmar// lce la za byed dril bu ljang// tshe bsrung pad+ma kun+d+ha li// dmar po pad+ma rgya gram bsnams// A yuHtshe b+h+rUM dz+nyA na tshe b+h+rUM bin du b+h+rUM/ a pa ra mi ta tshe b+h+rUM/ chag pa'i rdo rje bdag nyid che// pad+ma rgyal po kun d+ha li// sprul pa'i khro bo grangs med pas// tshe la gnod pa'i bgegs rnams kun// de yi gzugs bcom pha rol du// song zhing tshe la gnod byed bskrad// b+han+d+ha Ta Tha phaT/ tshe la dbang bskur bstim pa dang// sbas nas rgyas btab smon lam gdab// thod pa longs spyod gter du bcangs// sha rnams su yis zos pas ni// thun mong dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ gsang ba dag pa'i rdzas las/ tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i yum la tshe bsgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// dben pa'i gnas su phyin nas ni// pad+ma can nam dung can nam// ba glang 'dra'am ri dwags 'dra// mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzungs ma la// dpa' bo 'bru lnga lus la bkod// rigs lnga ye shes lngar byin brlabs// yab yum mkha' gsang bsnol bas ni// rdo rje pad+mar

byin brlabs nas// bde mchog bde bral bde ba dang// lhan skyes khu ba 'phro 'du las// hrIHlas rta mgrin khro bo dmar// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// sngags 'chang rgyal po gang gnas pa// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid de la gnas// phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor na// sma sha nag mo don snying za// de yi yang gsang thugs dkyil nas// gsung gi rgyal po rta mchog dpal// phyag mtshan phyag na 'brug drug bsnams// 'brug dkar 'brug sngon 'brug ljang dang// 'brug ser 'brug dmar 'brug nag bsnams// 'brug gi kha nas glog 'byin cing// glog gi kha nas thog 'bebs la// gnod sbyin dmar po'i klad pa 'gems// de yis sems kyi dal bsnams nas// drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ rdo rje tshe yi dngos grub stsol// oM A yur+dz+nyA na tshe b+h+rUM/ dga' ba bzhi dang ldan pa yi// bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi bsgrub pa yis// khu ba 'thung na nad med cing// de yi tshe yang lha dang mnyam// dbang gi mchog tu de 'gyur ro// sgrub pa po yi thugs gnas bstim// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ gsang ba mkha' dbyings la tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos kyis/ mchod pa de kho na nyid kyis mchod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bde ba chen po'i thugs// 'gro ba kun la kun gzhi yid// rnal 'byor A yuH'i tshe rnams bsgrub// dam rdzas byang sems dkar dmar len// 'di yi tshe dang srog brten nas// mgon po khyed la rjes yi rang// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// 'gyur med tshe yi dngos grub rgyud// rdo rje chos kyis zung la mkha' 'gros srungs// chos kyi spyan ldan spyod pas 'gro don mdzad// mi nub bstan pa rgyas par khyed kyis spyod// ces gsungs so// ston pa dang 'khor rnams chos nyid kyi ngang du thim ste chos skur bzhugs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'chi med tshe'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Dita bi ma la mi tra la/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba mjing gsal 'bar gyi zhus te bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ bud+d+ha a mr-i ta dz+nyA na pra b+ha bAn tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud rtsi ye shes 'od ldan gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ b+ha ga bAn rA dza a mr-i ta na ma/ bcom ldan 'das

bdud rtsi'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi'i rgyal po dang/ kun tu bzang mo gnyis ri rab kyi rtse mo la bdud rtsi rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi'i rgyal po yab yum gyi thugs ka nas/ 'od zer rnam pa lnga yang phyogs bcur 'phros pa las rigs lnga khrag 'thung yab yum dang/ khro bo khro mo dang/ sems dpa' sems ma dang/ dpa' bo dpa' mo dang/ rigs gsum mgon po dang/ lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang/ tshangs pa khyab 'jug ma hA de ba la sogs pa 'dus shing 'khod de/ ye shes sprin phung 'khrigs nas/ bdud rtsi'i char phab pas/ ri rab kyi bang rim la sogs pa/ 'jig rten du bdud rtsi bcud dang ldan pa zhes bya ba/ rtsa ba gro ma'am sran nag spangs pa 'dra ba/ tshig ring tshi ba dang/ ro kha la dngas pa/ mngar la tsha zhing bde ba/ me tog lnga dang ldan zhing/ bdud rtsi'i zil pa chags pa nub mo 'od dang ldan pa 'khrungs te/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis zos pas/ kun kyang bde bas brgyal te bog go/ sa yang rab tu g.yos so// kun tu rab tu yos so// kun gyi byang sems dkar dmar 'phel shing bo ba las/ sa bcud dang/ chu bcud/ me bcud/ rlung bcud/ nam mkha'i bcud/ rdo bcud/ sngo bcud/ ldum bu'i bcud/ lnga ldan bcud/ spos bcud/ shing bcud/ sha bcud la sogs pa/ srid pa'i bcud thams cad rgyas shing 'khrungs par gyur te/ 'di rnams kyi bcud khong du song ba la brten nas bde ba rgyas te/ 'gro ba mi la sogs pa dpag tu med pa 'phel lo// rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis zhi ba'i las rnams grub cing me long ye shes la mnga' brnyes so// rin chen rigs rnams kyis// rgyas pa'i phrin las grub cing/ mnyam nyid ye shes la mnga' brnyes so// pad+ma'i rigs rnams kyis/ dbang gi phrin las grub cing/ so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes la mnga' brnyes so// las kyi rigs rnams kyis/ drag po'i phrin las grub cing/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes la mnga' brnyes so// bud+d+ha'i rigs rnams kyis/ lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las thams cad grub cing/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la mnga' brnyes so// thugs rje chen pos ye shes la mnga' brnyes so// phyag na rdo rjes nus mthu la mnga' brnyes so// 'jam dpal shes rab la mnga' brnyes so// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za rnams kyis longs spyod la mnga' brnyes so// tshangs pa khyab 'jug ma hA de ba/ srid pa gsum la mnga' brnyes shing/ sa chu me rlung nags kyi lha la sogs pa bdag byas so// sangs rgyas kyi bdud rtsi ye shes 'od ldan rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas gsang bdag rdo rje

'dzin// gus pas phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// 'gro ba'i mgon po bcom ldan 'das// ting nge 'dzin las rab bzhengs shig/ e ma e ma ting 'dzin lngas// bdud rtsi ye shes 'od zer can// 'di yi rgyu rkyen 'od zer ci// smin byed dbang gi 'od zer skur// dam tshig sdom pa gang ltar bsrung// brtag cing bsdu ba nam tsam yin// 'di mthus rtsal ni gang gang gdon// bcud kyi len lugs ji ltar bgyid// 'di dus lha ni gang gang bsgom// lta bsgom spyod 'bras ji ltar 'chad// zhi rgyas dbang drag dgug bskrad mnan// gzir la sogs pa'i las sogs dang// 'chang zhing gtad pa ji ltar bgyi// 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsung du gsol// sangs rgyas kyi bdud rtsi ye shes 'od ldan rgyud las/ zhus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi'i rgyal pos zhal gyi 'dzum pa rab tu bstan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so gsang ba'i bdag/ khyed kyi zhus pa shin tu+u legs// chaus nyid nam mkha' skye med las// nga yi 'od zer rnam lngar shar// rigs lnga bzhi khro yab yum dang// sems dpa' sems ma rigs gsum mgon// dpa' bo dpa' mo thams cad dang// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za'i tshogs// tshangs pa khyab 'jug ma hA de ba// 'khor 'das ma lus thams cad kun// nga yi ting 'dzin sprul pa yin// ngas bshad ma nor yid la bzung// bdud rtsi ye shes 'od zil can// 'di rgyu kun bzang byang chub sems// rgyu rkyen yab yum bde stong rtsal// drod gsher byin brlabs 'dus las skyes// 'di yi yon tan thos pas myong// rdo rje zhi ba me long nyid// rin chen rgyas pa mnyam nyid do// pad+ma dbang dang so sor rtogs// las kyis drag po'i bya ba 'grub// bud+d+has kun 'grub chos dbyings thob// zhi khro yi dam lha zhal mthong// snying rje nus mthus shes rab skyed// dpa' bo dpa' mo 'du zhing sdud// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang// tshangs pa khyab 'jug ma hA de// dbang bsgyur las kun ci bcol byed// rkang mgyogs mig sman mngon shes 'grub// sgro ltar yang zhing rlung ltar mgyogs// gyad stobs ldan zhing lo stong thub// kun yid 'phrog cing DA ki 'du// bde ba rgyas shing lan brgya nus// zas nor 'du zhing zhen chags bral// rang rig rtogs nas zag pa zad// mi snang chos dbyings ngang du gnas// tha mal sems can phal pa dang// dud 'gro rnams kyis zos gyur kyang// bcud 'phel lus rgyas tshe ring zhing// srid 'phel mdangs ldan rma la bzang// spu legs sha rgyas 'o ma che// rigs mdangs bde bas mchog la skyed// ye shes 'od ldan rgyud las/ gnas lugs rgyu rkyen

yon tan gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ye shes 'od ldan dbang bskur ni// bla ma mtshan nyid ldan pa la// yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas nyid du// zhen log dad brtson ldan pa yis// dbang bskur bcud len gdams ngag zhu// dus ni tshes grangs bzang po la// thabs shes su ra 'dzom byas te// stegs bu mda' gang gru bzhi'i mkhar// dkar ser dmar ljang dbus mthing ga'i// pad 'dab bzhi pa tshom bu lnga// gtor tshogs mar me me tog spos// thod rnga dril bu mi rkang gling// gsur chen dud pa a mr-i ta// bla ma dpa' bo dpa' mos bskor// oM AHhU~M me long la bri'o// bum thod bdud rtsi 'bru gsum don// skal dang ldan la dbang bskur bya// ston pa bcom ldan thugs rje'i bdag/ 'gro ba smin cing grol la dgod// dug lnga'i nad 'joms bdud rtsi'i rgyal// ye shes 'od ldan dbang bskur stsol// lan gsum zhu ba phul dus su// rol mo'i sgra sgrog rig pa bskul// 'dar 'phar 'khrab cing mi rtog skye// byin rlabs dag snang rgya cher 'chad// khrus bum slob ma'i mgo thog gzhag/ snod bcud gzhal yas lha yi tshogs// skal ldan bu la dbang bskur bas// lus kyi dri ma dag gyur nas// sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam par shog/ kA ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ de nas thod pa'i bdud rtsi sbyin// dug gsum sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bcud// skal ldan bu la dbang bskur bas// ngag gi dri ma dag gyur nas// sangs rgyas gsung dang mnyam par shog/ wAka a b+hi Shiny+tsa AH/ de nas me long a hU~M bstan// sku gsung thugs ldan rang rig gis// skal dang ldan la dbang bskur bas// sems kyi dri ma dag gyur nas// sangs rgyas thugs dang mnyam par shog/ tsit+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ de nas A lo ke bstan la/ gsal gyur rig stong kun la khyab// skal dang ldan la dbang bskur bas// lus ngag yid gsum dag gyur nas// sangs rgyas thugs dgongs ldan par shog/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta A lo ke ma hA d+harma kA ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM AHhU~M/ ye shes 'od ldan rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ye shes 'od ldan dam tshig ni// lus ngag yid gsum mi dge sdom// dme yugs mdze pho'i zas gos spang// dur khrod rgyu zhing bcu len bya// me dang nyi ma yun mi ring// lus lha ngag sngags sems nyid blta// mnga' gsol bstod pa nyams glu len// chags sdang long gtam smra ba spang// skyid sdug 'khrul rtog rjes bcadal// ci yang mi dmigs don la bzhag/ ye shes 'od ldan rgyud las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ye shes 'od ldan brtags shing btu// dus ni

dbyar smad ston ser kha// bde gshegs gsung bsgrags DA ki gnas// grub thob zhabs bcags gnyan pa'i sa// nyi logs yid 'ongs pad+ma skye// tshig ring tshi can snum 'od ldan// sems can sbrang bu phra mo sdud// rtsa ba sran nag gro ma 'dra// ring thung mtho gang chags gang lhag/ me tog lnga ldan shas cher dkar// dus gsum sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bcud// bde ba mchog las 'khrungs pa yin// 'di dang su 'phrad skal dang ldan// nya dang gnam stong tshes brgyad dang// tshes bcu nyer gnyis nyer lnga dang// khye'u bu mo gzhon yid 'ong// khrus byas rgyan brtags rnams kyis btu// yang na dge sbyong rnal 'byor pa// khrims gtsang byams ldan rtogs ldan btu// oM si li si li pad+ma si li swA hA/ ma rul ma sums grib bskam bya// ye shes 'od ldan rgyud las/ brtags shing btu ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rtsa ba'i bcud mchog 'od ldan dang// de nyid rtsal 'don sa na se// srin nad sel zhing byang sems 'phel// sngo yi bcud mchog 'od dang ldan// de nyid rtsal 'don bu ram gyis// rlung kha gnon cing lus shed skye// me tog bcud mchog 'od ldan dang// de nyid rtsal 'don sbrang rtsi yis// lus zungs skyed cing dbang po gsal// rtsi yi bcud mchog 'od ldan dang// de nyid rtsal 'don rtsi mar gyis// grang ba sel zhing lus sha yang// 'bru yi bcud mchog 'od ldan dang// de nyid rtsal 'don 'bras nas chang// nyams myong 'ur cing bde gsal 'char// drod gsher bcud mchog 'od dang ldan// de nyid rtsal 'don til yungs mar// rus bcud 'phel zhing snum bag ldan// pho yi bcud mchog 'od ldan dang// de nyid rtsal 'don byang sems dkar// pho gdon 'dul zhing pho dbang sdud// mo yi bcud mchog 'od ldan dang// de nyid rtsal 'don rak+ta dmar// mo gdon 'dul zhing mo dbang sdud// zas kyi bcud mchog 'od ldan dang// de nyid rtsal 'don dri chen gyis// mdze nad 'joms shing zas dbang sdud// chu yi bcud mchog 'od ldan dang// de nyid rtsal 'don dri chu yis// nad rims bsrung zhing dam grib sel// sha yi bcud mchog 'od ldan dang// de nyid rtsal 'don sha chen gyis// skya sbos smyo sel mdangs ldan bde// nus pa'i bcud mchog 'od ldan dang// de nyid rtsal 'don gu gul brgyad// sde brgyad dngangs shing sreg par byed// yang ni ye shes 'od ldan gyis// sa yi bcud kyi rtsal 'don na// rgya tshwa rgyam tshwa kha ru tshwa// zas ma zhu rnams sel bar byed// chu yi bcud kyi rtsal 'don na// nya yi klad pa sram sha brun// skom ma zhu rnams sel bar byed// me yi bcud kyis rtsal 'don na// lga dang drod sman tsi tra ka/ pho ba'i me drod nyams pa sel// rlung gi bcud

kyis rtsal 'don na// srid bu rgya tshil gong mo'i sha/ grang ba sel zhing stobs chen 'phel// nam mkha'i bcud kyi rtsal 'don na// snying dang yid mthun gnas grogs bstan// mi rtog bde gsal nyams myong 'char// rdo yi bcud kyis rtsal 'don na// cong zhi brag zhun mu zi ser// bad mkhris gdon sel tshe bcud 'phel// sngo yi bcud kyis rtsal 'don na// lcam pa te ku lang ka skyes// grang bas chu bsdoms 'khrul ba sel// ldum gyi bcud kyis rtsal 'don na// ram nye nye shing dbang po lag/ thig le sha rgyas grang rlung sel// spod kyi bcud kyis rtsal 'don na// lung tang pi ling go snyod dang// mig skyon sel zhing bde ba 'phel// shing gi bcud kyi rtsal 'don na// sug sme dza ti a ru+u ra// stobs chen sha rgyas rlung nad sel// sha yi bcud kyis rtsal 'don na// da bying brag rtsangs sbrul ser sha/ khu 'phel mdangs ldan stobs kyis sel// tshangs pa khyab 'jug ma hA de ltar 'gyur// ye shes 'od ldan rgyud las/ rtsal 'don gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ye shes 'od ldan bcud len 'di// phye ma khaN+Da gnyis yin te// nyung phye mang la khaN+Da bya// 'od ldan ma rul ma sums pa// shing bcud a ru ra dang ni// bstun la zhib brdungs 'bri mar sbrang// sbyar te zla ba drug zos na// tshe dbang rig 'dzin lo stong thub// 'od ldan sngo bcud lcam 'bru phye// sbrang dang sbyar zos chu 'gags sel// 'od ldan phul gang kar bam brgyad// sbrang rtsi bu ram de dag 'dra// ldum bcud dbang lag 'od ldan mnyam// zhib btags 'o ma bre gsum la// bsdu bas bre dor song la gdab// zla phyed bar du lto stong la// zos na sha rgyas rgas pa med// khong nad byang zhing nyams shed skye// lus yang rta bas mgyogs par 'gyur// 'od ldan ldum bcud dbang po lag/ ka ra ba mar 'o bre gsum// phul bzhir bsdu bar legs btab ste// zos na mdog bzang dran yid gzhung// 'od ldan ldum bcud dbang po lag/ dur byid sbyar zos dug zos 'khru// 'od ldan ldum bcud dbang po lag/ 'o mar bsdus la shing bcud ni// a ru ra dang sa yi bcud// rgya tshwa rgyam tshwa kha ru tshwa// sha bcud da byid bcud btab nyid// zla phyed zos na lus stobs ldan// rgas med DA ki brgya la nus// 'od ldan sngo bcud 'o ma 'dzin// rdo bcud khab len cong zhi ni// 'o mar btab ste zos gyur na// thig le 'phel zhing nad rnams sel// 'gro ba kun gyi yid 'phrog 'gyur// 'od ldan sngo bcud kyi lce dkar// me tog tshe tse'i bye phul gang// a ru ra bzhi gar bam lnga// klu bdud rdo rje ma gi ta// legs sbyar tho rangs dri chus 'phul// zla gcig song na mdze yang sos// 'od ldan spos bcud go snyod

dang// phag tshil sbyar la rkang rgyud byug/ gtsug tu 'bri mar bzang bskus te// tho rangs theg mos so rgyag brad// de yis mig mnye dri chus bkru// lo gnyis tsam byas mig rib sel// 'od ldan a sho a d+ha dang// ba yi mar srang phyed sbyar za// lus kyi sha rgyas thig le 'phel// ram nye'i phye ma bre gsum la// shing bcud a ru ra ni gsum// yang na 'om bu'i rtsa ba nyid// btab ste ram nye tshos par btsos// grib bskams byas te 'od ldan dang// sa bcud me bcud rdo bcud rnams// zhib btags thus mgo gsum gsum 'gams// lus yang nad sel bcud 'phel rgyas// 'od ldan sngo bcud nA ge sar// ra dkar ba mar 'o
